title: Coach-kæmpen Kim: Sådan får du succes med træning og vægttab
subtitle: Bodybuilder Kim Kold arbejder med at coache både mænd og kvinder frem til en mere sund og veltrænet krop
body:
Der er stor forskel på, om man er 25 eller 56 år, hvis det handler om at få en mere trænet krop. Men med den rette indstilling kan alle opnå positive resultater og vægttab, lyder budskabet fra en af Danmarks kendteste bodybuildere, den 56-årige Kim Kold.
Han har en fortid som fodboldmålmand på førstedivisionsniveau i Hvidovre IF. I dag bor han med familien i Spanien, hvorfra han onlinecoacher og hver uge sender små personlige videoer med ny inspiration til sine klienter.
- Jeg plejer at understrege, at hjernen er den vigtigste muskel, man kan træne. For er hjernen ikke gearet ordentligt til det eller de mål, man nu har for øje, er der stor risiko for, at tingene falder til jorden, lyder det fra den store mand, som vi møder i TarGet Gym i Kastrup på Amager. Han tilføjer dog, at man er nødt til at være realistisk, i forhold til hvor man er sit liv.
- Der er stor forskel på, om man som mand er 25 eller 56 år, som jeg selv er, hvis det handler om at få en mere trænet krop.
BOKS: Kolds fire regler for succes
- Når jeg hjælper en mand eller kvinde til at tabe kilo, og vedkommende samtidig ønsker at tone sin krop, så er et af mine bedste råd, at man konsekvent tager små skridt ad gangen. Det kan godt være, at endemålet måske er at smide 25 eller 30 kilo, men har man kun dette store mål for øje, er der godt nok langt frem til målstregen.
- Så hellere dele rejsen op i mindre og mere overkommelige delmål. Det kan hjernen og kroppen også meget bedre kapere og arbejde med.
Motivation og ressourcer
- Man behøver ikke at være super fanatisk og leve som en fanatiker for at kunne opnå gode og vedvarende resultater. Man skal også gerne have det godt med sig selv, sin familie og sine omgivelser mens man arbejder sig frem mod den fysik, man ønsker sig.
- For mig som coach er det reelt lige meget, om man er utrænet eller trænet, eller om man kan træne to eller fem gange om ugen. Det vigtigste er, at man selv vil det. Og vil man det nok - her kommer ens tankesæt igen ind i billedet - så kan alle, også ’os gamle’, være med på vognen, smiler kæmpen Kim Kold
Han ynder at omtale sig selv som voksencoach, da han nu selv har nået en alder, hvor rigtig mange erfaringer hjælper ham til at guide og vejlede også meget voksne personer til at få succes.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Ikke to mennesker er ens - alle er vi unikke
- Uanset om det har været i min tid som fodboldspiller, bodybuilder eller skuespiller, så har mit udgangspunkt altid været den sunde livsstil, hvor kost og motion har været, og stadig er en del af min hverdag, smiler manden, mens han tørrer sveden af panden - og fortsætter så:
- Vi spejler os i andre, og ser helt naturligt også op til andre. Det kender vi nok alle til - og intet galt i det. Med den type af inspiration kan man helt sikkert også komme et stykke ad vejen.
- Det vigtigste er dog, når det kommer til at komme i mål med f.eks. et ønsket vægttab, det er, at man er realistisk og vedholdende. Så er det nemlig muligt at blive den bedste version af sig selv - uanset udgangspunkt, alder, opgave mv.
- Desuden, ikke at forglemme, så spiller de daglige prioriteringer også en væsentlig rolle. I forhold til f.eks. at sørge for at spise sundt og få trænet måske 2-3 gange om ugen, man nødvendigvis ikke engang skal ud ad døren for. Naturligvis er der fordele ved at komme i et træningscenter, men da hellere få trænet en smule derhjemme end slet ikke at få trænet.
- Her spiller mindsettet og ens prioriteringer igen-igen ind, slutter den store dansker, inden han med stor entusiasme kaster sig over en ny træningsøvelse sammen med sin klient.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Skurk og stærk mand foran kameraet
Filmentusiaster husker nok Kim Kold fra 2010-filmen ’10 timer til Paradis’, der også vakte stor interesse i udlandet og var med på en række internationale filmfestivaler, og som i høj grad bidrog til, at den danske muskelmand fik endnu mere smag for at agere foran kameraet.
Alligevel havde han dog aldrig regnet med, at det skulle kaste roller af sig i storfilm som eksempelvis ’Fast and Furious’, hvor han spillede sammen med nogle af de helt store verdensstjerner. ’Star Trek’, ’Fri os fra det onde’ og ’Antboy’ har også Kim Kold på rollelisten.
- Jeg tror altid på mig selv - og når jeg så ovenikøbet får at vide, at jeg har et naturligt talent for at agere foran kameraet, og jeg samtidig også elsker det, så er det altid fedt at tage hul på et nyt filmprojekt. Især efter de sidste to år, hvor corona har lagt en stor dæmper på hele filmbranchen.
Men nu lysner det heldigvis. I løbet af foråret tager jeg hul på nok en af de mest spændende og langvarige opgaver indtil videre. En serie, hvor alle sejl bliver sat til, og som jeg glæder mig ekstremt meget til at blive en del af, siger den store dansker.
body_en:
There is a big difference between whether you are 25 or 56 when it comes to getting a more fit body. But with the right attitude, everyone can achieve positive results and weight loss, says the message from one of Denmark's best-known bodybuilders, the 56-year-old Kim Kold.
He has a past as a football goalkeeper at first division level in Hvidovre IF. Today he lives with his family in Spain, from where he coaches online and sends small personal videos with new inspiration to his clients every week.
- I usually emphasize that the brain is the most important muscle you can train. Because if the brain is not geared properly to the goal or goals one now has in mind, there is a great risk that things will fall to the ground, says the big man we meet in TarGet Gym in Kastrup on Amager. He adds, however, that you have to be realistic about where you are in your life.
- There is a big difference between whether you, as a man, are 25 or 56, as I am myself, if it is about getting a more trained body.
BOX: Kold's four rules for success
- When I help a man or woman to lose kilos, and the person wants to tone their body at the same time, one of my best pieces of advice is to consistently take small steps at a time. It may well be that the end goal is perhaps to lose 25 or 30 kilos, but if you only have this big goal in mind, there is probably a long way to go to the finish line.
- So better to divide the journey into smaller and more affordable milestones. The brain and body can also hijack and work with this much better.
Motivation and resources
- You don't have to be super fanatic and live like a fanatic to be able to achieve good and lasting results. You also want to feel good about yourself, your family and your surroundings while you work towards the physique you want.
- For me as a coach, it really doesn't matter whether you are untrained or trained, or whether you can train two or five times a week. The most important thing is that you want it yourself. And if you really want to - this is where your mindset comes into play again - then everyone, even 'us old people', can join the bandwagon, smiles the giant Kim Kold
He likes to refer to himself as an adult coach, as he has now himself reached an age where a great deal of experience helps him to guide and mentor even very mature people to succeed.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
No two people are the same - we are all unique
- Whether it has been in my time as a footballer, bodybuilder or actor, my starting point has always been the healthy lifestyle, where diet and exercise have been, and still are, part of my everyday life, the man smiles as he wipes off the sweat the forehead - and then continues:
- We reflect ourselves in others, and quite naturally also look up to others. We probably all know that - and nothing wrong with that. With that type of inspiration, you can certainly go a long way.
- The most important thing, however, is when it comes to achieving e.g. a desired weight loss, it means being realistic and persistent. Then it is possible to become the best version of yourself - regardless of starting point, age, task, etc.
- Furthermore, not to forget, the daily priorities also play a significant role. In relation to e.g. to make sure you eat healthy and get exercise maybe 2-3 times a week, you don't necessarily even have to go out the door for. Of course, there are advantages to going to a gym, but it's better to train a little at home than not train at all.
- Here the mindset and one's priorities come into play again and again, concludes the great Dane, before he throws himself into a new training exercise with his client with great enthusiasm.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Villain and strong man in front of the camera
Film enthusiasts probably remember Kim Kold from the 2010 film '10 hours to Paradise', which also attracted great interest abroad and was featured in a number of international film festivals, and which greatly contributed to the Danish muscle man gaining even more taste for act in front of the camera.
Even so, he never expected that it would lead to roles in blockbusters such as 'Fast and Furious', where he played alongside some of the world's biggest stars. 'Star Trek', 'Free us from evil' and 'Antboy' also have Kim Kold in the cast.
- I always believe in myself - and when, on top of that, I am told that I have a natural talent for acting in front of the camera, and at the same time I also love it, it is always great to start a new film project. Especially after the last two years, when corona has put a big damper on the entire film industry.
But luckily it's getting brighter now. During the spring, I will embark on probably one of the most exciting and long-term tasks so far. A series where all sails are set, and which I am extremely looking forward to being a part of, says the great Dane.

title: Louise blev kendt for sex i radioen - nu står hun frem med nøgenbilleder
subtitle: Louise Fischer er bestemt ikke bange for at vise sig frem, når det går til en god sag
body:
Der er nok ikke mange, som ikke hørte, da journalist Louise Fischer valgte have sex, mens hun lavede en reportage fra en swingerklub i Ishøj til Radio4.
Nu har Louise endnu en gang valgt at bruge sig selv - men denne gang for at sætte fokus på kvindekroppen og kropspositivisme.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Det gør hun i
Illustreret Bunker
, der er det interne blad på Danmarks Medie- og Journalisthøjskole, hvor fotografen har fået lov at komme helt tæt på Louise Fischer, der klæder sig af i en billedserie.
Til Ekstra Bladet fortæller Louise, at hun havde en god oplevelse med nøgenbillederne.
- Fotografen kontaktede mig for at høre, om jeg var interesseret i et blive 'klædt af', og det syntes jeg lød superfedt. Jeg har jo gjort det for at sætte fokus på forskellige kroppe, og jeg tænkte, at det da var fint, hvis jeg kunne inspirere lidt ved selv at stå frem.
En tryg oplevelse
Ifølge 26-årige Louise Fischer var det en god oplevelse at vise sin krop.
- Det var virkelig sjovt og fedt at tage tøjet af, og jeg følte mig meget tryg.
Det er da også blevet til en flot billedserie af den unge kvinde, og Louise er godt tilfreds.
- Jeg er meget positivt overrasket. Jeg er virkelig glad for billederne. De er flotte og fine, og jeg synes, jeg er blevet fanget på en ikke seksualiseret måde. Da jeg så dem, tænkte jeg, at mine deller jo faktisk var smukke, og hvis de så sådan ud, så ville jeg da også lære at elske dem.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
Står frem privat
Selvom Louise er kommet langt med at elske sin krop, er der stadig aspekter, hun arbejder med, og det har billederne hjulpet på.
- Jeg har ikke altid været lige glad for min krop, og jeg er stadig ikke helt tilfreds. Men jeg prøver at være opmærksom på, at jeg godt må have stramt tøj på eller vise mig frem. Det er jo bare hud. Det gør mig ingenting at stille mig frem nøgen. Jeg er slet ikke blufærdig.
- Tænker du over, om det kan påvirke dit virke som journalist, at du bruger dig selv så meget?
- Der er journalist-Louise og der er privat-Louise. Jeg har vist efter min reportage, at jeg sagtens kan være journalist og være dygtig til mit arbejde, så nej, det påvirker bestemt ikke mit arbejde. På mandag skal jeg f.eks. interviewe Lars Løkke, siger hun med et grin.
For at slå det helt fast fortæller Louise, at det er hende privat, der står frem billederne for sin og andres skyld, hvis de kan få noget ud af dem.
- Jeg har heller ikke fået løn for det.
Hør hendes radio-reportage fra Swingerland
her.
body_en:
There are probably not many who did not hear when journalist Louise Fischer chose to have sex while she was doing a report from a swinger club in Ishøj for Radio4.
Now Louise has once again chosen to use herself - but this time to focus on the female body and body positivism.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
She does that
Illustrated Bunker
, which is the internal magazine at Denmark's Media and Journalism College, where the photographer has been allowed to get up close to Louise Fischer, who undresses in a photo series.
Louise tells Ekstra Bladet that she had a good experience with the nude photos.
- The photographer contacted me to see if I was interested in being 'undressed', and I thought that sounded super cool. After all, I did it to focus on different bodies, and I thought it would be nice if I could inspire a little by standing up myself.
A safe experience
According to 26-year-old Louise Fischer, it was a good experience to show her body.
- It was really fun and cool to take off my clothes, and I felt very safe.
It has also turned into a beautiful series of pictures of the young woman, and Louise is well satisfied.
- I am very positively surprised. I am really happy with the pictures. They are beautiful and fine, and I think I have been captured in a non-sexualized way. When I saw them, I thought that my parts were indeed beautiful, and if they looked like that, then I would learn to love them too.
The article continues below the picture...
Appears privately
Although Louise has come a long way in loving her body, there are still aspects she is working on, and the pictures have helped with that.
- I haven't always been happy with my body, and I'm still not completely satisfied. But I try to be aware that I must wear tight clothes or show off. It's just skin after all. It does me no good to present myself naked. I'm not shy at all.
- Do you think about whether it can affect your work as a journalist that you use yourself so much?
- There is journalist Louise and there is private Louise. I have shown after my report that I can easily be a journalist and be good at my work, so no, it certainly does not affect my work. On Monday, for example, I have to interviewing Lars Løkke, she says with a laugh.
To make it absolutely clear, Louise says that it is her privately who displays the pictures for her sake and for the sake of others, if they can get something out of them.
- I haven't been paid for it either.
Listen to her radio report from Swingerland
here.

 'Illustreret Bunker' 'Ishøj' 'Lars Løkke' 'Radio4' 'Swingerland']

title: Britt brutalt stukket ihjel: Fra skønhedsdronning til direktør
subtitle: Den 50-årige direktør Britt Palmgren, der lørdag blev stukket ihjel af sin mand, har siden teenageårene oplevet rampelyset som model - nu mindes hun fra flere sider
body:
’Hej mor, jeg vandt. Jeg blev frøken Aarhus'.
Sådan lød det i en telefax fra en glad ung Britt Kaiser Palmgren, da hun blev kåret i Aarhus Stifttidendes model-konkurrence i 1989.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
– Mine forældre er på ferie og ved ingenting, sagde den kønne dengang 17-årige pige fra forstaden Aabyhøj til det lokale medie, før hun med venlig hjælp i stormagasinet Salling fik sendt telefaxen til forældrenes feriemål i Portugal.
Manden erkender knivstik
Det glade store smil er kendetegnende, når man ser på artikler og billeder bragt i pressen af kvinden, der som teenager fik job i en grillbar, blev model og siden forretningskvinde og direktør, før en række af knivstik brutalt satte en stopper for hendes liv lørdag aften i en villahave i Ebeltoft.
Kvindens 53-årige mand blev kort efter anholdt og sigtet for drab. Han blev fremstillet i grundlovsforhør søndag, hvor han nægtede sig skyldig i manddrab, men erkendte vold med døden til følge. Han er nu fængslet.
Fra grillbar til skønhedsdronning
Aarhus Stiftstidende tegnede i 1989 det første portræt af Britt Palmgren i anledning af, at hun stillede op i skønhedskonkurrencen, som hun endte med at vinde.
Her fortalte hun om sit liv som teenager, hvor hun boede i kælderen hos sine forældre.
Det fremgår, at hun var vild med kunst og psykologi, og at hun tjente de første lommepenge, som ansat i ’Luksusgrillen’ i Vestergade. Et job hun mente, at hun lærte meget af - blandt andet ikke at optrappe konflikter, når hun var på vagt sent og havde utålmodige kunder.
– Hvis man selv opfører sig surt eller mopset bliver der hurtigt ballade. Så det afholder jeg mig klogeligt fra, fortalte hun avisen.
Kunst i Milano og sprog i Paris
Hun vandt titlen, og i anledning af at næste års 'frk. Århus' skulle kåres, genbesøgte avisen Britt Palmgren i 1990, der berettede om et eventyrligt år langt fra jobbet i den lokale grillbar.
Hun var her vendt tilbage til Aarhus efter at have været i Paris, hvor hun kom i stald hos modefotografen Gunnar Larsen. Alt imens lærte hun på tre måneder fransk i kærlighedens by. herudover fremgår det, at hun tilbragte tid i Milano mellem fotoshoots, hvor hun lærte italiensk.
Britt Palmgren beskrev sin tid i udlandet som fantastisk, selvom det ikke havde været helt, som hun havde regnet med.
Derfor var hun fast besluttet på, at hun gerne ville slå rødder i Aarhus, hvor hun boede i mange år, inden hun flyttede til Ebeltoft.
Sprogkyndig direktør
Af Britt Palmgrens Linkedin profil fremgår det, at den driftige kvinde, der af venner beskrives som udadvendt, flamboyant og et livsstykke, talte fem forskellige sprog.
Hun var model i det anerkendte modelbureau DIVA models i mere end et årti, inden hun som 28-årig sprang ud som forretningsejer første gang.
Indehaveren af modelbureauet, Lina Barbagallo husker tydeligt Britt Palmgren, som var med næsten fra start og siger til Ekstra Bladet, at hun husker hende som en smuk og dejlig pige.
-Jeg har intet ondt at sige om Britt. Hun var bare helt igennem sød og skøn, mindes hun.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Virksomhed: - Vil blive drevet videre i Britts ånd
Den 50-årige direktørs brutale død har efterladt ikke alene hendes nærmeste i chok og sorg.
I går valgte den virksomhed, som Britt Kaiser Palmgren var direktør og ejer af at offentliggøre et mindeord, som var aftalt med kvindens familie.
Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring, et aarhusiansk firma med domicil i Risskov og med flere end 100 ansatte er efterladt i stort tomrum, skriver virksomheden blandt andet.
– Britt Kaiser Palmgren var stolt af sin virksomhed, og hendes gode humør og smittende latter var hverdag på firmaets adresse. Britt efterlader et uendelig stort tomrum, som bliver umuligt at udfylde, står der i mindeordet.
'Jeg er trist og vred'
På sociale medier har også venner og veninder givet udtryk for deres sorg:
’Jeg er så ubeskriveligt trist og vred over, at Britt skulle forlade denne verden. Hun elskede livet, sine venner, sin virksomhed, sine medarbejdere og sin familie, hun havde omsorg for de svageste, og hendes tre vidunderlige børn var uden tvivl det allermest dyrebare for hende, skriver en.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Flere konkurser bag sig
Sammen med sin mand var Britt Palmgren et kendt ansigt i Aarhus, hvor de ifølge flere kilder blandt andet indgik i forskellige erhvervsnetværk i byen.
Parret har dog haft nogle svære år med deres virksomheder og har adskillige konkurser bag sig.
Ved sin død var Britt Palmgren direktør i seks firmaer, uden at der dog var aktivitet i dem alle. Et af dem har hun overtaget efter sin mand. I 2020 udtrådte han også af direktionen i rengøringsfirmaet.
Det kan hænge sammen med Ekstra Bladets oplysninger om, at han for få år tilbage skal været gået ned med stress, og at hun derefter i højere grad overtog driften.
Fire af de seks selskaber blev den 50-årige kvinde direktør for i sommer. Det ene er et ejendomsselskab, hvorigennem hun købte en ejendom i Lystrup for 3,7 millioner kroner.
Britt Palmgren har i en længere årrække drevet Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring. I 2020 skiftede det dog navn til Fuldstop26.03.20 ApS og gik konkurs i 2021. Rengøringsaktiviteterne er fortsat i et andet af hendes selskaber – Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring Jylland – og hedder altså stadig udadtil bare Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring.
body_en:
'Hey mom, I won. I became Miss Aarhus'.
That's what it sounded like in a fax from a happy young Britt Kaiser Palmgren when she was chosen in the Aarhus Stifttidende model competition in 1989.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
- My parents are on holiday and don't know anything, said the then pretty 17-year-old girl from the suburb of Aabyhøj to the local media, before with the kind help of department store Salling, she had the fax sent to her parents' holiday destination in Portugal.
The man admits stabbing
The happy big smile is characteristic when you look at articles and pictures published in the press of the woman who as a teenager got a job in a barbecue bar, became a model and then a businesswoman and director, before a series of stab wounds brutally ended her life on Saturday evening in a villa garden in Ebeltoft.
The woman's 53-year-old husband was arrested shortly afterwards and charged with murder. He was produced in a constitutional hearing on Sunday, where he pleaded not guilty to manslaughter, but admitted violence resulting in death. He is now imprisoned.
From barbecue bar to beauty queen
In 1989, Aarhus Stiftstidende drew the first portrait of Britt Palmgren on the occasion of her entering the beauty contest, which she ended up winning.
Here she talked about her life as a teenager, where she lived in the basement of her parents.
It appears that she was fond of art and psychology, and that she earned her first pocket money as an employee in the 'Luxusgrillen' in Vestergade. A job she believed she learned a lot from - among other things, not to escalate conflicts when she was on duty late and had impatient customers.
- If you yourself act grumpy or pug, trouble quickly ensues. So I wisely refrain from that, she told the newspaper.
Art in Milan and language in Paris
She won the title, and on the occasion of next year's 'Mrs. Århus' should be chosen, revisited the newspaper Britt Palmgren in 1990, who reported on an adventurous year far from the job in the local grill bar.
She had returned to Aarhus after being in Paris, where she joined fashion photographer Gunnar Larsen. All the while, she learned French in three months in the city of love. in addition, it appears that she spent time in Milan between photoshoots, learning Italian.
Britt Palmgren described her time abroad as fantastic, although it had not been quite as she had expected.
Therefore, she was determined that she wanted to put down roots in Aarhus, where she lived for many years before moving to Ebeltoft.
Linguistic director
From Britt Palmgren's Linkedin profile, it appears that the enterprising woman, who is described by friends as outgoing, flamboyant and a piece of life, spoke five different languages.
She was a model in the renowned modeling agency DIVA models for more than a decade, before jumping out as a business owner for the first time at the age of 28.
The owner of the modeling agency, Lina Barbagallo clearly remembers Britt Palmgren, who was with her almost from the start and tells Ekstra Bladet that she remembers her as a beautiful and lovely girl.
- I have nothing bad to say about Britt. She was just thoroughly sweet and beautiful, she recalls.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Business: - Will be carried on in Britt's spirit
The 50-year-old director's brutal death has left not only her loved ones in shock and grief.
Yesterday, the company of which Britt Kaiser Palmgren was director and owner chose to publish a memorial that was agreed with the woman's family.
Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring, an Aarhus company with domicile in Risskov and with more than 100 employees has been left in a large void, the company writes, among other things.
- Britt Kaiser Palmgren was proud of her company, and her good mood and contagious laugh were everyday at the company's address. Britt leaves an infinitely large void, which will be impossible to fill, the memorial says.
'I'm sad and angry'
Friends have also expressed their grief on social media:
'I am so indescribably sad and angry that Britt had to leave this world. She loved life, her friends, her company, her employees and her family, she cared for the weakest, and her three wonderful children were undoubtedly the most precious thing to her, writes one.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Several bankruptcies behind him
Together with her husband, Britt Palmgren was a well-known face in Aarhus, where, according to several sources, they were part of various business networks in the city.
However, the couple have had some difficult years with their businesses and have several bankruptcies behind them.
At the time of his death, Britt Palmgren was a director in six companies, but there was no activity in all of them. She has taken over one of them after her husband. In 2020, he also resigned from the management of the cleaning company.
This may be connected with Ekstra Bladet's information that a few years ago he must have had a breakdown with stress, and that she then took over the operation to a greater extent.
The 50-year-old woman became director of four of the six companies this summer. One is a property company, through which she bought a property in Lystrup for DKK 3.7 million.
Britt Palmgren has for a number of years run Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring. In 2020, however, it changed its name to Fuldstop26.03.20 ApS and went bankrupt in 2021. The cleaning activities are still in another of her companies - Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring Jylland - and are therefore still called externally just Palmgren Erhvervsrengøring.

title: Modige mødre viser kroppen frem
subtitle: Ingen mor-kroppe er ens. De kommer i mange forskellige former, og vi skal rumme dem alle, mener en række modige kvinder, der nu viser deres kroppe frem
body:
På sociale medier uddeles ofte virtuelle highfives til mødre, der ser ud som om, de aldrig har været gravide. Andre sætter en ære i at vise, hvordan helt almindelige modne, kroppe ser ud under tøjet - Se med her, når de modige kvinder viser deres helt naturlige kroppe frem...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Arkivartikel underholdning
Maria Nordø Jørstad
39-årige Maria Jørstad delte i 2018 et billede på sin Instagram-profil, som endte med at gå viralt. På det tidspunkt var Maria gravid med trillinger, og hendes enorme mave vakte stor opsigt.
Men efter fødslen kom det bag på hende, hvor længe hendes mave blev ved med at ligne en gravid en af slagsen.
Hun havde ikke set andre kvinder med maver, der som hendes stadig bulede ud lang tid efter fødslen. Maria Nordø Jørstad valgte derfor at bryde sine grænser og dele et billede af sin store mave.
Og det varede ikke længe, før det væltede ind med reaktioner fra kvinder, der roste Maria for sin ærlighed.
- Det var meget grænseoverskridende for mig. Jeg havde ikke set ikke særlig mange andre kvinder, der så sådan ud. Det er der mange, der gør, men det ser man ikke. Så jeg tror, at det var derfor, mit opslag gik så viralt. Der var mange kvinder, fra alle mulige lande, der skrev til mig efterfølgende, at det var virkelig dejligt, at jeg viste min mave frem og viste, at det ikke er unormalt, fortæller hun.
Ifølge Maria Nordø Jørstad blev det tydeligt, at der ikke var nok information omkring, hvad der sker med kroppen efter fødslen. Og hun synes derfor, at det er vigtigt at stille sig frem og gøre opmærksom på, at kroppen vil forandre sig, og det tager tid for den at hele.
- Det er trist, hvis der er mange mødre, der tror, at de automatisk vil vende tilbage til deres egen krop efter blot et par måneder. De lægger et stort pres på sig selv. Det er virkelig ikke en tid, hvor man skal stresse. Man skal lytte til sin krop, og hvad den har brug for. Det tager tid at komme tilbage.
Kroppen forandrer sig
Efter trillingerne kom til verden, måtte Maria gennem en stor operation for at genoprette mavemusklerne, der under graviditeten var blevet ødelagt. Operationen efterlod et stort ar midt på Marias mave, men hun er af den grund ikke mindre glad for sin krop.
- Jeg er ganske tilpas i min egen krop. Mine bryster er lidt trætte efter amning. De bliver nok ikke helt, som de har været før i tiden, griner Maria Jørstad og tilføjer: Men det har jeg det helt fint med. Det er helt okay.
- Kroppen ændrer sig konstant og hele livet. Når man bliver mor, ændrer den sig, når man kommer i overgangsalderen, også bare det at blive ældre. Det er en del af livet. Du kan ikke have den samme krop hele livet. Der er en tid til alt.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Maria Dior
Maria Dior på 30 år bor i Århus og arbejder til daglig som online-coach for både mødre og gravide. I sit arbejde støder hun ofte på kvinder, der ønsker at smide babyvægten hurtigst muligt.
- Jeg kan godt forstå, at mange gerne vil vende tilbage til deres gamle krop. For det er jo noget af det, vi ser på de sociale medier. Der viser mange sig fra deres bedste vinkler, som jo ikke altid er virkeligheden eller behøver at være det for alle. Men jeg tror, det er vigtigt, at man følger sit eget tempo. Hvis man knokler sig igennem et træningsprogram for at se godt ud i en bikini, så er det vigtigt, at man stopper op og tænker for hvem? Er det, fordi jeg bliver lykkeligere?, lyder det fra Maria Dior.
Selv har hun tre børn, og det har sat sine spor på kroppen, fortæller hun.
- Jeg har dage, hvor jeg har det rigtig godt med min krop. Men så har jeg de dage, hvor jeg bare synes, min krop er træls, og det er typisk, når jeg har brugt lidt for meget tid på Instagram eller har sammenlignet mig med andre.
Ingen kroppe er ens
Og netop derfor sagde Maria Dior ja, da Ekstra Bladet spurgte hende, om hun kunne have lyst til at sætte fokus på mor-kroppen.
- Samtidig er det vigtigt at anerkende, at der bare er kvinder, der på magisk vis skrumper ind efter fødsel og står helt skarpt. Og de skal også have lov til at være glad for deres kroppe. Der findes mange måder at se ud på, uden at det er rigtigt eller forkert. Der findes ikke to ens mor-kroppe. Det er virkeligt vigtigt, at vi rummer dem alle.
Men på trods af, at Maria til tider ikke er helt så gode venner med sin krop, så finder hun ro i, at den har så mange andre funktioner end blot at være til.
- Min krop kan utroligt mange ting. Den fungerer både som en omvandrende bolig og en menneskelig madpakke. Jeg synes, min krop er megasej. Nu har den også fået mine børn til verden. Jeg forstår betydningen af min krop endnu mere nu, end jeg gjorde, da jeg var ung, slutter Maria Dior af med.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Joan Divine
Den tidligere Playboy-model Joan Divine ved om nogen, hvad det vil sige at blive vurderet på sit udseende, og hvilke følelser det sætter i gang. Hun indrømmer da også, at det ikke var let for hende at tage på i vægt i forbindelse med først ni års fertilitetsbehandling og dernæst en længe ventet graviditet.
- Jeg har virkelig tænkt mange tanker om min krop, fordi jeg havde taget omkring 20 kilo på. Men jeg havde ingen idé om, at jeg ville tabe mig efter fødslen, derfor gik jeg og overvejede at få lavet en mommy makeover (en kombination af en brystoperation og en maveskindsoperation), siger hun og fortsætter:
- Det skyldes jo nok, at der er et pres på kvinder efter fødsel, hvor man helst skal se ud, som om man ikke har fået et barn. Min krop er selvfølgelig blevet anderledes, men det er ikke til den dårligere side. Jeg sætter stor pris på min krop og er sindssyg stolt af den, fordi den har præsteret rigtig meget.
Kvinder er seje
41-årige Divine fik sønnen Felix for knap et halvt år siden sammen med sin kæreste, 'Vild med dans'-stjernen Michael Olesen, efter ni års fertilitetsbehandling.
Og det har sat sine spor på kroppen - blandt andet i form af et ar efter kejsersnit, men ikke af den karakter, der tynger den tidligere model.
- Man skal bare huske, at kvindekroppen er vildt sej i betragtning af, at den går rundt og bærer på et barn i ni måneder og dernæst føder det. Derfor skal alle kvinder i alle former hylde deres kroppe, fordi det er et pissehårdt arbejde at få en baby og dernæst være på barsel.
- Lige nu hviler jeg i at gå hjemme og pusle med Felix, og får jeg lyst til at træne, så gør jeg det, men det er bestemt ikke noget, jeg gør for andre end mig selv, understreger hun.
body_en:
On social media, virtual high-fives are often given to mothers who look like they've never been pregnant. Others take pride in showing how ordinary mature bodies look under their clothes - Watch here as the brave women show off their all-natural bodies...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Archive article entertainment
Maria Nordø Jørstad
In 2018, 39-year-old Maria Jørstad shared a picture on her Instagram profile, which ended up going viral. At the time, Maria was pregnant with triplets, and her huge belly caused quite a stir.
But after giving birth, she realized how long her stomach continued to look like a pregnant woman.
She hadn't seen other women with bellies that, like hers, still bulged long after giving birth. Maria Nordø Jørstad therefore chose to break her boundaries and share a picture of her big belly.
And it wasn't long before it poured in with reactions from women praising Maria for her honesty.
- It was very borderline-crossing for me. I hadn't seen very many other women who looked like that. Many do, but you don't see it. So I think that's why my post went viral. There were many women, from all sorts of countries, who wrote to me afterwards that it was really nice that I showed my stomach and showed that it is not abnormal, she says.
According to Maria Nordø Jørstad, it became clear that there was not enough information about what happens to the body after birth. And she therefore thinks that it is important to stand up and point out that the body will change, and it takes time for it to heal.
- It is sad if there are many mothers who think that they will automatically return to their own body after just a few months. They put a lot of pressure on themselves. This is really not a time to stress. You have to listen to your body and what it needs. It takes time to come back.
The body changes
After the triplets were born, Maria had to undergo a major operation to restore the abdominal muscles that had been destroyed during pregnancy. The operation left a large scar in the middle of Maria's stomach, but she is no less happy with her body because of that.
- I am quite comfortable in my own body. My breasts are a little tired after breastfeeding. They probably won't be quite as they were in the past, Maria Jørstad laughs and adds: But I'm perfectly fine with that. It is completely alright.
- The body changes constantly and throughout life. When you become a mother, it changes when you enter menopause, even just getting older. It's a part of life. You can't have the same body all your life. There is a time for everything.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Maria Dior
Maria Dior, 30, lives in Aarhus and works daily as an online coach for both mothers and pregnant women. In her work, she often comes across women who want to shed the baby weight as soon as possible.
- I can understand that many would like to return to their old body. Because that is some of what we see on social media. Many show themselves from their best angles, which is not always reality or needs to be for everyone. But I think it is important that you follow your own pace. If you struggle through a training program to look good in a bikini, then it is important that you stop and think for whom? Is it because I become happier?, says Maria Dior.
She herself has three children, and it has left its mark on her body, she says.
- I have days when I feel really good about my body. But then I have those days when I just think my body is a slave, and that's typically when I've spent a little too much time on Instagram or have compared myself to others.
No two bodies are the same
And that is precisely why Maria Dior said yes when Ekstra Bladet asked her if she would like to focus on the mother's body.
- At the same time, it is important to recognize that there are just women who magically shrink after giving birth and stand absolutely sharp. And they must also be allowed to be happy with their bodies. There are many ways to look without being right or wrong. No two mother bodies are alike. It is really important that we accommodate them all.
But despite the fact that Maria is sometimes not such good friends with her body, she finds peace in the fact that it has so many other functions than just being.
- My body can do an incredible amount of things. It functions both as a nomadic home and a human lunch box. I think my body is super cool. Now it has also given birth to my children. I understand the importance of my body even more now than I did when I was young, concludes Maria Dior.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Joan Divine
Former Playboy model Joan Divine knows as much as anyone what it's like to be judged on your looks and the emotions it triggers. She also admits that it was not easy for her to gain weight in connection with first nine years of fertility treatment and then a long-awaited pregnancy.
- I have really thought a lot about my body because I had put on around 20 kilos. But I had no idea that I would lose weight after giving birth, so I went and considered getting a mommy makeover (a combination of a breast operation and a tummy tuck), she says and continues:
- This is probably because there is pressure on women after giving birth, where you want to look as if you haven't had a child. My body has of course changed, but it's not for the worse. I value my body very much and am insanely proud of it because it has achieved so much.
Women are cool
41-year-old Divine had her son Felix almost six months ago with her boyfriend, 'Wild with Dance' star Michael Olesen, after nine years of fertility treatment.
And it has left its mark on the body - among other things in the form of a scar after a caesarean section, but not of the nature that burdens the previous model.
- You just have to remember that the female body is really cool considering that it goes around carrying a child for nine months and then gives birth. That's why all women in all forms must celebrate their bodies, because having a baby and then being on maternity leave is a lot of work.
- Right now I rest by going home and playing with Felix, and if I feel like training, I do it, but it's definitely not something I do for anyone but myself, she emphasizes.

title: Er din penis skrumpet? Derfor sker det
subtitle: Mere end halvdelen af alle mænd oplever, at deres penis skrumper på et tidspunkt i livet. Men hvorfor sker det, og hvad kan du gøre ved det?
body:
Det giver anledning til dårligt selvværd og depression, når penis pludselig skrumper hos mænd. Her kan du blive klogere på, hvorfor det sker, og hvad man kan gøre.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Dårlig livsstil og sygdomme afledt deraf kan i mange tilfælde være årsagen, hvis penis skrumper. Eksempelvis kan problemer med hormoner få penis til at skrumpe, hvilket kan forårsages af fedme.
Mange af de problemer, der får penis til at skrumpe, fører også til en nedsat evne til at opnå erektion.
Det forklarer professor ved Urinvejskirurgisk Afdeling på Odense Universitetshospital og formand for Dansk Urologisk Selskab, Lars Lund, til Ekstra Bladet.
- Man har det, der hedder metabolisk syndrom. Det betyder, at man kommer ind i en overvægt, hvor kroppen hormonelt kommer til at reagere anderledes. Over 50 procent af mænd i dag, som har erektil dysfunktion, det vil sige manglende evne til at få eller vedligeholde en rejsning, har metabolisk syndrom. Det er dem, man skal snakke kost, rygning, alkohol og motion med. De såkaldte KRAM-faktorer, siger Lars Lund.
Et kæmpe problem
Fordi fedme er et generelt problem i samfundet, er det også en tilstand, der er i stigning.
- Det er meget, meget hyppigt i dag. Det er klart, at når man begynder at blive kraftig, og man får problemer med at få en sufficient rejsning, så prøver man selvfølgelig med nogle piller, som man får hos lægen. Men det, man egentlig skal, er at måle blodtryk og lave en objektiv undersøgelse.
-
Så det skyldes en uligevægt i hormoner?
- Præcis. Kroppen reagerer ikke på insulin og glukagon. Altså nogle af de substanser, som man normalt får sukker og fedtstoffer ind i de rigtige celler af. Mændene går faktisk ind i en ond cirkel, og så er det østrogen, altså det kvindelige kønshormon, som overtager.
- Det er et kæmpe problem, som bliver værre og værre.
- Har der været en stigning i tilfælde?
- En kæmpe stigning. Fedme har jo været et stort problem, men der kommer mere og mere af det, siger Lars Lund.
Sygdomme
Det er dog ikke kun dårlig livsstil, der fører til skrumpet penis eller manglende evne til erektion. Flere sygdomme som for eksempel hjerteproblemer og åreforkalkning kan også være årsagen. Og så er der en særlig sygdom, som giver problemer med penis.
- Det er den sygdom, der kaldes krummerik. Otte til ti procent af alle mænd oplever den tilstand i løbet af deres liv. De får en krum penis, hvilket vil sige, at deres penis begynder at bøje enten til siden eller opad med en vinkel på for eksempel 30 eller 50 grader. Jeg har set nogle på 120-180 grader, som faktisk peger direkte ind mod maveskindet.
Sygdommen hedder Peyronies Sygdom, og man ved ikke, hvad den skyldes, men der dannes arvæv inde i penis, som får den til at bøje.
- Den krumning gør jo så også, at penis bliver mindre. Det er en hyppig lidelse, og penis skrumper op til to-tre centimeter, fortæller Lars Lund.
Sådan behandles Peyronies Sygdom
Derudover kan penis også skrumpe som en bivirkning af andre sygdomme eller behandlinger.
- Hvis man for eksempel får fjernet blærehalskritlen på grund af kræft. Blærehalskirtlen er den, man kalder prostata. Den er normalt på størrelse med en mandarin, og hvis du fjerner den bag ved penis, så er det klart, at penis trækker sig ind.
- Kirurgerne fortæller ofte kun patienterne om de typiske bivirkninger som impotens og inkontinens, men de glemmer at fortælle, at penis kan blive en smule mindre, fordi den trækker sig ind. Men det er harmløst, fordi når man opnår en erektion, så bliver lemmet lige så stort, som det plejer at være, siger Lars Lund.
Så udbredt er det
body_en:
It gives rise to poor self-esteem and depression when the penis suddenly shrinks in men. Here you can find out why it happens and what you can do.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Poor lifestyle and diseases derived from it can in many cases be the cause if the penis shrinks. For example, problems with hormones can cause the penis to shrink, which can be caused by obesity.
Many of the problems that cause the penis to shrink also lead to a reduced ability to achieve an erection.
This is explained by professor at the Department of Urinary Surgery at Odense University Hospital and chairman of the Danish Urological Society, Lars Lund, to Ekstra Bladet.
- You have what is called metabolic syndrome. This means that you become overweight, where the body hormonally reacts differently. Over 50 percent of men today who have erectile dysfunction, that is, the inability to get or maintain an erection, have metabolic syndrome. They are the ones to discuss diet, smoking, alcohol and exercise with. The so-called KRAM factors, says Lars Lund.
A huge problem
Because obesity is a general problem in society, it is also a condition that is on the rise.
- It is very, very frequent today. It is clear that when you start to get strong and you have problems getting a sufficient erection, you naturally try some pills that you get from the doctor. But what you really have to do is measure blood pressure and do an objective examination.
-
So it is due to an imbalance in hormones?
- Exact. The body does not respond to insulin and glucagon. In other words, some of the substances from which you normally get sugar and fats into the right cells. The men actually enter a vicious circle, and then it is oestrogen, i.e. the female sex hormone, which takes over.
- It is a huge problem that is getting worse and worse.
- Has there been an increase in cases?
- A huge increase. Obesity has been a big problem, but there is more and more of it, says Lars Lund.
Diseases
However, it is not only bad lifestyle that leads to a shrunken penis or inability to get an erection. Several diseases such as heart problems and atherosclerosis can also be the cause. And then there is a special disease that causes problems with the penis.
- It is the disease called scurvy. Eight to ten percent of all men experience the condition during their lifetime. They get a curved penis, which means that their penis starts to bend either to the side or upwards with an angle of, for example, 30 or 50 degrees. I have seen some at 120-180 degrees, which actually point directly towards the abdomen.
The disease is called Peyronie's Disease, and it is not known what causes it, but scar tissue forms inside the penis, which causes it to bend.
- That curvature also makes the penis smaller. It is a frequent disorder, and the penis shrinks to two or three centimeters, says Lars Lund.
How Peyronie's Disease is treated
In addition, the penis can also shrink as a side effect of other diseases or treatments.
- If, for example, you have the bladder neck gland removed due to cancer. The bladder neck gland is the one called the prostate. It is usually the size of a tangerine, and if you remove it behind the penis, it is clear that the penis retracts.
- The surgeons often only tell the patients about the typical side effects such as impotence and incontinence, but they forget to tell them that the penis can get a little smaller because it retracts. But it's harmless because when you achieve an erection, the member becomes as big as it usually is, says Lars Lund.
That's how widespread it is

title: Den stille dræber: Det skal du spise for at sænke dit blodtryk
subtitle: Bestemt kost kan være lige så effektiv som blodtryksdæmpende medicin, men det er vigtigt, at man ikke gør bestemte madvarer 'forbudte' for én selv. Her får du råd til, hvad du skal spise for at have et sundt blodtryk
body:
Omkring hver femte dansker mellem 20 og 89 år har forhøjet blodtryk - og mange af dem har det formentlig uden at vide det. Derfor er det vigtigt at spise det rigtige - og ikke kun spinat hele tiden.
Sådan skal du spise
Klinisk diætist og kostvejleder Heidi Dreist forklarer, at der ikke er specifikke madvarer, hun anbefaler til blodtrykket, men derimod fødevaregrupper.
- Det er vigtigt at få godt med grøntsager. Hele planteriget er generelt vigtigt i kosten for at have et sundt blodtryk, siger hun.
Dog kan mange komme til at holde fast i specifikke grøntsager eller såkaldte superfoods, som de spiser meget af, fordi de har fået at vide, at det er sundt og godt for blodtrykket.
Men det er ifølge Heidi Dreist vigtigt at variere kosten.
- Mange bider sig fast i, at de skal spise rødbeder eller spinat hele tiden. Det er selvfølgelig rigtig sundt, men det duer ikke, hvis der kommer en skævvridning af næringsstoffer, siger hun.
Det skal du undgå
Heidi Dreist kan også fortælle om de kategorier af mad, man skal undgå.
- Det værste, man kan spise, er saltholdige snacks som chips, lakrids og fastfood, siger hun.
Heidi Dreist henviser til den såkaldte DASH-kost, som er en diæt til behandling af forhøjet blodtryk.
DASH-kosten: Ikke en diæt
Ud over en sund kost er det også vigtigt for et stabilt blodtryk, at man er fysisk aktiv og undgår rygning.
Det er en balance
- Alt handler om mængder. Det handler om at spise mindre af chipsne end grøntsagerne, siger hun.
Ifølge Heidi Dreist kan de sunde madvaner ikke altid opveje de usunde madvaner.
Så hvis man spiser en sund og grøn kost i løbet af dagen, men også en masse chips og andet godt foran fjernsynet om aftenen, er det ikke nødvendigvis, fordi det sunde opvejer det usunde.
- Du risikerer, at du ikke får effekten af den gode mad, du har spist, ved at gøre noget, som virker modsat, siger hun.
Men hun forklarer også, at det kan være en forhindring for en selv, hvis man gør visse madvarer 'forbudte'.
- Der sker det, når man gør en madvare forbudt, at man får lyst til den hele tiden. Der er meget psykologisk effekt i det. Så ender man måske med at blive 'madstresset' i stedet for – og det er skidt. Stress forhøjer også blodtrykket, siger hun.
Konsekvenser
Konsekvenserne ved forhøjet blodtryk er øget risiko for blodprop i hjertet, hjertesvigt og slagtilfælde.
Og ifølge Heidi Dreist er der en grund til, man kalder blodtrykket for 'den stille dræber'.
- Man kan gå rundt med forhøjet blodtryk uden at ane det, siger hun.
Alderen udgør også en risiko for et forhøjet blodtryk.
- Karrene bliver stivere og mindre eftergivende med alderen, og det øger risikoen for forhøjet blodtryk, siger hun.
body_en:
Around one in five Danes between the ages of 20 and 89 has high blood pressure - and many of them probably have it without knowing it. That's why it's important to eat the right thing - and not just spinach all the time.
This is how you should eat
Clinical dietitian and dietitian Heidi Dreist explains that there are no specific foods she recommends for blood pressure, but rather food groups.
- It is important to get good vegetables. The whole plant kingdom is generally important in the diet to have healthy blood pressure, she says.
However, many may stick to specific vegetables or so-called superfoods, which they eat a lot of, because they have been told that it is healthy and good for blood pressure.
But according to Heidi Dreist, it is important to vary the diet.
- Many are adamant that they must eat beetroot or spinach all the time. It is of course very healthy, but it will not do if there is a distortion of nutrients, she says.
You must avoid that
Heidi Dreist can also talk about the categories of food to avoid.
- The worst thing you can eat are salty snacks such as chips, licorice and fast food, she says.
Heidi Dreist refers to the so-called DASH diet, which is a diet for the treatment of high blood pressure.
The DASH Diet: Not a Diet
In addition to a healthy diet, it is also important for stable blood pressure to be physically active and avoid smoking.
It's a balance
- Everything is about quantities. It's about eating less of the chips than the vegetables, she says.
According to Heidi Dreist, the healthy eating habits cannot always outweigh the unhealthy eating habits.
So if you eat a healthy and green diet during the day, but also a lot of chips and other good things in front of the television in the evening, it is not necessarily because the healthy outweighs the unhealthy.
- You risk not getting the effect of the good food you have eaten by doing something that has the opposite effect, she says.
But she also explains that it can be an obstacle for yourself if you make certain foods 'forbidden'.
- What happens when you make a food item forbidden is that you crave it all the time. There is a lot of psychological effect in it. Then you might end up being 'food stressed' instead - and that's bad. Stress also increases blood pressure, she says.
Consequences
The consequences of high blood pressure are an increased risk of blood clots in the heart, heart failure and stroke.
And according to Heidi Dreist, there is a reason why blood pressure is called 'the silent killer'.
- You can walk around with high blood pressure without knowing it, she says.
Age also poses a risk for high blood pressure.
- The vessels become stiffer and less compliant with age, and this increases the risk of high blood pressure, she says.

title: Det tjener pornomodellerne i virkeligheden
subtitle: De har millioner af seere, men hvor meget tjener de egentlig på at dyrke sex foran kameraer? Det får du indblik i her
body:
De er frække og smider tøjet for rullende kameraer. Men hvor meget går der ind på bankkontoen?
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Det kom som et chok, da den verdenskendte tidligere pornostjerne Mia Khalifa afslørede, at hun kun tjente omkring 78.000 kroner for sine tre måneder i pornoindustrien, der skød hende op som et verdensnavn med visninger i milliardklassen.
Men hvordan er lønningerne egentlig i branchen? Svaret er nedslående, hvis man ønsker at gøre karriere på lagnerne, for de er dårlige, hvis man spørger pornostjernerne selv.
Italienske Valentina Nappi, 31, har knap 400.000 følgere på mastodonten PornHub, hvor hendes videoer er set cirka 21 millioner gange. Hun er klar i spyttet i et interview med
Vice
.
- Det er absurd, hvis man tror, at pornostjerner er rige, siger hun til mediet og kalder pornostjerner, de dårligst betalte offentligt kendte ansigter.
Indtjening varierer
Nappi fortæller, at du som pornostjerne bliver betalt per scene, og at kontrakter, der binder dig eksklusivt til et produktionsselskab, hører sjældenhederne til.
- Din indtjening afhænger af mange faktorer – hvor kendt du er, hvilken type scene og så videre. En lesbisk scene betales dårligere end en med penetration, og analsex giver mere. Da jeg rejste til USA, var jeg allerede kendt, så mit starthonorar var højere, end hvad du normalt får.
- Jeg fik 8.000 kroner for en normal heteroseksuel scene.
Det beløb kan løbe op, men det kræver, at du knokler for det.
- En skuespillerinde får flest jobs, når hun er mellem 22 og 26 år. I den periode kan hun vel lave omkring 100 scener om året, siger hun.
Det giver en årsløn på 800.000 kroner – eller en månedsløn på 66.000 kroner. Hvis du vel at mærke er kendt på f.eks. på sociale medier i forvejen.
Få har råd
62-årige Franco Roccaforte fortæller, at man i 1990'erne kunne tjene 116.000 kroner om måneden som mandlig pornostjerne, hvis man var på toppen af sin karriere. I dag nægter han at gå under 7.500 kroner for at filme en scene.
- Men meget få europæiske produktioner har råd til at betale det, konstaterer han og giver Viagra en del af skylden.
- Viagra var årsag til den første økonomiske krise for mandlige pornostjerner, for pludselig kunne hundredvis af håbefulde mænd, der ikke kunne præstere, pludselig arbejde, og lønnen dykkede.
- Hvis du var en del af den lille gruppe af mænd, der kunne have sex i timevis foran kameraet, ville produktionsselskaberne hyre dig, fordi de kunne regne med dig, siger han om de glade 90’ere.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Raser: Fik ikke en skid
En af verdens førende pornostjerner, den nu pensionerede Lana Rhoades, er 25 år og multimillionær i dollars.
Men det skyldes bestemt ikke hendes kontrakter som aktiv pornostjerne. Det fortalte hun sidste år til YouTube-kanalen
'BFF's with Dave Portnoy and Josh Richards'
.
- Jeg blev ikke betalt en skid, konstaterer Lana Rhoades, der har 1,6 millioner følgere på PornHub, hvor hendes videoer er set 145 millioner gange.
- Jeg havde vel 650.000 kroner på min bankkonto, da jeg stoppede med porno, og nu er jeg multimillionær.
I dag er hun aktiv andre steder, men det kommer vi tilbage til.
Advarer andre
Hun advarer nemlig andre kvinder mod at bevæge sig ind i pornoindustrien, hvis de tror, at det er glamourøst og godt for bankbogen.
- Jeg advarer piger mod det, det er ikke glamourøst. Det betaler ikke engang særlig godt. Det er smartere, hvis du opretter en instagramprofil eller bare laver en OnlyFans, siger hun.
Rhoades hævder at kunne tjene 200.000 kroner for et sponsoreret opslag på Instagram, ligesom hun på tidspunktet for interviewet havde 25.000 følger på OnlyFans, der betalte 40 kroner om måneden for at følge med. Det giver en indtjening fra OnlyFans alene på én million om måneden, før OnlyFans og skat har taget deres del.
I sin egen podcast har hun ligeledes advaret unge kvinder mod at bevæge sig ind i pornoindustrien, som efterlod hende traumatiseret.
- Jeg siger ikke, at alle scener var forfærdelige. Men der var en håndfuld, der var slemme nok til at gøre skade.
- Der var tre-fem scener, der var virkelig traumatiserende for mig. Hvad end det handlede om at blive sat sammen med en, der var alt for gammel, eller at blive presset til at gøre noget, jeg var bange for, fordi det var for ekstremt.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Danske pornokvinder: Det tjener vi
Pornoproducent og model Elvira Friis og pornomodellen Misse åbnede i 2020 for godteposen over for Ekstra Bladet og fortalte, hvad de tjener på at smide kludene for rullende kameraer.
Elvira Friis understregede dog samtidig, at det svinger, alt efter om man allerede er et navn eller ej.
- Pornomodeller tjener typisk et sted mellem 7.000 og 12.000 kroner på en dag, alt efter hvad de laver, fortalte hun.
Misse fra danskemisse.dk, der både laver porno og cam-arbejde, fortalte, at hun typisk hiver 10.000 kroner hjem om måneden.
- Som udgangspunkt arbejder jeg jo gratis til min hjemmeside, men der kom cirka 8000 kroner ind de sidste to måneder før skat. På cam koster jeg 39,95 kroner per minut, og her tager sitet 40 procent. Når jeg så arbejder for Elvira, får jeg 2500 kroner for en sexscene, 3000 for anal, 2000 for pigesex og 4500-5000 for trekant uden og med anal.
Mange pornomodeller benytter sig også af muligheden til at hive en pæn sum penge hjem på OnlyFans. Dyk ned i det univers her:
Bag om OnlyFans
body_en:
They are cheeky and shed their clothes for rolling cameras. But how much goes into the bank account?
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
It came as a shock when world-renowned former porn star Mia Khalifa revealed that she only earned around 78,000 kroner for her three months in the porn industry, which catapulted her to become a world name with views in the billions.
But what are the salaries really like in the industry? The answer is disappointing if you want to make a career on the sheets, because they are bad if you ask the porn stars themselves.
Italian Valentina Nappi, 31, has just under 400,000 followers on the behemoth PornHub, where her videos have been viewed approximately 21 million times. She is ready in the spit in an interview with
Deputy
.
- It is absurd if you think that porn stars are rich, she says to the media and calls porn stars the lowest paid publicly known faces.
Earnings vary
Nappi says that as a porn star you are paid per scene and that contracts that bind you exclusively to a production company are rare.
- Your earnings depend on many factors – how well known you are, what type of scene and so on. A lesbian scene is paid worse than one with penetration, and anal sex pays more. When I went to the US, I was already known, so my starting fee was higher than what you normally get.
- I got 8,000 kroner for a normal heterosexual scene.
That amount can add up, but it requires you to work hard for it.
- An actress gets the most jobs when she is between 22 and 26 years old. During that period, she can probably do around 100 scenes a year, she says.
This gives an annual salary of DKK 800,000 - or a monthly salary of DKK 66,000. If you are well known on e.g. on social media in advance.
Few can afford it
62-year-old Franco Roccaforte says that in the 1990s you could earn DKK 116,000 a month as a male porn star if you were at the top of your career. Today, he refuses to go below 7,500 kroner to film a scene.
- But very few European productions can afford to pay it, he states and gives Viagra part of the blame.
- Viagra was the cause of the first financial crisis for male porn stars, because suddenly hundreds of aspiring men who could not perform suddenly could work, and wages plummeted.
- If you were part of the small group of men who could have sex for hours in front of the camera, the production companies would hire you because they could count on you, he says of the happy 90s.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Raser: Don't give a damn
One of the world's leading porn stars, the now retired Lana Rhoades, is 25 years old and a multimillionaire in dollars.
But it is certainly not due to her contracts as an active porn star. She told the YouTube channel that last year
'BFF's with Dave Portnoy and Josh Richards'
.
- I wasn't paid a damn, states Lana Rhoades, who has 1.6 million followers on PornHub, where her videos have been viewed 145 million times.
- I probably had 650,000 kroner in my bank account when I stopped porn, and now I'm a multimillionaire.
Today she is active elsewhere, but we will come back to that.
Warns others
She warns other women against entering the porn industry if they think it's glamorous and good for the bank book.
- I warn girls against it, it's not glamorous. It doesn't even pay very well. It's smarter if you create an Instagram profile or just create an OnlyFans, she says.
Rhoades claims to be able to earn 200,000 kroner for a sponsored post on Instagram, just as at the time of the interview she had 25,000 followers on OnlyFans, who paid 40 kroner a month to follow along. That puts the earnings from OnlyFans alone at one million a month, before OnlyFans and tax have taken their share.
In her own podcast, she has also warned young women against moving into the porn industry, which left her traumatized.
- I'm not saying that all scenes were terrible. But there were a handful that were mean enough to do damage.
- There were three or five scenes that were really traumatizing for me. Whether it was being paired with someone who was way too old or being pressured into doing something I was afraid of because it was too extreme.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Danish porn women: That's what we earn
In 2020, porn producer and model Elvira Friis and porn model Misse opened up about the goody bag to Ekstra Bladet and told what they earn by throwing in the towel for rolling cameras.
However, Elvira Friis emphasized at the same time that it fluctuates, depending on whether you are already a name or not.
- Porn models typically earn somewhere between 7,000 and 12,000 kroner in a day, depending on what they do, she said.
Misse from danskemisse.dk, who does both porn and cam work, said that she typically brings home 10,000 kroner a month.
- As a starting point, I work for my website for free, but approximately DKK 8,000 came in the last two months before tax. On cam I cost DKK 39.95 per minute, and here the site takes 40 percent. When I work for Elvira, I get 2500 kroner for a sex scene, 3000 for anal, 2000 for girl sex and 4500-5000 for a threesome without and with anal.
Many porn models also take advantage of the opportunity to take home a nice sum of money on OnlyFans. Dive into that universe here:
Behind OnlyFans
ner_clusters:
['BFF' 'Dave Portnoy' 'Franco Roccaforte' 'Instagram' 'Josh Richards'
 'Lana Rhoades' 'Mia Khalifa' 'OnlyFans' 'PornHub' 'USA' 'Valentina Nappi'
 'Viagra' 'Vice' 'YouTube']

title: Kendte kvinder: Se vores plastikoperationer
subtitle: Der skal være plads til alle slags kroppe - de naturlige såvel som de 'unaturlige'. Sådan lyder opfordringen fra en række modige kvinder, der hylder deres plastikoperationer
body:
Denne artikel er fra arkivet og skrevet i 2022.
Plastik er fantastisk.
Det er overbevisningen hos tre kendte kvinder, som viser deres kroppe frem for at sætte fokus på at skabe rummelighed for kroppe, hvor det tydeligt fremgår, at de har været under kniven. Stoltheden over deres udseende er ikke til at tage fejl af.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Simone Skaaning Frederiksen
31-årige Simone Skaaning Frederiksen, der er kendt fra 'Ex on the Beach', lægger ikke skjul på, at hun har fået foretaget en række operationer, der har givet hende den krop, hun ønsker. Det tæller både to brystoperationer, filler i læber, kindben og hage, ligesom hun skal have opereret brysterne igen og have rettet næsen ved samme lejlighed inden for det næste halve år.
Derfor byder hun også Ekstra Bladet velkommen til en snak om plastikoperationer, da vi rækker ud til hende. Hvis der er noget, Simone gerne vil have belyst, så er det den shaming, hun oplever i forbindelse med sine operationer.
- Det handler om, at vi lever i en verden, hvor der er stort fokus på, at vi skal være tilfredse med, hvem vi er, og være naturlige, og det er også okay, men det skal også være okay ikke at være det, hvis man bliver glad ved at lave noget om på sig selv, siger hun og fortsætter:
- Folk har meget travlt med alle andre i stedet for at passe sig selv. Den måde, jeg får det at vide på nogle gange, når nogle er utilfredse med mit udseende, er rigtig strid, og det synes jeg ikke er i orden.
Dårligt selvværd
Tv-kendissen, der fik sin første brystforstørrende operation, da hun lige var fyldt 18 år, er ikke i tvivl om, at operationerne skal ses i lyset af dårligt selvværd, som hun har døjet med hele sit liv.
- Da jeg var 18, mente jeg, at jeg skulle have de her operationer, fordi jeg syntes, det var flot. Nu ved jeg jo godt, at det i bund og grund handler om ens selvværd. Jeg synes ikke, jeg er god nok, som jeg er, og det har jeg egentlig aldrig syntes. Det har jeg ikke noget imod at være fuldstændig ærlig omkring, fortæller Simone.
Hun er dog ikke i tvivl om, at de mange fysiske forandringer alligevel har medvirket til at give hende større selvtillid, og derfor fortryder hun ingen af de kirurgiske indgreb.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Mariyah Samia
Mariyah Samia, 31, optræder tit med meget lidt tøj på på de sociale medier og viser stolt sine former frem, som Gud og plastikkirurger har skabt hende.
Mariyah, der er kendt fra en række realityprogrammer, har fået to brystoperationer, rettet næsen, fillers og botox i ansigtet, og snart lægger hun sig under kniven igen for at samle mavemusklerne efter en fødsel. Desuden drømmer hun om at få indsat implantater i ballerne.
- Da jeg voksede op, syntes jeg, at større bryster var flotte. Jeg har altid set op til Oddset-pigen og ville gerne være som hende. Ligesom nogle hviler i sig selv med mindre bryster og synes, at det er det smukkeste, så synes jeg, at store bryster er flottest, fortæller hun til Ekstra Bladet.
Kvinderne er værst
- Jeg er også godt klar over, at mit look er meget fake i forhold til, hvad andre synes er pænt, men jeg går jo med mig hele dagen og kigger på mig, og jeg er glad for, hvad jeg ser. Det kan godt være, at det ikke er andres kop te, men det er meget min kop te, tilføjer Mariyah og forklarer, at hun møder meget had på de sociale medier grundet sit udseende.
- Hvis jeg lægger billeder op, som viser en mere naturlig side af mig med for eksempel strækmærker, så holder de meget mere af mig, men hvis jeg lægger et billede op, der er letpåklædt og lidt fræk, hvor mine plastikoperationer er tydelige, bliver jeg sablet ned, siger hun og påpeger, at det oftest er kvinder, der står bag de negative kommentarer.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Sasha Klæstrup
29-årige Sasha Klæstrup har botox i ansigtet, fordi hun hylder den glatte hud og ikke rynker, som hun siger. Men botox er ikke det eneste, hun får lavet.
'Divaer fra junglen'-kendissen fortæller åbent og ærligt, at hun har fået lavet større bryster, fedtsugning, numseløft, filler i kindben, læber og kæbelinjer.
- Når jeg kigger mig i spejlet, kan jeg godt se, at jeg er rigtig smuk, og jeg har en flot krop. Genetisk er jeg meget heldig, men derfor kan jeg stadig se forbedringer. Jeg er blevet skabt som en klump ler, som jeg selv kan forme videre, siger Sasha og tilføjer, at hun får et energiboost, hver gang hun rejser sig fra operationsbordet.
Had mod det 'unaturlige'
Selvom Sasha ikke fortryder en eneste operation, er hun alligevel overrasket over de reaktioner, hun er blevet mødt med i kølvandet på de kirurgiske indgreb.
- Det er blevet til en påstand om, at hvis du betaler dig fra det, så er det ikke godt nok. Det er det samme med folk, der træner, som bliver hyldet, fordi de træner sig til den krop, de vil have, men hvis jeg går hen og får lavet en sixpack-operation, vil folk sige, jeg har snydt mig til min form, men det er da i sidste ende lige meget, hvordan vi opnår det resultat, vi ønsker, fortæller hun.
- Jeg har fået rigtig mange trusler og fået vide, at jeg var en luder og en masse andre grimme ting. Jeg kan ikke engang forstå det, fordi hvis jeg synes, det er fedt at lægge mig under kniven, og du synes, det er fedt at træne, hvorfor skal det skille os ad? spørger hun retorisk.
Når det så er sagt, er Sasha utrolig ligeglad med andres meninger, understreger hun. Derfor fortsætter hun jagten på sin drømmekrop, hvor næste skridt er at få en fedtsugning til april samt næsekorrektion og brystløft til oktober.
body_en:
This article is from the archive and written in 2022.
Plastic is great.
This is the conviction of three well-known women who show off their bodies in order to focus on creating space for bodies where it is clear that they have been under the knife. The pride in their appearance is unmistakable.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Simone Skaaning Frederiksen
31-year-old Simone Skaaning Frederiksen, who is known from 'Ex on the Beach', does not hide the fact that she has had a series of operations that have given her the body she wants. This includes two breast operations, fillers in the lips, cheekbones and chin, as well as having her breasts operated on again and having her nose straightened on the same occasion within the next six months.
That is why she also welcomes Ekstra Bladet for a talk about plastic surgery, as we reach out to her. If there is something Simone would like to shed light on, it is the shaming she experiences in connection with her operations.
- It's about the fact that we live in a world where there is a big focus on us being satisfied with who we are and being natural, and that's also okay, but it should also be okay not to be , if you become happy by changing something about yourself, she says and continues:
- People are very busy with everyone else instead of taking care of themselves. The way I'm told sometimes when some people are unhappy with my appearance is really harsh and I don't think that's right.
Bad self esteem
The TV celebrity, who had her first breast enlargement surgery when she was just 18 years old, has no doubts that the surgeries should be seen in the light of poor self-esteem, which she has suffered with all her life.
- When I was 18, I thought I should have these operations because I thought it was beautiful. Now I know very well that it is basically about one's self-esteem. I don't think I'm good enough the way I am, and I never really have. I don't mind being completely honest about that, says Simone.
However, she has no doubt that the many physical changes have contributed to giving her greater self-confidence, and therefore she regrets none of the surgical procedures.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Mariyah Samia
Mariyah Samia, 31, often appears in very little clothing on social media, proudly showing off her shapes that God and plastic surgeons created for her.
Mariyah, who is known from a number of reality shows, has had two breast surgeries, straightened her nose, fillers and botox on her face, and soon she will go under the knife again to gather her abs after giving birth. She also dreams of having implants inserted in her balls.
- Growing up, I thought bigger breasts were cool. I always looked up to the Oddset girl and wanted to be like her. Just as some rest in themselves with smaller breasts and think that it is the most beautiful thing, I think that big breasts are the most beautiful, she tells Ekstra Bladet.
The women are the worst
- I am also well aware that my look is very fake compared to what other people think is nice, but I walk with myself all day and look at myself, and I am happy with what I see. It may not be someone else's cup of tea, but it is very much my cup of tea, adds Mariyah and explains that she faces a lot of hate on social media because of her appearance.
- If I post photos that show a more natural side of me with, for example, stretch marks, then they like me a lot more, but if I post a photo that is lightly dressed and a little cheeky, where my plastic surgery is obvious, I put the saber down, she says and points out that it is usually women who are behind the negative comments.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Sasha Klæstrup
29-year-old Sasha Klæstrup has botox on her face because she pays tribute to the smooth skin and does not wrinkle, as she says. But botox is not the only thing she gets done.
The 'Divas from the jungle' celebrity tells openly and honestly that she has had bigger breasts, liposuction, butt lift, fillers in the cheekbones, lips and jaw lines.
- When I look in the mirror, I can see that I am really beautiful and I have a nice body. Genetically I'm very lucky, but that's why I can still see improvements. I was created as a lump of clay that I can shape further myself, says Sasha, adding that she gets an energy boost every time she gets up from the operating table.
Hatred of the 'unnatural'
Although Sasha does not regret a single operation, she is nevertheless surprised by the reactions she has received in the wake of the surgical procedures.
- It has become a claim that if you pay yourself from it, then it is not good enough. It's the same with people who work out, who get praised for working out to get the body they want, but if I go and get six-pack surgery, people will say I cheated on my shape , but in the end it doesn't matter how we achieve the result we want, she says.
- I have received a lot of threats and been told that I was a whore and a lot of other ugly things. I can't even understand it because if I think it's cool to go under the knife and you think it's cool to work out, why does it have to separate us? she asks rhetorically.
Having said that, Sasha is incredibly indifferent to other people's opinions, she emphasizes. Therefore, she continues the hunt for her dream body, where the next step is to have liposuction in April, as well as rhinoplasty and a breast lift in October.
