title: Se de vildeste valgplakater
subtitle: Kreativiteten er ved at vende tilbage til valgplakaterne efter nogle kunstnerisk frodige årtier, som tv pludselig satte en stopper for. Se de flotteste og mest fantasifulde valgplakater her
body:
Valget er udskrevet og kampen gået ind om de bedste placeringer i lygtepælene.
Nogle bander dem langt væk, mens andre ligefrem hygger sig med demokratiets skov af budskaber i master og lygtepæle.
- På det seneste er det igen begyndt at blive mere fantasifuldt. Plakaterne er blevet mere sjove, fantasifulde og kreative igen ved de to seneste valg, siger hører Peter Nedergaard.
Professoren i statskundskab fra Københavns Universitet har det med de nyophængte valgplakater vel nærmest på samme måde som børn, der ser den første, hængende julepynt blive tændt i vintermørkets gadebillede.
En passion, der gennem årtier har fået ham til at købe ind til sin private samling, hvorfra et større udvalg pryder væggene på tre af fakultetets gange.
- Jeg har jo forsket og undervist i politik i mange år, og jeg syntes, at der manglede noget, når man præsenterede dansk politik i en given periode. Vi læste tekster, men havde ingen billeder på det.
- En valgplakat udtrykker tiden og en tidsånd og måden at se politik på i den periode, hvor de er lavet. I al fald de gode af dem, forklarer Peter Nedergaard, der har en både kærlig og kritisk tilgang til materialet.
- Jeg skelner mellem den gyldne periode og forfaldsperioden. Den første strækker sig fra cirka 1920 til 1960, hvor man ofte havde kunstnere til at lave plakaterne. Og de er jo bedre til at gå ind i hovederne på folk og sætte et kunstnerisk udtryk på, hvad folk tænker i tiden.
- Og så er der forfaldsperioden, hvor de bliver mere og mere u-kunstneriske. Hvor de bare indeholder et partibogstav eller et fotoshoppet portræt.
Man fornemmer ubehaget i hans stemme, mens han forklarer årsagerne.
- Det hænger sammen med, at vi får fjernsynet. Valgplakater var før et selvstændigt argument, men nu begynder de at referere til noget, der foregår et andet sted. Før argumenterede man for, hvorfor man skulle stemme på et parti, men så blev tv dominerende i valgkampen.
- Samtidig blev partilisterne afskaffet til fordel for sideordnet opstilling, hvor du skal ud med dit eget ansigt for at hente personlige stemmer. Herfra er du altså næsten mere i konkurrence med dem, du stiller op sammen med, end med de andre partier.
Peter Nedergaard, der er medforfatter til bogen ’Valget er dit!’ om den danske valgplakat gennem 100 år var ked af at se de dedikerede plakatkunstnere forlade skuden dengang.
Men han har under de senere års valgkampe glædet sig over, at kreativiteten er ved at vende tilbage.
For eksempel har han lagt mærke til, at eksempelvis Alternativet har benyttet sig af nye formater, der visuelt stikker af fra alle de andre.
- Men der mangler stadig de gode kunstnere. Hvorfor pokker entrerer man ikke med Michael Kvium eller en anden, så man kan få et udtryk, som er anderledes?
Se de vilde valgplakater
Der findes ikke megen dokumentation for, at valgplakater flytter stemmer.
- Men det betyder altså noget til for eksempel kommunalvalg, om du hænger derude eller ej, forklarer professoren om deres berettigelse.
- De giver også en stemning i gadebilledet, og så skal man ikke underkende, at det skaber opbakning til en persons valgkampagne at kunne mønstre nogle, der går ud og hænger vedkommendes plakater op. ’Nu starter det, nu står vi sammen.' Det skaber en korpsånd.
- For politikerne handler det om at få deres ungdomspolitikere op i gear og få dem til at føle en samhørighed med de opstillede.
Selv skifter han hørbart gear, mens han skridter sine ophængte værker af.
- Smilet vinder meget, bemærker han, da vi stopper ud for en kendt DSU-plakat med Anker Jørgensen.
- Anker som James Bond, haha. Han var jo antitesen af Bond. Det er jo sjovt, og vi taler stadig om den 30 år efter. Ungdomspartierne kan tillade sig mere. Man accepterer, at de har langt større frirum.
Vi taler i den grad også stadig om den berømte ’Stauning - eller kaos’-plakat.
- Det var den første i Danmark med et foto af en politiker, og så er budskabet genialt. Det kunne ikke formuleres mere elegant. ’Stauning’ står med rolig skrift, og ’kaos’ står og ryster. Så det er helt gennemtænkt, forklarer han om værket, som ingen kender ophavsmanden til.
Til gengæld ved han, at plakaten, han har hængt overfor, fordi den udgør et konservativt modsvar i Stauning-epoken, er kreeret af Thor Bøgelund, der startede som plakatkunstner hos Socialdemokratiet, før han blev grebet af det nationale og smuttede over til de konservative.
Også Peter Nedergaard bliver grebet.
- Jeg synes jo, det er den smukkeste plakat af dem alle, siger han og forklarer:
- Se nu den skrifttype her. Vi er 90 år tilbage, og det står så moderne, som kunne det være skabt i dag.
Retningslinjer for ophængning af valgplakater
- Her har du så et kort argument mod Stauning. Her det gyldne snit både op og hen. De 20 minutter både i teksten og her på rådhusuret. Det mørke, næsten blåsorte oppe hos Stauning, der så skifter til noget lysere ned mod de konservative.
- Intet er overladt til tilfældighederne. Det er så gennemtænkt, så raffineret og så gennemført i sit udtryk, så skal jeg udpege en plakat som den smukkeste, så er det den. Og så er den fuldkommen tidløs.
Samleren køber sine valgplakater to steder. Dels på auktion og dels hos tidligere typografer, der lige stak to eksemplarer til side til sig selv, når de trykte. De kommer løbende frem fra kældre og lofter.
Og så er der en, der ikke er til at betale.
- Her hænger Asger Jorn. Kommunisterne fik den foræret, men skal du købe originalen på auktion i dag, så koster den vel halvanden million eller mere.
Engell: Se alle valg-detaljerne
Det kæmper de om: Se politikernes vilde fryns
body_en:
The election has been announced and the battle has begun for the best positions in the lampposts.
Some curse them far away, while others simply enjoy democracy's forest of messages in masts and lampposts.
- Recently, it has started to become more imaginative again. The posters have become more fun, imaginative and creative again in the last two elections, says Peter Nedergaard.
The professor of political science from the University of Copenhagen feels about the newly hung election posters in almost the same way as children who see the first hanging Christmas decorations being lit in the winter dark street scene.
A passion that over the decades has led him to buy for his private collection, from which a larger selection adorns the walls of three of the faculty's corridors.
- After all, I have researched and taught politics for many years, and I thought that something was missing when presenting Danish politics in a given period. We read texts but had no pictures on it.
- An election poster expresses the time and a zeitgeist and the way of looking at politics in the period in which they were made. At least the good ones, explains Peter Nedergaard, who has both a loving and critical approach to the material.
- I distinguish between the golden period and the decay period. The first extends from approximately 1920 to 1960, when artists were often employed to make the posters. And they are better at getting into people's heads and putting an artistic expression on what people are thinking at the time.
- And then there is the decay period, when they become more and more unartistic. Where they just contain a party letter or a photoshopped portrait.
You sense the discomfort in his voice as he explains the reasons.
- It is connected with the fact that we get the television. Election posters used to be an independent argument, but now they start to refer to something that is going on somewhere else. Before, you argued for why you should vote for a party, but then television became dominant in the election campaign.
- At the same time, the party lists were abolished in favor of a side-by-side arrangement, where you have to show your own face to get personal votes. From here, you are therefore almost more in competition with those you stand with than with the other parties.
Peter Nedergaard, co-author of the book 'Valget er dit!' about the Danish election poster over 100 years, was sad to see the dedicated poster artists leave the scene at the time.
But during the election campaigns of recent years, he has been pleased that creativity is returning.
For example, he has noticed that Alternativet, for example, has used new formats that visually stand out from all the others.
- But there is still a lack of good artists. Why the hell don't you enter with Michael Kvium or someone else, so you can get an expression that is different?
See the wild election posters
There is not much evidence that election posters move votes.
- But it means something for, for example, municipal elections, whether you hang out there or not, the professor explains about their eligibility.
- They also give an atmosphere to the streetscape, and it must not be denied that it creates support for a person's election campaign to be able to muster people who go out and put up their posters. 'Now it starts, now we stand together.' It creates a team spirit.
- For the politicians, it's about getting their youth politicians up to speed and making them feel a sense of togetherness with the candidates.
He himself audibly changes gears as he steps off his suspended works.
- The smile wins a lot, he notes, when we stop in front of a well-known DSU poster with Anker Jørgensen.
- Anchor like James Bond, haha. After all, he was the antithesis of Bond. It's funny, and we're still talking about it 30 years later. The youth parties can afford more. It is accepted that they have much more free space.
To that extent, we are also still talking about the famous 'Stunning - or chaos' poster.
- It was the first in Denmark with a photo of a politician, and the message is brilliant. It could not be phrased more elegantly. 'Staunting' is written in calm writing, and 'chaos' is shaking. So it is completely thought out, he explains about the work, the author of which no one knows.
On the other hand, he knows that the poster he has hung opposite, because it represents a conservative response to the Stauning era, was created by Thor Bøgelund, who started out as a poster artist with the Social Democrats, before he was seized by nationalism and slipped over to the conservatives .
Peter Nedergaard is also arrested.
- I think it's the most beautiful poster of them all, he says and explains:
- Now look at that font here. We are 90 years back and it looks as modern as it could have been created today.
Guidelines for hanging election posters
- Here you have a short argument against Stauning. Here, the golden ratio both up and down. The 20 minutes both in the text and here on the town hall clock. The dark, almost blue-black up at Stauning, which then changes to something lighter down towards the conservatives.
- Nothing is left to chance. It is so well thought out, so refined and so complete in its expression, if I have to name one poster as the most beautiful, then it is this one. And it is completely timeless.
The collector buys his election posters in two places. Partly at auction and partly with former typographers who just put two copies aside for themselves when they printed. They keep coming out of basements and attics.
And then there is someone who cannot pay.
- Asger Jorn hangs here. The communists got it as a gift, but if you were to buy the original at auction today, it would probably cost a million and a half or more.
Engell: See all the election details
That's what they're fighting for: Look at the politicians' wild fringes
ner_clusters:
['Alternativet' 'Asger Jorn' 'Danmark' 'James Bond'
 'Københavns Universitet' 'kommunalvalg' 'Peter Nedergaard'
 'Socialdemokratiet' 'Stauning eller kaos' 'Thor Bøgelund']

title: Derfor er rocker jaget vildt
subtitle: Præsidenten for Satudarah Northside er leder af flere Satudarah-folk med en lang og broget fortid i biker-miljøet. Nu er han på flugt
body:
Satudarah Northside er et forholdsvist nyt chapter i den ekspanderende sort-gule rockerorgansation. Af de otte medlemmer i afdelingen er flere af dem veteraner i den danske underverden. Flere af dem har båret veste i andre farver og og nu er deres præsident på flugt
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
34-årige Sahin Celal Gülfirat er i følge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger præsident i Satudarah Northside. Han er efterlyst  for et voldsomt knivstikkeri i en lejlighed den 22. juni i år på Vesterbro i København. Her blev en 29-årig mand i følge politiet opsøgt og udsat for adskillige knivstik af Sahin Celal Gülfirat og en anden formodet medgerningsmand.
Satudarah Northside holder til i Rødovre, hvor politiet var ude at ransage så sent som den 11. august. Politiet kan ikke fortælle, om ransagningen havde forbindelse til knivstikkene på Vesterbro, fordi to formodede medgerningsmænd er varetægtsfængslet i sagen for såkaldt lukkede døre.
Satudarah Northside er et forholdsvist nyt chapter i den ekspanderende
sort-gule rockerorganisation
. Af de otte medlemmer i afdelingen er flere af dem veteraner i den danske underverden. Flere af dem har båret veste i andre farver og har også voldsomme historier med i bagagen.
Fortid i Gremium
I følge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger har den nu flygtede præsident Sahin Celal Gülfirat en fortid i rockerklubben Gremium.  Her har den nu flygtede præsident måske mødt en anden bandeveteran, som også har iklædt sig det sort-gule rygmærke i Northside-afdelingen. Det drejer sig om Tommy Josic, der i december 2020 poserede på de sociale medier med et logo fra Gremium.
Ekstra Bladet kunne ved den lejlighed fortælle, at han indtog en ledende rolle i klubben. Siden er han også skiftet til Satudarah Northside. Angiveligt i rollen som road captain, der planlægger rejser og køreture.
Smidt ud med Jønke
Forud for tiden i Gremium og Satudarah har Tommy Josic også en fortid i Hells Angels. Her var han en af to HA'ere, der blev
smidt ud af klubben
sammen med rockerveteranen Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen tilbage i 2020.
Selve beslutningen blev taget på et 'danmarksmøde', hvor repræsentanter fra alle danske afdelinger var forsamlede. På mødet blev Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsens medlemskab taget op til afstemning, hvor et flertal vendte tomlen nedad.
Forud for udsmidningen gik et længere forløb, der inkluderede interne beskyldninger i Kastrup-afdelingen. Her tog Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen parti for Tommy Josic.
I første omgang var det Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen og et yngre medlem kaldet ’Irish’, der blev smidt ud på danmarksmødet. Tre uger senere røg Tommy Josic så ud af Hells Angels.
Blodig familiehistorie
Tommy Josic var ellers blevet i klubben på trods af, at hans bror Thomas Josic - kaldet 'Tito' - var blevet likvideret på åben gade af et andet medlem af Hells Angels. 'Tito' blev skudt ned den 4. maj 2019 ved 22-tiden på Løvevej i Rødovre.
En eller flere drabsmænd havde lagt sig i baghold i villakvarteret, hvor hans ekskæreste boede og skød ham i nærheden af hendes bopæl. Politiet mistænker ha-rockeren Hasan Okutan for at have affyret de dræbende skud eller have været med til det. Han er fængslet in absentia (uden fremmøde, red) i forbindelse med drabet.
Drabet er sandsynligvis hævn for et skyderi med selvsamme Hasan Okutan som mål. Her var den afdøde Thomas 'Tito' Josic mistænkt for at have deltaget, da der blev skudt mod Hasan Okutan i den lille nordsjællandske by Plejelt i januar 2019.
Sagen fik mere en almindelig omtale, da Hasan Okutan flygtede i en tilfældig kvindes bil uden at vide, at hendes labrador lå på bagsæddet. Klokken 20.35. fik alarmcentralen dog et opkald fra en advokat, der kunne oplyse om bilen og hundens placering.
Efterlyste og dræbte var 'Brothers in arms
Den dræbte Thomas 'Tito' Josic og Hasan Okutan var ellers en del af en klike, der var vokset op sammen. Flere af dem bar også den samme tatovering. B. I. A - en forkortelse for Brothers In Arms.
De to var ellers i over ti år del af en lille gruppe mænd, der havde holdt sammen i tykt og tyndt.
I antal bestod gruppen af lidt over en håndfuld. Research samt retsbøger fra diverse retssager, gruppens medlemmer har været tiltalt i, viser, at der var tale om en koldblodig gruppe, der enten samlet eller i mindre grupper på kryds og tværs har stået bag blandt andet overfald, røverier og ' rulleforretninger' rettet mod andre kriminelle, tyverier af designermøbler samt bankrøverier.
Alle var HA'ere
Gruppen var først del af Bandidos. Men her kom man på kant med andre medlemmer, og det afstedkom en kort, men hektisk konflikt med skyderi og jagt i gaderne.
Senere blev gruppen optaget i Hells Angels, hvor
Thomas
Josic
og Hasan Okutan blev del af HA-afdelingen på Amager, kaldet Nomads.
Mens Hasan Okutan ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger fortsat er HA-medlem, så forlod
Josic
Hells Angels kort efter skyderiet i Plejelt. Det er uklart, om de blev smidt ud, eller om de gik selv.
Thomas Josics bror Tommy er nu roadcaptain i Satudarah Northside. Her er han i følge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger også blevet klubkammerater med mindst et tidligere medlem af Bandidos.
Politiet efterlyser formodet gerningsmand
Københavns Politi ønsker ikke at udtale sig om bandeforhold i forbindelse med efterlysningen af præsidenten for den lokale Satudarah-afdeling. Men de siger, at Sahin Celal Gülfirat godt er klar over, at politiet leder efter ham.
Ekstra Bladet har forsøgt at få en kommentar fra Satudarah Northside. De er ikke vendt tilbage.
Rockerfest: Det betyder mærkerne på vesten
body_en:
Satudarah Northside is a relatively new chapter in the expanding black and yellow rock organization. Of the eight members in the department, several of them are veterans of the Danish underworld. Several of them have worn vests in other colors and now their president is on the run
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
According to Ekstra Bladet's information, 34-year-old Sahin Celal Gülfirat is the president of Satudarah Northside. He is wanted for a violent stabbing in an apartment on 22 June this year at Vesterbro in Copenhagen. Here, according to the police, a 29-year-old man was approached and subjected to several stab wounds by Sahin Celal Gülfirat and another suspected accomplice.
Satudarah Northside is based in Rødovre, where the police were out searching as recently as 11 August. The police cannot say whether the search was connected to the stabbings at Vesterbro, because two suspected accomplices are in custody in the case for so-called closed doors.
Satudarah Northside is a relatively new chapter in the expanding
black and yellow rock organization
. Of the eight members in the department, several of them are veterans of the Danish underworld. Several of them have worn vests in other colors and also have violent stories in their luggage.
Past in the Board
According to Ekstra Bladet's information, the now fugitive president Sahin Celal Gülfirat has a past in the rock club Gremium.  Here, the now fugitive president may have met another gang veteran who has also donned the black and yellow back badge in the Northside branch. It concerns Tommy Josic, who in December 2020 posed on social media with a logo from Gremium.
Ekstra Bladet could tell on that occasion that he assumed a leading role in the club. Since then he has also switched to Satudarah Northside. Reportedly in the role of road captain, who plans trips and drives.
Thrown out with Jønke
Before the time in Gremium and Satudarah, Tommy Josic also has a past in the Hells Angels. Here he was one of two HAs who stayed
kicked out of the club
together with veteran rocker Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen back in 2020.
The decision itself was taken at a 'Danmark meeting', where representatives from all Danish departments were gathered. At the meeting, Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen's membership was put to a vote, where a majority turned the thumbs down.
The expulsion was preceded by a long process that included internal accusations in the Kastrup department. Here Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen sided with Tommy Josic.
Initially, it was Jørn 'Jønke' Nielsen and a younger member called 'Irish' who were thrown out at the Danish meeting. Three weeks later, Tommy Josic then quit the Hells Angels.
Bloody family history
Tommy Josic had otherwise stayed at the club despite the fact that his brother Thomas Josic - called 'Tito' - had been liquidated in the open street by another member of the Hells Angels. 'Tito' was shot down on 4 May 2019 at 10pm on Løvevej in Rødovre.
One or more killers had laid in ambush in the residential area where his ex-girlfriend lived and shot him near her residence. Police suspect ha-rocker Hasan Okutan of having fired the fatal shots or of having been involved in it. He is imprisoned in absentia in connection with the murder.
The killing is probably revenge for a shooting with Hasan Okutan himself as the target. Here, the late Thomas 'Tito' Josic was suspected of having participated when shots were fired at Hasan Okutan in the small North Zealand town of Plejelt in January 2019.
The case gained more mainstream publicity when Hasan Okutan fled in a random woman's car, unaware that her labrador was in the back seat. At 8:35 p.m. however, the emergency center received a call from a lawyer who could provide information about the car and the dog's location.
Wanted and killed were 'Brothers in arms
The slain Thomas 'Tito' Josic and Hasan Okutan were otherwise part of a gang that had grown up together. Several of them also wore the same tattoo. B. I. A - an abbreviation for Brothers In Arms.
For over ten years, the two were part of a small group of men who had stuck together through thick and thin.
In number, the group consisted of just over a handful. Research and court records from various court cases in which the group's members have been prosecuted show that it was a cold-blooded group that, either collectively or in smaller groups, has been behind, among other things, assaults, robberies and 'roll shops' aimed at other criminals, thefts of designer furniture and bank robberies.
All were HAs
The group was first part of the Bandidos. But here they came into conflict with other members, and this led to a short but hectic conflict with shooting and hunting in the streets.
Later, the group was accepted into the Hells Angels, where
Thomas
Josic
and Hasan Okutan became part of the HA department at Amager, called Nomads.
While Hasan Okutan, according to Ekstra Bladet's information, is still a HA member, he left
Josic
Hells Angels shortly after the shooting in Plejelt. It is unclear if they were kicked out or if they left on their own.
Thomas Josic's brother Tommy is now road captain in Satudarah Northside. Here, according to Ekstra Bladet's information, he has also become clubmates with at least one former member of the Bandidos.
The police are looking for the suspected perpetrator
Copenhagen Police do not want to comment on gang relations in connection with the search for the president of the local Satudarah branch. But they say that Sahin Celal Gülfirat is well aware that the police are looking for him.
Ekstra Bladet has tried to get a comment from Satudarah Northside. They have not returned.
Rockerfest: That means the marks on the vest

title: Drab på bandemedlem: 'De slår min bror ihjel'
subtitle: Et Snapchat-billede var sidste livstegn fra Mellissas lillebror
body:
black
Samme iskolde forårsmorgen som hendes lillebror blev fundet af en hundelufter død på en frossen græsplæne i Valbyparken ramt af 11 skud, sagde Mellissa til en arbejdskollega:
- Jeg tror, min bror er død.
Hendes 24-årige lillebror havde virket jaget, forvirret og ked af det, i dagene op til at han satte sig ind i en mørk bil nede på gaden og aldrig vendte hjem.
Der blev set mystiske biler holde på vejen eller kredse rundt ved bopælen i aftenmørket.
Hans storesøstre var bekymrede og bange på hans vegne.
Han havde nævnt, at han havde været oppe at skændes 'med dem'. Han havde også afvist at sælge hash eller stå vagt - han ville ikke være stikirenddreng mere.
Nu følte han sig ikke engang sikker i moderens lejlighed, hvor han ofte sov.
black
24-årige Ari Hussein havde også sagt, at han ville ud af miljøet. Han var medlem af banden Loyal To Familia, LTF, og var blevet rekrutteret nogle år forinden i et fængsel. Han havde også været supporter i Bandidos.
Om ønsket om at slippe helt ud af det miljø var oprigtigt, eller om det blev sagt for at please familien, har søsteren tænkt over. Men Ari sagde det både til familie og andre tæt på sig.
Selv var lillebroderen flere år tilbage dømt for blandt andet våbenbesiddelse og for grov vold og havde under et overfald hældt kogende vand på et offer.
black
Overfaldet
Ugen inden Ari Husseins 24-årige liv fik en brat ende natten til 15. marts 2018, havde der været bud efter ham.
Han var blevet forfulgt på en gade i Brønshøj-Husum og blev ramt af skud. Da der ikke var flere projektiler i våbnet, blev han væltet omkuld af den maskerede gerningsmand, der hamrede pistolskæftet ned i hans hoved og ansigt igen og igen, ryddede munden for fortænder og lavede blodige kløfter i hovedbunden.
En eftermiddag 14. marts 2018 forlod Ari Hussein en lejlighed på Østerbro. Han svarede ikke på søstrenes opkald, men lagde en video ud på det sociale medie Snapchat, hvor han filmede sig selv i en bil med nogle andre mænd, der sad foran. Her et billede derfra.
Han søstre blev urolige. Var det et råb om hjælp?
De to ringede hele aftenen og natten til hans telefon. Næste morgen, efter at Mellissa kæderygende var gået rundt i gaderne, mødte hun på arbejde i stormagasinet Field's og delte sin frygt for broderens skæbne med en kollega.
black
Værste frygt bekræftet
Kort tid efter fik de deres værste frygt bekræftet. Af politiet.
Ari Husseins kaotiske opvækst, hans vej inde i bandelivet og tiden op til hans brutale død beskrives i en ny bog, 'Fanget i familien' af storesøsteren Mellissa Hussein.
Mellissas bog - Om Mellissa Husseins og hendes bog
Den dag i dag fortryder hun, at hun ikke ringede til politiet den aften, da hun og søstrene ikke kunne få kontakt.
- Jeg er så vred på mig selv over, at jeg ikke ringede til politiet og sagde: 'De slår min bror ihjel.' Jeg ved, at Ari ikke ville have, at vi skulle blande os og spille mødre over for ham. Men når jeg ser på et foto af min bror, når jeg sidder og tænker på ham, er jeg ked af det og føler, at jeg ikke gjorde nok.
Det viste sig, at politiet samme aften havde truffet Ari på Blågårds Plads sammen med folk fra LTF. Ingen ved endnu, hvad der præcist skete senere den nat, og hvem Ari havnede med i Valbyparken.
Drabet er stadig uopklaret.
black
'Kriminelle karrierer ender i fængsel eller på en gravplads'
- Det var min bror, der mistede livet, men det kunne lige så godt have været ham, der tog en andens.
Mellissa Hussein bilder sig ikke ind, at hendes bror var en engel. En kriminel kammerat har sagt til hende, at han var 'frisk og lærenem', og i bogen skriver hun, at det har været en vigtig erkendelse, at han ikke var bedre end de andre. 'Kriminelle karrierer er grimme og ender i fængsel eller på en gravplads.'
Men Mellissa Hussein håber, at bogen kan støtte andre, som har en bekymring for en søn eller en bror.
- Hiv fat i de drenge i god tid. Gør noget. Der kan være mødre og fædre, som bare råber op og giver dem en flad, men der skal sættes ind meget tidligt.
- Jeg håber, historien om min brors død kan vendes til noget, så nogle unge drenge vil forstå, at det miljø er alvor. Nogle gange hører man og læser om bandefolk, som fortæller, hvordan de var fucking kriminelle og tjente mange penge. Det kan måske lyde spændende. For mig er det vigtigt at få frem, at det er et liv fra shawarma til shawarma.
black
'Du er helt slidt, brormand'
Mellissa har stået på sidelinjen og mærket bandemiljøets fornedrelse af hendes alt for tjenstvillige lillebror.
Hun beskriver i bogen, hvordan lillebroderen havde en grusom, jordslået sødlig lugt omkring sig, når han havde været sammen med sine brødre i en eller anden lejlighed, 'som om de havde siddet i et hul og røget fede'.
Hvordan broderen på sin fødselsdag lå hjemme på en sofa og ikke fik en eneste besked fra sine såkaldt højtelskede brødre.
Hvordan han blev vækket af en bandebror, der skulle bruge penge til et hotel. Ari måtte vække sin mor for at låne penge af hendes sparsomme kontanter.
Et halvt år før sin død fik han job på et tolkebureau og var vildt glad. Selv om han var tro mod bandens tavsheds-kodeks og ikke røbede hemmeligheder, betroede han sin søster, at han var blevet hånet og nedgjort. 'Dig, arbejde? Du er helt slidt, brormand, hvem er du at være tolk', havde de sagt.
Nytårsaften før hans død havde hans søstre givet ham en ternet skovmandsskjorte og et par løse bukser og sneakers, så han kunne være pæn til en fest. Kort efter var det væk. - De har brændt det, sagde Ari bagefter. LTF'ere gik i mærketøj fra blandt andet Gucci. Det løse tøj var noget, rivalerne fra banden Brothas gik i.
black
Rygter efter drab: Han skød en anden
Da Ari satte sig ind i den mørke bil, var meldingen, at han skulle hente sit pas. Nogle bandebrødre havde haft hans pas, fordi de skulle bestille en rejse til Spanien, sagde de. Det blev ikke til noget.
Efter drabet på lillebroderen hørte Mellissa flere rygter om baggrunden for hans død.
Det kunne handle om en rulleforretning med hash, der var gået galt. Det kunne bunde i et forhold til en veninde, der var problematisk, fordi hun havde familie i en rivaliserende bande. Ari Hussein havde også været soldat for YPK i Syrien og kæmpede mod Islamisk stat, IS. Andre i bandemiljøet var ikke enige med ham i hans holdninger til IS.
black
Det mest hårdnakkede rygte
Det mest hårdnakkede rygte, som Mellissa stadig hører, er, at Ari var den ene af to gerningsmænd, der under en bandekonflikt mellem LTF og Brothas skød ledende Brothas-folk i 2017.
Prisen for, at en våbenhvile mellem LTF og Brothas derefter skulle holde, var, at LTF'erne enten selv straffede en gerningsmand eller udleverede ham. Mellissa skriver i bogen:
- Jeg har spurgt politiet, om de tror på det sidste rygte, og deres svar har været, at de har undersøgt det og ikke kan placere Ari på gerningsstedet.
Københavns Politi vil over for Ekstra Bladet ikke kommentere de konkrete oplysninger.
Knud Hvass, chef for efterforskning af organiseret kriminalitet, siger: - Vi er bekendt med mange rygter og efterretninger, og hver sten er blevet vendt flere gange, uden at det desværre har ført til en opklaring.
Selv siger Mellissa, der ikke ønsker at være en mor til to små sønner, der er optaget af hævn:
- Jeg har da tænkt på hævn. Men jeg er for længst kommet frem til, at det der med tand for tand, dræb min bror, så dræber jeg din bror, det stopper her.
- Jeg har arbejdet med mig selv og føler, at jeg har fået en renere sjæl. Jeg ønsker ikke, at de skal dø (Aris drabsmænd, red.). Men de dræbte ikke bare en ung mand. Det gik ud over en hel familie. Alligevel - hvis de stod frem og tog deres straf, ville jeg tilgive dem.
black
Omskåret under familiebesøg
De tre søskende er opvokset i et kaotisk og tumultarisk hjem i skiftende lejligheder i København. Født af en gudesmuk kurdisk mor, der kom til Danmark som 16-årig fra Syrien og skulle giftes med en noget ældre mand, hun havde mødt en gang før.
Hun troede, hun skulle op til et pænt hjem i Danmark, men blev præsenteret for et klubværelse med en madras på gulvet.
Den purunge kvinde fødte med få års mellemrum to piger og en dreng og blev ifølge bogens beskrivelser udsat for vold. Faderen blev blandt andet varetægtsfængslet for drabsforsøg mod moderen, men endte med at få en dom for vold. Der var perioder, hvor han fik tilhold mod at opsøge moderen, men også en anden gang, hvor de tre børn pludselig skulle på ferie hos far med tøj, der hastigt blev proppet ned i deres skoletasker, og hovedet proppet med mors formaninger om ikke at nævne hendes nye mand.
En udflugt ud i naturen med faderen endte ifølge Mellissas beskrivelse i bogen med, at faderen med fråde om munden kastede en skrigende Ari hen ad jorden, løftede ham op og ruskede ham i kraven. Den lille dreng var faldet i en vandpyt og var blevet beskidt.
I sommeren 2001, da Ari var syv år, viste moderen, som var syg med ptsd endnu en gang, at hun var 'impulssstyret', som der stod i en indberetning. Hun sendte sine børn på ferie i Syrien. Børnene boede hos deres kurdiske familie i et primitivt hus. Da en tante opdagede, at Ari ikke var omskåret, blev der gjort klar til fest og en såkaldt doktor bestilt. Mellissa fortæller i bogen, hvordan synet af en lille dreng, alene og bange, der blev holdt fast af to mænd, har brændt sig ind på hendes nethinde. Hvordan doktoren ikke var i hvid kittel, men var en mand i brun skjorte med overskæg. Ingen lokalbedøvelse, men en lugt af brændt kød og synet af forhud, som doktoren viste frem.
Og Ari med et jaget blik, der bleg gik med benene spredt ud til siden, så stoffet på den kjortel, han havde fået på, ikke rørte såret. Han lagde sig på en pude under en ventilator, stille. Nu var han en mand, sagde familien. Og så var der fest.
Hjemme i København voksede sagsbunkerne hos de sociale myndigheder om omsorgssvigtede børn. I hjemmet kom mange mennesker, og der var altid drama og nogle, der skændtes. Myndighederne satte ind med massive hjælpeforanstaltninger. Mellissa har som voksen læst indberetningerne. Hun selv begyndte at stjæle i butikker med en veninde og skiftede heldagsskoler periodevist ud med opholdssteder på landet. Ari, som var platfodet, gik med fødderne indad og ikke kunne spille fodbold, fik efterhånden venner, der sendte den spinkle drenge ind i lejligheder på indbrud.
- Det er ikke min hensigt. Hensigten med min fortælling er, at nogle har fokus på de små drenge, som måske allerede fra niårsalderen er på en gal vej. Ikke fordi de små drenge
vil
være hårdkogte gangstere, men fordi de bliver mobbet eller er udsat for svigt og vold, og hverdagen omkring dem mest består af andre drenge, som enten fryser dem ude eller får dem til at gøre alt muligt, siger Mellissa.
- Han skulle være fjernet til et stabilt sted, hvor der var nogle andre forbilleder. En god plejefamilie. Han fik en aflastningsfamilie og nåede at være hos dem i en weekend, og han var så glad. Han elskede dyr, og der var katte og fugle. Men det var for sent, siger Mellissa.
Umiddelbart efter det første weekendophold blev han anholdt i en sag og røg ind på en lukket ungdomsinstitution.
Mellissa har i dag et godt forhold til sin mor, som hun elsker trods de svigt, hun har oplevet som barn. Moderen og Mellissa har talt meget om deres fælles fortid, men moderen har også sagt til datteren, at hun ikke har lyst til at læse bogen.
Mellissa har ikke kontakt til sin far. Ekstra Bladet har via et familiemedlem spurgt, om faderen har en kommentar til beskrivelserne af ham. Han er ikke vendt retur.
body_en:
black
On the same icy spring morning that her little brother was found by a dog walker dead on a frozen lawn in Valbyparken, hit by 11 shots, Mellissa told a work colleague:
- I think my brother is dead.
Her 24-year-old little brother had seemed hunted, confused and upset in the days leading up to getting into a dark car down the street and never returning home.
Mysterious cars were seen parked on the road or circling the residence in the evening darkness.
His older sisters were worried and scared for him.
He had mentioned that he had been arguing 'with them'. He had also refused to sell weed or stand guard - he didn't want to be a stilt boy any more.
Now he didn't even feel safe in his mother's apartment, where he often slept.
black
24-year-old Ari Hussein had also said that he wanted out of the environment. He was a member of the gang Loyal To Familia, LTF, and had been recruited a few years before in a prison. He had also been a supporter of the Bandidos.
The sister has thought about whether the desire to get out of that environment was sincere, or whether it was said to please the family. But Ari said it both to family and others close to him.
The younger brother himself was convicted several years ago for, among other things, possession of a weapon and for serious violence and had poured boiling water on a victim during an assault.
black
The assault
The week before Ari Hussein's 24-year-old life came to an abrupt end on the night of March 15, 2018, there had been bids for him.
He had been pursued on a street in Brønshøj-Husum and was hit by gunfire. When there were no more projectiles in the weapon, he was knocked down by the masked assailant, who hammered the butt of the gun into his head and face repeatedly, clearing his mouth of incisors and creating bloody gashes in his scalp.
One afternoon on March 14, 2018, Ari Hussein left an apartment in Østerbro. He did not answer the sisters' calls, but posted a video on the social media site Snapchat, filming himself in a car with some other men sitting in the front. Here is a picture from there.
His sisters became restless. Was it a cry for help?
The two of them called his phone all evening and night. The next morning, after Mellissa had walked the streets chain-smoking, she met at work at the department store Field's and shared her fears for her brother's fate with a colleague.
black
Worst fears confirmed
Shortly after, their worst fears were confirmed. By the police.
Ari Hussein's chaotic upbringing, his way into gang life and the time leading up to his brutal death are described in a new book, 'Caught in the Family' by older sister Mellissa Hussein.
Mellissa's book - About Mellissa Hussein and her book
To this day, she regrets not calling the police that night, as she and the sisters could not get in touch.
- I'm so angry with myself that I didn't call the police and say: 'They're killing my brother.' I know Ari wouldn't want us interfering and playing mothers to him. But when I look at a photo of my brother, when I sit and think about him, I feel sad and feel like I didn't do enough.
It turned out that the police had met Ari at Blågårds Plads together with people from LTF that same evening. No one yet knows what exactly happened later that night and who Ari ended up with in Valbyparken.
The murder is still unsolved.
black
'Criminal careers end in prison or a graveyard'
- It was my brother who lost his life, but it could just as well have been him who took someone else's.
Mellissa Hussein doesn't imagine her brother was an angel. A criminal friend told her that he was 'fresh and easy to learn', and in the book she writes that it was an important realization that he was no better than the others. 'Criminal careers are ugly and end in prison or a graveyard.'
But Mellissa Hussein hopes that the book can support others who have a concern for a son or a brother.
- Grab those boys in good time. Do something. There may be mothers and fathers who just shout up and give them a slap, but you have to intervene very early.
- I hope the story of my brother's death can be turned into something, so that some young boys will understand that this environment is serious. Sometimes you hear and read about gang members who tell how they were fucking criminals and made a lot of money. It might sound exciting. For me, it is important to show that it is a life from shawarma to shawarma.
black
'You're all worn out, bro'
Mellissa has stood on the sidelines and felt the gang environment's degradation of her overly dutiful little brother.
She describes in the book how the little brother had a cruel, earthy, sweet smell around him when he had been with his brothers in some apartment, 'as if they had sat in a hole and smoked weed'.
How the brother on his birthday was lying at home on a couch and didn't get a single message from his so-called much-loved brothers.
How he was woken up by a gang member who needed money for a hotel. Ari had to wake up his mother to borrow money from her meager cash.
Half a year before his death, he got a job at an interpreting agency and was very happy. Although he was true to the gang's code of silence and did not divulge secrets, he confided in his sister that he had been mocked and belittled. 'You, work? You are all worn out, brother, who are you to be an interpreter', they had said.
On New Year's Eve before his death, his sisters had given him a checkered woodsman's shirt and a pair of loose pants and sneakers so he could look nice for a party. Soon after, it was gone. - They burned it, said Ari afterwards. LTFers wore branded clothes from, among others, Gucci. The loose clothing was something the rivals from the Brothas gang wore.
black
Rumors after murder: He shot someone else
When Ari got into the dark car, the message was that he had to pick up his passport. Some gang members had had his passport because they needed to book a trip to Spain, they said. Nothing came of it.
After the murder of the little brother, Mellissa heard more rumors about the background of his death.
It could be about a hash business that had gone wrong. It could be rooted in a relationship with a friend that was problematic because she had family in a rival gang. Ari Hussein had also been a soldier for the YPK in Syria and fought against the Islamic State, IS. Others in the gang community did not agree with him in his views on IS.
black
The most stubborn rumor
The most stubborn rumor that Mellissa still hears is that Ari was one of two perpetrators who, during a gang conflict between the LTF and the Brothas, shot senior Brothas in 2017.
The price for a truce between the LTF and the Brothas to hold thereafter was that the LTF either punished a perpetrator themselves or extradited him. Mellissa writes in the book:
- I have asked the police if they believe the last rumour, and their answer has been that they have investigated it and cannot place Ari at the crime scene.
Copenhagen Police will not comment on the specific information to Ekstra Bladet.
Knud Hvass, head of the investigation of organized crime, says: - We are aware of many rumors and intelligence, and every stone has been turned several times, without unfortunately leading to an explanation.
Even Mellissa, who does not want to be a mother of two young sons who are preoccupied with revenge, says:
- I've been thinking about revenge. But I've long since come to the conclusion that with tooth for tooth, kill my brother, I'll kill your brother, it stops here.
- I have worked on myself and feel that I have gained a cleaner soul. I don't want them to die (Aris' killers, ed.). But they didn't just kill a young man. It affected an entire family. Still - if they stood up and took their punishment, I would forgive them.
black
Circumcised during family visit
The three siblings grew up in a chaotic and tumultuous home in changing apartments in Copenhagen. Born to a beautiful Kurdish mother who came to Denmark as a 16-year-old from Syria and was to marry a somewhat older man she had met once before.
She thought she was going up to a nice home in Denmark, but was presented with a club room with a mattress on the floor.
The very young woman gave birth to two girls and a boy a few years apart and, according to the book's descriptions, was subjected to violence. The father was remanded in custody for, among other things, attempted murder against the mother, but ended up getting a sentence for violence. There were periods when he was restrained from visiting the mother, but also another time when the three children suddenly had to go on holiday with their father with clothes hastily stuffed into their school bags, and their heads stuffed with mother's admonitions not to mention her new husband.
An excursion into nature with the father ended, according to Mellissa's description in the book, with the father, foaming at the mouth, throwing a screaming Ari to the ground, lifting him up and shaking him by the collar. The little boy had fallen into a puddle and gotten dirty.
In the summer of 2001, when Ari was seven years old, the mother, who suffered from PTSD, once again showed that she was 'impulse controlled', as one report said. She sent her children on holiday in Syria. The children lived with their Kurdish family in a primitive house. When an aunt discovered that Ari was not circumcised, preparations were made for a party and a so-called doctor was ordered. Mellissa tells in the book how the sight of a little boy, alone and scared, being held by two men, has burned into her retina. How the doctor wasn't in a white coat, but was a man in a brown shirt with a moustache. No local anaesthetic, but a smell of burnt flesh and the sight of foreskin, which the doctor showed.
And Ari with a hunted look, walking pale with his legs spread to the side, saw that the fabric of the robe he had put on did not touch the wound. He lay down on a pillow under a fan, quietly. Now he was a man, the family said. And then there was a party.
Back home in Copenhagen, the piles of cases at the social authorities about neglected children grew. In the home, many people came and there was always drama and some people arguing. The authorities stepped in with massive aid measures. As an adult, Mellissa has read the reports. She herself began stealing from shops with a friend and periodically replaced full-day schools with residences in the countryside. Ari, who was flat-footed, walked with his feet inward and couldn't play football, eventually made friends who sent the skinny boys into apartments to break into.
- That is not my intention. The purpose of my story is that some focus on the little boys, who may already be on a crazy path from the age of nine. Not because the little boys
will
be hard-boiled gangsters, but because they are bullied or are exposed to failure and violence, and the everyday life around them mostly consists of other boys who either freeze them out or make them do everything possible, says Mellissa.
- He should have been removed to a stable place where there were other role models. A good foster family. He got a respite family and got to stay with them for a weekend and he was so happy. He loved animals, and there were cats and birds. But it was too late, says Mellissa.
Immediately after the first weekend stay, he was arrested in a case and committed to a closed youth institution.
Today, Mellissa has a good relationship with her mother, whom she loves despite the failures she experienced as a child. The mother and Mellissa have talked a lot about their shared past, but the mother has also told the daughter that she does not want to read the book.
Mellissa has no contact with her father. Ekstra Bladet has asked via a family member whether the father has a comment on the descriptions of him. He has not returned.

 'YPK']

title: Lindas massage-orgasme: Jeg kom som aldrig før
subtitle: Både baller og bryster blev masseret - og til sidst kom spørgsmålet: Ønsker du yoni-massage?
body:
Jeg har lige bestilt en tantramassage,' fortalte Linda, da vi forleden mødtes over en kop kaffe.
Jeg havde før hørt om tantra, men var ikke sikker på, præcis hvad det indebar.
Min veninde fortalte, at hun tilfældigt var faldet over en annonce online og fandt emnet interessant.
'Tantramassage handler om at åbne sig kropsligt og mentalt, så man kan være til stede i nuet. I tre timer bliver du masseret grundigt over hele kroppen, og i slutningen af sessionen spørger massøren så, om du ønsker en yoni-massage,' forklarede Linda og sendte mig et sigende blik.
Yoni-hvad-for noget? Hun aflæste min forvirring og uddybede:
'Yoni er din vagina. Du kan simpelthen vælge, om du vil afslutte med, at han også masserer denne kropsdel. Formålet med massagen er ikke at få en orgasme, men det kan naturligvis forekomme. Og sker det, skal man bare byde den velkommen.'
Kærligheds-klummeskribent
Selvom det hele lød en smule for spirituelt for mig - for slet ikke at tale om angstprovokerende - var jeg dybt betaget af min venindes forestående eventyr.
Det var både modigt og interessant. Højt og helligt lovede hun, at jeg ville blive den første, der fik et resumé.
Ballerne? Jep!
Endelig oprandt dagen. Flere gange skævede jeg mod uret og ventede utålmodigt på, at der var gået tre timer.
Så ringede telefonen. Jeg bemærkede, hvor glad Linda lød, da hun med det samme kastede sig ud i at fortælle.
'Nu skal du bare høre. Det startede med, at jeg blev ført ind i et lokale, hvor jeg kunne klæde mig af i fred. Og inden du spørger: Ja, man er helt nøgen. Så lagde jeg mig på maven på en briks, hvorefter massøren kom ind og begyndte at massere mig. Fra ende til anden, bogstavelig talt.'
Jeg lyttede opmærksomt og kunne ikke lade være med at spørge, om også numsen var blevet berørt. Linda svarede bramfrit, at ikke bare var hun blevet masseret på ballerne, men også imellem.
... og brysterne?
Da min veninde efter en times tid var blevet æltet godt og grundigt igennem, kom turen til frontpartiet.
'Var det ikke grænseoverskridende at ligge helt nøgen og blottet foran en fremmede mand,' ville jeg gerne vide.
Linda fortalte, at selvom situationen var nervepirrende, havde hun følt sig tryg og afslappet gennem hele processen.
'Masserede han så også dine bryster.' spurgte jeg.
'Som jeg fortalte tidligere, bliver du masseret over hele kroppen,' slog hun skarpt fast.
Endelig nåede beretningen den del, jeg var mest spændt på.
Min veninde havde tidligere sagt, at hun ikke på forhånd vidste, om hun ville prøve tissekone-massagen. Det kunne hun først tage stilling til i momentet.
'Ønsker du yoni-massage,' havde massørens pludselig spurgt. Før hun kunne nå at tænke yderligere, hørte Linda sig selv fremstamme et ja.
Og så skal jeg love for, at massagen tog en vild drejning. Nu handlede det udelukkende om den såkaldte yoni.
Her blev masseret på ydre læber, på indre læber, på klitoris og til sidst også dybt indeni.
Jeg lappede fortællingen i mig og kunne ikke undgå at konstatere, at man da måtte blive vanvittig liderlig af sådan en omgang.
Linda udstødte et højlydt fnis og sagde, at alt andet var uundgåeligt. Og med det fulgte naturligvis million-kroners-spørgsmålet. Havde Linda fået en orgasme?
Gerne igen
'Ved tantra er orgasme ikke formålet, uanset om du modtager yoni-massage eller ej. Formålet er at …', begyndte Linda sin prædiken.
Jeg afbrød hurtigt:
'Nej-nej, det har jeg forstået. Men kom du,' spurgte jeg igen.
For skal vi være ærlige, var det jo det interessante her.
'Om jeg kom,' gentog hun drillende og udbrød endelig:
'Ja, du kan tro, at jeg kom. Jeg kom, som jeg aldrig er kommet før. Det var en fantastisk følelse og helt sikkert noget, jeg kunne finde på at prøve igen.'
I mit stille sind kunne jeg ikke helt lade være med at tænke på, om ikke min veninde reelt set lige havde købt sig til en orgasme? Og endnu vigtigere, om ikke jobbet som tantramassør er enhver mands våde drøm?

body_en:
I've just ordered a tantra massage,' said Linda when we met over a cup of coffee the other day.
I had heard of tantra before, but wasn't sure exactly what it entailed.
My friend said that she had stumbled across an ad online and found the topic interesting.
'Tantra massage is about opening up physically and mentally so that you can be present in the present. For three hours you will be thoroughly massaged all over your body and at the end of the session the masseuse will ask if you would like a yoni massage,' explained Linda, giving me a telling look.
Yoni-what-what? She read my confusion and elaborated:
'Yoni is your vagina. You can simply choose whether you want to finish with him massaging this body part as well. The purpose of the massage is not to have an orgasm, but it can of course occur. And if that happens, you just have to welcome it.'
Love columnist
Although it all sounded a little too spiritual for me - not to mention anxiety provoking - I was deeply enthralled by my friend's impending adventure.
It was both brave and interesting. Out loud she promised I would be the first to get a summary.
The balls? Yup!
The day finally arrived. Several times I squinted against the clock, impatiently waiting for three hours to pass.
Then the phone rang. I noticed how happy Linda sounded as she immediately launched into the story.
'Now, let me tell you. It started with me being taken into a room where I could undress in peace. And before you ask: Yes, you are completely naked. Then I lay down on my stomach on a bench, after which the masseuse came in and started massaging me. From end to end, literally.'
I listened attentively and couldn't help but ask if the butt had also been affected. Linda bluntly replied that not only had she been massaged on the balls, but also in between.
... and the breasts?
When, after an hour, my friend had been thoroughly kneaded, it was time for the front part.
'Wasn't it transgressive to lie completely naked and exposed in front of a strange man,' I wanted to know.
Linda said that although the situation was nerve-wracking, she had felt safe and relaxed throughout the process.
'Did he also massage your breasts.' I asked.
'As I told you earlier, you are being massaged all over,' she stated sharply.
Finally, the story reached the part I was most excited about.
My friend had previously said that she did not know in advance whether she would try the pee wife massage. She could only decide on that in the moment.
'Do you want a yoni massage,' the masseuse had suddenly asked. Before she could think further, Linda heard herself utter a yes.
And then I have to promise that the massage took a wild turn. Now it was all about the so-called yoni.
Here the outer lips, inner lips, clitoris and finally also deep inside were massaged.
I patched up the story and couldn't help but notice that one must get madly horny from such a match.

Would love to again
'With tantra, orgasm is not the goal, regardless of whether you receive yoni massage or not. The purpose is to ...', Linda began her sermon.
I quickly interrupted:
'No-no, I understood that. But did you come,' I asked again.
Because let's be honest, that was the interesting thing here.
'If I came,' she repeated teasingly, and finally exclaimed:
'Yes, you can believe I came. I came like I've never come before. It was a great feeling and definitely something I could try again.'
In my quiet mind, I couldn't help but wonder if my friend had actually just bought herself an orgasm? And more importantly, isn't the job of tantra masseur every man's wet dream?

title: Brøndbys berygtede hooligans
subtitle: Hooligans fra Fri Sport var blandt ballademagerne på stadion i Dortmund i september. En af dem har en brutal historie med at kæmpe under de blågule farver
body:
Blandt Brøndbys ballademagere på stadion i Dortmund var nogle af klubbens mest notoriske hooligans. Dansk politi bekræfter, at de har set flere medlemmer af den berygtede hooligan-gruppering Fri Sport i forbindelse med de overfald og den uro, som hjemsøgte både byen og stadion i forbindelse med fodboldkampen mellem FC. København og Dortmund i Champions League.
På et af pressebillederne fra Stadion i Dortmund ser man flere Brøndby-fans løbe i forbindelse med optøjerne. En af dem er maskeret med en gul og blå halsedisse foran ansigtet i klubbens farver. Flere kilder bekræfter over for Ekstra Bladet, at det er en navngiven hooligan fra Fri Sport, som gemmer sig bag maskeringen.
På de sociale medier optræder han flere steder med kendte hooligans fra Fri Sport, og på nettet er det dokumenteret, at han i hvert fald mindst én gang har kæmpet under de blågule farver.
Ballademageren fra kampen i Dortmund har i 2020 kæmpet i den illegale undergrunds- kampsportsturnering Kots. I august 2020 stiller han op i en kamp uden regler, hvor han ifølge beskrivelsen er en yngre Brøndby hooligan med en kampvægt på 95 kilo og en baggrund i thaiboksning.
I en slidt lagerhal i Sverige træder den unge hooligan ind i en byggeplads-indhegning. Kamplederen og de fleste af tilskuerne er maskerede, for kampene bliver streamet til et stort publikum, selvom de er ulovlige. Stemningen er intens.
Han åbner med et venstre-jab og et lang højre slag, som ikke rammer den lidt højere modstander. Slag og spark flyver frem og tilbage mellem de to kæmpere. Brøndby-kæmperen begynder på et tidspunkt at bløde fra en flænge ved næsen. Tempoet går lidt ud af kampen, som den bølger frem og tilbage.
Brøndby-kæmperen forsøger at ramme modstanderen med en skalle. Uden held. Ingen af dem kan få det afgørende slag ind. Indtil den unge Brøndby-mand kontrabokser modstanderen efter et spark og rammer ham med en højrehånd, der får benene til at ekse under ham. Kampen bliver sekunder senere standset, og sejrherren holder et Brøndby-halstørklæde op over sit hoved i en sejrsgestus.
I Kots-kampene kæmper de mod modstandere, der er indforstået med risikoen. Mens optøjerne på og omkring stadion i Dortmund gik ud over flere uskyldige ofre, der blot var kommet for at se fodbold.
Politiinspektør Mogens Lauridsen fra Vestegnens Politi fortæller, at de havde deres spottere med til kampen i Tyskland. Her fik de øje på flere gamle kendinge. Blandt andet fra Fri Sport, som de også kender fra Kots-turneringerne.
- Fri Sport deltager jo, ifølge vores oplysninger, i turneringer, der minder om UFC for hooligans, som de arrangerer i Sverige og andre steder, hvor de indbyrdes slås i en tom lagerhal, siger han.
Yderligtgående fans fra Brøndby er allieret med deres ligesindede i Dortmund, og derfor støtter de hinanden i forbindelse med optøjer og arrangerede kampe.
Ekstra Bladet har forsøgt at få en kommentar fra hooliganen, men han er ikke vendt tilbage.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Stemnings-fans involveret i optøjer
Fanfraktionen Alpha betegner sig selv om de 'stemningsskabende fans', men i Dortmund var de ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger med til at sætte en ganske anden stemning.
Her var de nemlig særdeles aktive i optøjer og overfald på FCK-fans.
Til Brøndbys hjemmekampe sætter Alpha stemningen fra Sydsiden, som den mest inkarnerede tribune hedder på stadion på den københavnske vestegn. Til mandagens kamp mod Dortmund spillede de ikke op til slagsange, men til ballade, overfald og slagsmål rundt om i Dortmund.
Jan Bech om uroligheder
Styrer capo og budskaber
Alpha-gruppen har, ligesom Fanafdelingen og Brøndby Support, en halvofficiel status i forhold til Brøndby IF, hvor de med to repræsentanter sidder i fanafdelingens bestyrelse. Og så er det dem, der i det såkaldte capotårn dikterer slagets gang på Brøndbys stemningstribune.
Capotårnet er det sted, hvor ham der svinger taktstokken, befinder sig. Ham der bestemmer, hvad og hvornår der synges.
I sidste weekend besluttede Alpha for eksempel, at de ikke ønskede at synge for Brøndbys nyindkøb Nicolai Vallys, fordi han voksede op på Østerbro og har en fortid som fan af FC København.
Alpha styrer også, hvilke budskaber der spredes på bannere og tifoer, ligesom de ofte har gjort sig bemærket med deres markante holdninger til Brøndby IF. Senest med
udmeldinger om Brøndbys ejerstruktur
.
Spottere observerede Alpha
På den måde spiller Alpha en fremtrædende rolle blandt fans af fodboldklubben Brøndby. I manges øjne er de Brøndbys mest magtfulde fangruppering.
Men Københavns Vestegns Politi fortæller til Ekstra Bladet, at Alpha også har en anden og mindre fredelig side. Faktisk observerede politiets spottere flere Alpha-fans blandt de Brøndby-tilhængere, som var rejst til Tyskland for at støtte Dortmund i deres opgør mod arvefjenderne fra FC København.
Det fortæller politiinspektør Mogens Lauridsen.
- Der var folk fra Alpha dernede. Hvor mange der præcis var, ved jeg ikke. Vores spotteres vurdering dernede var, at det var en kombination af flere forskellige grupper, og totalt observerede de en 50-60 stykker, siger han.
Københavns Vestegns Politi er opmærksomme på både den lyse og den mørke side af Alpha.
- Jeg tror, at Alpha er mange ting, og der er ingen tvivl om, at de også i forhold til stemningen er superaktive. Men det er også vores opfattelse, at der i hvert fald er en del af dem, der også er med til at slås. De er meget i centrum nede på Sydsiden på mange forskellige måder, og de er typisk også involverede, når der er de her opgør med andre fans, fortæller politiinspektør Mogens Luridsen.
Kæmpede mod hooligans fra Lübeck
Yderligtgående fans fra Alpha Brøndby har i årevis været allieret med fans fra Dortmund. Det er en af grundene til, at de møder op i Tyskland til Dortmunds kamp i Champions League mod arvefjenderne fra FC København. Yderligtgående fans fra mange danske klubber har allierede i andre lande. FCK er for eksempel tæt med Hamburger SV.
Som en slags optakt til kampen mellem Dortmund og FCK deltog yderligtgående fans fra Brøndby få dage før i et arrangeret slagsmål i Tyskland. Som man kan se på hooligan-sites, så kæmpede de mod hooligans fra Lübeck en U20 (under 20 år, red.) 13 mod 13. Ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger var der også her flere medlemmer af Alpha gruppen med til kampen mod tyskerne. Brøndby-drengene vandt opgøret.
Ekstra Bladet har forsøgt at få en kommentar fra Alpha, men de er ikke vendt tilbage.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Blive endnu klogere på fanfraktionen Alpha
her.
Ekstra Bladet har tidligere beskrevet, hvordan fangrupperinger i FC København og Hamburger SV internt bytter slagsbrødre - det kan du læse mere om
her.
body_en:
Among Brøndby's troublemakers at the stadium in Dortmund were some of the club's most notorious hooligans. Danish police confirm that they have seen several members of the notorious hooligan group Fri Sport in connection with the assaults and the unrest that haunted both the city and the stadium in connection with the football match between FC. Copenhagen and Dortmund in the Champions League.
In one of the press photos from the Stadium in Dortmund, several Brøndby fans are seen running in connection with the riots. One of them is masked with a yellow and blue scarf in front of the face in the club's colours. Several sources confirm to Ekstra Bladet that it is a named hooligan from Fri Sport who is hiding behind the mask.
On social media, he appears in several places with known hooligans from Fri Sport, and it is documented on the internet that he has at least once fought under the blue and yellow colours.
The troublemaker from the match in Dortmund has fought in the illegal underground martial arts tournament Kots in 2020. In August 2020, he will compete in a fight without rules, where, according to the description, he is a younger Brøndby hooligan with a fighting weight of 95 kilos and a background in Thai boxing.
In a shabby warehouse in Sweden, the young hooligan steps into a construction site enclosure. The referee and most of the spectators are masked, because the matches are streamed to a large audience, even though they are illegal. The atmosphere is intense.
He opens with a left jab and a long right punch, which misses the slightly taller opponent. Punches and kicks fly back and forth between the two fighters. The Brøndby fighter at one point begins to bleed from a gash on the nose. The pace goes a little out of the fight as it waves back and forth.
The Brøndby fighter tries to hit the opponent with a shell. Unsuccessfully. None of them can land the decisive blow. Until the young man from Brøndby counter-boxes the opponent after a kick and hits him with a right hand that causes his legs to go out from under him. Seconds later, the fight is stopped, and the victor holds a Brøndby scarf above his head in a victory gesture.
In the Kots matches, they fight against opponents who agree to the risk. While the riots in and around the stadium in Dortmund left several innocent victims who had just come to watch football.
Police Inspector Mogens Lauridsen from the Vestegnens Police says that they had their spotters with them for the match in Germany. Here they spotted several old acquaintances. Among other things from Fri Sport, which they also know from the Kots tournaments.
- According to our information, Fri Sport participates in tournaments that are reminiscent of the UFC for hooligans, which they organize in Sweden and elsewhere, where they fight each other in an empty warehouse, he says.
Extreme fans from Brøndby are allied with their like-minded ones in Dortmund, and therefore they support each other in connection with riots and organized matches.
Ekstra Bladet has tried to get a comment from the hooligan, but he has not returned.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Atmospheric fans involved in riots
The fan faction Alpha refers to itself as the 'atmosphere-creating fans', but in Dortmund, according to Ekstra Bladet's information, they helped set a completely different atmosphere.
Here they were particularly active in riots and assaults on FCK fans.
For Brøndby's home games, Alpha sets the mood from Sydsiden, as the most iconic stand is called at the stadium on Copenhagen's west sign. For Monday's game against Dortmund, they did not play up chants, but for trouble, assaults and fights around Dortmund.
Jan Bech on unrest
Controls capo and messages
The Alpha group, like the Fan section and Brøndby Support, has a semi-official status in relation to Brøndby IF, where they sit with two representatives on the fan section's board. And then it is they who, in the so-called capo tower, dictate the course of the battle on Brøndby's mood stand.
The capo tower is where he who swings the baton is. The one who decides what and when is sung.
Last weekend, for example, Alpha decided that they did not want to sing for Brøndby's new signing Nicolai Vallys, because he grew up in Østerbro and has a past as a fan of FC Copenhagen.
Alpha also controls which messages are spread on banners and tifos, just as they have often made a name for themselves with their distinctive attitudes towards Brøndby IF. Most recently with
announcements about Brøndby's ownership structure
.
Spotters observed Alpha
In this way, Alpha plays a prominent role among fans of football club Brøndby. In the eyes of many, they are Brøndby's most powerful fan group.
But Copenhagen's Vestegns Police tell Ekstra Bladet that Alpha also has another and less peaceful side. In fact, police spotters observed several Alpha fans among the Brøndby supporters who had traveled to Germany to support Dortmund in their clash against arch-rivals FC Copenhagen.
This is what police inspector Mogens Lauridsen tells us.
- There were people from Alpha down there. I don't know exactly how many there were. Our spotters' assessment down there was that it was a combination of several different groups, and in total they observed 50-60 pieces, he says.
Copenhagen Vestegns Police are aware of both the light and the dark side of Alpha.
- I think that Alpha is many things, and there is no doubt that they are also super active in relation to the atmosphere. But it is also our opinion that there are at least a part of them who also help to fight. They are very much in the center down on the South side in many different ways, and they are typically also involved when there are these clashes with other fans, says police inspector Mogens Luridsen.
Fought against hooligans from Lübeck
Extreme fans from Alpha Brøndby have been allies with fans from Dortmund for years. This is one of the reasons why they show up in Germany for Dortmund's match in the Champions League against arch-enemies from FC Copenhagen. Extreme fans from many Danish clubs have allies in other countries. FCK, for example, is close with Hamburger SV.
As a kind of prelude to the match between Dortmund and FCK, extreme fans from Brøndby took part in an organized fight in Germany a few days before. As you can see on hooligan sites, they fought against hooligans from Lübeck an U20 (under 20 years, ed.) 13 against 13. According to Ekstra Bladet's information, there were also several members of the Alpha group here for the fight against the Germans. The Brøndby boys won the match.
Ekstra Bladet has tried to get a comment from Alpha, but they have not returned.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Learn more about the Alpha fan faction
here.
Ekstra Bladet has previously described how fan groups in FC Copenhagen and Hamburger SV internally exchange battle brothers - you can read more about that
here.

['Alpha' 'Alpha' 'Alpha Brøndby' 'Brøndbys' 'Brøndby Support'
 'Champions League' 'Dortmund' 'Dortmunds' 'Ekstra Bladets'
