 'København' 'Københavns Vestegns Politi' 'Lübeck' 'Mogens Lauridsen'
 'Mogens Luridsen' 'Østerbro' 'Sverige' 'Sydsiden' 'tyskerne' 'Tyskland'
 'Vallys' 'Vestegnens Politi']

title: Stina Maria finder altid en anden - der vil knalde
subtitle: At gå i swingerklub handler også om accept af din egen og andres kroppe og lyster. Og så bliver man god til at tage imod en afvisning, forklarer Stina Maria i denne meget personlige klumme
body:
Et familiemedlem spurgte nysgerrigt og temmelig modigt: ’Hvad giver det dig egentlig at komme i den der swingerklub?’.
Der er en form for skjult familiekodeks om min ’fritidsbeskæftigelse’, der betyder, at jeg kun svarer på spørgsmål og aldrig spontant udbasunerer noget om mine 'bedrifter’.
Til gengæld er jeg altid bundærlig på en uslibrig måde, når jeg bliver spurgt direkte. Spørgeren må derfor have gjort op med sig selv, at hun godt kunne tåle at høre svaret.
Det var nu ikke nødvendigt at lægge filter på min respons. At gå i swingerklub giver mig nemlig meget andet end det åbenbare.
Fællesskab er én af de første roser, jeg vil kaste efter swingerklubmiljøet.
Som med så mange andre fritidsklubber danner man et naturligt sammenhold, fordi man deler interesser. I en swingerklub kan man så dyrke sporten på vidt forskellig vis, men stadig mærke åbenhed frisind mellem menneskene i klubben.
Man kan tale
om alt, og ingen fordømmer nogen. Derfor er det da heller ikke en sjældenhed, at nogle besøger klubben uden seksuelle hensigter blot for at nyde stemningen og fællesskabet.
Derudover har mange, mig selv inklusive, oplevelsen af, at selvtilliden og accepten af ens krop, som Gud har skabt den, øges mærkbart, efter blot et par besøg i en swingerklub. Det er, som om man der kan se sig selv i et mangfoldigt spejl af ægte mennesker, der trods fejl hist og her bærer deres krop værdigt og stolt - og det smitter positivt af.
Man får desuden
et helt andet syn på det at blive afvist.
Måske er man ikke den adspurgtes type, måske er personen ikke ude på ’ballade’, eller måske passer det bare dårligt lige nu. Det kan lære én, at en afvisning ikke er ensbetydende med, at man ikke er god nok, og at der næsten altid er andre, som er klar til at give én et ja.
Spørgeren nikkede og tilføjede, ’så det er altså ikke kun en seksuel ting?’.
- Bingo, svarede jeg.
For selvom en swingerklub er en fantastisk seksuel legeplads med uendelige muligheder, fylder de andre ting faktisk ganske meget, og jeg ved, at størstedelen af mine medswingere vil give mig fuldstændig ret.
stine-mara box
Der er intet skamfuldt
ved sex og intimitet, mener den 28-årige sygeplejerske Line fra Aalborg. Selv er hun vild med at blive bundet.
Det fortæller hun om her
.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
body_en:
A family member asked curiously and rather bravely: 'What does it really get you to join that swinger's club?'.
There is some kind of hidden family code about my 'leisure occupation', which means that I only answer questions and never spontaneously trumpet anything about my 'businesses'.
On the other hand, I am always honest in an unflattering way when I am asked directly. The questioner must therefore have made up with herself that she could bear to hear the answer.
It was now not necessary to put a filter on my response. Going to a swinger club gives me a lot more than the obvious.
Community is one of the first things I want to throw at the swinger club scene.
As with so many other leisure clubs, you form a natural bond because you share interests. In a swinger club, you can practice the sport in very different ways, but still feel the openness and free spirit between the people in the club.
You can talk
about everything and no one condemns anyone. Therefore, it is not a rarity that some visit the club without sexual intentions, simply to enjoy the atmosphere and community.
In addition, many, including myself, have the experience that self-confidence and acceptance of one's body as God created it increases noticeably after just a few visits to a swinger's club. It's as if you can see yourself there in a diverse mirror of real people who, despite mistakes here and there, carry their bodies with dignity and pride - and this rubs off positively.
You also get
a completely different view of being rejected.
Maybe you're not the interviewee's type, maybe the person isn't into 'problems', or maybe it just doesn't fit right now. It can teach you that a rejection does not mean that you are not good enough, and that there are almost always others who are ready to give you a yes.
The questioner nodded and added, 'so it's not just a sexual thing?'.
- Bingo, I replied.
Because even though a swinger club is a fantastic sexual playground with endless possibilities, the other things actually take up quite a lot, and I know that the majority of my fellow swingers will agree with me completely.
stine-mara box
There is nothing shameful
by sex and intimacy, believes the 28-year-old nurse Line from Aalborg. She herself loves being tied up.
She talks about it here
.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------

title: Trusler og bedragerianklager: Dansk tv-profil i byggekaos
subtitle: Olsen Olsen Construction holdt otte måneder på den spanske solkyst med den tidligere danske fodboldspiller og fodbolddebattør Fernando Olsen som frontmand, inden det gik op i hat og bedragerianklager
body:
Har du gjort forretning med Fernando Olsen og vil dele din oplevelse, så skriv til journalisten
her
Den tidligere professionelle fodboldspiller Fernando Olsen var i 80'erne ganske dygtig på en fodboldbane.
Men danskeren med det spanskklingende fornavn kom for alvor først ind i de danske stuer som åbenmundet fodbolddebattør på flimmerkassen i 2010'erne.
I starten af 2020 begav karismatiske Fernando Olsen sig så ud i rollen som byggemastodont med virksomheden Olsen Olsen Construction (OOC) i danskerparadiset Fuengirola, men her gik det hurtigt op i hat og bedragerianklager.
I juni 2021 gik firmaet bankerot på grund af manglende kunder, manglende pengetilførsel og uoverensstemmelser blandt virksomhedens arkitekt Elizabeth Bennett og Fernando Olsen.
I tre ud af firmaets seks byggesager beskylder tidligere klienter og samarbejdspartnere Fernando Olsen for bedrageri, byggesjusk og for et fjendtligt arbejdsmiljø, og 21. oktober 2022 sluttede entreprenør-eventyret endegyldigt, da virksomheden blev erklæret konkurs.
Artiklen fortsætter efter billedet ...
Selveste Fernando Olsen
Hele miseren startede, da det danske par Marjan Ghaysvand og hendes mand stødte på Fernando Olsen i 2020. Den pensionerede fodboldspiller brystede sig af byggeerfaring og charme, som parret faldt pladask for.
- Vi tænkte, her er en dansk byggemand, der fortæller, at han har været fodboldspiller og har styr på sit shit.
Derfor hyrede parret Fernando Olsen og OOC til at renovere deres nykøbte hus.
I dag er de af den opfattelse, at den karismatiske forretningsmand var bedre egnet til at jonglere fodbolde end byggeprojekter.
Artiklen fortsætter efter billedet ...
Trusler og bedragerianklager
Økonomiske uenigheder splittede samarbejdet op i to lejre, og stemningen blandt Fernando Olsen og det danske par minder nu mere om grumme sangria-tømmermænd end grisefest og glade dage.
For en vurdering foretaget af OOC's to egne tilknyttede arkitekter, Elizabeth Bennett og Francisco Linares, viste, at det udførte arbejde ikke var det beløb værd, som Marjan og hendes mand havde betalt.
- De havde allerede havde betalt 370.000 kroner for meget, fortæller Fernando Olsens tidligere partner og arkitekt Elizabeth Bennett og fortsætter:
- Det er lidt ligesom at betale for en Ferrari, men får en Fiat Panda.
Artiklen fortsætter efter opslaget  ...
facebook
Det fik parret op i det røde felt.
- Min mand flejner fuldstændig ud, tager ind til Fernandos kontor og siger, at han har røvrendt os og beder ham betale pengene tilbage, siger Marjan Ghaysvand.
-
Så kontakter vi hans børn og familie, for vi vil have de her penge.
- Det er fair nok at tage penge for et stykke arbejde, men han skal ikke røvrende os på den måde, siger Marjan Ghaysvand.
Den reaktion opfattede Fernando Olsen som en trussel, og derfor anmeldte han parret til politiet for truende adfærd.
- De siger, at jeg skal betale differencen nu, og det skal være lige nu, fortæller Fernando Olsen.
- Så jeg er blevet truet på livet, jeg er blevet jagtet i det sydspanske. Man har truet min familie, man har truet med at kontakte Ekstra Bladet og andre medier - alt for at få mig til at betale nogle penge. Vi taler decideret afpresning.
- De skyldte 427.500 kr, og det fik de vendt om til, at jeg skyldte dem penge. Men jeg har dokumentation på, at det er helt grotesk at sige, at jeg skylder dem penge.
- Der er intet, der kan skade mig. For jeg har bilag på samtlige euro, der er blevet faktureret, siger Fernando Olsen.
Uenig med arkitekt
Medejer og arkitekt Elizabeth Bennett fra OOC skulle visualisere Marjan og hendes mands boligdrømme. En opgave, Elizabeth Bennett lidt efter lidt indså ville være besværlig med Fernando Olsen involveret.
- Fernando sagde til mig, at han havde byggeprojektserfaring fra Danmark.
- Da jeg endelig så ham i aktion, så havde han ingen idé om, hvad han lavede, fortæller Elizabeth Bennett.
- Vi mødte Marjan og skulle lave deres projekt. Derfra var alt et ukontrolleret kaos.
- Jeg konfronterede ham med, at tilgangsmåden var forkert, men han svarede bare, at jeg var en dum lille pige, der ville ønske, jeg kunne være som ham med en bankkonto som hans.
Artiklen fortsætter efter billedet ...
Fernando Olsen har en anden opfattelse af arbejdsgangen end sin tidligere forretningspartner.
- Hvorfor skulle jeg overtrumfe? Det er jo ikke mig, der stod på byggepladsen, fortæller Fernando Olsen.
- Jeg var partner i det her selskab. Men jeg er ikke arkitekt eller byggesagkyndig.
-  Hvis der var noget, som ikke var i henhold til lovgivning eller byggeregler, så er det 100 procent arkitekternes ansvar at sige, at det vil jeg ikke skrive under på, eller det kan jeg ikke.
- Uanset om jeg ville. Og hvorfor skulle jeg det, når jeg betaler en arkitekt og en teknisk arkitekt for det?
- Så det var på ingen måde mig, der satte standard for byggeriet.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Dialogen mellem Fernando Olsen og OOC's tidligere klienter går nu gennem advokater.
Alle klienter med igangværende projekter ved OOC har Fernando Olsens tidligere partner
Elizabeth Bennett taget med videre i sin nystartede entreprenørvirksomhed Bennett & Co. Marjan og hendes mands byggeprojekt går nu som planlagt og står klar til februar.
body_en:
If you have done business with Fernando Olsen and want to share your experience, write to the journalist
here
The former professional footballer Fernando Olsen was quite skilled on the football field in the 80s.
But the Dane with the Spanish-sounding first name only really entered Danish living rooms as an open-mouthed football debater on Flimmerkassen in the 2010s.
At the beginning of 2020, charismatic Fernando Olsen set out in the role of construction giant with the company Olsen Olsen Construction (OOC) in the Danish paradise of Fuengirola, but here it quickly turned into hate and accusations of fraud.
In June 2021, the company went bankrupt due to lack of customers, lack of funding and disagreements between the company's architect Elizabeth Bennett and Fernando Olsen.
In three out of the company's six construction cases, former clients and business partners accuse Fernando Olsen of fraud, construction waste and a hostile work environment, and on October 21, 2022, the contractor adventure ended definitively when the company was declared bankrupt.
The article continues after the picture...
Fernando Olsen himself
The whole mess started when the Danish couple Marjan Ghaysvand and her husband encountered Fernando Olsen in 2020. The retired footballer boasted construction experience and charm, which the couple fell head over heels for.
- We thought, here is a Danish construction worker who tells us that he used to be a football player and has control of his shit.
Therefore, the couple hired Fernando Olsen and OOC to renovate their newly purchased house.
Today, they are of the opinion that the charismatic businessman was better suited to juggling footballs than construction projects.
The article continues after the picture...
Threats and fraud allegations
Financial disagreements split the collaboration into two camps, and the atmosphere between Fernando Olsen and the Danish couple is now more reminiscent of a grim sangria hangover than a pig party and happy days.
For an assessment by two of OOC's own associate architects, Elizabeth Bennett and Francisco Linares, showed that the work done was not worth the amount Marjan and her husband had paid.
- They had already paid DKK 370,000 too much, says Fernando Olsen's former partner and architect Elizabeth Bennett and continues:
- It's a bit like paying for a Ferrari, but getting a Fiat Panda.
Article continues after the post  ...
facebook
It got the pair up in the red field.
- My husband completely freaks out, goes into Fernando's office and says that he has robbed us and asks him to pay the money back, says Marjan Ghaysvand.
-
Then we contact his children and family, because we want this money.
- It's fair enough to take money for a piece of work, but he shouldn't rob us like that, says Marjan Ghaysvand.
Fernando Olsen perceived that reaction as a threat, and therefore reported the couple to the police for threatening behaviour.
- They say that I must pay the difference now, and it must be right now, says Fernando Olsen.
- So my life has been threatened, I have been hunted in southern Spain. They have threatened my family, they have threatened to contact Ekstra Bladet and other media - all to get me to pay some money. We are definitely talking extortion.
- They owed DKK 427,500, and they turned that into me owing them money. But I have documentation that it is completely grotesque to say that I owe them money.
- There is nothing that can harm me. Because I have vouchers for all the euros that have been invoiced, says Fernando Olsen.
Disagree with architect
Co-owner and architect Elizabeth Bennett from OOC had to visualize Marjan and her husband's residential dreams. A task Elizabeth Bennett gradually realized would be difficult with Fernando Olsen involved.
- Fernando told me that he had construction project experience from Denmark.
- When I finally saw him in action, he had no idea what he was doing, says Elizabeth Bennett.
- We met Marjan and had to do their project. From there everything was uncontrolled chaos.
- I confronted him that the approach was wrong, but he just replied that I was a stupid little girl who wished I could be like him with a bank account like his.
The article continues after the picture...
Fernando Olsen has a different view of the work process than his former business partner.
- Why should I trump? It wasn't me who stood on the construction site, says Fernando Olsen.
- I was a partner in this company. But I am not an architect or construction expert.
-  If there was something that was not according to legislation or building regulations, then it is 100 percent the responsibility of the architects to say that I will not sign for it, or I cannot.
- Regardless of whether I wanted to. And why should I when I'm paying an architect and a technical architect for it?
- So it was by no means me who set the standard for the construction.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
The dialogue between Fernando Olsen and OOC's former clients now goes through lawyers.
All clients with ongoing projects at OOC have Fernando Olsen's former partner
Elizabeth Bennett taken on board in her newly started construction company Bennett & Co. Marjan and her husband's construction project is now going as planned and will be ready for February.

 'Fuengirola' 'Marjan Ghaysvand' 'Olsen Olsen Construction' 'OOC' 'OOC']

title: Vildt vægttab: DR-værtens lækre kur
subtitle: Louise Gade nægtede at gå ned på nydelse, da hun ville tabe sig, alligevel fik hun smidt 24 kilo
body:
DR's vejrvært Louise Gade har fundet en særdeles lækker måde at tabe sig på. I løbet af sin lækre kur lykkedes det hende at blive ved med at spise chips og drikke sodavand.
For hun ville ikke gå ned på snacks, da hun tog hul på sit imponerende vægttab. Der var lagt op til et ambitiøst projekt, hvor hun skulle tælle kalorier, men det droppede hun efter 14 dage. Alligevel lykkedes det hende at tabe hele 24 kilo.
Op til og under sin graviditet vejede Louise Gade op til 90 kg, men da hun havde født, raslede de ekstra kilo ikke af, som hun ellers havde oplevet ved tidligere graviditeter.
Babyvægten fik hun selvfølgelig taget hul på helt af sig selv, men de resterende kilo lod vente på sig.
'Fød en baby. Sindssygt effektivt. Så smider man lige fire kilo + det løse på en eftermiddag (en smertefuld eftermiddag, bevares),' skriver hun på
Instagram
.
Louise Gade følte sig dog stadig ikke tilpas i sin krop, og hun besluttede sig derfor for at tabe sig yderligere.
Arkivartikel - Vægttab
Kostplan
Hun startede med en basisplan hos en kostvejleder, det gik mest op i at tælle kalorier. Det var hun ikke den store fan af og stoppede hurtigt igen.
- 10-14 dage. Så opgav jeg altså det, Jøsses, hvor tager det meget tid at veje sin mad sirligt på en køkkenvægt og sammenholde det med et tal bag på madens emballage.
Det rakte tålmodigheden ikke til for vejrværten, men de indledende trin gav en viden og bevidsthed om næringsstoffer, i forhold til at det ikke gør den store forskel for dit vægttab, om du putter et ekstra stykke trestjernet salami eller kyllingepålæg på din rugbrødsmad.
En kæmpe snacker
Hvis man spørger Louise Gade selv, er hun er stor 'snacker', og hun nægtede derfor at gå ned på nydelse, da hun skulle tabe sig.
Hun fandt dog en gylden vej til at fortsætte sit snackeri - på en mere effektiv måde i forhold til vægttabet.
- Et par dråber sødemiddel i min havregrød i stedet for sukker.
- Easis-chips når jeg var snacksulten. Lækkertørsten blev slukket med en Pepsi Max eller Squash Light, og så har jeg spist den lækre kaloriefattige hindbærstang fra Hjemis, lyder det fra Louise Gade.
De kaloriefattige snacks har gjort et godt stykke arbejde for at tilfredsstille den søde tand, uden at det har sat sig på sidebenene.
- Jeg var på barsel, og det er da klart, at den søvntortur, som en baby i perioder beriger sine forældre med, ikke altid harmonerede med den motivation og overskud, et vægttab også kræver.
Kæmpede med motivationen
Den slags giver udfordringer i de sene timer.
- Jeg har altid været en kæmpe snacker. Sådan en, der keder mig inde i munden efter klokken 20, og når du er i søvnunderskud, bliver trangen til snacks og søde sager bare forstørret. Og det ER bare ikke det samme at sidde og gnaske i en gulerod.
- Derfor nægtede jeg ikke mig selv at snacke, hvis jeg havde lyst til det, fortæller Louise Gade.
body_en:
DR's weather host Louise Gade has found a particularly delicious way to lose weight. During her delicious regimen, she managed to keep eating chips and drinking soda.
Because she didn't want to skimp on snacks as she embarked on her impressive weight loss. An ambitious project was planned, where she had to count calories, but she dropped that after 14 days. Still, she managed to lose a whopping 24 kilos.
Up until and during her pregnancy, Louise Gade weighed up to 90 kg, but when she had given birth, the extra kilos did not rattle off, as she had otherwise experienced with previous pregnancies.
Of course, she gained the baby weight all by herself, but let the remaining kilos wait for her.
'Give birth to a baby. Insanely efficient. Then you just lose four kilos + the loose in one afternoon (a painful afternoon, to be preserved),' she writes
Instagram
.
However, Louise Gade still did not feel comfortable in her body, and she therefore decided to lose more weight.
Archive article - Weight loss
Diet plan
She started with a basic plan with a nutritionist, it was mostly about counting calories. She wasn't a big fan of that and quickly stopped again.
- 10-14 days. So I gave up, Jøsses, it takes a lot of time to weigh your food neatly on a kitchen scale and compare it with a number on the back of the food's packaging.
The weatherman didn't have enough patience, but the initial steps provided a knowledge and awareness of nutrients, in relation to the fact that it doesn't make much difference to your weight loss whether you put an extra piece of three-star salami or chicken spread on your rye bread meal.
A huge snacker
If you ask Louise Gade herself, she is a big 'snacker', and she therefore refused to cut down on pleasure when she had to lose weight.
However, she found a golden way to continue her snacking - in a more effective way in relation to weight loss.
- A few drops of sweetener in my oatmeal instead of sugar.
- Easis chips when I was hungry for a snack. The delicious thirst was quenched with a Pepsi Max or Squash Light, and then I ate the delicious low-calorie raspberry bar from Hjemis, says Louise Gade.
The low-calorie snacks have done a good job of satisfying the sweet tooth without putting it on the sidelines.
- I was on maternity leave, and it is then clear that the sleep torture that a baby sometimes enriches its parents with did not always harmonize with the motivation and energy that weight loss also requires.
Struggled with motivation
This kind of thing presents challenges in the late hours.
- I have always been a huge snacker. One that bores me inside my mouth after 8pm, and when you're sleep-deprived, the cravings for snacks and sweets just magnify. And it just IS not the same as sitting and munching on a carrot.
- That's why I didn't deny myself a snack if I wanted to, says Louise Gade.

title: Danske Cecilie: Derfor er jeg på OnlyFans
subtitle: Der er mange gode grunde til, at den tidligere realitydeltager Cecilie Harder er på OnlyFans, men i dag har hun nået et punkt, hvor blandt andet grænseoverskridende adfærd får hende til at overveje et stop
body:
OnlyFans lyder som et let gennemskueligt medie, hvor folk betaler for at se frækt indhold. Men laver man indhold på platformen, bliver man ofte mødt af liderlige gribbe, der vil gøre alt for at få dig til at overskride dine egne grænser.
Det fortæller flere danske brugere af portalen. Hvor enkelte hurtigt fik nok og deaktiverede deres konto, har Cecilie Harder stadig sin profil. Hun fortæller dog, at nogle af de betalende brugere er halvdelen af årsagen til, at hun i dag alvorligt overvejer at stoppe.
- Jeg vil klart sige, at folks beskeder er 50 procent af grunden til, at jeg overvejer at stoppe. Rigtig mange af dem, der følger med derinde, er super utaknemmelige og forventer, at man går langt ud over sin egen grænse for dem, siger hun til Ekstra Bladet og giver et eksempel:
- Jeg er stoppet med at svare de fleste, fordi jeg simpelthen bliver så negativt ladet over at få af vide, at jeg snyder folk, når jeg ikke vil bolles af otte mænd i røven på samme tid, sukker hun.
Tænk dig om
Cecilie Harder er stripper til daglig – og mange vil formentlig genkende hende fra tv-programmet ’Ex on the Beach’. I det seneste år har hun suppleret indtægten som stripper med OnlyFans, som hun først sprang ud i efter at have overvejet det i et år.
- Det vil jeg anbefale alle at gøre, for dine videoer og billeder er ikke noget, der bare lige går væk igen, selvom man fjerner sin profil. Jeg var stripper i forvejen, og derfor lå det nemt til mig, siger hun og fortæller, at hun nok er i den mere - med sine egne ord - kedelige ende af OnlyFans-spektret.
Sådan fungerer OnlyFans
- Jeg laver ikke videoer med mænd – ud over en enkelt gang i starten. Jeg laver stort set kun soloarbejde, og ellers har jeg få gange lavet noget med Fie (Laursen, red.).
- For mig er det en let ekstra indtjeningskilde, som bare giver mig lidt ekstra frihed i hverdagen, siger Cecilie Harder.
Lukker i om økonomi
Brugere skal betale 14 dollars – svarende til 105 kroner – om måneden for at se hendes indhold, forudsat at man ikke køber et flere måneder langt abonnement.
- Det er ikke noget, jeg har tænkt mig at skulle fortsætte med de næste 15 år, men jeg synes, det er fint for mig at tage et par år med det, siger hun.
- Hvad er det bedste og værste ved Onlyfans?
- Det bedste er jo pengene. Vi gør det jo for at tjene penge, det er vel grunden til, at alle tager på arbejde, og ingen ville gøre det gratis. Det værste er nok de lede beskeder, samt at folk har et behov for at dele mine videoer frem for bare at købe dem.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Afviser prostitution
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Drømmer om almindelig familie
Cecilie Harder giver sig selv et par år mere på OnlyFans, før det er slut. Det skyldes - ud over de grimme beskeder - blandt andet, at hun har fået en kæreste.
- Jeg har fået en kæreste, og jeg kan godt mærke, at jeg ikke har samme lyst til at lave det længere. Jeg vil hellere have mine seksuelle øjeblikke med ham frem for i en video. Jeg har ikke lyst til at filme, når han er hjemme, og jeg vil faktisk hellere bare have en normal familie, griner hun.
- Men hvis du hellere vil have en normal familie uden OnlyFans, hvorfor så ikke bare lukke den, når det er noget, du kører i din fritid?
- Fordi jeg lige tager lidt mere tid. Når jeg engang lukker den, så åbner jeg den ikke igen, så jeg vil gerne være helt sikker på, at jeg er klar til at stoppe, siger hun.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Ekspert: Ingen grund til bekymring
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Bag om OnlyFans
body_en:
OnlyFans sounds like an easily transparent medium where people pay to see raunchy content. But if you create content on the platform, you are often met by horny vultures who will do anything to make you exceed your own limits.
This is what several Danish users of the portal say. While some quickly had enough and deactivated their account, Cecilie Harder still has her profile. However, she says that some of the paying users are half the reason why she is seriously considering quitting today.
- I would clearly say that people's messages are 50 percent of the reason why I am considering stopping. A great many of those who follow in there are super ungrateful and expect you to go far beyond your own limits for them, she tells Ekstra Bladet and gives an example:
- I've stopped answering most people because I simply get so negatively charged by being told that I'm cheating people when I don't want to be pounded in the ass by eight men at the same time, she sighs.
use your brain
Cecilie Harder is a daily stripper - and many will probably recognize her from the TV program 'Ex on the Beach'. In the past year, she has supplemented her income as a stripper with OnlyFans, which she only jumped into after considering it for a year.
- I would recommend everyone to do that, because your videos and pictures are not something that just goes away again, even if you remove your profile. I was a stripper before, and therefore it was easy for me, she says and says that she is probably at the more - in her own words - boring end of the OnlyFans spectrum.
This is how OnlyFans works
- I don't make videos with men - apart from once at the beginning. I mostly only do solo work, and otherwise I have done something with Fie a few times (Laursen, ed.).
- For me, it's an easy extra source of income, which just gives me a little extra freedom in everyday life, says Cecilie Harder.
Close in on finances
Users must pay 14 dollars - equivalent to 105 kroner - per month to see her content, provided that one does not buy a subscription lasting several months.
- It's not something I intend to continue with for the next 15 years, but I think it's fine for me to take a few years with it, she says.
- What is the best and worst thing about Onlyfans?
- The best thing is the money. After all, we do it to make money, I guess that's why everyone goes to work, and no one would do it for free. The worst is probably the lead messages and the fact that people have a need to share my videos rather than just buy them.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Rejects prostitution
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Dreams of ordinary family
Cecilie Harder is giving herself a few more years on OnlyFans before it's over. This is due - in addition to the nasty messages - to the fact that she has got a boyfriend.
- I've got a girlfriend, and I can tell that I don't have the same desire to do it anymore. I would rather have my sexual moments with him than in a video. I don't want to film when he's at home, and I'd actually rather just have a normal family, she laughs.
- But if you'd rather have a normal family without OnlyFans, why not just close it when it's something you drive in your spare time?
- Because I just take a little more time. Once I close it, I don't open it again, so I want to be absolutely sure that I'm ready to stop, she says.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Expert: No need to worry
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Behind OnlyFans

title: Joan Ørting: Sådan ved du om du bør behandles for din fetich
subtitle: Nogle feticher kan være farlige eller ulovlige og bør behandles, inden det går galt, forklarer sexolog Joan Ørting
body:
De fleste feticher kan være uskyldige og ufarlige, mens andre kan resultere i lange fængselsstraffe, hvis man udlever dem.
Derfor kræver nogle af dem behandling, inden skaden er sket. Sexolog og parterapeut Joan Ørting vil her give svar på, hvornår du bør gå i behandling for din fetich
Hvad er en fetich?
Helt overordnet er en fetich en seksuel tiltrækning af objekter eller bestemte kropsdele, men kan også være en lang række andre ting. Det er i mange tilfælde helt normalt, men for nogle kan det komme til at fylde så meget, at det går ud over parforholdet og de sociale aspekter af livet.
- En fetich er helt grundlæggende, når det ikke længere er partneren og partnerens følelser  der er i centrum i en seksuel kontekst, men derimod en forskydning væk fra partneren til det, fetichen handler om. Det kan være ting som et bestemt materiale, element eller en kropsdel, siger Joan Ørting.
- Ens fetich skal altså være med, hvis man virkelig skal være højtændt. Det betyder ikke nødvendigvis, at man ikke kan tænde på sin partner uden, men det betyder, at man er allermest tændt, når hun for eksempel har stiletter eller latex på, hvis det nu er det, der er ens fetich.
Derfor får nogle en fetich
Feticher kan ifølge sexologen komme, hvis man i sin barndom har oplevet noget, hvor der indgik en seksualisering af noget bestemt og skam på en gang.
- Jeg kender en, som fandt fars pornoblad som otteårig, hvor han blev begejstret og så en kvinde, der havde samleje med et træ og noget med en hund. Men så kom faderen hjem og skældte ham ud. Han oplevede der blandingen af skam og begejstring og fik derfor senere en fetich for træer og dyresex, siger Joan Ørting.
Selvom det første spadestik til en fetich ofte kan opstå i forbindelse med en bestemt oplevelse i barndommen, er det ifølge sexologen først senere i livet, at det går op for en, at der er noget helt bestemt, man tænder på.
– Når først hormonerne begynder at dukke op i løbet af teenageårene, vil nogle opleve, at denne bestemte oplevelse, de havde i barndommen, pludselig tænder en, siger hun.
Fetisher
Kan være ulovligt og skadeligt
I langt de fleste tilfælde er fetichisme helt uskyldigt, og mange er ifølge Joan Ørting rigtig glade for deres fetich. Men der findes også en lang række af feticher, som både er direkte skadelige, men også kan være ulovlige, hvis de udleves.
- Feticher, hvor kvælningslege indgår, kan være ulovlige, selvom man ikke dør af det. Nekrofili, hvor man tænder på at have sex med lig, er også ulovligt. Det samme gælder porno, hvor nogen bliver dræbt, samt dyresex og pædofili, siger Joan Ørting.
Straffen for at have sex med et dyr kan i de groveste tilfælde give fængselsstraf op til to år. Nogle har en fetich for børn, også kaldt pædofili, og hvis det udleves, er strafferammen helt op til otte år.
En fetich kan også være farlig, selvom den ikke nødvendigvis er ulovlig.
- Leg med nåle, ild eller sådan noget som at hive negle af er farligt. Generelt det at være sadist eller masochist kan gå hen og blive til tortur, siger Joan Ørting.
Hvornår bør man gå i behandling?
Behandlingen af en fetich er vigtig at få behandlet, hvis det går ud over ens hverdag, forklarer sexologen.
- Man bør klart opsøge behandling, hvis ens fetich generer en, man ikke kan leve et normalt liv, det går ud over ens parforhold, eller hvis man er helt kapret af sin fetich, siger hun og fortsætter:
- Og ved man, at ens fetich er ulovlig, bør man klart gå i behandling. Men der kan desværre være flere års ventetid.
Sådan foregår behandlingen
Ifølge sexologen ændrer sexfantasierne sig ikke, bare fordi man udlever dem. Det er nemlig selve barndomstraumet, der skal hele, hvis seksualiteten skal ændre sig.
- En fetich kan godt behandles, så man ikke længere tænder på sin fetich. Det kan dog være svært at blive helet 100 procent for nogle, siger hun.
- Det er for eksempel muligt at stoppe med at være pædofil med den rette behandling. Man kan gå fra at være aktiv til at være passiv, lidt ligesom en ædru alkoholiker, hvis man lærer at styre det.
På Sexologisk Klinik i København kan man blandt andet få behandling for afvigende seksualiteter som pædofili, dyresex og nekrofili. Behandlingen vil ofte gå gennem en række samtaler med psykologer og læger, og nogle kan også blive tilbudt bestemte former for medicin.
Stort tabu blandt mange
Selvom en del er glade for deres fetich, kan det også være noget, der er svært at dele med andre.
- Jeg oplever i høj grad, at feticher er et tabu for rigtig mange mennesker. Heldigvis findes der subkulturer, hvor folk med feticher mødes på nettet eller til fester. For eksempel er der en manifest i København, hvor der er en dresscode, og alle er påklædt som deres fetich, siger hun.
- Jeg tror, det er et tabu, fordi det kan være svært at præsentere for sin partner. Det kan for nogle være lidt pinligt pludselig at skulle bede konen om at hoppe i en latexdragt. Andre siger naturligvis heller ikke noget, fordi de ved, at det er ilde set eller direkte ulovligt, siger hun afsluttende.
Læs mere her:
Joan Ørting: Sådan ved du om du har en fetich
Joan Ørting: Det skal du vide om din fetich
Michaels fetich: Sådan udlever han den
body_en:
Most fetishes can be innocent and harmless, while others can result in long prison terms if indulged.
Therefore, some of them require treatment before the damage is done. Here, sexologist and couples therapist Joan Ørting will give answers on when you should go for treatment for your fetish
What is a fetish?
Overall, a fetish is a sexual attraction to objects or certain body parts, but can also be a wide range of other things. In many cases it is completely normal, but for some it can take up so much that it goes beyond the relationship and the social aspects of life.
- A fetish is completely fundamental when it is no longer the partner and the partner's feelings that are at the center in a sexual context, but instead a shift away from the partner to what the fetish is about. It can be things like a certain material, element or a body part, says Joan Ørting.
- So one's fetish must be included if you really want to be high-spirited. This does not necessarily mean that you cannot turn on your partner without it, but it means that you are most turned on when she is, for example, wearing stilettos or latex, if that is what your fetish is.
That's why some get a fetish
According to the sexologist, fetishes can come if you have experienced something in your childhood that involved a sexualization of something specific and shame at the same time.
- I know someone who found his father's porn magazine when he was eight years old, where he got excited and saw a woman who had intercourse with a tree and something with a dog. But then the father came home and scolded him. There he experienced the mixture of shame and excitement and therefore later developed a fetish for trees and animal sex, says Joan Ørting.
Although the first sod for a fetish can often arise in connection with a certain experience in childhood, according to the sexologist, it is only later in life that it dawns on you that there is something completely specific that turns you on.
- Once the hormones start to appear during the teenage years, some will find that this particular experience they had in childhood suddenly turns them on, she says.
Fetishes
Can be illegal and harmful
In the vast majority of cases, fetishism is completely innocent, and many are, according to Joan Ørting, very happy with their fetish. But there is also a wide range of fetishes, which are both directly harmful, but can also be illegal if practiced.
- Fetishes that include strangulation can be illegal, even if you don't die from it. Necrophilia, where you turn on having sex with corpses, is also illegal. The same applies to porn where someone is killed, as well as animal sex and pedophilia, says Joan Ørting.
The punishment for having sex with an animal can result in a prison sentence of up to two years in the most serious cases. Some have a fetish for children, also called pedophilia, and if it is carried out, the penalty is up to eight years.
A fetish can also be dangerous, although it is not necessarily illegal.
- Playing with needles, fire or something like pulling nails is dangerous. In general, being a sadist or masochist can turn into torture, says Joan Ørting.
When should you go for treatment?
The treatment of a fetish is important to get treated if it goes beyond one's everyday life, explains the sexologist.
- You should definitely seek treatment if your fetish bothers you, you cannot live a normal life, it affects your relationship, or if you are completely hijacked by your fetish, she says and continues:
- And if you know that your fetish is illegal, you should definitely go for treatment. But unfortunately there can be several years of waiting.
This is how the treatment takes place
According to the sexologist, sexual fantasies do not change just because you live them out. It is the childhood trauma itself that must be healed if sexuality is to change.
- A fetish can be treated, so that you no longer turn on your fetish. However, it can be difficult to be healed 100 percent for some, she says.
- For example, it is possible to stop being a pedophile with the right treatment. You can go from being active to being passive, a bit like a sober alcoholic, if you learn to control it.
At the Sexology Clinic in Copenhagen, you can get treatment for deviant sexualities such as pedophilia, animal sex and necrophilia, among other things. The treatment will often go through a series of conversations with psychologists and doctors, and some may also be offered certain types of medication.
Big taboo among many
Although some are happy with their fetish, it can also be something that is difficult to share with others.
- I feel to a great extent that fetishes are a taboo for a great many people. Fortunately, there are subcultures where people with fetishes meet online or at parties. For example, there is a manifesto in Copenhagen where there is a dress code and everyone is dressed according to their fetish, she says.
- I think it's a taboo because it can be difficult to introduce to your partner. It can be a bit embarrassing for some to suddenly have to ask the wife to jump in a latex suit. Others naturally don't say anything either, because they know it's frowned upon or outright illegal, she concludes.

Joan Ørting: This is how you know if you have a fetish

title: Hilsen til HA: Udsmidte Jønkes nye tatovering
subtitle: Den tidligere rockerveteran, der blev kylet ud af HA, betegner det som ’en velsignelse’, at han blev smidt ud af HA - Se Hells Angels usædvanlige svar på Jønkes kritik
body:
Med en kreativ ændring af en stor HA-tatovering sender den tidligere rockerveteran Jørn Jønke Nielsen en hilsen i retning mod Hells Angels; rockerklubben, han selv var med til at etablere på dansk jord ved årsskiftet til 1981.
Den tidligere toprocker figurerer på et billede siddende i shorts med bar overkrop og en joint i hånden på en træterrasse på et ikke navngivet sted. Hans venstre overarm er prydet af den særegne tatovering.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Det ses i bogen ’Engle og Sjakaler – Hells Angels i Danmark 1998-2022’, som udkommer i dag.
Bogen er skrevet af Ekstra Bladets krimichef Carsten Norton og handler om de stridigheder og konflikter, HA’ere var indblandet i, da Hells Angels havde sluttet fred med Bandidos som følge af den Store Nordiske Rockerkrig i midten af 1990’erne.
Interne konflikter
Den dengang førende rockerklub, Hells Angels, blev udfordret i miljøet af ikke mindst indvandrerbander, der skød op i den københavnske underverden. Det resulterede i en række brutale sammenstød og drab, som beskrives i bogen sammen med en række af de personer, der har været bødler eller ofre. Eller begge dele.
Men Hells Angels har også været førende på interne konflikter, hvor retten til at bære lædervesten med det bevingede dødningehoved gang på gang har været til diskussion i HA-afdelingerne.
Heri indgår også fortællinger om Jørn Jønke Nielsen.
I en alder af 60 blev han i november 2020 suspenderet og siden smidt ud af Hells Angels efter en langvarig strid, der havde rod i et nyt HA-chapter i Kastrup.
I bogen ’Engle og Sjakaler’ kommer Jønke med en lang udtalelse om sin exit fra det gamle broderskab og tiden derefter:
’Fællesskabet, broderskabet og loyaliteten var det vigtigste, men det forsvandt med årene og blev afløst af magtkampe, bagtale, begærlighed og enkeltpersoners private agendaer.’
Han beskriver, hvordan han nu ser sin egen udsmidning som ’en velsignelse’.
’I dag er der ikke meget andet tilbage end udbrændte fester, flokke af brødre, der som gidsler i en dårlig B-film fortsætter med at nedbryde det, som engang blev betragtet som verdens førende motorcykelklub,’ siger han i bogen.
Det er HELT slu
t
Da Jørn Jønke Nielsen blev smidt ud af HA, var det i såkaldt ’out’: det begreb, som tidligere har været betegnet som ’bad standing’.
Han har aldrig lagt skjul på, at han synes, udsmidningen var forkert.
Også andre førende HA’ere er blevet smidt på porten i forbindelse med uenigheder og konflikter. Flere af dem er siden optaget af andre rockerklubber, og der har da også været spekulationer om Jønkes fremtid.
Jønkes venstre skulder var prydet af Hells Angels’ motto AFFA (Angels Forever, Forever Angels, red) .
For Jønke blev det ikke ’forever’. Som reglerne foreskriver, skal HA-tatoveringer ved en udsmidning overmales.
AFFA er nu forvandlet til et lige så massivt ABBA.
– Det er i det mindste et band, man kan regne med, lyder det fra Jønke i bogen.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Hells Angels svarer igen
Ekstra Bladet har spurgt Hells Angels, om de vil svare på Jønkes kommentarer om HA i den nye bog.
Svaret lyder således på skrift:
’Hells Angels MC udtaler sig generelt ikke om enkeltpersoner, men vi vil gerne gøre en enkelt undtagelse her.
Vi kan bekræfte, at der de sidste år op til Jønkes udsmidning, har været en del bagtaleri, magtkampe mm.
HA er IKKE topstyret, og det slog vi fast én gang for alle på det meget omtalte møde i Malmø tilbage i 2020  (møde, hvor Jønke blev suspenderet red.)  Præcis den dag forsvandt bagtaleriet og magtkampene, – og vi fik genoprettet det sande broderskab og sammenhold.’
Hells Angels tilføjer lidt kryptisk i mailen til Ekstra Bladet:
’Med Jønkes exit, fik vi også afsluttet verdens længste foredrag.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Fællesmøde på hotel: Råbte mod Jønke
Under et møde sidst på efteråret 2020 mellem Jønke og cirka 40 HA’ere på et hotel i Sverige blev han erklæret ude af klubben.
På mødet udtalte en af de toneangivende rockere fra HA Copenhagen, at de ville have Jønke suspenderet.
’Vi er fem afdelinger og har 86 stemmer med os i dag. Der er et flertal, som vil have dig ud af klubben,’ lød det.
’Omtrent samtidig rejste halvdelen af deltagerne sig op og begyndte at råbe ad Jønke og enhver, der prøvede at protestere,’ står der i den nye bog.
Blev nærmest ført ud
Ekstra Bladet har tidligere indgående beskrevet Jønkes exit og afgangen fra fællesmødet på det svenske hotel med blandt andet citater fra hans bog ’En Ny Begyndelse’.
’Ingen rørte mig, men jeg blev omringet og nærmest ført ud af mødelokalet. Særligt Presi, som var en lille, lavstammet hooligan, pressede på.’
’Én ting var at blive udsat for et komplot, en anden, at man efter 40 år i klubben blev eskorteret ud af en havenisse,’ skrev han.
Læs også:
Jønke om udsmidning: Eskorteret ud af 'havenisse'
Ekstra Bladet har i en tidligere artikel spurgt Jønke, om han kan sige sig fri for selv at være del af den proces, der har ført klubben hen, hvor den er i dag.
– Nej, det kan jeg nok ikke helt. Jeg har selv været med til at skabe nogle ting, der har gjort, at vi er endt, hvor vi er. Men jeg synes i høj grad, at jeg samtidig har sat bremserne i for mange ting, svarede han.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
HA’s regler for ’LEFT’ og ’OUT’ til ny bog om HA hvori Jønkes exit også er med
Kort om Jønke
body_en:
With a creative change to a large HA tattoo, former rock veteran Jørn Jønke Nielsen sends a salute in the direction of the Hells Angels; rocker club, which he himself helped to establish on Danish soil at the turn of the year 1981.
The former top rocker is pictured sitting in shorts, shirtless and holding a joint on a wooden deck at an unnamed location. His left upper arm is adorned with the distinctive tattoo.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
This can be seen in the book 'Angels and Jackals - Hells Angels in Denmark 1998-2022', which is published today.
The book was written by Ekstra Bladet's crime boss Carsten Norton and is about the disputes and conflicts that HA'ers were involved in when the Hells Angels had made peace with the Bandidos as a result of the Great Nordic Rocker War in the mid-1990s.
Internal conflicts
The leading rock club at the time, Hells Angels, was challenged in the environment not least by immigrant gangs that rose up in the Copenhagen underworld. This resulted in a series of brutal clashes and killings, which are described in the book together with a number of the people who have been executioners or victims. Or both.
But the Hells Angels have also been a leader in internal conflicts, where the right to wear the leather vest with the winged death's head has time and again been discussed in the HA departments.
This also includes stories about Jørn Jønke Nielsen.
At the age of 60, in November 2020 he was suspended and then kicked out of the Hells Angels after a long-term dispute that had its roots in a new HA chapter in Kastrup.
In the book 'Angels and Jackals', Jønke makes a long statement about his exit from the old brotherhood and the time after:
'Community, brotherhood and loyalty were the most important, but that disappeared over the years and was replaced by power struggles, slander, greed and the private agendas of individuals.'
He describes how he now sees his own expulsion as 'a blessing'.
'Today there's not much left but burnt out parties, gangs of brothers who, like hostages in a bad B-movie, continue to destroy what was once considered the world's leading motorcycle club,' he says in the book.
It's TOTALLY sly
t
When Jørn Jønke Nielsen was thrown out of HA, it was in so-called 'out': the term which has previously been referred to as 'bad standing'.
He has never hidden the fact that he thinks the expulsion was wrong.
Other leading HAs have also been kicked out in connection with disagreements and conflicts. Several of them have since been taken up by other rock clubs, and there has also been speculation about Jønke's future.
Jønke's left shoulder was adorned with the Hells Angels' motto AFFA (Angels Forever, Forever Angels, red).
For Jønke, it was not 'forever'. As the rules prescribe, HA tattoos must be painted over when thrown out.
AFFA has now transformed into an equally massive ABBA.
- At least it's a band you can count on, says Jønke in the book.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
The Hells Angels answer again
Ekstra Bladet has asked the Hells Angels if they will respond to Jønke's comments about HA in the new book.
The answer reads as follows in writing:
Hells Angels MC generally does not comment on individuals, but we would like to make a single exception here.
We can confirm that in the last years leading up to Jønke's expulsion, there has been a lot of backbiting, power struggles etc.
HA is NOT the top management, and we established that once and for all at the much talked about meeting in Malmö back in 2020  (meeting where Jønke was suspended ed.)  Exactly that day the slander and power struggles disappeared, - and we got the true brotherhood restored and togetherness.'
The Hells Angels adds something cryptic in the email to Ekstra Bladet:
'With Jønke's exit, we also ended the world's longest lecture.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Joint meeting at hotel: Shouted at Jønke
During a meeting at the end of autumn 2020 between Jønke and approximately 40 HAs at a hotel in Sweden, he was declared out of the club.
At the meeting, one of the leading rockers from HA Copenhagen stated that they wanted Jønke suspended.
'We are five departments and have 86 votes with us today. There is a majority who want you out of the club,' it read.
'About the same time, half of the participants stood up and started shouting at Jønke and anyone who tried to protest,' the new book says.
Was almost taken out
Ekstra Bladet has previously detailed Jønke's exit and the departure from the joint meeting at the Swedish hotel with, among other things, quotes from his book 'A New Beginning'.
'No one touched me, but I was surrounded and almost taken out of the meeting room. Especially Presi, who was a small, low-born hooligan, pushed on.'
'It was one thing to be exposed to a plot, another to be escorted out by a garden gnome after 40 years in the club,' he wrote.
Also read:
Youngster about eviction: Escorted out by 'garden gnome'
In a previous article, Ekstra Bladet asked Jønke if he can say no to being part of the process that has led the club to where it is today.
- No, I probably can't quite do that. I myself have helped to create some things that have made us end up where we are. But I think to a large extent that I have put the brakes on too many things at the same time, he replied.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
HA's rules for 'LEFT' and 'OUT' for a new book about HA in which Jønke's exit is also included
Briefly about Jønke

 'Rockerkrig' 'Sjakaler Hells' 'Sverige']

title: Sådan er Peter Madsens liv i dag
subtitle: Han ville skyde sig selv ud i rummet som amatørastronat, men i dag afsoner han en livstidsdom i Storstrøm Fængsel og har kontakt med folk gennem en glasrude
body:
Peter Madsen havde ambitioner om at skrive sig ind i historiebøgerne ved at skyde sig selv ud i rummet som den første amatørastronaut og elskede opmærksomheden ved at optræde for rullende kameraer.
Peter Madsen i nyt retsdrama
I stedet lever han nu et begrænset liv, hvor hans yderst sparsomme kontakt til folk uden for fængslets mure er foregået gennem en glasrude, hvor han og den besøgende skal kommunikere via et samtalesystem, hvor stemmerne giver ekko, når man taler.
Det erfarer Ekstra Bladet fra flere kilder.
Peter Madsen afsoner sin livstidsdom for det planlagte seksualdrab på Kim Wall i Storstrøm Fængsel på Falster, hvor han afsoner i fængslets særligt sikrede afdeling E. Her er hans hjem en celle på 12,8 kvadratmeter med eget bad og toilet.
Han blev flyttet til Storstrøm Fængsel, efter at han flygtede fra Herstedvester Fængsel 20. oktober 2020 ved at lave et falsk bombebælte og tage en psykolog som gidsel.
Siden er der kommet yderligere begrænsninger for hans kontakt med omverdenen, efter at en lov om indskrænkning af livstidsfangers og forsvaringsdømtes rettigheder blev vedtaget. Det skete oven på stor forargelse over, at Peter Madsen fandt nye kvinder at date, mens han var bag tremmer.
Derfor er det nu ikke længere tilladt for livstidsfanger at skrive breve, ringe eller få besøg af personer, som de ikke havde kontakt med, før de blev varetægtsfængslet. Og det er den indsatte, der skal bevise, at der var en kontakt tidligere.
Han ville gerne have besøg
Peter Madsens ven fra gamle dage Jens Falkenberg var en af dem, der besøgte Peter Madsen, da han sad i Herstedvester Fængsel.
- Jeg besøgte ham stort set hver uge i en time. Nogle gange overvejede jeg, at der lige skulle gå et par uger, før jeg kom igen, men så sagde Peter, at 'du må meget gerne komme i næste uge'. Jeg kunne mærke, at han rigtig gerne ville have besøg, siger han.
Men han siger, at det er længe siden, at han har besøgt ham. Og slet ikke nede i Storstrøm Fængsel. Først var der corona, så kom flugten, og i starten af året fik Jens Falkenberg ligesom alle andre annulleret sin besøgstilladelse på grund af den nye lov.
Eftersom han har kendt Peter Madsen længe før gerningen, så ville han formentlig godt kunne få en ny besøgstilladelse. Men det har han ikke set nogen grund til.
Var utilfreds
Allerede under retssagen, hvor Peter Madsen var sigtet for flugtforsøg, satte han ord på, at han var utilfreds med sin afsoningssituation. Dengang Herstedvester Fængsel.
Han befandt sig i en situation, hvor han følte, at han aldrig ville blive løsladt, og hans adgang til besøg var meget begrænset. Han var desuden afskåret fra sine pårørende, forklarede han i Retten i Glostrup.
Han sagde, at han var desperat for at komme væk fra Herstedvester Fængsel, fordi han ville tilbage til sit gamle arbejde og bidrage til samfundet. Han var desuden meget ked af de restriktioner, herunder i forhold til besøg, som han var underlagt. Og det var baggrunden for hans flugt, forklarede han.
Siden er hans afsoningsforhold ikke blevet bedre.
Peter Madsen før drabet: Rablede om psykopater
body_en:
Peter Madsen had ambitions to write himself into the history books by launching himself into space as the first amateur astronaut and loved the attention of performing for rolling cameras.
Peter Madsen in new court drama
Instead, he now lives a restricted life, where his extremely sparse contact with people outside the prison walls has taken place through a glass window, where he and the visitor must communicate via a conversation system, where the voices echo when you speak.
Ekstra Bladet learns this from several sources.
Peter Madsen is serving his life sentence for the planned sexual murder of Kim Wall in Storstrøm Prison in Falster, where he is serving his sentence in the prison's specially secured section E. Here his home is a 12.8 square meter cell with its own bath and toilet.
He was moved to Storstrøm Prison after he escaped from Herstedvester Prison on 20 October 2020 by making a fake bomb belt and taking a psychologist hostage.
Since then, there have been further restrictions on his contact with the outside world after a law restricting the rights of life prisoners and defense convicts was passed. It happened on top of great outrage that Peter Madsen found new women to date while he was behind bars.
Therefore, it is now no longer permitted for life prisoners to write letters, call or visit people with whom they had no contact before they were remanded in custody. And it is the inmate who must prove that there was a previous contact.
He wanted visitors
Peter Madsen's old friend Jens Falkenberg was one of those who visited Peter Madsen when he was in Herstedvester Prison.
- I visited him almost every week for an hour. Sometimes I considered that it would be a few weeks before I came again, but then Peter said that 'you are welcome to come next week'. I could feel that he really wanted to have visitors, he says.
But he says it's been a long time since he visited him. And not at all down in Storstrøm Prison. First there was corona, then came the flight, and at the beginning of the year Jens Falkenberg, like everyone else, had his visitor's permit canceled due to the new law.
Since he has known Peter Madsen long before the crime, he would probably be able to get a new visitor's permit. But he has seen no reason for that.
Was dissatisfied
Already during the trial, where Peter Madsen was charged with attempted escape, he made it clear that he was dissatisfied with the situation of his sentence. At that time Herstedvester Prison.
He was in a situation where he felt he would never be released and his access to visits was very limited. He was also cut off from his relatives, he explained in the Court in Glostrup.
He said he was desperate to get out of Herstedvester Prison because he wanted to return to his old job and contribute to society. He was also very upset about the restrictions, including in relation to visits, to which he was subject. And that was the reason for his escape, he explained.
Since then, his terms of service have not improved.
Peter Madsen before the murder: Rabbled about psychopaths
