 'Kim Wall' 'Retten i Glostrup' 'Storstrøm Fængsel' 'Storstrøm Fængsel']

title: Fra offer til hooligan til HA
subtitle: Mazdak Fabricius gik fra at være et vidunderbarn på violin til hooligan og HA'er. En voldsspiral omkring ham antændte en omfattende bandekrig mellem Hells Angels og flere indvandrer-bander
body:
Brian Sandberg rekrutterede 12 fyre fra hooliganmiljøet, der havde potentiale som rockeraspiranter. Ved et stiftende møde i HA Copenhagen nogle uger senere diskuterede de navnet på den nye underafdeling. 'Legions From Hell' bliver forkastet, fordi det lød som et computerspil. En af de unge rekrutter sagde 'AK81'.
Jønke spurgte, hvad AK står for.
'Altid klar', sagde Mazdak Fabricius. Alle vidste, at 81 står for HA.
Det var i 2006. Blot to år senere havde Mazdak Fabricius på kort tid taget turen fra offer over hooligan og til Hells Angels' inderste rækker.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Onsdag 14. august 2008 var himlen skyfri og aftenen lun. Som så ofte før hang en stor flok unge mænd af anden etnisk herkomst end dansk ud foran pizzeriaet Gonzales, som lå i en lav arkadebygning tæt på Lille Torv i Tingbjerg uden for København.
Flere af de unge var kendte ansigter hos Københavns Politis bandeenhed, hvor de internt gik under navnet ‘Tingbjerg-gruppen’.
Ved 23-tiden traskede flere af dem hjemad, mens 12-15 fyre blev hængende på torvet. Flere var iført stiksikre Kevlar-veste og bevæbnet med pistoler. I skuret bag et vaskeri havde de en sportstaske med to pumpguns liggende som backup. De vidste, at noget var under opsejling, og var forberedt på det værste.
Klokken 23.15 trillede en sølvgrå Peugeot langsomt ud i krydset ved Åkandevej og Ruten med kurs mod Lille Torv. Mundingen fra et AK-47-stormgevær stak ud fra den ene siderude.
I bilen befandt sig ifølge en senere dom en af bandekrigens senere mest toneangivende personer sig. Det var Mazdak Fabricius.
Hans historie begynder dog meget langt fra voldelige opgør i en betonforstand til København. Beskrivelserne stammer fra bogen 'Engle og sjakaler', som udkom i september 2022.
Fra violin til våben
Mazdak blev født i Danmark i 1986. Allerede før han fyldte tre år, spillede han violin. Senere begyndte han på musikskole, og inden længe var han optaget i strygeorkestret og blev udnævnt til koncertmester før sin 12-års fødselsdag.
På et tidspunkt flyttede han med sin iranskfødte mor fra Vestegnen til Vangede nord for København, og her begyndte han at få en følelse af ikke at passe helt ind. Efter eget udsagn blev han kendt som ‘ham den lille sorte henne fra hjørnet’, og han var lykkelig for, at han havde musikken, hvor det kun var evnerne på violinen, han blev målt på.
Han blev optaget i Det Danske Drengekor, og iført hvid skjorte og vest var han med, når koret samarbejdede med Det Kongelige Teater. Mødet med de meget dygtige musikere fik ham dog gradvist til at miste lysten til musikken.
Splittet baggrund
Snart begyndte han på HF og fik smag for fest og fodboldholdet FC København. Han blev venner med en fyr, som hed Mads P, som var opvokset i Mjølnerparken på Nørrebro og kendte de hårde fyre derinde. Mazdak var nysgerrig, fordi han længe var blevet behandlet som en indvandrer, selv om han var opdraget dansk.
Han oplevede let at glide ind i det hårde miljø, men fandt hurtigt ud af, at det var lige så nemt at skaffe sig fjender i de omgivelser. En af de toneangivende yngre mænd i miljøet var jaloux på Mazdak, fordi han havde en BMW.
En dag mødtes de, og fyren narrede bilen fra ham. Senere fik han den tilbage med smadret front og en motor, som ikke havde det for godt. Utallige gange blev han lovet penge for skaderne, men måtte efter noget tid hive fat i mandens storebror.
- Jeg skal nok ordne det, sagde han.
Kort tid efter vendte han dog tilbage med uforettet sag.
Troede, han skulle dø
Tre måneder senere gik Mazdak rundt i Haraldsgadekvarteret på Nørrebro, da han så manden med bilen og to store fyre komme imod ham.
- Vi skal lige tale sammen, sagde han og skubbede Mazdak hen mod en bil, der holdt 20 meter derfra.
Ifølge 'Engle og sjakaler ' satte manden sig ind bag rattet, vendte sig om og pressede en sølvgrå revolver for panden af ham.
- Du er færdig. Du dør nu. Du skulle aldrig have stukket mig til min bror. Bare vent og se, hvad der sker, truede han.
Den ene af de to fyre sad med en dolk i hånden. Ingen af dem sagde noget. Mazdak troede, at han skulle dø. Han nærmest ventede på, at han pressede aftrækkeren i bund. Han forsøgte at lade som om, han var ligeglad, men kunne mærke, at han fik tårer i øjnene. Efter at have fået vist to patroner og fået at vide, at der var en til hvert ben, så sagde de, at han nu skulle sælge stoffer, røve butikker og begå indbrud for dem.
I stedet undgik han alle fra Mjølnerparken. Nu havde han mærket på egen krop, at man ikke kunne stole på den slags typer. Selvom han var mørk i huden, var han en del af majoritetskulturen. Han besluttede sig for at få tatoveret ordene ‘I Danmark er jeg født’ hen over navlen.
Rygterne begyndte på et tidspunkt at svirre om, at hans plageånder havde slået sig sammen med dem fra Blågårds Plads.
Copenhagen casuals
Mazdak reagerede ved at træne ihærdigt og se sig om efter rygdækning. Den fandt han i hooliganmiljøet omkring FC København. Det faldt ham let at begå sig blandt de hardcore fans. En søndag eftermiddag stod Mazdak i flokken af de mest aktive og larmende FCK-fans på Sektion 12, da dommeren fløjtede.
En ung fyr, der ikke så ud til at være meget mere end 15 år, blev rasende over kendelsen og kastede sin fadøl, så det sprøjtede ud over tilskuere længere nede på lægterne. Mazdak kunne straks se, at sjatterne ramte de helt forkerte. Stemningen blev ond. Flokken af hooligans var klar til at angribe. Mazdak rykkede resolut hen foran fyren for at komme de andre i forkøbet.
Den unge fyr syntes først, at han var langt ude, men fornemmede så, at det var til hans eget bedste. Et par timer senere kørte tre biler op foran en FCK-bar i nærheden af Parken. Tre skaldede og pumpede mænd steg ud og spurgte:
- Vi leder efter ham, som smed en ud fra Parken, sagde den ene ifølge 'Engle og sjakaler.'
Backup forsvandt
Mazdak sagde, at det var ham, fordi han følte, at han havde sin backup i orden. Men i det samme trak alle væk fra ham, så han stod alene over for den pumpede fyr, som nu var helt tæt på og stirrede på ham.
- Prøv og hør, han var ved at få ørerne i maskinen, sagde Mazdak og forklarede, hvad der var sket.
- Det har jeg sgu respekt for, sagde fyren, og snart efter udviklede det sig til venskab, og de stod sammen i Parken.
Manden var en ven af 'HA', og da Brian Sandberg begyndte at frekventere Parken fik han øje på gruppen af unge yderligtgående fans. Han skulle finde kandidater til HA's nye bokseklub. Copenhagen Casuals (CC) var det perfekte sted at lede.
Organiserede hooligans
Fraktionen havde de seneste par år gjort sig bemærket ved at være langt mere organiseret og voldsparat, end politiet tidligere havde forestillet sig. Op til kampe mod arvefjenderne fra Brøndby IF kørte medlemmerne for eksempel rundt i bil og ledte efter modstanderholdets tilhængere. Efterfølgende blev bilen brugt som en slags kommandocentral, hvorfra ledende skikkelser i CC dirigerede deres folk uden om politiet og hen til det sted, hvor de ville overfalde rivalerne.
Særligt en af de unge mænd skilte sig ud, syntes Sandberg ifølge 'Engle og Sjakaler'.
Han var veltrænet, skarp i tøjet, havde glimt i øjet og var charmerende. Sammen med Mazdak samlede Sandberg i efteråret og vinteren 2006 12 fyre fra hooliganmiljøet, der havde potentiale som rockeraspiranter.
AK81 opstår
Bag den automatiske gitterport i HA South End's klubhus var omkring 20 unge fyre samlet. De var enten kronragede eller karseklippede, tæt tatoverede og havde svulmende, muskuløse overkroppe. HA-veteranen Basker Hans tog ordet:
- Vi er her, fordi vi har et fælles problem, og det er de satans indvandrere. Vi ved, at I allesammen har oplevet at ligge og bokse med dem selv, hvor I har været alene, og pludselig er det bare ti mod en. Medierne skriver, at indvandrerne er begyndt at styre gader og stræder, og at HA er nogle afdankede rockere, der ikke kan en skid mere. Nu laver vi sgu noget sammen, så vi kan slå tilbage, siger han ifølge bogen.
Ved et stiftende møde i HA Copenhagen nogle uger senere diskuterede de navnet på den nye underafdeling. Jønke har lige fortalt, at man med næver, knive og pistoler skal slå tilbage mod indvandrergrupperingerne. 'Legions From Hell' bliver forkastet, fordi det lød som et computerspil. En af de unge rekrutter sagde 'AK81'.
Jønke spurgte, hvad AK står for.
'Altid klar', sagde Mazdak. Alle vidste, at 81 står for HA.
Opgør med indvandrere
Vinteren 2007/08 var der flere sammenstød mellem indvandrere og HA-relaterede folk. Blandt andet blev Jønke og hans daværende tro væbner Esben Hertz 27. december 2007 overfaldet af en mand bevæbnet med kniv i Ægirsgade på Nørrebro.
Her blev Jønke stukket flere gange med kniv ligesom overfaldmanden gjorde. Begge de HA-relaterede mænd blev siden frifundet, idet de handlede i nødværge.
Fredag 8. august 2008 blev en voldsspiral, hvirvlet op, så den førte til en ny bandekrig med utallige sårede og flere dræbte. Her holdt Mazdak sammen med en anden AK81'er ind til siden ved Sjællandsgade på Nørrebro. Mazdak gik ud af den hvide Mercedes Vito og over gaden til en kiosk for at købe slik og sodavand.
Ved siden af lå frisørsalonen 'Aladin', hvor en gruppe unge indvandrere som sædvanlig stod og hang ude foran indgangen. Han kunne se, at de straks spottede AK81-logoet på hans trøje, hvorpå de begyndte at hviske til hinanden.
- Flover du dig ikke? sagde en af fyrene til ham.
I første omgang kunne Mazdak ikke finde ud af, om de lavede sjov eller var alvorlige. Men pludselig trak nogle af fyrene hen mod ham, og stemningen blev aggressiv. Han skyndte sig tilbage mod bilen og rakte ind efter en hammer, som lå der.
Da han vendte sig om, var der kommet flere ud fra frisørsalonen, så han nu stod over for syv-otte fyre. Han holdt hammeren frem foran sig og indtog en slags kampstilling.
- Læg hammeren. Det er snyd, sagde en af dem.
- Ja, men prøv lige at se, hvor mange I er, svarede han.
- Hvad er det, I vil?
- Vi er fra Tingbjerg
Fem lange sekunder stod parterne helt tæt på hinanden og skændes, indtil først frisøren og dernæst en grønthandler kom ud fra deres butikker og forsøgte at skille dem ad. En af dem lagde en beroligende hånd på Mazdaks arm med hammeren, så han heller ikke kunne slå. Samme sekund slår en af mændene ud efter ham og snitter ham på hagen.
Han eksploderer, men de ældre mænd får ham ind i bilen. De kører væk, men han koger indeni.
Kom tilbage med pistol
Det stred mod alt, han havde lært i HA. Hvis nogen trådte én over tæerne, så trampede man straks hårdt tilbage.
De to mænd parkerede kort efter foran frisørsalonen igen. Denne gang bevæbnet med skydevåben. Men de unge indvandrere var ingen steder at finde i byen den dag. De følgende dage stødte de med mellemrum på dem i bybilledet, og hver gang kastede de ting efter hinanden.
En sen onsdag aften tog konflikten en ny karakter. Mazdak og en anden var blevet sat af på Frederikssundsvej og havde ikke set, at de var blevet skygget hele vejen fra Tingbjerg. En knallert gassede op og skød to gange mod bilen, før den forsvandt. AK81'erne vidste, at de måtte svare hårdt igen.
Skudsalve
Den sølvgrå Peugeot rullede ind ved Lille Torv i Tingbjerg. Sekunder senere flænsede en skudsalve aftenstilheden og sendte en byge af projektiler mod gruppen af unge mænd og forretningsfacaderne. De unge fyre på pladsen panikkede ved bragene og den hvinende lyd fra kuglerne. De råbte og skreg til hinanden, nogle smed sig på jorden, mens andre, deriblandt Osman Nuri Dogan, løb væk fra den åbne plads. To salver mere, og så blev der stille.
Ifølge de senere tekniske undersøgelser nåede skytten at affyre mindst 24 skud, før bilen accelererede og i høj fart flygtede fra Tingbjerg. Mindst en af Tingbjerg-drengene nåede at trække sin 9 mm-pistol og afgive fire skud efter bilen, inden den forsvandt. Bortset fra én lå alle de unge fyre uskadte tilbage på jorden.
19-årige Osman Nuri Dogan blev ramt af en af kuglerne fra første eller anden byge. Projektilet havde ramt ham i overkroppen og boret sig gennem hans Kevlar-vest og videre ind i brystet, før den havde sat sig fast i vestens rygstykke. I nogle brøkdele af et sekund havde han forsøgt at kæmpe sig videre for at komme i dækning, men efter knap 20 meter var benene begyndt at vakle under ham, og han var segnet om foran pizzeriaet. Blodet piblede ud gennem hullet i vesten, som var designet til at beskytte mod knivstik, men ikke skud fra et automatvåben. Hans egen pistol sad stadig i buksekanten.
Den næsten færdiguddannede VVS'er blev det første dødsoffer i det, der senere blev kendt som bandekrigen mellem HA og indvandrerbanderne på Nørrebro. Konflikten kostede adskillige menesker livet og sårede op mod 100.
Mazdak Fabricius blev dømt for drabet i Tingbjerg og fik 13 år og syv måneders fængsel.
Mazdak kommentar:
Fra bokseklub til HA's tæskehold: Hemmeligt møde om AK81
body_en:
Brian Sandberg recruited 12 guys from the hooligan scene who had potential as rock aspirants. At a founding meeting in HA Copenhagen a few weeks later, they discussed the name of the new subdivision. 'Legions From Hell' is rejected because it sounded like a computer game. One of the young recruits said 'AK81'.
Jønke asked what AK stands for.
'Always ready,' said Mazdak Fabricius. Everyone knew that 81 stands for HA.
That was in 2006. Just two years later, Mazdak Fabricius had in a short time made the journey from victim to hooligan and into the inner ranks of the Hells Angels.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
On Wednesday 14 August 2008, the sky was cloudless and the evening warm. As so often before, a large group of young men of ethnic origin other than Danish hung out in front of the pizzeria Gonzales, which was located in a low arcade building close to Lille Torv in Tingbjerg outside Copenhagen.
Several of the young people were well-known faces at Copenhagen Police's gang unit, where they internally went by the name 'Tingbjerg group'.
At 11 p.m., several of them trudged home, while 12-15 guys remained hanging on the square. Several were wearing stab-proof Kevlar vests and armed with pistols. In the shed behind a laundry, they had a sports bag with two pump guns lying around as a backup. They knew something was brewing and were prepared for the worst.
At 11.15 p.m., a silver-grey Peugeot rolled slowly out of the intersection at Åkandevej and Ruten, heading towards Lille Torv. The muzzle of an AK-47 assault rifle protruded from one side window.
In the car, according to a later verdict, one of the later most influential figures in the gang war was found. It was Mazdak Fabricius.
However, his story begins very far from violent confrontations in a concrete sense to Copenhagen. The descriptions come from the book 'Angels and Jackals', which was published in September 2022.
From violin to weapon
Mazdak was born in Denmark in 1986. Even before he turned three, he was playing the violin. Later he started music school, and before long he was accepted into the string orchestra and was appointed concertmaster before his 12th birthday.
At one point, he moved with his Iranian-born mother from Vestegnen to Vangede, north of Copenhagen, and here he began to feel that he didn't quite fit in. According to his own statement, he was known as 'the little black one from the corner', and he was happy that he had music, where he was only measured by his skills on the violin.
He was accepted into the Danish Boys' Choir, and wearing a white shirt and waistcoat, he joined when the choir collaborated with the Royal Theatre. However, the meeting with the very talented musicians gradually made him lose his desire for music.
Split background
Soon he started at HF ​​and got a taste for parties and the football team FC Copenhagen. He became friends with a guy called Mads P, who had grown up in Mjølnerparken in Nørrebro and knew the tough guys there. Mazdak was curious because he had long been treated as an immigrant, even though he was brought up Danish.
He found it easy to slip into the harsh environment, but soon found out that it was just as easy to make enemies in those surroundings. One of the leading younger men in the community was jealous of Mazdak because he had a BMW.
One day they met and the guy tricked the car from him. Later he got it back with a smashed front end and an engine that wasn't doing too well. Countless times he was promised money for the damages, but after some time had to grab hold of the man's older brother.
- I'll probably fix it, he said.
Shortly afterwards, however, he returned with an unfinished business.
Thought he was going to die
Three months later, Mazdak was walking around the Haraldsgade neighborhood in Nørrebro when he saw the man with the car and two big guys coming towards him.
- We just need to talk, he said and pushed Mazdak towards a car that was 20 meters away.
According to 'Angels and jackals', the man got behind the wheel, turned around and pressed a silver-grey revolver to his forehead.
- You are done. You die now. You should never have stabbed me to my brother. Just wait and see what happens, he threatened.
One of the two guys was sitting with a dagger in his hand. Neither of them said anything. Mazdak thought he was going to die. He almost waited for him to pull the trigger. He tried to pretend he didn't care, but could feel tears welling up in his eyes. After being shown two cartridges and told there was one for each leg, they said he would now sell drugs, rob stores and commit burglaries for them.
Instead, he avoided everyone from Mjølnerparken. Now he had felt on his own body that such types could not be trusted. Although he was dark-skinned, he was part of the majority culture. He decided to get the words 'In Denmark I was born' tattooed across his navel.
Rumors began to swirl at one point that his tormentors had teamed up with those from Blågårds Plads.
Copenhagen casuals
Mazdak responded by training hard and looking around for back cover. He found it in the hooligan environment around FC Copenhagen. It was easy for him to make his way among the hardcore fans. On a Sunday afternoon, Mazdak was among the most active and noisy FCK fans in Section 12 when the referee blew the whistle.
A young fellow, who did not appear to be much more than 15 years of age, was enraged by the ruling and threw his draft beer, splashing over spectators further down the rafters. Mazdak could see immediately that the arrows were hitting the wrong people. The mood turned evil. The pack of hooligans was ready to attack. Mazdak moved resolutely in front of the guy to get ahead of the others.
The young fellow thought at first that he was far out, but then sensed that it was for his own good. A few hours later, three cars pulled up in front of an FCK bar near the Park. Three bald and pumped-up men got out and asked:
- We are looking for the person who threw someone out of the Park, said one according to 'Angels and Jackals.'
Backup disappeared
Mazdak said it was him because he felt he had his backup in order. But at the same time, everyone pulled away from him, so he was alone facing the pumped-up guy, who was now very close and staring at him.
- Try and listen, he was about to get his ears in the machine, said Mazdak and explained what had happened.
- I really respect that, said the guy, and soon after it developed into friendship, and they stood together in the Park.
The man was a friend of 'HA', and when Brian Sandberg started frequenting the Park he spotted the group of young extreme fans. He had to find candidates for HA's new boxing club. Copenhagen Casuals (CC) was the perfect place to look.
Organized hooligans
In the past few years, the faction had made a name for itself by being far more organized and ready for violence than the police had previously imagined. In the run-up to matches against arch-enemies from Brøndby IF, the members drove around by car, for example, looking for the opposing team's supporters. Subsequently, the car was used as a kind of command center from which leading figures in the CC directed their people around the police and to the place where they wanted to ambush the rivals.
One of the young men in particular stood out, Sandberg thought according to 'Angels and Jackals'.
He was well trained, sharp in his clothes, had a twinkle in his eye and was charming. Together with Mazdak, in the autumn and winter of 2006, Sandberg gathered 12 guys from the hooligan milieu who had potential as rock aspirants.
AK81 arises
Behind the automatic lattice gate of the HA South End clubhouse, about 20 young men were gathered. They were either shaved or close-cropped, heavily tattooed and had bulging, muscular torsos. HA veteran Basker Hans took the floor:
- We are here because we have a common problem, and that is the damn immigrants. We know that you have all experienced lying and boxing with them yourself, where you have been alone, and suddenly it is just ten to one. The media write that the immigrants have started to rule the streets and alleys, and that HA are some renegade rockers who can't give a shit anymore. Now we're doing something together so we can fight back, he says according to the book.
At a founding meeting in HA Copenhagen a few weeks later, they discussed the name of the new subdivision. Jønke has just said that you have to fight back against the immigrant groups with fists, knives and guns. 'Legions From Hell' is rejected because it sounded like a computer game. One of the young recruits said 'AK81'.
Jønke asked what AK stands for.
'Always ready,' said Mazdak. Everyone knew that 81 stands for HA.
Dealing with immigrants
In the winter of 2007/08, there were several clashes between immigrants and HA-related people. Among other things, on 27 December 2007, Jønke and his then faithful squire Esben Hertz were attacked by a man armed with a knife in Ægirsgade in Nørrebro.
Here, Jønke was stabbed several times with a knife, just as the assailant did. Both of the HA-related men were later acquitted, having acted out of necessity.
On Friday 8 August 2008, a spiral of violence was stirred up, so that it led to a new gang war with countless injured and several killed. Here the Mazdak, together with another AK81, pulled in to the side at Sjællandsgade in Nørrebro. Mazdak got out of the white Mercedes Vito and across the street to a kiosk to buy candy and soda.
Next to it was the hairdressing salon 'Aladin', where a group of young immigrants as usual stood and hung out in front of the entrance. He could see that they immediately spotted the AK81 logo on his shirt, whereupon they started whispering to each other.
- Aren't you embarrassed? one of the guys said to him.
At first, Mazdak couldn't tell if they were joking or serious. But suddenly some of the guys moved towards him and the atmosphere became aggressive. He rushed back to the car and reached for a hammer that was lying there.
When he turned around, more people had come out of the hairdressing salon, so he was now facing seven or eight guys. He held the hammer out in front of him and assumed a sort of fighting stance.
- Put down the hammer. It's cheating, one of them said.
- Yes, but just try to see how many of you there are, he replied.
- What is it you want?
- We are from Tingbjerg
For five long seconds the parties stood very close to each other and argued, until first the hairdresser and then a greengrocer came out of their shops and tried to separate them. One of them put a soothing hand on Mazdak's arm with the hammer so he couldn't hit either. At the same second, one of the men lunges after him and cuts him on the chin.
He explodes, but the older men get him into the car. They drive away, but he's boiling inside.
Come back with gun
It went against everything he had learned in HA. If someone stepped on one's toes, they immediately stomped back hard.
The two men parked in front of the hair salon again soon after. This time armed with firearms. But the young immigrants were nowhere to be found in the city that day. In the following days, they encountered them at intervals in the city, and each time they threw things at each other.
Late on Wednesday evening, the conflict took on a new character. Mazdak and another had been dropped off on Frederikssundsvej and had not seen that they had been shadowed all the way from Tingbjerg. A moped gassed up and fired twice at the car before it disappeared. The AK81s knew they had to hit back hard.
Shot volley
The silver-grey Peugeot rolled in at Lille Torv in Tingbjerg. Seconds later, a volley of gunfire shattered the evening silence, sending a flurry of projectiles toward the group of young men and the storefronts. The young guys in the square panicked at the bangs and the screeching sound of the bullets. They shouted and screamed at each other, some threw themselves on the ground, while others, including Osman Nuri Dogan, ran away from the open square. Two more volleys, and then there was silence.
According to the later technical investigations, the shooter managed to fire at least 24 shots before the car accelerated and fled Tingbjerg at high speed. At least one of the Tingbjerg boys managed to draw his 9 mm pistol and fire four shots at the car before it disappeared. All but one of the young fellows lay unharmed on the ground.
19-year-old Osman Nuri Dogan was hit by one of the bullets from the first or second burst. The projectile had struck him in the upper body and drilled through his Kevlar vest and further into his chest before becoming lodged in the back of the vest. For a few fractions of a second he had tried to fight his way to cover, but after barely 20 meters his legs had begun to wobble under him and he was passed out in front of the pizzeria. Blood trickled out through the hole in the vest, which was designed to protect against stab wounds, but not gunshots from an automatic weapon. His own gun was still in the hem of his pants.
The almost fully qualified plumber became the first victim in what later became known as the gang war between HA and the immigrant gangs in Nørrebro. The conflict cost several people their lives and injured up to 100.
Mazdak Fabricius was convicted of the murder in Tingbjerg and received 13 years and seven months in prison.
Mazdak comment:
From boxing club to HA's beating squad: Secret meeting about AK81

 'Gang crime']

title: Dette vitamin kan du nøjes med
subtitle: DROP KOSTTILSKUD:
body:
Vitaminer er et livsnødvendigt brændstof for, at kroppen kan fungere. Men kan man egentligt få for mange vitaminer? Og er det en god idé at tage en multitablet hver dag – bare for en sikkerheds skyld? Få svarene her.
- Det er faktisk de færreste, der har brug for ekstra tilskud, siger Susanne Gjedsted Bügel, professor i ernæring ved Københavns Universitet.
- Ekstra tilskud til kosten kan endda føre til forgiftning og forhøjet risiko for bl.a. kræft, forkalkninger og blødninger i hjernen.
– Så rigtig meget af det store forbrug af kosttilskud er spild af penge?
– Ja - i bedste fald betyder overdosering en dyr urin, men i værste fald kan det betyde ophobninger og forkalkninger i vitale dele af kroppen og alvorlige komplikationer.
– Men vi bliver alle anbefalet at tage tilskud af D-vitamin?
– Ja, lige med D-vitamin anbefaler vi, at man tager ti mikrogram hver dag – eller 20 mikrogram hver anden dag, men kun i de tre vintermåneder. De øvrige måneder vil langt de fleste stadig have nok D-vitamin, som vi optager fra solen og ophober i kroppen. Er man i tvivl, skal man få det tjekket hos en læge eller en selvstændig diætist.
For meget af D
– Hvordan kan man mærke, man får for lidt D-vitamin?
– Så får man ondt! I sine led og muskler, føler træthed, udmattelse i hele kroppen. Desværre er symptomer på for lidt D-vitamin stort set de samme, som hvis man har for meget af vitaminet.
– Hvad sker der, hvis man får for meget?
– D-vitaminet er med til at regulere vores kalcium-koncentration i blodet. Kalcium er et af de allervigtigste stoffer, fordi det sikrer kommunikationen mellem cellerne, og derfor er det livsnødvendigt at opretholde en konstant koncentration i blodet. For meget D-vitamin forstyrrer reguleringen, og man risikerer ophobning i hjertet, lungerne,
leveren, nerver – en decideret forkalkning, der forhindrer kroppens organer i at kunne fungere korrekt.
Den store vitaminguide
– Tager du selv kosttilskud?
– Nej. Eller … jeg har faktisk få gange fået en indskydelse til at tage ekstra D-vitamin om vinteren, fordi jeg syntes, jeg havde spist for lidt fisk. Så har jeg taget en tablet et par dage, men glemmer det så igen …, siger hun og fastslår, at hun til hver en tid vil mene, at det bedste er at spise varieret – hele året.
Hvad er vitaminer
– Vores krop kan regulere sig selv, hvis vi sørger for at fylde den rigtige energi på. Vi kommer jo heller ikke diesel på en benzinbil. Og varieret betyder altså ikke, at vi aldrig går på burgerbar, siger Susanne Gjedsted Bügel. Hun har gennem 30 år forsket og arbejdet med vitaminernes virkninger og samspil i vores kroppe.
Ekspert: Alle vitaminer kan være farlige
Der er stadig mange mennesker – unge som ældre – der tager en multi-vitaminpille hver dag – bare for en sikkerheds skyld.
- Men er det en god idé?
– Nej, i dag siger vi, der arbejder med det her i stedet:
- ’Lad være med at tage en vitaminpille hver dag – for en sikkerheds skyld’. For vi ved ikke helt, hvad det får af effekt, siger Susanne Gjedsted Bügel, professor i ernæring ved Københavns Universitet .
– Det viser sig nemlig gang på gang, at vi finder ud af, at noget er mere giftigt, end vi havde regnet med. Alle vitaminerne er potentielt giftige, hvis man får dem i forkerte mængder, fastslår hun.
Dem skal du passe på
Det er især de fedtopløselige A-, E- og D-vitaminer, du især skal være opmærksom på i sammenhæng med øvrigt kosttilskud og medicin.
– Vitaminer og mineraler er biologisk aktive stoffer, der går ind og påvirker vores kroppe – og det kan også være skadeligt, siger hun og understreger:
– Man skal derfor ikke anbefale kosttilskud til alle – eller tage det for en sikkerheds skyld. Man skal have en individuel vurdering i forhold til personens øvrige kost, alder og eventuelle andre tilskud.
Susanne Gjedsted Bügel forklarer, at holdningen til, om man skulle tage tilskud for en sikkerheds skyld eller lade være, ændrede sig for cirka 20 år siden.
I dag ved man eksempelvis, at stoffet betacaroten,
der blandt andet findes naturligt i grønne bladgrøntsager, gulerødder, tomater og andet grønt – men også findes som et meget populært og benyttet kosttilskud fra mange forskellige fabrikanter  – har vist sig at øge risiko for kræft, hvis man er midaldrende, storrygende mand, og indtager det som kosttilskud, advarer hun.
– Det kan skyldes, at stoffet opfører sig anderledes ved naturligt indtag end som kosttilskud. Så midaldrende mænd skal være opmærksomme på ikke at få betacaroten som kosttilskud..
– Om det også gælder kvinder, ved man ikke, for man har ikke turdet gentage forsøget, fordi det ikke alene viste markant øget risiko for kræft, men også øgede risikoen for lungekræft og hjertesygdom – især hos rygere.
Pas på ekstra kalk
Kalcium (kalk) bliver taget af mange midaldrende kvinder, fordi de har risiko for knogleskørhed. Hvis de gør det, skal de sikre sig at tage det sammen med D-vitamin, da det ellers vil øge risiko for at få hjerteproblemer.
– Tidligere var man kun opmærksomme på A-vitamin til gravide, fordi det kunne være fosterskadeligt. Men vi ved også nu, at kvinder, der har knogleskørhed, skal passe på med at tage ekstra A-vitamin, da der i stedet er risiko for, at det forværrer det, advarer hun.
Pas på ekstra jern
Jern er meget svært at udskille, og derfor bør mænd ikke tage kosttilskud, der indeholder jern.
Den eneste måde, man kan udskille jern på, er nemlig, når hår og hudceller forgår – og ved at bløde. Derfor er det kun kvinder, der gennem livet mister jern, indtil de ikke længere menstruerer.
– Mange kvinder anbefales at tage jern på et tidspunkt som yngre, og så bliver de ved med at tage det hele deres liv – men det skal de ikke, advarer Susanne Gjedsted Bügel og tilføjer:
– Der er formodning om, at når mænd oftere rammes af hjerte-kar-sygdomme end kvinder, kan det have noget at gøre med, at mænd har en højere ophobning af jern. Mænd bør derfor gennem hele livet ikke tage kosttilskud, der indeholder jern.
Læs mere her:
Urolig mave kan være mangel på vigtigt mineral
Stor guide: Dette holder din hjerne knivskarp
body_en:
Vitamins are a vital fuel for the body to function. But can you really get too many vitamins? And is it a good idea to take a multitablet every day - just to be safe? Get the answers here.
- It is actually very few people who need extra subsidies, says Susanne Gjedsted Bügel, professor of nutrition at the University of Copenhagen.
- Extra supplements to the diet can even lead to poisoning and an increased risk of, among other things, cancer, calcifications and bleeding in the brain.
- So a lot of the large consumption of nutritional supplements is a waste of money?
- Yes - in the best case overdose means expensive urine, but in the worst case it can mean accumulations and calcifications in vital parts of the body and serious complications.
- But we are all recommended to take supplements of vitamin D?
- Yes, just like vitamin D, we recommend that you take ten micrograms every day - or 20 micrograms every other day, but only during the three winter months. In the other months, the vast majority will still have enough vitamin D, which we absorb from the sun and accumulate in the body. If you are in doubt, you should have it checked by a doctor or an independent dietitian.
Too much of D
- How can you tell if you are getting too little vitamin D?
- Then you get hurt! In his joints and muscles, feel fatigue, exhaustion throughout the body. Unfortunately, symptoms of too little vitamin D are largely the same as if you have too much of the vitamin.
– What happens if you get too much?
- Vitamin D helps to regulate our calcium concentration in the blood. Calcium is one of the most important substances because it ensures communication between the cells, and therefore it is vital to maintain a constant concentration in the blood. Too much vitamin D disrupts the regulation, and you risk accumulation in the heart, lungs,
the liver, nerves – a definite calcification that prevents the body's organs from being able to function correctly.
The big vitamin guide
- Do you take supplements yourself?
- No. Or... I've actually been advised a few times to take extra vitamin D in the winter because I thought I'd eaten too little fish. Then I have taken a tablet for a few days, but then forget it again..., she says and states that at times she will think that the best thing is to eat varied food - all year round.
What are vitamins
- Our body can regulate itself if we make sure to fill it with the right energy. We don't get diesel on a petrol car either. And varied does not mean that we never go to a burger bar, says Susanne Gjedsted Bügel. For 30 years, she has researched and worked with the effects and interaction of vitamins in our bodies.
Expert: All vitamins can be dangerous
There are still many people – young and old – who take a multi-vitamin pill every day – just to be safe.
- But is it a good idea?
- No, today we say who works with this instead:
- 'Don't take a vitamin pill every day - just in case'. Because we don't quite know what effect it will have, says Susanne Gjedsted Bügel, professor of nutrition at the University of Copenhagen.
- It turns out time and time again that we find out that something is more toxic than we had expected. All the vitamins are potentially toxic if you get them in the wrong amounts, she states.
You must take care of them
It is especially the fat-soluble vitamins A, E and D that you must pay particular attention to in connection with other dietary supplements and medicines.
- Vitamins and minerals are biologically active substances that enter and affect our bodies - and this can also be harmful, she says and emphasizes:
- You should therefore not recommend nutritional supplements to everyone - or take them just in case. You must have an individual assessment in relation to the person's other diet, age and any other supplements.
Susanne Gjedsted Bügel explains that the attitude to whether one should take subsidies just to be safe or not, changed approximately 20 years ago.
Today, for example, we know that the substance beta-carotene,
which is found naturally in green leafy vegetables, carrots, tomatoes and other vegetables - but is also found as a very popular and used dietary supplement from many different manufacturers - has been shown to increase the risk of cancer if you are a middle-aged, heavy-smoking man, and consume it as a dietary supplement, she warns.
- This may be because the substance behaves differently when taken naturally than as a dietary supplement. So middle-aged men should be careful not to get beta-carotene as a dietary supplement.
- Whether this also applies to women is not known, because they have not dared to repeat the experiment, because it not only showed a significantly increased risk of cancer, but also increased the risk of lung cancer and heart disease - especially in smokers.
Beware of extra lime
Calcium (lime) is taken by many middle-aged women because they are at risk of osteoporosis. If they do, they should make sure to take it with vitamin D, otherwise it will increase the risk of heart problems.
- In the past, people were only aware of vitamin A for pregnant women, because it could be harmful to the foetus. But we also now know that women who have osteoporosis must be careful about taking extra vitamin A, as there is instead a risk that it worsens it, she warns.
Beware of extra iron
Iron is very difficult to excrete, which is why men should not take supplements containing iron.
The only way you can excrete iron is when hair and skin cells die - and by bleeding. Therefore, only women lose iron throughout life until they no longer menstruate.
- Many women are recommended to take iron at some point when they are younger, and then they continue to take it their whole life - but they shouldn't, warns Susanne Gjedsted Bügel and adds:
- There is a presumption that when men are more often affected by cardiovascular diseases than women, it may have something to do with the fact that men have a higher accumulation of iron. Men should therefore not take nutritional supplements containing iron throughout their lives.

An upset stomach can be a lack of an important mineral
Big guide: This keeps your brain sharp

title: Betjente holdt pusher ud af 5. sals vindue
subtitle: - Så holder vi fast i livremmen og anklerne, mens han får lidt 'hang time'. Tidligere narkobetjent fortæller i ny bog om betjente, banditter og skandalen med Stripper-Simone
body:
black
- Vi kommer op i en lejlighed. En 'bjørn' smider en lille plastikbeholder til en fotorulle ud ad vinduet fyldt op med kokainkugler. Min kollega 'Baronen' går ned og samler op. Da han kommer op igen, er han i det røde felt, fortæller René Dahl Andersen i sin nye bog 'Helhjertet' om sin tid som narkobetjent.
Kokain ligner bolsjer
Nede i gården løber der børn rundt og leger, da beholderen rammer jorden og springer op, så 10-12 ét-grams kokainkugler i cellofan falder ud på jorden omkring dem. Kugler, som til forveksling ligner bolsjer.
- Spiser en af dem den kokain, så dør de, siger René Dahl Andersen om episoden, der har mejslet sig fast i hans hukommelse. Ikke mindst efterspillet mellem betjentene og pusheren i lejligheden.
- Vi satte 'bjørnen' på plads ude i køkkenet, kørte ham hen ad køkkenbordet, holdt ham fast i livremmen og anklerne, mens han hang ud af vinduet fra 5. sal. Efter lidt 'hang time', som man siger i basketball, blev han hevet ind og visiteret i bund.
quote
Bjørne er vores øgenavn for de afrikanske pushere fra Gambia og Guinea-Bissau. Det har de altid heddet, jeg ved ikke hvorfor. Det er ikke racistisk ment, men mit syn på det er, de går som en ludende bjørn - på bagbenene, roligt og søgende.
Bog om en betjents gråzoner
black
Har du fået højdeskræk?
Otte år senere løber René Dahl Andersen igen på 'bjørnen' fra vinduet. Han skriver i bogen:
'Adressen er Lygten tæt på Nørrebro Station, og da vi kommer frem til lejligheden, viser den sig at være en typisk bjørnerede. Den er så uhumsk, at der ikke kan have været gjort rent i årevis. På gulvet sidder en dansk mand og en afrikaner i håndjern, og afrikaneren smiler smørret, da han ser mig.
- Welcome, Mr. René Dahl Andersen, siger han.
Jeg kan regne ud, at vi har mødt hinanden før. Men jeg kan ikke lige placere ansigtet på den her bjørn. Men da han begynder at forklare, hvordan vi kender hinanden, går det op for mig, at han hang med hovedet nedad, sidst vi sås.
- Har du fået højdeskræk? spørger jeg ham. Det ser ikke ud til, at han kan se humoren. Han siger ikke andet, end at det var ærgerligt for ham, 'at der ikke var andre vidner end politifolk dengang.'
Går over stregen
- Var du bange for vidner?
- Så ville jeg have lænet mig op ad sandheden og fortalt, han forsøgte at springe ud ad vinduet, men at vi nåede at gribe ham i livremmen og anklerne.
- En forsvarsadvokat nævner i bogen, at hans klienter ofte har fortalt historier om politiet, men at han aldrig har troet på dem. Men nogle af historierne, som klienterne fortæller om jer, er jo så sande?
- Ja.
- Ville du altid slippe godt fra sådan en situation?
- Det kan man ikke vide. Det kommer an på situationen og kollegerne. Og det er klart, når man er en sammentømret enhed og har en kultur, så kender man hinanden særdeles godt. Når man går til stregen og over den nogle gange, så gør man det med dem, man stoler på. Men stregen og grænser rykker sig, uanset hvilket fag man er i, og hvorhenne i livet man er. Det skal man bare turde stå ved, og det gør jeg.
black
quote
Det er tydeligt, han ikke har skænket det en tanke i mellemtiden, at han har kastet kokainkugler ned i en gård fyldt med legende børn. Det er kynismen, han står for, der gør en narkobetjent hærdet.
black
Kærlighed og lussinger
René Dahl Andersens moralske og etiske kompas blev rykket i de 18 år, han var i aktiv tjeneste.
Han har skåret dæk op på mistænktes biler, omgået sandheden i politirapporter og givet narkotika tilbage til misbrugere og meddelere.
- Mennesker på gaden, om det er en prostitueret eller en mandlig misbruger, der sidder med en nål i armen og ikke kan skaffe penge til det næste fix, ligger mig nært, for det er dem, vi har overset som samfund. Og så synes jeg, det er en barsk skæbne at skulle tjene sine penge til sit næste fix ved at have sex med en mand i Sydhavnen eller et andet gustent sted. Det er ikke et valg, hun selv har taget. Det er narkotikaen, der tager det valg for hende, siger René Dahl Andersen.
- Jeg tror på, man kommer længst ved at turde være blød i en rå virkelighed. Jeg skal ikke løbe fra, jeg har taget fat, og jeg har også taget hårdt fat nogle gange, men jeg har spredt mere kærlighed end lussinger.
- Og manden fra vinduet, følte han også din kærlighed?
- Han havde fået en lærestreg. Og han var jo heller ikke hidsig eller sur på mig, da han møder mig igen otte år efter i en lejlighed. Der var god stemning, det var med et smil på læben og med respekt. Vi sagde pænt farvel, og det er det, man skal forstå i det miljø; der er to fronter, røvhullerne og svinene - banditterne har nogle spilleregler, betjente nogle andre, og der er en gensidig respekt.
- Som betjent kan man godt lave det nummer med at hænge folk ud af vinduet, så længe vedkommende ved, han nok havde fortjent det.
- Man skal kun være en hård fyr, hvis det virkelig, virkelig er nødvendigt, ellers skal man møde folk med forståelse og empati.
Stripper-Simone
Tidligere betjent René Dahl Andersen viser rundt i narkomiljøet på Vesterbro
Se René Dahl Andersen vise rundt i narkomiljøet på Vesterbro i København.
Bestod FBI's agent-kursus: René smed bukserne
René begik sit livs dumhed: Politiets vidunderdreng dømt for tyveri
Undercover-agentens dobbeltliv: René er Danmarks James Bond
body_en:
black
- We arrive at an apartment. A 'bear' throws a small plastic container for a photo roll out the window filled with cocaine balls. My colleague 'The Baron' goes down and picks up. When he comes up again, he is in the red field, says René Dahl Andersen in his new book 'Helhjertet' about his time as a drug officer.
Cocaine looks like candy
Down in the yard, children are running around and playing when the container hits the ground and pops up, so that 10-12 one-gram balls of cocaine in cellophane fall onto the ground around them. Balls that look like candy.
- If one of them eats that cocaine, they die, says René Dahl Andersen about the episode that has etched itself in his memory. Not least the aftermath between the officers and the pusher in the apartment.
- We put the 'bear' in place in the kitchen, drove him to the kitchen table, held him by the waist belt and ankles while he hung out of the window from the 5th floor. After a little 'hang time', as they say in basketball, he was hauled in and searched downstairs.
quote
Bears is our nickname for the African pushers from Gambia and Guinea-Bissau. They've always been called that, I don't know why. It's not meant to be racist, but my take on it is that they walk like a slobbering bear - on their hind legs, calm and searching.
Book about an officer's gray areas
black
Have you got a fear of heights?
Eight years later, René Dahl Andersen again runs at the 'bear' from the window. He writes in the book:
'The address is Lygten, close to Nørrebro Station, and when we arrive at the apartment, it turns out to be a typical bear's nest. It is so disgusting that it cannot have been cleaned for years. On the floor sit a Danish man and an African in handcuffs, and the African smiles wryly when he sees me.
- Welcome, Mr. René Dahl Andersen, he says.
I can figure out that we have met before. But I can't quite place the face of this bear. But as he begins to explain how we know each other, it dawns on me that he was hanging with his head down the last time we saw each other.
- Have you got a fear of heights? I ask him. He doesn't seem to see the humor. He says nothing other than that it was a pity for him 'that there were no witnesses other than policemen at the time.'
Crossing the line
- Were you afraid of witnesses?
- Then I would have leaned on the truth and said that he tried to jump out of the window, but that we managed to grab him by the waist belt and ankles.
- A defense lawyer mentions in the book that his clients have often told stories about the police, but that he has never believed them. But some of the stories that the clients tell about you are so true, aren't they?
- Yes.
- Would you always escape such a situation?
- You can't know that. It depends on the situation and the colleagues. And it is clear that when you are a close-knit unit and have a culture, you know each other extremely well. When you go to the line and over it sometimes, you do it with those you trust. But the line and boundaries move, regardless of what subject you are in and where you are in life. You just have to have the courage to stand by it, and I do.
black
quote
It's clear he hasn't given it a second thought in the meantime that he's been throwing balls of cocaine into a yard full of playing children. It's the cynicism he stands for that makes a drug cop hardened.
black
Love and slaps
René Dahl Andersen's moral and ethical compass was shaken during the 18 years he was in active service.
He has slashed tires on suspects' cars, sidestepped the truth in police reports, and returned drugs to addicts and informants.
- People on the street, whether it's a prostitute or a male addict, who sits with a needle in their arm and can't raise money for the next fix, are close to me, because they are the ones we have overlooked as a society. And then I think it's a harsh fate to have to earn your money for your next fix by having sex with a man in Sydhavnen or some other nice place. It is not a choice she has made herself. It is the drugs that make that choice for her, says René Dahl Andersen.
- I believe that you get the furthest by daring to be soft in a harsh reality. I'm not going to run away, I've grabbed and I've grabbed hard sometimes, but I've spread more love than slaps.
- And the man from the window, did he also feel your love?
- He had learned a lesson. And he wasn't irritable or mad at me either, when he meets me again eight years later in an apartment. There was a good atmosphere, it was with a smile on the face and with respect. We said goodbye nicely, and that's what you have to understand in that environment; there are two fronts, the assholes and the pigs - the bandits have some rules, the cops some others, and there is a mutual respect.
- As an officer, you can do the trick of hanging people out of the window, as long as the person knows that he probably deserved it.
- You only have to be a tough guy if it's really, really necessary, otherwise you have to meet people with understanding and empathy.
Stripper-Simone
Former officer René Dahl Andersen shows around the drug scene in Vesterbro
Watch René Dahl Andersen show around the drug scene at Vesterbro in Copenhagen.
Passed the FBI's agent course: René dropped his pants
René committed the stupidity of his life: the police prodigy convicted of theft
The undercover agent's double life: René is Denmark's James Bond

title: Sex-krænket af hjemmehjælper: Troede han kom for at trøste
subtitle: I retten i Nykøbing Falster blev en 55-årig mandlig hjemmehjælper tirsdag dømt otte måneders fængsel for at forgribe sig på to nylige enker i deres hjem
body:
RETTEN I NYKØBING FALSTER (Ekstra Bladet): Det var med skælvende stemme og lemmer, at en ældre kvinde forsøgte at sætte ord på de modbydelige
overgreb, som den 55-årige hjemmehjælper udsatte hende og en anden ældre kvinde for
i deres egne hjem i Nykøbing Falster.
Hun skuttede sig, hver gang dommer og anklager spurgte ind til forholdene. Hendes rødbrune hår med grå rødder var samlet i en rodet og tjavset hestehale.
- Han blev ved med at kramme og kysse mig. Tog fat i mig, holdt omkring mig, jo tættere, jo bedre. Når jeg prøvede at skubbe ham væk, sagde han bare: Du kan jo lide det, (red. forurettedes navn), jeg ved, du kan lide det. Jeg hører den sætning for mig hele tiden. Så var det også, han sagde: Kan du mærke bulen i mine bukser?, forklarede hun.
Den ældre kvindes forklaring led tydeligt under, at hun skulle genkalde og beskrive de fysiske overgreb, og at hendes hukommelse er begyndt at svigte hende.
Mens ordene var svære at finde, brugte hun hænderne til at illustrere ganske detaljeret, hvordan manden havde forgrebet sig på hende.
Den 55-årige mand, der onsdag blev dømt otte måneders fængsel for blufærdighedskrænkelse og andet seksuelt forhold end samleje ved voldtægt, nægtede sig skyldig i de seksuelle krænkelser, men modtog alligevel sin dom.
- Den eneste, han ville trøste, var sig selv
Hjemmehjælperen var lejlighedsvis kommet i hendes hjem for at pleje den ældre kvindes syge mand. Men efter ægtemanden afgik ved døden juli sidste år, fortsatte hjemmehjælperen med at lukke sig ind i hendes hjem med nøgler, han havde adgang til i kraft af sin stilling.
- Jeg troede, han kom for at trøste mig. Han kom jo i sin arbejdstid. Men den eneste, han ville trøste, var sig selv, sagde kvinden. Den ældre kvinde blev hurtigt klar over, at hjemmehjælperen kom for at få udløsning, enten ved at gnubbe sig op ad hende, eller ved at presse hende til at røre ved ham. Han kom fast et par gange om måneden, når han havde weekendvagt.
Den 55-årige tidligere hjemmehjælper var også tiltalt for at have udøvet ulovlig tvang i forbindelse med overgrebene, hvilket han blev frifundet for. Til gengæld lagde dommeren vægt på de skærpende omstændigheder, at han har udnyttet sårbare kvinder, der i kraft af deres alder og dybe sorg var ude af stand til at sige fra.
Vulgære beskeder: 'Du gør mig så liderlig'
Også det andet vidne, en 83-årig kvinde oplevede krænkelsen, umiddelbart efter hendes ægtemand døde januar i år. Hun forklarer, at hjemmehjælperen umiddelbart efter stod i hendes hjem, hvor han selv havde lukket sig ind. Hun havde lige været i bad, da han begyndte at befamle hendes nøgne krop.
I hendes tilfælde skete det kun én gang. Selvom hun også var 'helt ude af den' i situationen, anmeldte hun alligevel sagen. Manden blev kort efter bortvist fra hjemmeplejen, mens undersøgelserne stod på.
- Det er sgu ikke normalt, hvis man vil have sex, at man vælger de gamle damer. Jeg ved godt vi ser godt ud, men det er jo det, der er det perverse, det snedige. Han vidste jo godt, jeg var helt ude af den, sagde hun.
Var der for at hjælpe
Den 55-årige forklarede selv, at han aldrig havde gjort seksuelle tilnærmelser til de to kvinder, men at han besøgte dem for at hjælpe til i deres sårbare situation.
-  Når borgeren går bort, så er vi (red. hjemmeplejen) der ikke mere. Men jeg er fortaler for, at vi også samler de pårørende op. For hvem skal være der for de her mennesker? Egentlig skal der jo måske noget professionelt til, men hvis en samtale med mig kan gøre det, der det jo også godt, sagde han.
Samtidig forklarede han, at han ikke var forelsket i nogen af kvinderne, og at de tværtimod var 'en diamentral modsætning af hans type'.
Dommeren endte alligevel med at tilsidesætte mandens forklaring som værende utroværdig og kaldte det 'fantasifuldt', at manden skulle bryde ind i deres hjem for at hjælpe dem i deres sorg.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Gruppeleder: Blev tidligere advaret
Hjemmeplejens gruppeleder indgik også som vidne i retssagen mod den 55-årige mand. Her forklarede hun, at hjemmeplejen blev opmærksom på overgrebene gennem en centersygeplejerske, der havde talt med den 83-årige kvindelige borger.
Gruppelederen indkalder derefter den 55-årige mand til tjenestesamtale for at høre ham ind til forholdene.
- Jeg spurgte, om han kunne nikke genkendende til, hvad kvinden havde beskrevet. Han forklarede, at han kun mindedes en enkelt episode, hvor han skulle have lagt hånden på borgeren, fordi han ville trøste hende, sagde gruppelederen under vidneforklaringen.
Men mens efterforskningen af sagen stod på, blev manden alligevel fritaget fra tjeneste i januar 2022. For via hjemmeplejens digitale nøglesystem, kunne de hurtigt afgøre, at manden brudt ind hos kvinderne uden at have et ærinde.
- Vi kunne jo registrere, hvornår han havde brugt nøgleloggen og sammenholde det med,om han havde et ærinde på det pågældende sted, det pågældende tidspunkt, forklarede gruppeleden.
Først et halvt år efter manden var blevet afskediget, stod den anden kvinde frem. For hende nåede chikanen at strække sig over en periode på omtrent et års tid.
Upassende beskeder til elev
Gruppelederen kunne også se i sine systemer, at manden tidligere havde fået en advarsel fra samme arbejdsplads for at have skrevet upassende beskeder til en elev under oplæring.
- Jeg så, der lå en skriftlig advarsel fra 2020, hvor han havde skrevet til en af vores elever, at vedkommende var smuk og dejlig, sagde hun.
Under retssagen kunne anklagemyndigheden også afsløre, at manden derudover også tidligere har fået en bøde for blufærdighedskrænkelse, efter han havde sendt et billede af sit lem til en kvindelig bekendt.
Det er blandt andet også i lyset af mandens tidligere overtrædelser, at dommeren vurderede, det var meget sandsynligt, at manden ville krænke igen. Derfor fik han udover sin dom på otte måneders fængsel også frataget retten til at beskæftige sig med lignende arbejde.
body_en:
THE COURT IN NYKÖBING FALSTER (Ekstra Bladet): It was with trembling voice and limbs that an elderly woman tried to put into words the disgusting
abuse that the 55-year-old domestic worker subjected her and another elderly woman to
in their own homes in Nykøbing Falster.
She shot herself every time the judge and prosecutor asked about the circumstances. Her auburn hair with gray roots was gathered in a messy and messy ponytail.
- He kept hugging and kissing me. Grabbed me, held me close, the closer the better. When I tried to push him away, he just said: You like it, (ed. victim's name), I know you like it. I hear that phrase all the time. Then he also said: Can you feel the bulge in my trousers?, she explained.
The older woman's explanation clearly suffered from having to recall and describe the physical abuse and that her memory has begun to fail her.
While the words were hard to find, she used her hands to illustrate in great detail how the man had preyed on her.
The 55-year-old man, who was sentenced to eight months in prison on Wednesday for indecent assault and sexual intercourse other than intercourse by rape, pleaded not guilty to the sexual offenses, but received his sentence anyway.
- The only one he wanted to comfort was himself
The domestic helper had occasionally come to her home to care for the elderly woman's sick husband. But after the husband died last July, the domestic helper continued to let himself into her home with keys he had access to by virtue of his position.
- I thought he came to comfort me. He came during his working hours. But the only one he wanted to comfort was himself, the woman said. The elderly woman quickly realized that the domestic helper was coming to ejaculate, either by rubbing up against her, or by pressuring her to touch him. He came in a few times a month when he was on weekend duty.
The 55-year-old former domestic helper was also accused of having exercised illegal coercion in connection with the assaults, for which he was acquitted. On the other hand, the judge emphasized the aggravating circumstances that he has taken advantage of vulnerable women who, due to their age and deep grief, were unable to speak out.
Vulgar messages: 'You make me so horny'
Also the second witness, an 83-year-old woman, experienced the violation immediately after her husband died in January this year. She explains that the home helper was in her home immediately afterwards, where he had let himself in. She had just taken a shower when he started groping her naked body.
In her case, it only happened once. Although she was also 'completely out of it' in the situation, she still reported the case. The man was shortly afterwards expelled from home care while the investigations were ongoing.
- It's not normal, if you want to have sex, that you choose the old ladies. I know we look good, but that's what the perverse, the cunning is. He knew very well that I was completely out of it, she said.
Was there to help
The 55-year-old himself explained that he had never made sexual approaches to the two women, but that he visited them to help in their vulnerable situation.
-  When the citizen passes away, we (ed. home care) are no longer there. But I am an advocate that we also pick up the next of kin. Because who will be there for these people? Actually, maybe something professional is needed, but if a conversation with me can do that, that's good too, he said.
At the same time, he explained that he was not in love with any of the women and that, on the contrary, they were 'diametrically opposed to his type'.
The judge nevertheless ended up dismissing the man's explanation as unreliable, calling it 'imaginative' that the man would break into their home to help them in their grief.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Group Leader: Was previously warned
The group manager of the home care also took part as a witness in the trial against the 55-year-old man. Here she explained that the home care became aware of the abuse through a center nurse who had spoken to the 83-year-old female citizen.
The group leader then calls the 55-year-old man to a service interview to hear him about the situation.
- I asked if he could nod in recognition of what the woman had described. He explained that he only remembered a single episode where he should have put his hand on the citizen because he wanted to comfort her, said the group leader during the testimony.
But while the investigation of the case was ongoing, the man was nevertheless released from duty in January 2022. Because via the home care's digital key system, they were able to quickly determine that the man broke into the women without having an errand.
- We could register when he had used the key log and compare it with whether he had an errand at the place in question, at the time in question, explained the group member.
It wasn't until half a year after the man had been dismissed that the other woman came forward. For her, the harassment managed to extend over a period of about a year.
Inappropriate messages to students
The group leader could also see in his systems that the man had previously received a warning from the same workplace for having written inappropriate messages to a student during training.
- I saw that there was a written warning from 2020, where he had written to one of our students that he was beautiful and lovely, she said.
During the trial, the prosecution was also able to reveal that the man has also previously been fined for defamation after he had sent a picture of his member to a female acquaintance.
It is, among other things, also in light of the man's previous offences, that the judge assessed that it was very likely that the man would offend again. Therefore, in addition to his sentence of eight months in prison, he was also deprived of the right to engage in similar work.

title: Engell: Mordet på Barbara
subtitle: Hans Engell, Ekstra Bladets politiske kommentator, går tæt på valgkampens vindere og tabere
body:
DANMARK ER INGEN
bananrepublik, politikere og topembedsmænd skyder ikke hinanden. Forsøg på karaktermord foregår på en mere raffineret måde.
SOM EKSEMPELVIS
i den nye bog, som den tidligere chef for efterretningstjenesterne og departementschef i Forsvarsministeriet, Lars Findsen, sendte på gaden i sidste uge. Den udløste en mindre politisk storm og i embedsværket var man heller ikke i tvivl: Findsen kæmper med næb og klør for at vride sig ud af den straffesag, han er viklet ind i og som muligvis ender med, han skal endnu en tur i spjældet for brud på sin syvdobbelte tavshedspligt som topembedsmand. Han er tiltalt for straffelovens sjældne og tunge paragraffer.
HVAD SAGEN ENDER MED
, ved vi ikke. Men bogudgivelsen viser i hvert fald, Findsen er klar til at kæmpe med alle midler og hans angreb føres på flere fronter. Han er klog nok til ikke at komme med oplysninger, som kan nedkalde nye tiltaler for brud på tavshedspligt. Baggrunden for den konkrete straffesag, som det hele handler om, skriver han sig stort set udenom. Til gengæld er der guf på andre hylder. Det er nemlig tilladt at bryde alle normale spilleregler i omgangen med citater og beskrivelse af ministre og embedsmænd, som ingen kan kontrollere korrektheden af. Findsen er eneste kilde. Hans bog er et partsindlæg, som en domstol næppe kan bruge til noget.
VI ANER IKKE
, om hans tidligere chef, forsvarsminister Trine Bramsen i en aflyttet samtale beskrives som ’dum som en dør’ lige så lidt, som vi kan kontrollere alle de andre anekdoter og underholdende verbalslagsmål med andre embedsmænd, han disker op med.
Men Findsens strategi med bogen er nu gennemskuelig nok: Han vil prøve at gøre sin egen straffesag til en meget stor, principiel sag, der handler om hele den måde efterretningstjenesterne fungerer på i dag. Er de kommet under for meget politisk kontrol og styring? Spændende debat. Har bare ikke en brik med hans straffesag at gøre.
FINDSEN HAR ET UALMINDELIGT
skarpt øje til Statsministeriets magtfulde departementschef, Barbara Bertelsen, som entydigt er fortællingens skurk. Hun er hovedmålet for hans forsøg på karaktermord. Hun bestemmer alt. Slotsholmens diktator. Han beretter om deres sammenstød ved forskellige møder og hendes faste greb om embedsværket. Alt sammen meget sjovt, men som heller ikke har noget med straffesagen at gøre, selv om han på en måde får det sagt som om hans sag har været styret fra Statsministeriet. Underforstået: Gamle kontroverser med Barbara Bertelsen har muligvis spillet en afgørende rolle for at den pæne spionchef helt overgearet havnede i en varetægtscelle.
GOD KONSPIRATIONSTEORI
, men regeringens sikkerhedsudvalg består altså af en håndfuld centrale ministre og embedsmænd og Statsministeriets departementschef repræsenterer altså ikke anklagemyndigheden. Så medmindre Findsen mener, hele systemet er sammenspist, underkuet eller korrupt giver hans halve anklager og antydninger ikke megen mening.
MAN KAN NATURLIGVIS
spørge, om de to topembedsmænd har haft en karriere, der kolliderede. Hvor de begge styrede efter toppen og Findsen på et tidspunkt blev overhalet af Barbara Bertelsen. Det tyder intet på. Taler man med centrale kilder i centraladministrationen siger de, Lars Findsen aldrig har tilhørt A-kæden. Han har altid været på B-holdet, mens Barbara Bertelsen fra starten var i A-kæden. For nu at blive i ministeriel-sladderen, så fik Findsen allerede i tiden som departementschef i Forsvarsministeriet tilnavnet ’TITO’. Ikke efter den jugoslaviske marskal, men fordi han mødte på arbejde klokken TI og forlod ministeriet klokken TO. Jeg kan ikke bekræfte, om påstanden er korrekt, men den er vedholdende. Findsen var ikke typen, der sad midt om natten på sin PC og fandt en ukendt viruspandemi i Kina, som Barbara Bertelsen ...
UNDER ALLE OMSTÆNDIGHEDER
har Findsens bog kaldt politikere på banen, som straks forlanger en ny dommerundersøgelse. Blandt de klogere fastslog Lars Løkke dog, at en mulig undersøgelse først bør nedsættes efter straffesagen er slut.
Spændende var Findsens reaktion, da han i programmet ’Lippert’ på TV2 News blev konfronteret med dette. At der formentlig kom en undersøgelse, men efter hans straffesag. Det syntes Findsen ikke var nogen god ide. Han mener sagtens de to sager kan køre sideløbende. Muligvis ikke ulovligt, men i realiteten helt absurd.
NU ER DER VALGKAMP,
og så kan intet besluttes. Jeg kan ikke forstille mig en regering efter valget bare nedsætter en dommerundersøgelse på et tidspunkt, hvor straffesagen mod Findsen ikke er afsluttet. Hvad er det for resten, der skal undersøges? Hvad lyder anklagen mod Bertelsen og regeringen på og efterretningstjenesterne? Altså udover Findsens egen anekdotesamling. Glemmer man, at alt omkring lovligheden allerede er undersøgt af tre landsdommere, som sagde god for det hele.
DET ER SMART
af Lars Findsen at kaste en bombe midt i en valgkamp og på randen af straffesagen mod ham selv.
Måske også lige et nummer for smart.
Engell: Ikke oplevet noget lignende
Engell: Dette tal præger valgkampen
Engell: Sådan bliver Løkke statsminister
body_en:
DENMARK IS NOBODY
banana republic, politicians and top officials don't shoot each other. Attempted character assassination takes place in a more refined way.
AS EXAMPLE
in the new book that the former head of the intelligence services and head of department in the Ministry of Defence, Lars Findsen, sent to the streets last week. It triggered a minor political storm and there was no doubt in the civil service either: Findsen is fighting tooth and nail to wriggle out of the criminal case he is embroiled in and which may end up with him having to go through the cracks again. breach of his sevenfold duty of confidentiality as a top official. He is charged with the rare and heavy sections of the penal code.
WHAT THE CASE ENDS WITH
, we don't know. But the book publication at least shows that Findsen is ready to fight with all means and his attack is conducted on several fronts. He is smart enough not to provide information that could lead to new charges for breach of confidentiality. He largely ignores the background to the concrete criminal case, which it is all about. On the other hand, other shelves are empty. It is indeed permissible to break all normal rules of the game when dealing with quotes and descriptions of ministers and officials, the correctness of which no one can check. The find is the only source. His book is a party submission that a court can hardly use for anything.
WE HAVE NO IDEA
, about his former boss, Minister of Defense Trine Bramsen in a wiretapped conversation being described as 'stupid as a door' as little as we can control all the other anecdotes and entertaining verbal fights with other officials he dishes out.
But Findsen's strategy with the book is now clear enough: He will try to turn his own criminal case into a very large, principled case that is about the entire way the intelligence services work today. Have they come under too much political control and management? Interesting debate. Just has nothing to do with his criminal case.
THE FIND HAS AN UNUSUAL
sharp eye for the Prime Minister's powerful head of department, Barbara Bertelsen, who is clearly the villain of the story. She is the main target of his attempted character assassination. She decides everything. Slotsholmen's dictator. He recounts their clashes at various meetings and her firm grip on the civil service. All very funny, but which also has nothing to do with the criminal case, although in a way he is told as if his case has been managed from the Prime Minister's Office. Implied: Old controversies with Barbara Bertelsen may have played a decisive role in the fact that the handsome spy chief ended up in a custody cell in overdrive.
GOOD CONSPIRACY THEORY
, but the government's security committee therefore consists of a handful of central ministers and civil servants and the Prime Minister's department head does not represent the prosecution. So unless Findsen believes the entire system is colluded, subjugated or corrupt, his half-accusations and insinuations don't make much sense.
OF COURSE YOU CAN
ask whether the two top officials have had careers that collided. Where they both steered for the top and Findsen was at one point overtaken by Barbara Bertelsen. There is no indication of that. If you talk to central sources in the central administration, they say Lars Findsen has never belonged to the A chain. He has always been on the B team, while Barbara Bertelsen was from the start in the A chain. To stay in the ministerial gossip, Findsen was already nicknamed 'TITO' during his time as head of department in the Ministry of Defence. Not because of the Yugoslav Marshal, but because he arrived at work at TEN and left the Ministry at TWO. I can't confirm if the claim is correct, but it is persistent. Findsen was not the type who sat in the middle of the night on his PC and found an unknown virus pandemic in China, as Barbara Bertelsen ...
IN ALL CIRCUMSTANCES
Findsen's book has called politicians to the fore, who are immediately demanding a new judicial investigation. Among the wiser, Lars Løkke determined, however, that a possible investigation should only be launched after the criminal case is over.
Findsen's reaction was interesting when he was confronted with this in the program 'Lippert' on TV2 News. That there would probably be an investigation, but after his criminal case. Findsen didn't think that was a good idea. He believes that the two cases can run parallel to each other. Possibly not illegal, but in reality completely absurd.
NOW THERE IS AN ELECTION CAMPAIGN,
and then nothing can be decided. I cannot imagine a government after the election simply setting up a judicial inquiry at a time when the criminal case against Findsen has not been concluded. What is the rest that needs to be investigated? What is the accusation against Bertelsen and the government and the intelligence services? That is, in addition to Findsen's own collection of anecdotes. You forget that everything about the legality has already been examined by three national judges, who said yes to everything.
IT IS SMART
of Lars Findsen throwing a bomb in the middle of an election campaign and on the verge of criminal proceedings against himself.
Perhaps also just a number too smart.
Engell: Never experienced anything similar
Engell: This figure characterizes the election campaign
Engell: This is how Løkke becomes prime minister

title: Overlægen Anna: Nøgenfotos gjorde mit sexliv bedre
subtitle: At få taget nøgenfotos har ændret 49-årige Annas syn på sig selv - nu kan hun give sig 100 procent hen under sex
body:
- I forhold til tidligere nyder jeg i dag at få taget billeder - og også at tage fotos af mig selv. Både med og uden tøj på.
Sådan fortæller 49-årige Anna. Hun bor i Midtjylland og arbejder som overlæge. Hun erkender dog også en særlig tilgang til billederne:
- Primært fokuserer jeg på det, der er smukt. At det for eksempel også kan være pænt og attraktivt med brede hofter og fyldig numse, smal talje og lille barm.
-Timeglasformet bliver jeg aldrig, men hellere sætte pris på de ting ved kroppen, jeg er glad for - som min lille barm, jeg tidligere var ked af. Det er jeg ikke længere.
- I dag er jeg virkelig glad og tilfreds med mine bryster. Som en af de få kvinder - i min alder og efter tre graviditeter - har jeg ikke fået hængebryster. Og brysterne er i min optik om noget medvirkende til at fremhæve en flot figur.
- Netop brysterne er også den del af kroppen, jeg i dag får allerflest komplimenter for, fortæller den midtjyske overlæge.
I en række artikler på Ekstra Bladet+ har Anna fortalt om sit nye og eksperimenterende sexliv, der involverer både mænd, kvinder og par.
- Fra den første sex-artikel om mig blev bragt, har jeg været positivt overrasket over, hvor pæne billederne af mig er. Jeg troede faktisk, at nogle af dem var redigeret. Disse fotos har klart bidraget til at gøre mig en del mere glad for min krop.
- Sex er for mig - af samme årsag - blevet løftet til et helt nyt niveau. For nu kan jeg give mig fuldstændig hen. Jeg synes, jeg er smuk, som jeg er, og bruger ikke længere tid og kræfter på at tænke over, hvordan jeg tager mig ud under sexakten, fortæller Anna.
- For mig er det også positivt at dele de frække fotos med andre. Som den ekshibitionist, jeg nu engang er, så giver det stor bekræftelse, når jeg oplever, at andre tænder på mig.
- Når først jeg evner at tænde en mand eller en kvinde, så tænder det også mig - og så bliver det seksuelle bare så meget bedre.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Mobbet for sit udseende
Som barn blev Anna mobbet for sit udseende, og hun syntes aldrig selv, at hun var pæn.
- Dette negative syn på mig selv blev ændret, i takt med at jeg voksede op og blev voksen. Trækkene i ansigtet faldt mere på plads, og jeg var høj og slank og modtog pludselig positiv opmærksomhed fra både mænd og kvinder.
- Dog har det altid været svært for mig at købe tøj og sko, da jeg har en ikke så hyppig fysik og størrelse. Det kan desværre underbygge oplevelsen af, at ens krop er 'forkert'.
- Med årene har dette heldigvis også ændret sig. I dag er mange unge piger høje, så nu er det blevet nemmere for mig at finde passende tøj. Det er bare så dejligt, at der er plads til forskelligheder, pointerer Anna og fortsætter:
- Det er jo også der, vi skal hen; væk fra glansbilledet af de perfekte modeller, der via billedredigering ofte får forlænget deres ben og glattet huden helt ren. Samt lever et liv med personlig træner og stram diæt. Det er slet ikke noget at stræbe efter.
- Alligevel drømte jeg hele min ungdom om netop at blive model. For at kunne vise dem, der drillede, at jeg altså var pæn, fortæller den overlægen, der voksede op med, at nøgenhed er helt naturligt.
Så selv om hun - som pige og ung kvinde - i mange år havde det svært med sin krop, så har hun som voksen aldrig oplevet problemer med at være nøgen i selskab med en fast partner.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Forbillede for døtre
Som småbørnsmor oplevede Anna, at hun gradvist fik et mere anstrengt syn på egen krop.
- Man er træt, trøstespiser og får heller ikke bevæget sig ordentligt, og så er kroppen bare ikke sig selv efter to graviditeter. Så selv om det var dejligt at blive mor, så havde det fysiske omkostninger.
- Men da jeg blev skilt, ændrede det hele sig. Jeg ville nemlig kunne smide tøjet med stolthed, når jeg igen fik lyst til at date, fortæller Anna, der oplevede, at hun på det tidspunkt havde et behov for at få styrket selvtilliden og selvværdet.
- Jeg husker for eksempel stadig, da min daværende mand gav mig frækt undertøj til en jul, hvor jeg syv måneder tidligere havde født barn nummer to. Undertøjet var selvfølgelig for småt, og jeg følte det som en hån. Jeg kunne jo slet ikke lide min krop og havde absolut ingen lyst til sex.
- I dag kan jeg godt se, at han faktisk bare ville opmuntre mig og give mig et kompliment.
At hvile i sig selv
Når Anna i dag ser sig i spejlet - eller på billeder af sig selv - er hun godt tilfreds med det, hun ser. Ja, måske i virkeligheden mere tilfreds end nogensinde.
- Der er intet galt med for eksempel at træne og tabe sig lidt. Men det er først, når man begynder at hvile i, hvordan man nu engang tager sig ud, at man for alvor begynder at blive glad for sig selv.
- Og samtidig får man en mere positiv udstråling, der i sig selv gør én smukkere i både egne og andres øjne, pointerer Anna, der arbejder på at give denne indstilling videre til sine døtre.
