body_en:
- Compared to before, today I enjoy having photos taken - and also taking photos of myself. Both with and without clothes on.
This is how 49-year-old Anna tells. She lives in Central Jutland and works as a senior physician. However, she also recognizes a special approach to the images:
- I primarily focus on what is beautiful. That, for example, it can also be nice and attractive with wide hips and a full butt, narrow waist and small bust.
-I will never be hourglass-shaped, but rather appreciate the things about my body that I am happy with - like my small breasts, which I was previously sad about. I am no longer.
- Today I am really happy and satisfied with my breasts. As one of the few women - at my age and after three pregnancies - I have not had sagging breasts. And the breasts are, in my view, somewhat instrumental in highlighting a beautiful figure.
- Precisely the breasts are also the part of the body that I get the most compliments on today, says the chief physician in Central Jutland.
In a series of articles on Ekstra Bladet+, Anna has told about her new and experimental sex life, which involves both men, women and couples.
- Since the first sex article about me was published, I have been pleasantly surprised by how nice the pictures of me are. I actually thought some of them were edited. These photos have clearly contributed to making me a lot happier with my body.
- For me - for the same reason - sex has been raised to a whole new level. Because now I can give myself completely. I think I'm beautiful the way I am, and no longer spend time and effort thinking about how I look during sex, says Anna.
- For me, it is also positive to share the naughty photos with others. As the exhibitionist that I am, it gives great confirmation when I experience that others turn me on.
- Once I'm able to turn a man or a woman on, it turns me on too - and then the sex just gets that much better.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Bullied for his looks
As a child, Anna was bullied for her looks, and she never thought she was pretty herself.
- This negative view of myself changed as I grew up and became an adult. The facial features fell more into place and I was tall and slim and suddenly receiving positive attention from both men and women.
- However, it has always been difficult for me to buy clothes and shoes, as I have an unusual physique and size. Unfortunately, this can underpin the experience that one's body is 'wrong'.
- Fortunately, this has also changed over the years. Today, many young girls are tall, so now it has become easier for me to find suitable clothes. It's just so wonderful that there is room for differences, points out Anna and continues:
- That is also where we are going; away from the glossy image of the perfect models who, via image editing, often have their legs lengthened and their skin completely smoothed. As well as living a life with a personal trainer and strict diet. It's not something to strive for at all.
- Still, all my youth I dreamed of becoming a model. In order to show those who teased me that I was nice, the head doctor, who grew up with it, tells me that nudity is completely natural.
So even though she - as a girl and young woman - had a hard time with her body for many years, as an adult she has never experienced problems with being naked in the company of a permanent partner.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Role model for daughters
As a mother of young children, Anna experienced that she gradually had a more strained view of her own body.
- You are tired, you eat comfort food and you don't get to move properly either, and then the body just isn't itself after two pregnancies. So although it was great to be a mother, it had physical costs.
- But when I got divorced, everything changed. I wanted to be able to throw away the clothes with pride when I wanted to date again, says Anna, who experienced that at that time she had a need to strengthen her self-confidence and self-esteem.
- I still remember, for example, when my then-husband gave me cheeky underwear for a Christmas when I had given birth to child number two seven months earlier. The underwear was of course too small and I felt it was a mockery. After all, I didn't like my body at all and had absolutely no desire for sex.
- Today I can see that he actually just wanted to encourage me and give me a compliment.
To rest in oneself
When Anna looks in the mirror today - or at pictures of herself - she is quite satisfied with what she sees. Yes, perhaps in fact more satisfied than ever.
- There is nothing wrong with, for example, training and losing a little weight. But it is only when you start to rest in how you carry yourself that you really start to be happy with yourself.
- And at the same time you get a more positive radiance, which in itself makes you more beautiful both in your own eyes and in the eyes of others, points out Anna, who is working to pass this attitude on to her daughters.

title: Sådan kan Putins atomvåben ramme Danmark
subtitle: Der er flere scenarier for, hvad der vil ske, hvis russiske atombomber rammer ukrainsk jord - og alle vil få konsekvenser for Danmark
body:
Trusler og snak om atomvåben er efterhånden dagligdags kost, og hele verden holder vejret og håber, at de skrækindjagende våben bliver bag lås og slå trods stadig mere skingre trusler fra Rusland.
- Dommedagsuret har aldrig været så tæt på midnat som nu, siger Rasmus Dahlberg, lektor ved Institut for Strategi og Krigsstudier, med henvisning til fænomenet Doomsday Clock, hvor forskere har vurderet atomtruslen siden 50'erne.
Selvom ukrainerne bør være dem, der er mest nervøse for, om kernevåbnene tages i brug, kan det hurtigt også få alvorlige konsekvenser for flere lande i Europa, deriblandt Danmark, hvis situationen eskalerer.
- Vi kan opstille tre forskellige scenarier, når det kommer til atomvåben. Det første er, at Rusland vil bruge taktiske atomvåben. Det er små sprænghoveder, der bruges på slagmarken. Det vil være ensidig brug, da Ukraine jo ikke besidder atomvåben, siger Rasmus Dahlberg.
Selvom det scenarie selvsagt får voldsomme konsekvenser for både militær og civile i det område, hvor sprænghovederne detoneres, og områder vil skulle evakueres og renses, vil det som udgangspunkt ikke påvirke os i Danmark.
- Vi kan sammenligne det med atomulykken i Tjernobyl. Der vil være områder, der skal afspærres og renses, og hvor afgrøder ikke vil kunne dyrkes. Og så vil vi formentlig se en flygtningestrøm, som kan påvirke os.
Bekymringen over den brug af atomvåben går primært på, at det vil afstedkomme et modsvar fra Nato og Vesten. Flere vestlige statsledere har understreget, at brug af atomvåben fra russisk side vil resultere i 'hårde og kontante modsvar' uden dog at komme nærmere, hvad man konkret vil besvare bomberne med.
Atombomber mod storbyer
- Scenarie to vil være, at Rusland anvender et strategisk kernevåben mod en by som f.eks. Kiev for at tvinge en ukrainsk overgivelse igennem. Her er vi oppe i en helt anden skala, og afhængigt af størrelsen på bomben og placeringen vil det kunne mærkes i lande uden for Ukraine.
- Det vil nok ikke blive meget alvorligt for Danmark, men i lande som Polen og Tyskland vil man skulle tage strålingsfaren alvorligt. Når man smider en atombombe i en by, er der rigtig meget porøst materiale, som hvirvles op i luften, og som kan bære atompartiklerne meget langt, siger Rasmus Dahlberg.
Også ved dette scenarie vil millioner af mennesker flygte op igennem Europa for at komme væk fra faren og rædslerne, og det vil i høj grad kunne påvirke Danmark og resten af Europa.
Natos atomdilemma
Og som om den tanke ikke er skræmmende nok, vil en sådan handling fra russisk side muligvis kunne eskalere situationen til scenarie tre: en tredje verdenskrig!
- Nato vil ikke kunne sidde en egentlig atombombe overhørig. Der vil man sidde i det dilemma, om man skal svare igen med atombomber - vel vidende, at det vil kunne udslette hele planeten, siger lektoren, der understreger, at både Rusland og USA har mere end rigeligt med a-våben til at efterlade kloden som en sort og ubeboelig planet uden den mindste form for liv.
Ifølge Rasmus Dahlberg er vi i dag tættere på dommedag end nogensinde, fordi man under den kolde krig 'stod lige' - atommagt over for atommagt.
- Der har været en gensidig udslettelsesdoktrin, hvor begge parter har vidst, at tyer man til atomvåben, vil man også udslette sig selv.
- Situationen her er anderledes, fordi Rusland er i krig med et ikke-Nato-land. Bruger de atomvåben, vil det i første omgang være ensidigt, og der vil ikke blive gengældt med atomvåben fra Ukraine. Spørgsmålet er, hvornår det holder op med at være ensidig brug. På et tidspunkt vil Vesten sige, her går grænsen, forklarer han.
Hvor den grænse sættes er Natos store dilemma.
- Man må formode, at den skal findes et sted midt imellem brugen af atomare sprænghoveder på slagmarken og atomvåben mod store byer i Ukraine. Der er jo en rød linje - også moralsk - som ikke kan overskrides uden konsekvenser, siger Rasmus Dahlberg.
Atombomber over Danmark
Selvom militærforskeren understreger, at det ikke er hans ekspertiseområde, tør han godt at sige, at en egentlig atombombe over Danmark er meget usandsynlig.
Kun i den værste udgave af scenarie tre kan han forestille sig brug af atombomber mod Danmark. I den situation skal man ikke ile afsted efter det nærmeste sikringsrum. I stedet bør man søge indendørs og vente på udmeldinger fra myndighederne, lyder rådet.
- De fleste beskyttelsesrum i Danmark er 'leftovers' fra den kolde krig. De fleste bygget i 50'erne, og de er ikke lavet til at modstå atombomber. I det tilfælde, at der smides bomber i nærheden af os, vil der komme beredskabsmeddelelser fra myndighederne om, at man skal bliv inden døre, lukke vinduer og døre og slukke for sin aircondition.
- Man vil gerne undgå at evakuere i den situation, fordi man så vil få mange mennesker løbende rundt ude på gaden. Atompartikler føres med vinden og andre partikler rundt, men de bliver liggende der, hvor de lander, forklarer han.
Når alt det er nævnt, mener Rasmus Dahlberg, at atomtruslen lige nu er noget mindre end risikoen for cyberangreb på vores kritiske infrastruktur som el- og vandforsyning.
- Jeg plejer at sige, at vi har mere brug for firewalls end for betonvægge.
Ender virkeligheden med at overgå vores værste frygt, og Nato og Rusland bomber hinanden med kernevåben i en atomverdenskrig, vil det i yderste konsekvens betyde enden for menneskeheden og stort set alt andet liv på jorden.
Et stort antal atomsprængninger med de største af de a-våben, som både USA og Rusland ligger inde med, vil hurtigt føre til såkaldt atomvinter, hvor de enorme mængder aske og andre partikler, der slynges op ved de gigantiske eksplosioner, vil skygge for solen i en grad, der vil sænke temperaturen på jorden med ti grader eller mere. Det vil resultere i mørke og kulde, der gør det umuligt at dyrke jorden, og sult vil tage livet af langt de fleste skabninger, der ikke er døde under angrebene. Læs mere om, hvordan verden vil gå under, hvis en tredje verdenskrig bryder ud, her:
Mørke, kulde og milliarder af døde: Her er konsekvenserne af en atomkrig
Fik du også læst?
Kom helt tæt på Putins uovervindelige missil
Putins atomknap: Kun de kan stoppe ham
Det skal du gøre, når sirenen lyder i Danmark
Dagen ingen taler om: Højeste dødstal nogensinde
body_en:
Threats and talk about nuclear weapons are now daily food, and the whole world is holding its breath and hoping that the terrifying weapons will be locked up despite increasingly shrill threats from Russia.
- The doomsday clock has never been as close to midnight as now, says Rasmus Dahlberg, associate professor at the Department of Strategy and War Studies, referring to the Doomsday Clock phenomenon, where researchers have assessed the nuclear threat since the 50s.
Although the Ukrainians should be the ones who are most nervous about whether the nuclear weapons will be used, it could quickly also have serious consequences for several countries in Europe, including Denmark, if the situation escalates.
- We can set up three different scenarios when it comes to nuclear weapons. The first is that Russia will use tactical nuclear weapons. These are small warheads that are used on the battlefield. It will be unilateral use, as Ukraine does not possess nuclear weapons, says Rasmus Dahlberg.
Although that scenario will obviously have severe consequences for both the military and civilians in the area where the warheads are detonated, and areas will have to be evacuated and cleaned, it will basically not affect us in Denmark.
- We can compare it to the nuclear accident in Chernobyl. There will be areas that need to be cordoned off and cleaned, and where crops will not be able to be grown. And then we will probably see a flow of refugees which can affect us.
The concern over the use of nuclear weapons is primarily that it will trigger a counter-response from NATO and the West. Several Western heads of state have emphasized that the use of nuclear weapons by Russia will result in 'harsh and direct responses', without, however, getting closer to what they will concretely respond to the bombs with.
Atomic bombs against big cities
- Scenario two will be that Russia uses a strategic nuclear weapon against a city such as Kiev to force a Ukrainian surrender. Here we are on a completely different scale, and depending on the size of the bomb and the location, it will be felt in countries outside of Ukraine.
- It probably won't be very serious for Denmark, but in countries like Poland and Germany you will have to take the radiation danger seriously. When you drop an atomic bomb in a city, there is a lot of porous material that is swirled up into the air and that can carry the atomic particles very far, says Rasmus Dahlberg.
Also in this scenario, millions of people will flee up through Europe to get away from the danger and the horrors, and this will greatly affect Denmark and the rest of Europe.
NATO's nuclear dilemma
And as if that thought isn't scary enough, such an action by Russia could possibly escalate the situation to scenario three: a third world war!
- NATO will not be able to sit on an actual atomic bomb. There you will sit in the dilemma of whether to respond again with nuclear bombs - knowing that it will be able to wipe out the entire planet, says the associate professor, who emphasizes that both Russia and the USA have more than enough nuclear weapons to leave the globe as a black and uninhabitable planet without the slightest form of life.
According to Rasmus Dahlberg, today we are closer to doomsday than ever, because during the Cold War 'we stood equal' - nuclear power against nuclear power.
- There has been a doctrine of mutual annihilation, where both parties have known that if you resort to nuclear weapons, you will also annihilate yourself.
- The situation here is different because Russia is at war with a non-NATO country. If they use nuclear weapons, it will initially be unilateral, and there will be no retaliation with nuclear weapons from Ukraine. The question is when it stops being one-sided use. At some point the West will say, this is the limit, he explains.
Where that limit is set is NATO's big dilemma.
- One must assume that it must be found somewhere between the use of nuclear warheads on the battlefield and nuclear weapons against large cities in Ukraine. After all, there is a red line - also moral - which cannot be crossed without consequences, says Rasmus Dahlberg.
Atomic bombs over Denmark
Although the military researcher emphasizes that it is not his area of ​​expertise, he dares to say that an actual atomic bomb over Denmark is very unlikely.
Only in the worst version of scenario three can he imagine using atomic bombs against Denmark. In that situation, you should not rush off to the nearest security room. Instead, you should search indoors and wait for announcements from the authorities, says the council.
- Most shelters in Denmark are 'leftovers' from the Cold War. Most built in the 50s and they are not made to withstand nuclear bombs. In the event that bombs are thrown near us, there will be emergency messages from the authorities telling you to stay indoors, close windows and doors and turn off your air conditioning.
- You want to avoid evacuating in that situation, because then you will have many people running around in the street. Atomic particles are carried around by the wind and other particles, but they stay where they land, he explains.
When all that has been mentioned, Rasmus Dahlberg believes that the nuclear threat is currently somewhat less than the risk of cyber attacks on our critical infrastructure such as electricity and water supply.
- I usually say that we need firewalls more than concrete walls.
If reality ends up surpassing our worst fears, and Nato and Russia bomb each other with nuclear weapons in a nuclear world war, it will ultimately mean the end of humanity and virtually all other life on earth.
A large number of nuclear explosions with the largest of the nuclear weapons that both the USA and Russia possess will quickly lead to a so-called nuclear winter, where the enormous amounts of ash and other particles thrown up by the giant explosions will shade the sun to a degree that will lower the temperature of the earth by ten degrees or more. It will result in darkness and cold that make it impossible to cultivate the land, and starvation will kill the vast majority of creatures that did not die during the attacks. Read more about how the world will end if a third world war breaks out here:
Darkness, cold and billions of dead: Here are the consequences of a nuclear war
Did you read too?
Get up close and personal with Putin's invincible missile
Putin's nuclear button: Only they can stop him
You must do that when the siren sounds in Denmark
The day nobody talks about: Highest death toll ever

 'Ukraine' 'ukrainerne' 'USA' 'Vesten']

title: Anni fylder 50: - Jeg kan lide hvad jeg ser
subtitle: Anni Fønsby runder det skarpe hjørne. Overgangsalderen har sneget sig ind på hende, men Fønsby nægter at føle sig gammel og knokler for at holde sin krop ung. Se de eksklusive billeder her
body:
black
Dåbsattesten lyver ikke. Anni Fønsby fylder 50 år.
For fødselaren er alder bare et tal. Det, der betyder noget, er, hvordan hun har det inde i – og der er hun langt fra et halvt hundrede år, fortæller hun med et smil i et eksklusivt interview med Ekstra Bladet.
- Når jeg ser mig i spejlet, så ser jeg en på 35 år, og jeg pjatter stadig, som da jeg var 25. Men mit cpr-nummer lyver ikke. Jeg er 50 år, men jeg føler mig meget ung i mit sind. Jeg kommer aldrig til at bruge den der med at være for gammel til noget. Man er ikke ældre, end man gør sig selv, siger Anni Fønsby.
fullwidth
black
At hun ikke er 35 år mere, kan - og vil - hun ikke skjule for sig selv. For seks måneder siden kom overgangsalderen pludselig snigende hos Anni Fønsby, og det kan mærkes.
- Det gik op for mig, at jeg var kommet i overgangsalderen, da min mand en dag sagde til mig, at han havde fået ny kone. Den ene dag kan jeg være supersensitiv og få tårer i øjnene over det mindste - den næste er jeg ved at bide hovedet af ham. De der humørsvingninger var noget af det første, der ramte mig. Og så nætterne ... de er varme, siger Anni Fønsby.
fullwidth
black
Siden hun mødte sin mand, René, har de to ligget tæt om natten. Det er slut – i hvert for en stund.
- Vi plejer at ligge i futtog. Jeg ligger i midten, så ligger min mand i ske bag mig, og vores to hunde ligger foran mig under dynen. Det kan jeg slet ikke nu, hvor jeg er i overgangsalderen. Det er passé. Jeg er badet i sved, så det er hverken rart for min mand eller mig, siger hun og fortsætter.
- Så må vi finde andre metoder, og jeg er heldigvis ikke ramt på det seksuelle plan. Man hører jo, at kvinder kan miste lysten og tørrer ind som en rosin, men det er ikke tilfældet for mig. Heldigvis, siger hun.
black
black
Det er ikke kun om natten, Anni Fønsby har sit eget varmeværk, der nogle gange overopheder.
- Efter jeg har været i bad om morgenen, går der kun en halv time, så har jeg svedringe under armene, siger Anni Fønsby og fortæller, at hun har anskaffet sig en roll on-deodorant, der blokerer for svedkirtlerne og mindsker problemet.
- Det er for så vidt godt nok, og den virker, men det er, som om sveden skal ud et andet sted, og det er så på overlæben. Der får jeg svedperler, som jeg jævnligt må duppe væk.
fullwidth
black
Anni Fønsby har læst og googlet en masse om overgangsalderen, og hun føler, at hun er godt klædt på til at håndtere den tilstand, hendes krop er i.  For tre uger siden valgte hun alligevel at tage en tur forbi sin læge for at se, om der kunne gøres noget for at afhjælpe nogle af generne.
- Jeg har fået noget østrogentilskud, men jeg synes, at det er for tidligt at sige, om det virker. Men jeg føler mig lidt som en teenager, der skal lære min krop at kende igen, siger hun.
fullwidth
black
Et sted, hvor Anni Fønsby også mærker overgangsalderen, er på figuren. I hvert fald hvis hun ikke passer på.
- Jeg elsker jo mad. Gerne god mad med sovs, kød og et godt glas vin. I årene fra jeg blev 40 til nu, er der nok røget et lille kilo på om året, og jeg skal jo bare kigge på en romkugle, så sætter den sig på sidebenene. Vi prøver at holde os til at hygge os i weekenden, og så spiser vi fornuftigt i hverdagene, siger Anni Fønsby, der også træner regelmæssigt.
- Jeg træner to gange om ugen med min personlige træner. Det er godt, jeg har ham, så han kan holde mig til ilden. Når man har en aftale, er det svært ikke at møde op, ik?, siger hun.
black
black
Udover at træne hyppigt går Anni Fønsby også i cryo-sauna to gange om ugen i sin egen klinik, La Concordia, på Østerbro. De tre minutter i minus 140 grader øger forbrændingen og opstrammer huden, fortæller hun.
fullwidth
black
Timerne i fitnesscentret og minutterne i den isnende kulde bærer frugt, mener Anni Fønsby.
- Jeg kan lide, hvad jeg ser, når jeg ser mig i spejlet. Jeg føler mig tilpas i min krop og privilegeret over, at jeg er sund og rask. Jeg er stolt over, at jeg ser ud, som jeg gør, men jeg kan da godt se, at det hele søger lidt sydpå, siger Anni Fønsby, der derfor har overvejet, om hendes barm skal gøres mindre.
black
black
- Jeg skal ikke have ungpigebryster, men måske vil det være flot, hvis de blev lidt mindre og blev hævet lidt. Min mand er ikke enig. Han er meget tilfreds med, hvordan min barm er nu, så nu må vi se, griner hun.
fullwidth
black
Mens det for mange kvinder kan være tabubelagt at nå overgangsalderen, så er Anni Fønsby åben omkring det. Det er helt bevidst.
- For mig er det ikke et tabu at tale om overgangsalder. Det er jo noget, vi alle skal igennem. Man bliver frustreret indimellem, når man er i overgangsalderen, men sådan er det, siger hun fortsætter.
- Der er ikke rigtigt nogen af mine veninder, der taler om overgangsalderen, for det kan være svært at snakke om svedeture, manglende lyst, smerter under sex og hvad det ellers medfører. Men for mig er det vigtigt at gøre op med, at det er et tabu. Der skal fokus på det, og vi skal kunne tale åbent om det, for som jeg sagde før, så er det noget, alle kvinder skal igennem.
fullwidth
black
Anni Fønsby har til fulde accepteret, at hun er gået i overgangsalderen, og hun har besluttet at få det bedste ud af den epoke af livet.
- Er der også noget godt ved at være i overgangsalderen?
- Nej, det er der ikke. Det er som at spørge på et plejehjem, om det er sjovt at blive gammel. Så nej, der er ingen fordele, fastslår hun med et grin.
fullwidth
Fylder 50 år: Vigtigt for Fønsby at holde sig i god form
body_en:
black
The baptismal certificate does not lie. Anni Fønsby turns 50.
For the birthday boy, age is just a number. What matters is how she feels inside - and she is far from half a century old, she says with a smile in an exclusive interview with Ekstra Bladet.
- When I look in the mirror, I see a 35-year-old, and I still fool around like I did when I was 25. But my social security number doesn't lie. I am 50 years old, but I feel very young in my mind. I'm never going to use that about being too old for anything. You are not older than you make yourself out to be, says Anni Fønsby.
fullwidth
black
The fact that she is not 35 years old anymore, she cannot - and will not - hide from herself. Six months ago, menopause suddenly crept up on Anni Fønsby, and you can feel it.
- It dawned on me that I had reached menopause when my husband told me one day that he had got a new wife. One day I can be super sensitive and have tears in my eyes over the smallest thing - the next I'm about to bite his head off. Those mood swings were one of the first things that hit me. And then the nights ... they are warm, says Anni Fønsby.
fullwidth
black
Since she met her husband, René, the two have slept close at night. It's over - at least for a while.
- We tend to sleep in the train. I lie in the middle, then my husband lies in a spoon behind me, and our two dogs lie in front of me under the covers. I can't do that at all now that I'm in menopause. It is passé. I'm bathed in sweat, so it's not nice for my husband or me, she says and continues.
- Then we have to find other methods, and fortunately I am not affected on a sexual level. You hear that women can lose their lust and dry up like a raisin, but that's not the case for me. Fortunately, she says.
black
black
It's not just at night, Anni Fønsby has her own heating plant that sometimes overheats.
- After I have showered in the morning, it only takes half an hour before I have ringlets under my arms, says Anni Fønsby and says that she has acquired a roll-on deodorant that blocks the sweat glands and reduces the problem.
- So far, it's good enough and it works, but it's as if the sweat has to come out somewhere else, and it's on the upper lip. There I get beads of sweat, which I have to regularly dab away.
fullwidth
black
Anni Fønsby has read and googled a lot about the menopause, and she feels that she is well equipped to handle the state her body is in. Three weeks ago, she still decided to visit her doctor to see, whether anything could be done to alleviate some of the inconveniences.
- I have received some estrogen supplementation, but I think it is too early to say whether it is working. But I feel a bit like a teenager who needs to get to know my body again, she says.
fullwidth
black
One place where Anni Fønsby also feels the menopause is on the figure. At least if she's not careful.
- I love food. Preferably good food with sauce, meat and a good glass of wine. In the years from when I turned 40 to now, I've probably smoked a little kilo a year, and I just have to look at a rum ball and it sits on its side legs. We try to enjoy ourselves at the weekend, and then we eat sensibly during the weekdays, says Anni Fønsby, who also exercises regularly.
- I train twice a week with my personal trainer. It's good I have him so he can hold me to the fire. When you have an appointment, it's hard not to show up, right?, she says.
black
black
In addition to training frequently, Anni Fønsby also goes to the cryo-sauna twice a week in her own clinic, La Concordia, in Østerbro. The three minutes at minus 140 degrees increase the burn and tighten the skin, she says.
fullwidth
black
The hours in the gym and the minutes in the freezing cold bear fruit, Anni Fønsby believes.
- I like what I see when I look in the mirror. I feel comfortable in my body and privileged to be healthy. I'm proud that I look the way I do, but I can see that it's all looking a little south, says Anni Fønsby, who has therefore considered whether her breasts should be made smaller.
black
black
- I don't want to have teenage breasts, but maybe it would be nice if they were a little smaller and raised a little. My husband does not agree. He's very pleased with how my bosom is now, so now we'll have to see, she laughs.
fullwidth
black
While it can be taboo for many women to reach menopause, Anni Fønsby is open about it. It is completely conscious.
- For me, it is not a taboo to talk about menopause. It's something we all have to go through. You get frustrated occasionally when you're in menopause, but that's how it is, she continues.
- None of my friends really talk about the menopause, because it can be difficult to talk about sweats, lack of desire, pain during sex and what else it entails. But for me it is important to do away with the fact that it is a taboo. There needs to be a focus on it, and we need to be able to talk openly about it, because as I said before, it's something that all women have to go through.
fullwidth
black
Anni Fønsby has fully accepted that she has entered menopause, and she has decided to make the most of that period of life.
- Is there anything good about being in menopause?
- No, it's not there. It's like asking a nursing home if getting old is fun. So no, there are no advantages, she states with a laugh.
fullwidth
Turning 50: Important for Fønsby to stay in good shape

title: Prostatalægen: Sådan lever jeg selv
subtitle: Prostatakræft er den mest hyppige kræftsygdom for mænd over 50 år. En overlæge, der arbejder med netop denne sygdom, forsøger at leve så kræftforebyggende som muligt - blandt andet med ruggryn og vin
body:
Klinisk professor og overlæge i urinvejskirurgi Michael Borre starter dagen med ruggryn og mælk med en kærlig tanke til sin prostata. Prostatakræft er den kræftsygdom, som flest mænd over 50 år i Danmark får. Men der er stor forskel på hyppigheden i forskellige dele af verden.
- I Østen ser man næsten ikke prostatakræft. En af grundene er, at de spiser meget fisk og soja. Sidstnævnte nedbrydes i tarmen og påvirker tarmfloraen på en måde, der beskytter blandt andet mod prostatakræft. Herhjemme har vi en idé om, at fuldkorn og særligt rug virker på en lignende måde og danner plantestoffer i tyktarmen, som teoretisk set også beskytter, fortæller Michael Borre.
Animalsk fedt fra kød og mælk kan nemlig også bidrage negativt, når det kommer til at beskytte sig mod blandt andet prostatakræft. Kost er generelt et område, som Michael Borre prioriterer i sit liv. Og det er da også oplagt på hjemmefronten, hvor hans hustru netop er klinisk diætist og derfor går meget op i sund kost og diæt.
- Vi spiser varieret uden for meget fedt og kød fra firbenede dyr og sikrer os protein fra andre kilder. Det er uden løftede pegefingre, og vi spiser også rødt kød en gang imellem. Men vi ved jo, at det ikke er godt i forhold til blandt andet tarmkræft, så det bliver en del af livsstilen, siger Michael Borre.
Bevægelse til dagen og natten
For prostatalægen er fysisk sundhed en helt naturlig del af hans liv. Som ekspert i prostatakræft fokuserer han i sit private liv på at følge rådene om kræftforebyggelse, når det kommer til kosten. Derudover er det vigtigt for overlægen at holde sig slank og sund. Musklerne er nemlig også et vigtigt organ, når det kommer til at prøve at leve så kræftforebyggende som muligt.
- Når musklerne bruges, styrker det immunforsvaret, som er så vigtigt i forhold til kræft. Den nyeste kræftbehandling bruger for eksempel immunterapi for at kæmpe hårdt mod kræftcellerne, og her er det vigtigt med et stærkt immunforsvar, forklarer Michael Borre.
Fakta om prostatakræft
Han cykler ti kilometer hver vej til og fra arbejde, går lange ture og laver fysisk styrketræning hjemme. Motionen hjælper ham også ud på de sene timer.
- Jeg holder mig fysisk aktiv i dagens løb, og måske derfor sover jeg godt. Jeg er ovre den alder, hvor jeg har døgnvagter på kirurgisk afdeling. Nu er jeg heldigvis sikret min nattesøvn, siger Michael Borre.
Mere end bare kost og motion
Selvom Michael Borre er helt med på de officielle råd om kost og motion, går han ikke af vejen for et godt glas vin eller flere. Dog har han lagt sine dage med røg langt bag sig.
I forhold til den mentale ro og sundhed kan Michael Borre også se steder, hvor han måske kunne blive bedre.
- Jeg er for dårlig til at slappe af og lade op. Jeg arbejder alt for meget. Jeg arbejder i weekender og glemmer at holde ferie, så jeg er ikke en god rollemodel, når det kommer til det. Men jeg får ro i hovedet, når vi går lange ture i naturen.
Lægens bord: Sådan lever vi
body_en:
Clinical professor and chief physician in urinary tract surgery Michael Borre starts the day with rye groats and milk with a loving thought for his prostate. Prostate cancer is the cancer that most men over the age of 50 in Denmark get. But there is a big difference in the frequency in different parts of the world.
- In the East you hardly see prostate cancer. One of the reasons is that they eat a lot of fish and soy. The latter is broken down in the intestine and affects the intestinal flora in a way that protects against prostate cancer, among other things. At home, we have an idea that whole grains and especially rye work in a similar way and form plant substances in the colon, which theoretically also protect, says Michael Borre.
Animal fat from meat and milk can also contribute negatively when it comes to protecting against prostate cancer, among other things. Diet is generally an area that Michael Borre prioritizes in his life. And it is also obvious on the home front, where his wife is a clinical dietician and therefore pays a lot of attention to healthy food and diet.
- We eat a varied diet without too much fat and meat from four-legged animals and secure protein from other sources. It's without raised index fingers, and we also eat red meat once in a while. But we know that it is not good in relation to, among other things, bowel cancer, so it becomes part of the lifestyle, says Michael Borre.
Movement for day and night
For the prostate doctor, physical health is a completely natural part of his life. As an expert in prostate cancer, he focuses in his private life on following cancer prevention advice when it comes to diet. In addition, it is important for the head doctor to stay slim and healthy. The muscles are also an important organ when it comes to trying to live as cancer-preventing a life as possible.
- When the muscles are used, it strengthens the immune system, which is so important in relation to cancer. The latest cancer treatment, for example, uses immunotherapy to fight hard against the cancer cells, and here it is important to have a strong immune system, explains Michael Borre.
Facts about prostate cancer
He cycles ten kilometers each way to and from work, goes for long walks and does physical strength training at home. The exercise also helps him out in the late hours.
- I stay physically active during the day, and maybe that's why I sleep well. I am past the age where I have 24-hour shifts in the surgical ward. Now, fortunately, my night's sleep is secured, says Michael Borre.
More than just diet and exercise
Although Michael Borre is fully on board with the official advice on diet and exercise, he does not go out of his way for a good glass of wine or several. However, he has put his smoking days far behind him.
In relation to mental peace and health, Michael Borre can also see places where he could perhaps improve.
- I'm too sick to relax and recharge. I work way too much. I work weekends and forget to take vacations, so I'm not a good role model when it comes to that. But I get peace of mind when we go for long walks in nature.
The doctor's table: This is how we live

title: Markant Tour-omvæltning: En stor dansk gave i Paris
subtitle: En utraditionel indledning på næste års Tour de France i Pyrenæerne er en gave for de danske ryttere. Det mener Ekstra Bladets cykelsportsekspert, Michael Rasmussen, der peger på vindere og tabere efter tæppefaldet i Paris
body:
Torsdag var der tæppefald i Paris, da ruten til næste års Tour de France blev offentliggjort. Og profilen på verdens største cykelløb skuffede ingenlunde.
I hvert fald ikke Ekstra Bladets cykelsportsekspert, Michael Rasmussen, der gned sig i hænderne, da han kiggede etaperne igennem.
Står det til den tidligere stjerne, er der særdeles god grund til at håbe på tre topunderholdende uger i Frankrig, hvor Jonas Vingegaard meget vel kan gentage sidste års samlede triumf.
Den utraditionelle - og meget hårde - indledning på løbet i Pyrenæerene er tilmed en gave i forhold til chancerne for danske etapesejre på både kort og lang sigt.
Og hvorfor så det? Få svaret og find også ud af, hvem der må formodes at ærgre sig gevaldigt over den dugfriske rute, når Rasmussen her fremhæver de vigtige nøglepunkter, man skal være opmærksom på i Touren 2023.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Jubler Jonas?
Der er ingen tvivl om, at den nye rute på mange måder passer fremragende til Jonas Vingegaard. Han får i hvert fald massevis af kilometer opad til at ryste konkurrenterne gennem hele løbet.
- Der er alle muligheder, som Michael Rasmussen udtrykker chancerne for en gentagelse af sidste års samlede sejr.
Han hæfter sig - foruden opkørslerne - ved løbets enlige kamp mod uret, som er en særdeles kuperet af slagsen, der lægger op til markante tidsforskelle.
- Vingegaard kan ikke være utilfreds med den enkeltstart. Det er en udgave, hvor der i dén grad kan vindes tid. Den er modbydelig hård og slutter jo nærmest på en kategori 3-stigning. Der kan laves store tidsforskelle, selv om etapen kun er 22 kilometer.
Rutekortet efterlader dermed ingen undskyldninger for ikke at give forsvaret af Tour-titlen et skud, mener Rasmussen.
Han hører heller ikke til dem, der har lagt noget som helst i de opsigtsvækkende udtalelser fra Jumbo-Vismas sportsdirektør, Merijn Zeeman,
som i sidste uge såede et lille gram af tvivl
om Vingegaards deltagelse.
- Uanset hvad, Zeeman har sagt, har de aldrig nogensinde tænkt anderledes, end at Vingegaard skulle køre Touren. Som forsvarende vinder ville man jo aldrig vælge ikke at stille op. Det er først, når man har tabt i Touren, at man kan finde på at droppe det for at vinde noget andet, siger Rasmussen.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Ny dansk etapefest?
Dette års Tour de France var et dansk festfyrværkeri med hele fire etapesejre. Jonas Vingegaard (to triumfer), Mads Pedersen og Magnus Cort nåede alle at lade sig hylde for førstepladser, og derfor er forventningerne da også store til 2023-udgaven.
Offentliggørelsen af ruten har ikke gjort håbet om nye danske sejre mindre, påpeger Ekstra Bladets ekspert, der ser indledningen af løbet som en gave i rødt og hvidt. De kuperede etaper i Baskerlandet gør det svært få tunge sprintere at holde hjem, og det er rent guf for en type som Mads Pedersen.
- Når ruten er på den måde, er der nogle hold i feltet, som har interesse i at gøre det hårdt, fordi de allertungeste sprintere hurtigt kan sættes af. Mads Pedersen står med rigtig mange muligheder. Han synes, det er federe med sådan nogle etaper end dem, der er pandekageflade, siger Rasmussen.
Prognosen for succes er ikke kun god for Trek-stjernen, der i år sammenlagt sejrede på fire etaper i Touren og Vueltaen.
Også ryttertyper som Mikkel Honoré, Magnus Cort, Søren Kragh Andersen, Kasper Asgreen og Andreas Kron vil nyde godt af, at Grand Depart i 2023 finder sted nær Pyrenæerne. Bjergene kommer tidligt, og derfor vil klassementet også hurtigt tage form.
- Det er jo en fordel for dem, at der efter 6. etape vil være så stor tidsforskel, at de ikke ligger tæt på i klassementet. De er hurtigt ude af det samlede regnskab, og det kan åbne op for en masse godt cykelløb resten af Touren, lyder vurderingen fra Rasmussen.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Her bliver løbet afgjort
2023-ruten byder på flere spektakulære opstigninger. Ikke mindst på 9. etape, hvor feltet til sidst skal bestige Puy dé Dome. Turen op ad finalebjerget bliver efter alt at dømme et af flere nøglemomenter i næste års udgave.
- De sidste fire kilometer er latterligt stejle. Den stigning kommer til at dele favoritterne fra hinanden. Det er der ingen tvivl om siger Rasmussen.
Han peger desuden på enkeltstarten, når han sætter fire punktnedslag over de vigtigste etaper i næste års franske drama.
- Her vil afstanden blive målt i minutter, og det sker jo trods alt sjældent i bjergene, når det handler om de bedste ryttere.
Endeligt sætter eksperten et par krydser ved to store bjergslag i løbets sidste uge, der meget vel kommer til at afgøre kampen om den gule trøje.
- Den sidste bjergetape til Le Markstein er vanvittig interessant og enormt godt egnet til at lave angreb og få et hold til at gå helt i opløsning. Men det åbenlyse valg er 17. etape til Courchevel, der byder på opstigningen til Col de la Loze, fordi det isoleret set er det hårdeste bjerg, de skal over.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
De trak nitten
Mens bjergryttere vil slikke sig om munden ved udsigten til næste års Tour de France, er det givetvis en anden situation for verdens bedste sprintere. For det er et fåtal af de 21 etaper, der byder op til massespurt på stregen.
- Hvor meget er der lige for typer som Dylan Groenewegen (Jayco-BikeExgange), Arnaud Démare (Grouparma-FDJ) og Caleb Ewan (Lotto-Soudal), spørger Rasmussen retorisk.
- Det er ikke meget at komme efter, og der godt nok langt til Paris. For nogle af de ryttere kunne det godt være bedre at prøve Giro d'Italia i stedet for, pointerer han.
I klassement-afdelingen er der muligvis også en skuffet verdensmester, som sidder og fordøjer rutebeskrivelsen.
Det er i hvert fald overvejende sandsynligt, at Remco Evenepoel (QuickStep-Alpha Vinyl) kunne have draget mere nytte af en anderledes type tidskørsel og nogle knapt så markante stigningsprocenter på de afgørende bjergetaper.
- Han havde sikkert godt kunne tænke sig en 40 kilometer flad enkeltstart. Det er der, han ville have en fordel i forhold til Tadej Pogacar og Jonas Vingegaard. Og så er Evenepoel måske lidt bekymret over de stejle procenter, der er på stigningerne nogle steder som fx Col de la Loze. Det har typisk været i det terræn, at han er kommet i problemer, når han kører med de allerbedste, siger Rasmussen.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Vild med cykling? Der er meget mere her:
Mads P. tager vildt spring: - Det bliver et eventyr
Dansk stjernepar løfter sløret: Sådan er vores ægteskab
Husker du det dramatiske exit? Alt om Kyllingens Tour-kollaps
Hvordan er livet i den gule trøje? Få et unikt indblik her
body_en:
On Thursday, there was a blanket drop in Paris when the route for next year's Tour de France was announced. And the profile of the world's biggest cycling race did not disappoint.
At least not Ekstra Bladet's cycling expert, Michael Rasmussen, who rubbed his hands as he looked through the stages.
If it's up to the former star, there is very good reason to hope for three top-entertaining weeks in France, where Jonas Vingegaard can very well repeat last year's overall triumph.
The unconventional - and very tough - start to the race in the Pyrenees is also a gift in relation to the chances of Danish stage wins in both the short and long term.
And why then? Get the answer and also find out who is supposed to be very upset about the dewy route when Rasmussen here highlights the important key points to be aware of in the Tour 2023.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Is Jonas cheering?
There is no doubt that the new route suits Jonas Vingegaard excellently in many ways. At least he gets a lot of kilometers uphill to shake the competition throughout the race.
- There are all possibilities, as Michael Rasmussen expresses the chances of a repeat of last year's overall victory.
In addition to the uphills, he struggles with the race's only battle against the clock, which is a particularly hilly one of the kind that leads to significant time differences.
- Vingegaard cannot be dissatisfied with that single start. It is a version where time can be gained to that extent. It is disgustingly hard and almost ends on a category 3 climb. Big time differences can be made, even if the stage is only 22 kilometers.
The route map thus leaves no excuses for not giving the defense of the Tour title a shot, Rasmussen believes.
He is also not one of those who put anything into the sensational statements of Jumbo-Visma's sports director, Merijn Zeeman,
which last week sowed a small gram of doubt
about Vingegaard's participation.
- Regardless of what Zeeman has said, they have never ever thought otherwise than that Vingegaard should ride the Tour. As a defending winner, you would never choose not to stand. It is only when you have lost in the Tour that you can think of dropping it to win something else, says Rasmussen.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
New Danish stage party?
This year's Tour de France was a Danish celebration with four stage victories. Jonas Vingegaard (two triumphs), Mads Pedersen and Magnus Cort all managed to be praised for first places, and therefore expectations are also high for the 2023 edition.
The publication of the route has not lessened the hope for new Danish victories, points out Ekstra Bladet's expert, who sees the start of the race as a gift in red and white. The hilly stages in the Basque Country make it difficult for heavy sprinters to keep home, and that is pure guff for a guy like Mads Pedersen.
- When the route is like that, there are some teams in the field who have an interest in making it tough, because the heaviest sprinters can quickly be dislodged. Mads Pedersen has a lot of options. He thinks it's cooler with stages like this than those that are pancake flat, says Rasmussen.
The prognosis for success is not only good for the Trek star, who won a total of four stages in the Tour and the Vuelta this year.
Rider types such as Mikkel Honoré, Magnus Cort, Søren Kragh Andersen, Kasper Asgreen and Andreas Kron will also benefit from the fact that the Grand Depart in 2023 will take place near the Pyrenees. The mountains come early, and therefore the classification will also quickly take shape.
- It is an advantage for them that after the 6th stage there will be such a big time difference that they are not close in the standings. They are quickly out of the overall account, and that can open up a lot of good cycling for the rest of the Tour, says Rasmussen's assessment.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Here the race is decided
The 2023 route offers several spectacular ascents. Not least on the 9th stage, where the peloton must finally climb the Puy dé Dome. The trip up the final mountain will, by all accounts, be one of several key moments in next year's edition.
- The last four kilometers are ridiculously steep. That surge is going to split the favorites apart. There is no doubt about that, says Rasmussen.
He also points to the single start when he puts four points down over the most important stages in next year's French drama.
- Here the distance will be measured in minutes, and after all that rarely happens in the mountains when it comes to the best riders.
Finally, the expert puts a couple of crosses at two big mountain battles in the last week of the race, which will very well decide the battle for the yellow jersey.
- The last mountain stage to Le Markstein is insanely interesting and extremely well suited to attack and cause a team to completely disintegrate. But the obvious choice is the 17th stage to Courchevel, which features the ascent of the Col de la Loze, because it is, in isolation, the hardest mountain they will cross.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
They drew nineteen
While mountain riders will be licking their lips at the prospect of next year's Tour de France, it is obviously a different situation for the world's best sprinters. Because it is only a few of the 21 stages that offer mass sprints at the finish line.
- How much is equal for guys like Dylan Groenewegen (Jayco-BikeExgange), Arnaud Démare (Grouparma-FDJ) and Caleb Ewan (Lotto-Soudal), asks Rasmussen rhetorically.
- There is not much to catch up on, and it is quite a long way to Paris. For some of those riders, it might be better to try the Giro d'Italia instead, he points out.
In the classification department, there may also be a disappointed world champion who sits and digests the route description.
In any case, it is overwhelmingly likely that Remco Evenepoel (QuickStep-Alpha Vinyl) could have benefited more from a different type of time trial and some less significant climb percentages on the decisive mountain stages.
- He probably would have liked a 40 kilometer flat single start. This is where he would have an advantage over Tadej Pogacar and Jonas Vingegaard. And then Evenepoel is perhaps a little worried about the steep percentages on the climbs in some places such as the Col de la Loze. It has typically been in that terrain that he has run into problems when he drives with the very best, says Rasmussen.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Love cycling? There is much more here:
Mads P. takes a wild leap: - It will be an adventure
Danish star couple lift the veil: This is how our marriage is
Remember the dramatic exit? All about the Kyllingen Tour collapse
How is life in the yellow jersey? Get a unique insight here

 'Vismas' 'Vueltaen']

title: Årtiets magtkamp: Løkkes otte runder med Mette
subtitle: Hans Engell, Ekstra Bladets politiske kommentator, går tæt på valgkampens vindere og tabere
body:
SÅ ER DER
fire dage til det endelige opgør. Når stemmerne tirsdag aften er talt op, og vælgerne har udført deres del af opgaven, kommer turen til politikerne. Og det tegner til at blive et af de hårdest og mest uforudsigelige magtopgør i årtier. Især på grund af uforudsigeligheden og vælgervandringer plus to nye partier.
DRAMAET
bliver denne gang større, fordi valgopgøret indeholder så mange ubekendte, bl.a. hvilke partier kommer i Folketinget? Ryger Alternativet ud, ryger Mette Frederiksens muligheder for at fortsætte også fem trin ned. Falder DF ud af Folketinget, vil Jakob Ellemann på tilsvarende vis mangle blå benzin til motoren.
Forhandlingerne efter tirsdag ligner en gyser. Ser vi på den mest friske meningsmåling fra Gallup, er der hverken flertal til den ene eller anden side, heller ikke selvom de nordatlantiske mandater tælles med.
Men lad os se på det sandsynlige:
1. RUNDE:
Mette Frederiksen vil håbe på, valgresultatet ikke tvinger hende til at træde tilbage og starte en dronningerunde lige med det samme.
Hendes favoritmodel vil være, at S er stærkt nok til at kunne indbyde partier til forhandlinger og etablere en regeringsalliance uden Amaliensborgs medvirken.
2. RUNDE:
Det lykkes næppe. De radikale plus alle blå vil til dronningen. Derefter møder partilederne op på Amalienborg, og deres opgave er: Stik dronningen navnet på den partileder, som I mener skal lede forhandlingerne om dannelsen af en eller anden form for regering.
3. RUNDE:
Hvis Gallup har ret, vil Mette Frederiksen formentlig kunne stille med 84 mandater, Jakob Ellemann med 75. Og vi må regne med, at Lars Løkke med 16 mandater vil pege på sig selv.
Om det går helt så let, vides ikke. Hvad vil de radikale eksempelvis forlange for deres støtte? Taber Sofie Carsten Nielsen halvdelen af sin gruppe, kan hun så overhovedet stille krav?
4. RUNDE:
Så går stafetten i første omgang til Mette Frederiksen, som skal orientere sig og forhandle med alle partier og ud fra det mandat, hun har fået, samt undersøge, om hun kan samle flertal for en regering.
5. RUNDE:
Det bliver ikke enkelt, og muligvis må hun tilbage til dronningen flere gange. Ender det blindt, kan majestæten derefter bede Jakob Ellemann undersøge, om han kan samle flertal.
6. RUNDE:
Det er så her, Lars Løkke Rasmussen kan komme til at udfolde alle sine talenter for taktik, udholdenhed, rævekager, brutalitet og afpresning. Løkke er ikke til at slide ned ved et forhandlingsbord, og hans udspil til Ellemann kan være: ’Gør mig til statsminister. Derudover skal jeg have to-tre ministerposter, og så kan du og Pape dele resten efter størrelse.’
7. RUNDE:
Det er ikke en løsning, de andre blå partier vil bryde sig om. Men de har ikke mange kort at spille med. Vermund, Messerschmidt, Vanopslagh og Støjberg vil hellere brække arme og ben end støtte Mette Frederiksen.
Vist er de også dødtrætte af Løkke, men de har ikke rigtig noget valg.
8. SIDSTE RUNDE:
På den måde kan Løkke spille blokkene ud imod hinanden. Og vælge selv. Kan man forestille sig, at V eller K går sammen med Mette Frederiksen?
Det ville være groft løftebrud, i forhold til hvad de har sagt inden valget. Pape og Ellemann ville blive flænset af deres egne baglande og de andre blå, hvis de møder op sammen med Mette Frederiksen. Skulle en model med f.eks. en SV eller SK-regering have bærekraft, skulle de to blå ledere have anlagt en politisk landingsbane for længe siden.
METTE FREDERIKSEN
virker, som om hun helt har opgivet troen på, at Løkke kommer til at støtte en regering under hendes ledelse. Hans forsøg på at mobbe hende ud fra S-formandsposten er blevet afvist med hån. Løkkes krav om en uvildig advokatundersøgelse om minkene set som en markering af, at han aldrig har ment noget seriøst med det brede samarbejde. Løkke er og bliver blå, og det er sammen med Pape og Ellemann, han skal finde sin løsning, er vurderingen i S.
Det er også derfor, partierne kæmper om mandaterne lige til det sidste. Hvis Mette Frederiksen skal vinde, skal hun hente tre-fire mandater i forhold til Gallups tal. Skal Ellemann vinde, er han tvunget til at have Løkke med på vognen og ham selv måske på bagsmækken.
Men Gallup kan selvfølgelig tage fejl.
Opsang fra Engell: Har Mette bedt dem holde kæft?
Engell: Ingen tror på Mette
Valget lige på: Luftkasteller
Engell: Løkkes dobbeltspil
body_en:
THEN THERE IS
four days until the final showdown. When the votes have been counted on Tuesday evening, and the voters have done their part of the task, it will be the turn of the politicians. And it promises to be one of the fiercest and most unpredictable power struggles in decades. Especially because of the unpredictability and voter migration plus two new parties.
THE DRAMA
will be bigger this time, because the election results contain so many unknowns, i.a. Which parties are in the Danish Parliament? If the Alternative goes out, Mette Frederiksen's chances of continuing also go down five steps. If DF falls out of the Folketing, Jakob Ellemann will similarly lack blue petrol for the engine.
The negotiations after Tuesday look like a nightmare. If we look at the most recent opinion poll from Gallup, there is neither a majority for one side nor the other, not even if the North Atlantic mandates are counted.
But let's look at the likely:
ROUND 1:
Mette Frederiksen will hope that the election result does not force her to step down and start a queen round right away.
Her favorite model will be that S is strong enough to be able to invite parties to negotiations and establish a government alliance without Amaliensborg's involvement.
ROUND 2:
It is unlikely to succeed. The radicals plus all the blues want the queen. The party leaders then appear at Amalienborg, and their task is: Give the Queen the name of the party leader who you think should lead the negotiations on the formation of some form of government.
ROUND 3:
If Gallup is right, Mette Frederiksen will probably be able to run with 84 mandates, Jakob Ellemann with 75. And we must count on Lars Løkke with 16 mandates to point to himself.
It is not known whether it will be quite that easy. For example, what will the radicals demand for their support? If Sofie Carsten Nielsen loses half of her group, can she even make a claim?
4TH ROUND:
Then the baton will initially go to Mette Frederiksen, who will have to find out and negotiate with all parties and based on the mandate she has been given, as well as investigate whether she can muster a majority for a government.
5TH ROUND:
It won't be easy, and she may have to return to the queen several times. If it ends blindly, the majesty can then ask Jakob Ellemann to investigate whether he can muster a majority.
ROUND 6:
This is where Lars Løkke Rasmussen can display all his talents for tactics, endurance, fox cakes, brutality and blackmail. Løkke is not to be worn down at a negotiating table, and his proposal to Ellemann could be: 'Make me prime minister. In addition, I will have two or three ministerial positions, and then you and Pape can divide the rest according to size.'
ROUND 7:
It is not a solution the other blue parties will care about. But they don't have many cards to play with. Vermund, Messerschmidt, Vanoplasgh and Støjberg would rather break arms and legs than support Mette Frederiksen.
Apparently they are also sick of Løkke, but they don't really have a choice.
8. FINAL ROUND:
In this way, Løkke can play the blocks against each other. And choose yourself. Can you imagine V or K going together with Mette Frederiksen?
It would be a gross breach of promise, compared to what they have said before the election. Pape and Ellemann would be flayed by their own hinterlands and the other blues if they show up together with Mette Frederiksen. Should a model with e.g. for an SV or SK government to have sustainability, the two blue leaders should have built a political runway long ago.
METTE FREDERIKSEN
seems as if she has completely given up faith that Løkke will support a government under her leadership. His attempt to bully her out of the S-chairmanship has been rejected with scorn. Løkke's demand for an impartial lawyer's investigation about the minks is seen as a sign that he has never meant anything serious about the broad collaboration. Løkke is and will be blue, and it is together with Pape and Ellemann that he must find his solution, is the assessment in S.
This is also why the parties fight for the mandates right to the end. If Mette Frederiksen is to win, she must pick up three or four mandates compared to Gallup's figures. If Ellemann is to win, he is forced to have Løkke on the wagon and himself perhaps on the back.
But Gallup can of course be wrong.
Singing from Engell: Has Mette asked them to shut up?
Engell: No one believes Mette
The right choice: Luftkasteller
Engell: Løkke's double play

['Amalienborg' 'DF' 'Gallup' 'Gallup' 'Gallups' 'Jakob Ellemann' 'K'
 'Lars Løkke Rasmussen' 'Messerschmidt' 'Mette Frederiksens' 'Pape' 'S'
 'SK' 'Sofie Carsten Nielsen' 'Støjberg' 'SV' 'V' 'Vanopslagh' 'Vermund']

title: Adgang forbudt: Den hemmelige Lego-kælder
subtitle: I Billund findes en kælder, som du godt kan glemme alt om at få lov til at besøge. Den rummer alle de Lego-sæt, der nogensinde er produceret, hvoraf nogle er så sjældne, at de aldrig må berøres. Kom med ned i den sagnomspundne kælder her
body:
fullwidth
black
Legos DNA
Legos design og modeller har ændret sig ganske meget, siden 1949 hvor de første klodser så dagens lys.
For at holde styr på firmaets historie, gemmer legetøjsgiganten mindst en æske af alle sæt, de sender ud i verden.
fullwidth
black
Tempereret kælder
Æskerne ligger godt gemt i en tempereret kælder i det centrale Billund under Lego-grundlægger Ole Kirk Christiansens hus.
Selv om det sandsynligvis ville blive et tilløbsstykke på linje med Legoland og Lego House, er det nemmere at få adgang til USA's guldreserver i Fort Knox end at komme ned i den topsikrede kælder.
fullwidth
black
Underjordisk Lego-himmel
Trods adskillige forespørgsler og dialog med Legos hovedkvarter, er det ikke blevet til mere end en stribe høflige afslag, på Ekstra Bladets anmodning om besøg i den underjordiske Lego-himmel.
Seneste forklaring lyder på, at koncernen for tiden er i gang med et storstilet projekt, er indebærer at flytte den historiske samling til et arkiv, der er specielt bygget til formålet.
fullwidth
black
Inspiration og tradition
I 2014 var avisen Politiken til gengæld heldige, da de som det eneste danske medie nogensinde fik eksklusiv adgang til Lego-kælderen, hvor flere end 7.000 forskellige modeller ligger sirligt arrangeret på reoler, der ligner noget fra et bibliotek eller statsligt arkiv.
Det eksklusive produktarkiv har flere formål. Dels at bevare firmaets historie for eftertiden, men samtidig fungerer det samtidig som såkaldt arbejdsarkiv for Legos designere, der kan søge inspiration og sikre sig, at de følger firmaets traditioner, når de designer biler, huse, rumskibe eller andet.
fullwidth
black
Sent i gang
Selv om idéen om det altomfattende arkiv virker utrolig gennemført og gennemtænkt fra Legos side, kom legetøjsgiganten faktisk ret sent i gang med den praktiske og fysiske dokumentation af modelhistorien.
Derfor er der eksempelvis ikke ret mange modeller fra årene mellem 1966 og 1976.
fullwidth
black
Flere arkiver
Faktisk findes der modeller, som der kun findes et enkelt kendt eksemplar tilbage af, og i de tilfælde er de opbevaret i et endnu mere professionelt sikret museumsmagasin i Vejle.
Til Politiken
oplyser Lego, at de allermest sjældne modeller aldrig må røres.
Derudover har Lego to yderligere arkiver i Billund, hvor fem eksemplarer af alt produceret gemmes i uåbnede æsker for eftertiden. Desuden findes endnu et lager, hvor æskerne - i modsætning til de andre placeringer - er åbnet, så modellerne for eksempel kan bruges på udstillinger.
body_en:
fullwidth
black
Lego's DNA
Lego's design and models have changed quite a lot since 1949 when the first bricks saw the light of day.
To keep track of the company's history, the toy giant saves at least one box of every set it sends out into the world.
fullwidth
black
Temperate cellar
The boxes are well hidden in a temperate basement in central Billund under Lego founder Ole Kirk Christiansen's house.
Although it would probably be a run-in along the lines of Legoland and Lego House, accessing America's gold reserves at Fort Knox is easier than getting down into the top-security basement.
fullwidth
black
Underground Lego heaven
Despite numerous inquiries and dialogue with Lego's headquarters, there has been no more than a string of polite refusals to Ekstra Bladet's request for a visit to the underground Lego heaven.
The latest explanation is that the group is currently working on a large-scale project, which involves moving the historical collection to an archive that has been specially built for the purpose.
fullwidth
black
Inspiration and tradition
In 2014, the newspaper Politiken was lucky, as the only Danish media ever to get exclusive access to the Lego basement, where more than 7,000 different models are neatly arranged on shelves that look like something from a library or state archive.
The exclusive product archive has several purposes. Partly to preserve the company's history for posterity, but at the same time it also functions as a so-called working archive for Lego's designers, who can seek inspiration and make sure that they follow the company's traditions when they design cars, houses, spaceships or other things.
fullwidth
black
Late start
Although the idea of ​​the all-encompassing archive seems incredibly complete and well-thought-out on Lego's part, the toy giant actually got started quite late with the practical and physical documentation of the model's history.
Therefore, for example, there are not very many models from the years between 1966 and 1976.
fullwidth
black
More archives
In fact, there are models of which there is only a single known copy left, and in those cases they are stored in an even more professionally secured museum warehouse in Vejle.
To Politiken
Lego states that the very rarest models must never be touched.
In addition, Lego has two additional archives in Billund, where five copies of everything produced are stored in unopened boxes for posterity. In addition, there is another warehouse where the boxes - unlike the other locations - are opened, so that the models can, for example, be used at exhibitions.

title: Prøvet alt? Nu er det slut med hår på ryggen
subtitle: De sidste par år har flere og flere danske mænd fået øjnene op for, at man ikke behøver at leve med uønsket hårvækst på kroppen, og permanent hårfjerning egner sig rigtig godt til de steder, man ikke selv kan nå med skraberen
body:
Når en ny patient sætter sig i behandlingsstolen på en af CeriX’ otte kosmetiske klinikker for at komme sin uønskede hårvækst til livs, er det oftere end tidligere en mand.
For permanent hårfjerning har som behandlingsform vundet indpas blandt de danske mænd. Det fortæller Rie LeClaire-Rosenblum, der er uddannet kosmetisk sygeplejerske og indehaver af CeriX.
Mænd har mere hår
- Permanent hårfjerning med laserteknologien IPL (intenst pulserende lys, red.) er både en af vores mest populære behandlinger og samtidig den eneste behandling, hvor kønnene er nogenlunde lige repræsenteret, siger hun og fortsætter:
- Alle andre behandlinger har en klar overvægt af kvinder, men nu snakker vi også om uønsket hårvækst, og det har mange mænd naturligt mere af, fordi de nu engang er mere behårede end kvinder fra naturens side. Det nye er, at flere gør noget ved det.
Det er især uønsket hår på ryggen, skuldre og lænden, som mange mænd gerne vil slippe helt for, men også nakke, hals og bryst - og i sjældne tilfælde langs kanten af skægget for at få en skarpere linje - kommer under kærlig laser-behandling.
Boom i kosmetiske behandlinger
Svært at barbere sig selv på ryggen
Typisk er det mænd med meget kraftig, mørk og tæt hårvækst på steder, hvor de ikke selv kan komme til, for eksempel på ryggen, der søger hjælp, og når de først henvender sig, er det tit sidste udvej.
- Alle, der kommer til os, har prøvet at løse problemet med skraber, voks og epilator først. Men det skal både holdes ved lige og trimmes regelmæssigt, giver knopper og skægpest, og så er det svært at fjerne hårene på ryggen, hvis man bor alene. Selv dem med partnere kan ikke belemre deres partnere med at bede dem barbere ryggen i tide og utide, siger Rie LeClaire-Rosenblum fra CeriX.
Den mest effektive behandling mod uønsket hår kaldes som sagt IPL og står for Intenst Pulserende Lys, som er indstillet på en særlig bølgelængde, der destruerer hårsækkene nede i huden. Dog virker behandlingen kun på mørke hår, da laseren sigter efter farvestoffet melanin i hårstrået for at finde ned i hårsækken.
- Er håret lyst, har laseren ikke noget target at sigte efter, og så preller lyset af på huden uden at slå hårsækkene ihjel. En grim bivirkning kan være forbrænding i en eller anden grad, som i sidste ende kan give permanente ar og pigmentfejl, siger hun.
Tjek altid registreringen
Derfor har hun også en bøn til de mænd, der efter at have læst denne artikel ønsker at blive far-måtten på ryggen kvit en gang for alle. Man skal altid undersøge på Styrelsen for Patientsikkerheds hjemmeside, om klinikken er registreret og har tilladelsen på plads.
- Markedet er meget reguleret, og det er kun sygeplejersker, der må foretage behandlingen, og oven i det skal klinikken også have en ansvarlig hudlæge, men alligevel er det det vilde vesten. For Styrelsen for Patientsikkerhed fører kun tilsyn med de klinikker, der er registreret i forvejen, og dermed har alle andre frit spil, siger hun.
Klamphuggere
For i takt med efterspørgslen på kosmetiske behandlinger, som permanent hårfjerning hører ind under, dukker der også stadig flere klamphuggere op, der ofte gør mere skade end gavn.
- Jeg plejer at sammenligne lasere med en bil. Her er der også forskel på, hvilken bil man køber i forhold til kvalitet og sikkerhed. Samtidig vil man jo normalt også tjekke, om føreren af bilen overhovedet kan finde ud af at betjene bilen og har kørekort til den, siger hun og fortsætter:
- Samme alarmklokkerne bør ringe, hvis klinikken ikke er registreret, og så er mit bedste råd at finde et andet sted at få sin behandling, siger Rie LeClaire-Rosenblum fra CeriX.
Uønsket hårvækst
body_en:
When a new patient sits in the treatment chair at one of CeriX's eight cosmetic clinics to get rid of unwanted hair growth, it is more often than not a man.
Permanent hair removal has gained traction among Danish men as a form of treatment. This is what Rie LeClaire-Rosenblum, a trained cosmetic nurse and owner of CeriX, tells us.
Men have more hair
- Permanent hair removal with the laser technology IPL (intense pulsed light, ed.) is both one of our most popular treatments and at the same time the only treatment where the sexes are more or less equally represented, she says and continues:
- All other treatments have a clear predominance of women, but now we are also talking about unwanted hair growth, and many men naturally have more of that, because they are naturally more hairy than women. The new thing is that more people are doing something about it.
It is especially unwanted hair on the back, shoulders and lower back that many men would like to get rid of completely, but also the neck, neck and chest - and in rare cases along the edge of the beard to get a sharper line - come under loving laser treatment .
Boom in cosmetic treatments
Hard to shave yourself on the back
Typically, it is men with very strong, dark and dense hair growth in places where they cannot reach themselves, for example on the back, who seek help, and when they do first turn, it is often a last resort.
- Everyone who comes to us has tried to solve the problem with a scraper, wax and epilator first. But it must both be kept straight and trimmed regularly, gives rise to bumps and beard plague, and then it is difficult to remove the hair on the back if you live alone. Even those with partners can't burden their partners with asking them to shave their backs now and then, says Rie LeClaire-Rosenblum of CeriX.
As mentioned, the most effective treatment against unwanted hair is called IPL and stands for Intense Pulsed Light, which is set to a special wavelength that destroys the hair follicles under the skin. However, the treatment only works on dark hair, as the laser targets the pigment melanin in the hair shaft to find its way into the hair follicle.
- If the hair is light, the laser has no target to aim at, and the light then bounces off the skin without killing the hair follicles. An ugly side effect can be burning to one degree or another, which can ultimately cause permanent scars and pigment defects, she says.
Always check the registration
Therefore, she also has a prayer for the men who, after reading this article, want to get rid of the father-mat on their backs once and for all. You must always check on the website of the Swedish Patient Safety Authority whether the clinic is registered and has the permit in place.
- The market is highly regulated, and only nurses are allowed to carry out the treatment, and on top of that, the clinic must also have a responsible dermatologist, but still, it is the wild west. Because the Agency for Patient Safety only supervises the clinics that are registered in advance, and thus everyone else has free rein, she says.
Cleavers
Because in line with the demand for cosmetic treatments, which includes permanent hair removal, more and more clippers are also appearing, who often do more harm than good.
- I usually compare lasers to a car. There is also a difference between which car you buy in terms of quality and safety. At the same time, you usually also want to check whether the driver of the car can even figure out how to operate the car and has a driving license for it, she says and continues:
- The same alarm bells should ring if the clinic is not registered, and then my best advice is to find another place to get your treatment, says Rie LeClaire-Rosenblum from CeriX.
Unwanted hair growth

title: Overfald udløste rockerballade i Pusher Street
subtitle: Et overfald på en ven af Hells Angels fik rockerne til at møde talstærkt op i Pusher Street. Det fik straks Satudarah til at svare tilbage
body:
Voldsomme opgør har den seneste tid igen hærget Pusher Street på Christiania. Den berømte og berygtede hashgade er et mikrokosmos på den danske underverden, hvor næsten alle rockere og bandegrupperinger har deres respektive hashboder. 'Det brune guld' kaster millioner af sig, og de mange penge får ofte konflikter mellem de forråede gangstere til at bryde ud i knytnæver, knivstik og andre former for vold.
Senest i denne uge hvor en episode fik både Hells Angels og Satudarah til at møde talstærkt op og markere sig i Pusher Street.
Forud for rockergruppernes manifestationer ligger ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger et overfald på en mand med sin daglige gang i hashhandler-miljøet på Christiania. Han er angiveligt en ven af Hells Angels og bevæger sig omkring de hashboder, som rockerklubben kontrollerer i 'Fronten' af Pusher Street.
Det fik folk med tilknytning til rockergruppen med det bevingede kranium på rygmærket til tirsdag at troppe talstærkt op i Pusher Street. Manifestationen er en måde at demonstrere sin styrke og utilfredshed med, hvad der skete uden at eskalere konflikten til yderligere voldsepisoder.
Kortege af rocker-biler
Da overfaldsmændene angiveligt skal findes blandt de mænd, der har deres gang omkring Satudarahs forretning på fristaden, så kørte de onsdag af sted i en lang række biler fra deres klubhus for at markere deres støtte til deres folk derude.
De nåede dog aldrig så langt. Københavns Politi oplyser, at deres betjente onsdag stødte sammen med en større gruppe på omkring 50 personer.
- Det lykkedes at afskære gruppen, så de ikke kunne fortsætte ind mod Pusher Street, skriver de i et tweet.
Stave og peberspray til Satudarah
Her måtte politiet både trække stave og bruge peberspray for at stoppe mændene. Det fortæller Simon Hansen, der er vicepolitiinspektør og leder af Operativ Specialafdeling i Københavns Politi,
- De har ikke været truende, men de var trods alt så målrettede, at vi måtte trække stave og bruge peberspray for at få dem standset op og registreret, siger han.
I Københavns Politi kan man ikke bekræfte, at et overfald ligger til grund for de to manifestationer. Men man mener også, at gruppernes tilstedeværelse derude med en dags mellemrum hænger sammen.
- Man kan godt få en opfattelse af, at det ene er et modsvar på det andet, siger Simon Hansen.
Københavns Politi ønsker ikke at kommentere, hvilke kriminelle grupperinger der er tale om.
Relation til organiseret kriminalitet
- Men vi betragter dem som nogen, der har en relation til den organiserede hashhandel, siger vicepolitiinspektøren.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Ingen forbindelse til drab
26. oktober blev en 23-årig mand skudt i hovedet og dræbt foran hashboden 'Medusa'. Hash-forretningen med det flamboyante navn er styret af en
rocker-relateret mand, som for nylig blev medlem af Bandidos
. Tidligere har han været med i HA. Drabet menes dog ikke at have forbindelse til det nye overfald og de efterfølgende manifestationer.
Ekstra Bladet har tidligere beskrevet den evige magtkamp mellem rockere og bander i Pusher Street.
Læs mere her
.
Danmarks blodigste brosten: Skyderierne i Pusher Street
Rocker-uro i Pusher Street
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
To personer er sigtet for drabet på en højgravid kvinde, der blev slået ihjel sidste torsdag i Holbæk. Hør mere om sagen i 'Afhørt' herunder eller i din podcast-app
Afhørt: To sigtet for drab på højgravid
body_en:
Violent confrontations have recently once again ravaged Pusher Street in Christiania. The famous and infamous hash street is a microcosm of the Danish underworld, where almost all rockers and gang groups have their respective hash stalls. 'The brown gold' throws away millions, and the large amount of money often causes conflicts between the betrayed gangsters to break out in fists, stabbings and other forms of violence.
Most recently this week when an episode caused both the Hells Angels and Satudarah to show up in large numbers and make their mark in Pusher Street.
According to Ekstra Bladet's information, the rock groups' manifestations were preceded by an assault on a man with his daily routine in the hash dealer environment in Christiania. He is allegedly a friend of the Hells Angels and moves around the hash shops that the rock club controls in the 'Fronten' of Pusher Street.
That prompted people associated with the rock group with the winged skull on their back badge to flock to Pusher Street in large numbers on Tuesday. The demonstration is a way to demonstrate one's strength and dissatisfaction with what happened without escalating the conflict into further episodes of violence.
Procession of rocker cars
As the assailants are said to be among the men who have their way around Satudarah's business in the sanctuary, they drove off on Wednesday in a long line of cars from their clubhouse to show their support for their people out there.
However, they never got that far. The Copenhagen Police state that their officers clashed with a larger group of around 50 people on Wednesday.
- They managed to cut off the group so that they could not continue towards Pusher Street, they write in a tweet.
Spells and pepper spray for Satudarah
Here the police had to pull batons and use pepper spray to stop the men. This is what Simon Hansen, deputy police inspector and head of the Operative Special Department in the Copenhagen Police, tells us.
- They have not been threatening, but they were after all so targeted that we had to draw batons and use pepper spray to get them stopped and registered, he says.
The Copenhagen Police cannot confirm that an assault is the basis for the two manifestations. But it is also believed that the presence of the groups out there with one-day intervals is connected.
- You can get the impression that one is a counter to the other, says Simon Hansen.
Copenhagen Police do not wish to comment on which criminal groups are involved.
Relationship to organized crime
- But we regard them as someone who has a relationship with the organized hashish trade, says the deputy police inspector.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
No connection to murder
On 26 October, a 23-year-old man was shot in the head and killed in front of the hash stall 'Medusa'. The hash business with the flamboyant name is managed by a
rocker-related man who recently joined the Bandidos
. He has previously been with HA. However, the killing is not believed to be connected to the new assault and the subsequent manifestations.
Ekstra Bladet has previously described the eternal power struggle between rockers and gangs in Pusher Street.
read more here
.
Denmark's bloodiest cobblestone: The shootings in Pusher Street
Rocker unrest in Pusher Street
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Two people are charged with the murder of a heavily pregnant woman who was beaten to death last Thursday in Holbæk. Hear more about the case in 'Interrogated' below or in your podcast app
