title: 49 kvinder smider tøjet: Det perfekte er en illusion
subtitle: Gennem otte år har Heidi Maxmiling fotograferet nøgne kvinder i alle størrelser for at sætte fokus på, at virkeligheden er langt mere fantastisk end det perfekte. Se deres virkelighed her
body:
black
Over 20 kvinder på en strand. For hinanden var de fremmede. Men sammen sad de der. Helt Nøgne. Og delte to kartoner vin og spiste chips og grinede, imens solen gik ned.
På sidelinjen stod fotograf Heidi Maxmiling med sit kamera og forevigede for at sætte fokus på, at det perfekte er en illusion.
Alle billederne kan ses i bogen 'Ærlige kvindekroppe' og et uddrag af dem i artiklen her.
fullwidth
black
'Er der nogen kvinder, der har lyst til at vise, hvordan de ser ud' mindes Heidi Maxmiling, at hun spurgte ud på de sociale medier. Og det var der. 49 af slagsen. I alderen 24 til 89 år. Og det blev starten på en otteårig lang rejse for fotografen Heidi Maxmiling.
- Jeg synes, at det er vigtigt, at vi har mulighed for at spejle os i andre end dem, som vi bliver præsenteret for i bladende, at vi ser, at der er nogen, der ligner en selv, siger Heidi Maxmiling om baggrunden for bogen 'Ærlige kvindekroppe' til Ekstra Bladet.
- En del unge piger – og drenge for den sags skyld – har det skidt, tilføjer hun.
Derfor ønskede hun med projektet at vise, at det perfekte er en illusion, og at virkeligheden er langt mere spændende.
En af fotolokationerne er en svømmehals omklædningsrum. Og det er der en helt særlig grund til, fortæller fotografen.
- Fordi man tit kan føle sig usikker lige her, men også fordi, man helt naturligt er nøgen sammen der.
- Der har altid været kropsidealer, og det er også fint nok, at man synes, at nogen er flottere end en selv. Det er bare eksploderet, og der er mange, der har det skidt, forklarer Heidi Maxmiling til Ekstra Bladet.
fullwidth
black
Og tøjet det tog over 20 kvinder af på Hornbæk Stand. Heidi Maxmiling havde medbragt to kantoner vin, chips og slik.
- Alle filtre røg. Alt var ligesom bare sjovt og magisk. Det var helt fantastisk, fortæller Heidi Maxmiling om den aften ved solnedgangstid, hvor billederne blev taget.
- De er jo super modige, siger Heidi Maxmiling om de mange kvinder, der har sagt ja til at lade sig fotografere til projektet.
Den ældste kvinde, der medvirker i bogen, bliver 90 år. Den yngste var på tidspunktet, da billederne blev taget, 24 år. I alt medvirker 49 kvinder.
black
body_en:
black
Over 20 women on a beach. To each other they were strangers. But together they sat there. Completely Naked. And shared two cartons of wine and ate chips and laughed as the sun went down.
On the sidelines, photographer Heidi Maxmiling stood with her camera and immortalized to focus on the fact that the perfect is an illusion.
All the pictures can be seen in the book 'Honest women's bodies' and an extract from them in the article here.
fullwidth
black
'Are there any women who want to show how they look' Heidi Maxmiling recalls asking on social media. And there it was. 49 of the kind. Aged 24 to 89 years. And that was the start of an eight-year long journey for the photographer Heidi Maxmiling.
- I think it is important that we have the opportunity to reflect ourselves in others than those that we are presented with in the pages, that we see that there is someone who looks like ourselves, says Heidi Maxmiling about the background for the book 'Honest women's bodies' for Ekstra Bladet.
- A number of young girls – and boys for that matter – have a bad time, she adds.
Therefore, with the project, she wanted to show that the perfect is an illusion and that reality is far more exciting.
One of the photo locations is a swimming pool changing room. And there is a very special reason for that, says the photographer.
- Because you can often feel insecure right here, but also because you are quite naturally naked together there.
- There have always been body ideals, and it is also fine that you think that someone is better looking than yourself. It just exploded, and there are many who feel bad, Heidi Maxmiling explains to Ekstra Bladet.
fullwidth
black
And the clothes it took off over 20 women at Hornbæk Stand. Heidi Maxmiling had brought two cantons of wine, chips and sweets.
- All filters smoked. Everything was like just fun and magical. It was absolutely fantastic, says Heidi Maxmiling about the evening at sunset when the photos were taken.
- They are super brave, says Heidi Maxmiling about the many women who have agreed to be photographed for the project.
The oldest woman who appears in the book turns 90. The youngest was 24 at the time the photos were taken. A total of 49 women participate.
black

title: Engell: Mette skal presses helt i bund
subtitle: Jakob Ellemann er på vej ud på en livsfarlig mission, hvis man spørger Ekstra Bladets politiske kommentator Hans Engell
body:
SANDHEDENS TIME.
Den kommer nu. Jakob Ellemann er klar til regeringssamarbejde med Mette Frederiksen under en masse betingelser. Hun skal presses helt i bund.
I denne uge finder vi ud af, om det hele er til noget eller ej. For vist tog Jakob Ellemann lørdag et afgørende skridt på Venstres landsmøde, da han meldte sig klar til regeringssamarbejde med Mette, men han fortalte ikke meget om, hvad han forlanger som medgift.
Eller om resten eller dele af den blå familie plus de uregerlige radikale skal følge med. Vi ved faktisk kun, at Ellemann gerne vil i regering med Mette. Resten ligger i de kommende ugers forhandlinger.
Men lad os se på optakten først:
FOLKETINGSVALGET
efterlod et rødt, men dybest et ret ubrugeligt flertal på mange punkter. De røde er en børnehave uden seriøsitet. Det viste de første to dage med de radikale og Alternativet. SF er en klippe af troværdighed – de andre røde det modsatte.
Mette Frederiksen kan danne regering på baggrund af de røde, men det vil blive en regering, der kan vælte sig selv tre gange om ugen. Så svag er den.
Mette er gået til valg på en bred regering over midtbanen. Det samme er R og Løkke. Men ikke Venstre og de andre blå. De ville have en ren blå regering, som der bare ikke er flertal for.
Faktisk står den borgerlige side svagere end nogensinde.
Ellemann fik i sin tale lørdag udstillet, hvor elendigt kørende den blå blok er.
INGEN ANER
, om Pape er formand om fem måneder. Eller Messerschmidt er medlem af Folketinget. Inger Støjberg ville end ikke pege på Ellemann som kongelig undersøger. Lars Løkke vil slet ikke deltage i møder med de blå formænd. Vermund virker fraværende, og Vanopslagh er tættere på Tiktok end et regeringsprojekt.
Det var selvfølgelig baggrunden for, at Venstres formand lørdag valgte at tage skridtet fuldt ud og erklære sig klar til regeringssamarbejde med S. MEN ... der er et meget stort MEN.
Han sagde intet om, hvorvidt han forestiller sig en ren SV-regering eller en regering med flere partier. Og han konkretiserede heller ikke de politiske krav, Venstre vil stille for at være med. De bliver store og dyre.
METTE FREDERIKSEN
skal nærmest tvinges til at føre borgerlig-liberal politik, som er mere blå, end de blå selv kunne klare.
Nok har Mette Frederiksen under valgkampen og i møderne med partierne talt om behovet for reformer, men møderne har hidtil være så løse i kanten og uforpligtende, at ingen af deltagerne rigtig er klar over, hvad hun i detaljen mener med sine reformer.
For Venstre vil det være en livsfarlig mission at gå i regering med S. Ellemann sætter i realiteten sit politiske liv ind på det projekt, hvis han siger ja.
Derfor skal indrømmelserne til Venstre være store og synlige. Han kan ikke møde med noget, der bare minder om smårettelser til Mette Frederiksens hidtidige politik.
MAN MÅ STARTE
forfra på tegningerne om bl.a. udbud af arbejdskraft, klimapolitik og CO2-afgift, sundhedsreform, energipolitik, vinterhjælp-pakker, skatte- og afgifter, forsvarsforlig og meget andet.
Det åbne spørgsmål er, om Mette Frederiksen er klar til at gå så langt. I virkelighedens verden har hun nok flertallet, men i realiteten har Frederiksen mere brug for Ellemann end omvendt.
HAN KAN VÆLGE
at læne sig tilbage og være oppositionsleder for det største parti blandt de blå. Hun skal fægte sig igennem med besværlige flertal. Hun kan forsøge noget med Lars Løkke, men enhver partileder ved, det er som at handle med en privat lånehaj. Renterne er uhyrlige.
At skulle bjerge en regering igennem Zenia Stampe (R), Theresa Scavenius (AL) og Lars Løkke (M) er farligere end at sejle ishavs-konvoj under krigen.
Ellemann fik sit partis fulde opbakning til at fortsætte forhandlingerne med regeringen. Han fik også mandat til at kunne danne en regering, hvis indholdet i et regeringsgrundlag er stærkt nok. Formentlig skal et resultat godkendes i Venstres hovedbestyrelse og folketingsgruppe. Men er vi først nået så langt, har Ellemann allerede sat det meste af sit formandskab som indsats.
FORHANDLINGERNE
bliver svære og hårde. Nok er regeringen kun fungerende, men statsministeren kan trække på alle de papirer og beregninger fra embedsværket, hun har brug for. Det skal bare gå uden om ministrene og direkte til Statsministeriet.
Venstre har kun sig selv og egne embedsmænd plus formentlig gode venner i DI og Landbrug & Fødevarer, som kan lave beregninger og prognoser for dem.
Ellemann er nødt til at være helt sikker, for det er i samme periode, han skal have testet, om han tør stole på Mette Frederiksen, eller han ikke tør. Hun skal bevise over for ham, at han kan have fuld tillid til hende. Præcis den forsigtige tilnærmelse, han beskrev i sin tale lørdag.
INDTIL NU
har vi hørt på mange ord. Ord koster kun en mundfuld luft. De næste par uger viser, om det hele er luftsteg og vindfrikadeller.
Ellemann benyttede weekenden til at sende bolden over til Mette Frederiksen. Nu er det hendes tur.
Læs også:
Engell om Ellemann: Hans livs sværeste opgave
Engell: De er på Mettes pinebæk
Engell: Pape uden power
Engell: Mette og Jakob - Tør de?
body_en:
THE HOUR OF TRUTH.
It's coming now. Jakob Ellemann is ready for government cooperation with Mette Frederiksen under a lot of conditions. She must be pushed to the bottom.
This week we find out if it's all for nothing or not. For sure, Jakob Ellemann took a decisive step on Saturday at the Venstre national meeting, when he declared himself ready for government cooperation with Mette, but he did not say much about what he demands as a dowry.
Or whether the rest or parts of the blue family plus the unruly radicals must follow. We actually only know that Ellemann would like to be in government with Mette. The rest lies in the coming weeks' negotiations.
But let's look at the prelude first:
THE PEOPLE'S ELECTION
left a red but basically a pretty useless majority on many points. The reds are a kindergarten without seriousness. This was shown in the first two days with the radicals and the Alternative. SF is a rock of credibility – the other reds the opposite.
Mette Frederiksen can form a government based on the reds, but it will be a government that can topple itself three times a week. That's how weak it is.
Mette has gone to the polls on a broad government above the middle ground. So are R and Løkke. But not the Left and the other blues. They wanted a pure blue government, for which there is just no majority.
In fact, the bourgeois side is weaker than ever.
In his speech on Saturday, Ellemann showed how badly the blue block is running.
NO IDEA
, whether Pape is chairman in five months. Or Messerschmidt is a member of the Danish Parliament. Inger Støjberg would not even point to Ellemann as a royal investigator. Lars Løkke will not participate in meetings with the blue chairmen at all. Vermund seems absent and Vanoplagh is closer to Tiktok than a government project.
This was, of course, the reason why the chairman of the Liberal Party chose to take the full step on Saturday and declare himself ready for government cooperation with S. BUT ... there is a very big BUT.
He said nothing about whether he envisions a pure SV government or a multi-party government. And he also did not specify the political demands that the Left will make in order to participate. They get big and expensive.
METTE FREDERIKSEN
must almost be forced to pursue bourgeois-liberal politics, which are more blue than the blues themselves could manage.
Of course, Mette Frederiksen during the election campaign and in the meetings with the parties talked about the need for reforms, but the meetings have so far been so loose at the edges and non-committal that none of the participants are really aware of what she means in detail by her reforms.
For Venstre, it will be a life-threatening mission to go into government with S. Ellemann is in effect putting his political life on the project if he says yes.
Therefore, the concessions to the Left must be large and visible. He cannot come up with anything that just resembles small corrections to Mette Frederiksen's policy so far.
YOU HAVE TO START
from the front on the drawings about i.a. labor supply, climate policy and CO2 tax, health reform, energy policy, winter aid packages, taxes and duties, defense settlement and much more.
The open question is whether Mette Frederiksen is ready to go that far. In the real world, she probably has the majority, but in reality Frederiksen needs Ellemann more than the other way around.
HE CAN CHOOSE
to sit back and be the opposition leader of the largest party among the blues. She has to fight her way through difficult majorities. She can try something with Lars Løkke, but every party leader knows it's like dealing with a private loan shark. The interest rates are outrageous.
Having to rescue a government through Zenia Stampe (R), Theresa Scavenius (AL) and Lars Løkke (M) is more dangerous than sailing an Arctic convoy during the war.
Ellemann received the full support of his party to continue negotiations with the government. He was also given a mandate to be able to form a government if the content of a government basis is strong enough. Presumably, a result must be approved in Venstre's main board and parliamentary group. But once we have reached this far, Ellemann has already put most of his chairmanship to work.
THE NEGOTIATIONS
become difficult and hard. Sure, the government is only functioning, but the prime minister can draw on all the papers and calculations from the civil service she needs. It just has to bypass the ministers and go directly to the Prime Minister's Office.
The Liberals only have themselves and their own officials plus probably good friends in DI and Agriculture & Food, who can make calculations and forecasts for them.
Ellemann has to be completely sure, because it is in the same period that he must have tested whether he dares to trust Mette Frederiksen, or whether he dares not. She must prove to him that he can have complete trust in her. Exactly the cautious approach he described in his speech on Saturday.
UNTIL NOW
We have heard many words. Words cost only a mouthful of air. The next few weeks will show if it's all air fry and wind meatballs.
Ellemann used the weekend to pass the ball over to Mette Frederiksen. Now it's her turn.

Engell: Pape without power
Engell: Mette and Jakob - Do they dare?

title: Kæmpe forskel: Så meget tjener VM-heltene
subtitle: Der er meget stor forskel på, hvad de 26 danske VM-spillere tjener til dagligt i deres klubber - se listen her
body:
En slutrunde er altid et stort udstillingsvindue. En skueplads, hvor man kan gøre opmærksom på sig selv overfor de største klubber.
Det er den gyldne mulighed for at score en ny, stor kontrakt.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Men sådan er det ikke for de fire bedst lønnede i den danske VM-trup.
De har alle inden for det seneste år sikret sig gode, indbringende aftaler, der bringer dem i en lønklasse for sig selv blandt de 26 danske VM-spillere.
Christian Eriksen er den ubetingede lønkonge på det danske landshold. Det blev han med det transferfrie skifte fra Brentford til Manchester United.
65 mio. kr. hedder lønchecken årligt. Det bringer ham i top på landsholdet, men kun i midterfeltet i Manchester United.
Simon Kjær var i flere år lønførende, men han må vige pladsen til sin gode ven. Landsholdskaptajnen har dog intet at klage over. Det var en fornem aftale han fik, da han sidste år forlængede opholdet i Milan frem til 2024.
Joachim Andersen og Andreas Christensen er også højt rangeret på lønlisten efter de har været involveret i klubskifter sidste år og i sommer.
Der lurer ikke de store landsholdsskifter allerede i januar-vinduet. Det skulle lige være et Joakim Mæhle skifte.
Til gengæld kunne der godt ligge et par store klubskifter og vente næste sommer, hvor specielt Jesper Lindstrøm er ved at vokse ud af Frankfurt.
Han kan blive Danmarks dyreste spiller, hvis Frankfurt står fast på et krav i niveauet 230-280 mio. kr.
Et skifte for Pierre Emile Højbjerg til eksempelvis Spanien kan også komme i spil næste sommer.
Endelig må Kasper Dolberg også finde sig en ny arbejdsgiver for at karrieren tilbage på sporet.
Klubskifter er næsten altid ensbetydende med en bedre aftale og derved en højere løn.
Her er oversigten over, hvor meget de 26 danske VM-helte tjener i deres klubber:
Så meget tjener landsholdsspillerne
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Blodbold: Fodbold på de dødes grave
VM Quiz 2022
body_en:
A final round is always a big showcase. A stage where you can draw attention to yourself in front of the biggest clubs.
It is the golden opportunity to score a new, big contract.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
But that is not the case for the four best-paid in the Danish World Cup squad.
They have all secured good, profitable contracts within the past year, which puts them in a salary class of their own among the 26 Danish WC players.
Christian Eriksen is the undisputed wage king of the Danish national team. He became that with the transfer-free switch from Brentford to Manchester United.
65 million DKK is called the salary check annually. That brings him to the top of the national team, but only in the midfield at Manchester United.
Simon Kjær was the salary leader for several years, but he has to give way to his good friend. However, the national team captain has nothing to complain about. It was a noble agreement he got when last year he extended his stay in Milan until 2024.
Joachim Andersen and Andreas Christensen are also highly ranked on the payroll after being involved in club changes last year and this summer.
There are no major national team changes lurking already in the January window. It was supposed to be a Joakim Mæhle change.
On the other hand, there could well be a couple of big club changes waiting for next summer, when Jesper Lindstrøm in particular is growing out of Frankfurt.
He could become Denmark's most expensive player if Frankfurt insists on a demand in the range of DKK 230-280 million. DKK
A move for Pierre Emile Højbjerg to, for example, Spain could also come into play next summer.
Finally, Kasper Dolberg must also find a new employer to get his career back on track.
A change of club almost always means a better deal and thus a higher salary.
Here is the overview of how much the 26 Danish WC heroes earn in their clubs:
This is how much the national team players earn

 'Spanien']

title: Strejke, sexafpresning og sort magi: Historien om verdens bedste landshold
subtitle: Skandalerne klæber til det franske landshold, der hører til blandt verdens bedste - men også det allermest kontroversielle
body:
Væggen bag ham er kridhvid. T-shirten er sort og stram. Og rumklangen vidner om den skrællede opsætning.
Det ligner ved første øjekast en video af en kidnappet mand, der bekræfter sin eksistens og beder sin familie om at betale løsesummen. Og det lyder også sådan.
-Hvis du ser denne video, betyder det, at jeg ikke længere er en fri mand. Enten på grund af min brors håndlangere eller politiet, lyder det fra manden i midten.
Det er Mathias Pogba. Bror til verdensstjernen Paul Pogba og i disse måneder kuglestøber til den seneste af de store skandaler på det franske landshold, som Danmark skal forsøge at nedkæmpe lørdag i Qatar.
Historien er både bizar og trist, og den skriver endnu et kapitel i den kulørte del af historien Frankrigs fodboldlandshold. Måske verdens mest kontroversielle landshold. Det er bare svært at se i guldglimmerets skær.
For siden 1998 har Frankrig vundet VM to gange og EM en gang samt været i finalen en enkelt gang mere i begge turneringer. Tilsæt legender som Zinedine Zidane, Thierry Henry og Kylian Mbappé, og det bliver endnu nemmere at lade sig narre af facaden.
Der skal dog ikke slås mange døre ind for at finde skeletterne i skabet hos det franske landshold. Nej, de spøger sådan set stadig, mens VM ruller.
- Pogba blev afpresset af gamle venner. Da han var i Paris på et tidspunkt med det franske landshold, blev han passet op i sin lejlighed og bedt om at betale omkring 10 millioner euro. Mændene havde elefanthuer på, men Pogba mente at kunne se, at den ene af mændene var hans bror
- Det er en forfærdelig historie, fordi det er en familieskandale. De to brødre har ikke talt sammen i flere måneder, og deres mor står imellem dem. Der kommer en retssag, så vi ser i løbet af de kommende måneder, hvad der sker, fortæller Baptiste Chaumier fra franske L’Équipe.
Mathias Pogba sidder lige nu i fængsel, men inden han blev placeret bag stive gardiner, nåede han via en internet-bot at udsende den video fra det hvide lokale og med de mange injurier.
- Mathias fortalte, at Paul benyttede sig af sort magi, og han påstod, at Paul nogle gange brugte det mod sine egne holdkammerater – blandt andre Mbappé. Det var ret underligt at høre. Men generelt i Frankrig tror mange spillere med afrikansk oprindelse på sort magi. Det er ikke usædvanligt. Men det er underligt at bruge mod sine egne holdkammerater, siger Chaumier.
Stjernerne strejker
Det er 2010 i Sydafrika, og bussen i de franske farver triller op til træningsanlægget, hvor et halvt hundrede journalister står klar, mens også mange fans er mødt op for at hilse på stjerner som Patrice Evra og Franck Ribery.
Videokameraerne ruller, og fotokameraerne tikker løs.
Landstræner Raymond Domenech – udskældt af folket, hadet af spillerne – træder ud i sine fodboldstøvler. Alle spillerne kommer i løbesko. De nægter at træne, for de er rasende over, at deres holdkammerat Nicolas Anelka er blevet sendt hjem fra den skandaløse VM-lejr.
Han har ellers ikke gjort meget for at få lov at blive i Knysna, hvor holdet holder til.
'Knep dig selv, din ludersøn', skulle Anelka have sagt til landstræneren i pausen af VM-kampen mod Mexico ifølge L’Équipe.
Spillerne er rasende over, at det er kommet ud i offentligheden, og de er fnysende arrige på landstræneren og hans stab. Patrice Evra kommer i klammeri med den fysiske træner, Frankrig ryger ud af VM, og den dag i dag er VM i Sydafrika den største landsholdsskandale i Frankrigs historie.
- For mange spillere var det slutningen på deres karriere. For andre – som Franck Ribery – vil det for altid være det, som alle i Frankrig husker ham for. Han var fantastisk for Bayern München, men alle taler om Knysna, når de taler om Ribery. Alle, siger Baptiste Chaumier.
Det var Frankrigs største skandale, men altså langt fra den sidste.
Det helt forkerte værelse
Han skulle nok aldrig være gået ind på det værelse, Karim Benzema. Frankrigs landshold træner og bor på Clairefontaine, når de er samlet, og 6. oktober 2015 banker Benzema, i 2022 kåret til verdens bedste fodboldspiller, på døren til holdkammeraten Mathieu Valbuenas værelse.
Benzema har en besked til sin holdkammerat, og han mener selv, at det er i god tro. Sådan opfatter Valbuena det på ingen måde.
- En af Benzemas venner havde fortalte ham, at han havde set en sexvideo af Valbuena, og at han kunne hjælpe ham med at få den slettet. Benzema påstod, at han bare viderebragte en besked. Men han burde ikke have sagt det til Valbuena, fortæller Baptiste Chaumier.
Det blev til en sag – ikke bare på det franske landshold, men i retten. For Mathieu Valbuena mente, at det var afpresning, og at Karim Benzema var medskyldig. Det kostede ikke bare Karim Benzema en dom i retten mange år senere.
Nej, superstjernen fra Real Madrid blev slet ikke udtaget af landstræner Didier Deschamps.
- Didier Deschamps sagde igen og igen, at Benzemas fravalg var af sportslig karakter. Men det passer ikke. I de første måneder var det et politisk valg. Hverken Benzema eller Valbuena var på landsholdet. Derefter blev Benzema rasende over beslutningen. I et interview sagde han, at Deschamps gav efter for den racistiske del af Frankrig, siger Baptiste Chaumier.
- Deschamps var fnysende arrig over det interview. Han besluttede ikke at udtage Benzema. Han blev ved med at sige, at det var en sportslig beslutning. Men Benzema var helt utrolig hos Real Madrid, så det var bare underligt
Karim Benzema blev benådet af Didier Deschamps i 2021, og det var kun en skade kort før VM, der gjorde, at han ikke skulle med til Qatar. Derfor er han heller ikke med mod Danmark, men det er historierne om et skørt fransk landshold.
Vi taler om de her historier nu med et smil på læben, og det skyldes kun resultaterne. Havde resultaterne ikke været lige så gode… wow, slutter Baptiste Chaumier.
body_en:
The wall behind him is chalk white. The T-shirt is black and tight. And the reverberation testifies to the stripped down set-up.
At first glance, it looks like a video of a kidnapped man confirming his existence and asking his family to pay the ransom. And it sounds like that too.
-If you watch this video, it means that I am no longer a free man. Either because of my brother's henchmen or the police, says the man in the middle.
It's Mathias Pogba. Brother of the world star Paul Pogba and in these months the mold for the latest of the big scandals in the French national team, which Denmark will try to fight on Saturday in Qatar.
The story is both bizarre and sad, and it writes another chapter in the colorful part of the history of the French national football team. Perhaps the world's most controversial national team. It's just hard to see in the glare of the gold glitter.
Because since 1998, France has won the World Cup twice and the European Championship once, and has been in the final once more in both tournaments. Add legends like Zinedine Zidane, Thierry Henry and Kylian Mbappé and it becomes even easier to be fooled by the facade.
However, you don't have to knock on many doors to find the skeletons in the closet of the French national team. No, they're kind of still joking while the World Cup rolls around.
- Pogba was blackmailed by old friends. When he was in Paris at one time with the French national team, he was looked after in his apartment and asked to pay around 10 million euros. The men were wearing elephant hats, but Pogba thought he could tell that one of the men was his brother
- It's a terrible story because it's a family scandal. The two brothers haven't spoken in months, and their mother stands between them. There will be a trial, so we will see in the coming months what happens, says Baptiste Chaumier from French L'Équipe.
Mathias Pogba is currently in prison, but before he was placed behind stiff curtains, he managed to broadcast the video from the white room with the many libels via an internet bot.
- Mathias said that Paul used black magic, and he claimed that Paul sometimes used it against his own team-mates – including Mbappé. It was quite strange to hear. But generally in France, many players of African origin believe in black magic. It is not unusual. But it's strange to use against your own teammates, says Chaumier.
The stars are on strike
It is 2010 in South Africa, and the bus in French colors rolls up to the training facility, where half a hundred journalists are ready, while many fans have also turned up to greet stars such as Patrice Evra and Franck Ribery.
The video cameras are rolling and the photo cameras are ticking away.
National coach Raymond Domenech – reviled by the people, hated by the players – steps out in his football boots. All players come in running shoes. They refuse to train because they are furious that their teammate Nicolas Anelka has been sent home from the scandalous World Cup camp.
Otherwise, he has not done much to be allowed to stay in Knysna, where the team is based.
'Fuck yourself, you son of a bitch', Anelka is said to have told the national coach at half-time of the World Cup match against Mexico, according to L'Équipe.
The players are furious that it has become public, and they are furious with the national coach and his staff. Patrice Evra gets into trouble with the physical coach, France smokes out of the World Cup, and to this day the World Cup in South Africa is the biggest national team scandal in France's history.
- For many players it was the end of their career. For others – like Franck Ribery – it will forever be what everyone in France remembers him for. He was great for Bayern Munich, but everyone talks about Knysna when they talk about Ribery. Everyone, says Baptiste Chaumier.
It was France's biggest scandal, but far from the last.
The completely wrong room
He probably should never have entered that room, Karim Benzema. France's national team train and live at Clairefontaine when they are together, and on 6 October 2015, Benzema, voted the world's best footballer in 2022, knocks on the door of teammate Mathieu Valbuena's room.
Benzema has a message for his teammate, and he himself believes that it is in good faith. That's not how Valbuena perceives it in any way.
- One of Benzema's friends had told him that he had seen a sex video of Valbuena and that he could help him get it deleted. Benzema claimed he was just passing on a message. But he shouldn't have said that to Valbuena, says Baptiste Chaumier.
It turned into a case – not just on the French national team, but in court. For Mathieu Valbuena thought it was blackmail and that Karim Benzema was an accomplice. It didn't just cost Karim Benzema a verdict in court many years later.
No, the superstar from Real Madrid was not selected at all by national coach Didier Deschamps.
- Didier Deschamps said again and again that Benzema's exclusion was of a sporting nature. But it doesn't fit. In the first months it was a political choice. Neither Benzema nor Valbuena were in the national team. Afterwards, Benzema was furious with the decision. In an interview he said that Deschamps gave in to the racist part of France, says Baptiste Chaumier.
- Deschamps was furious about that interview. He decided not to select Benzema. He kept saying it was a sporting decision. But Benzema was absolutely incredible at Real Madrid, so it was just weird
Karim Benzema was pardoned by Didier Deschamps in 2021 and it was only an injury shortly before the World Cup that kept him out of Qatar. That's why he's not with Denmark either, but those are the stories about a crazy French national team.
We talk about these stories now with a smile on our faces, and that's only because of the results. Had the results not been as good... wow, concludes Baptiste Chaumier.
ner_clusters:
['Baptiste Chaumier' 'Bayern München' 'Danmark' 'Didier Deschamps'
 'Franck Ribery' 'Frankrig' 'Frankrigs' 'Karim Benzema' 'Knysna' 'Knysna'

 'Zinedine Zidane']

title: Bar mave-fest i landsholds-lejren: Derfor har de ikke tøj på
subtitle: Joakim Mæhle, Daniel Wass, Yussuf Poulsen og flere andre på det danske landshold bevæger sig hver dag ud i Qatars eftermiddags-sol for at træne, og her viser de kroppen frem til fuld skue for fotografer
body:
Når Danmarks landsholdsstjerner går fra omklædningsrummet og ud på træningsbanen, er de ofte stadig i gang med at tage tøj på, og det giver fotograferne anledning til at fange både biceps og brystkasse.
Flere af spillerne tager nemlig en helt særlig vest på, inden de hopper i resten af træningstøjet, og det sker først på græsset.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Under VM i Qatar fungerer Al Sailiya Sport Club som landsholdets private træningsområde.
Banerne er i tiptop stand, men rammerne skriger af noget, der bliver nedlagt igen, når fodboldfesten i ørkenstaten er slut.
Muskler og urin
Her bliver spillerne fulgt nøje. Målt og vejet. For individuel data er en gigantisk del af moderne fodbold. Allerede op til slutrunden fik Kasper Hjulmand en kæmpe stak papirer i hånden på hver af sine spillere med information om alt fra særligt belastede muskler til kvaliteten i deres urin.
Det er landsholdets fysiske træner - spanske Ismael Camenforte López - der står for den del, og i Qatar er han ansvarlig for, hvordan spillerens fysiske tal ser ud før, mellem, under og efter VM-kampene.
Sports-bh til mænd
Et af værktøjerne til det er de diminutive veste, der mest af alt minder om en slags sports-bh til mænd. Derfor ser man, at spillerne kommer ud i bar kasse, fordi de skal have vesten over hovedet, inden de tager trøjer på.
Det sker for det meste først på banen, når pressefotograferne er på plads i deres markerede zoner. Og i Doha skal spillerne ikke bekymre sig om at fryse, for varmegraderne når nemt op på den gode side af 30.
Landsholdet i bar kasse
Vestene, som alle hold fra PSG til FCK, har taget til sig, har en indbygget gps, og de kan blandt andet måle, hvor langt en spiller har løbet, eller hvor mange sprinter spilleren har taget.
Landsholdets trænings-tyr
Som man kan se, får Kasper Hjulmands fodsoldater spist deres spinat og havregryn, men der er spillere, der tilbringer mere tid i styrkelokalet end andre.
En af dem er Martin Braithwaite.
Espanyol-angriberen har knoklet og svedt for at komme i det, han selv kalder for sit livs form.
Og efter kampen mod Frankrig medgav han også, at
han oftere er at finde blandt håndvægtene end nogle af sine medspillere
, hvilket Andreas Skov Olsen også har givet ham ret tidligere under slutrunden.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
En anden er Andreas Cornelius, der altid har sørget for at få spist sine vitaminer. Han har imidlertid nået en størrelse, der ideelt set ikke må blive større.
I hvert fald hvis det står til Christian Eriksen. Ekstra Bladet spurgte Manchester United-spilleren, hvor mange armbøjninger Cornelius skyldte efter en forfærdelig afbrænder i 0-0-kampen mod Tunesien.
- Ikke nogen. Han skal sgu ikke blive større,
sagde han med et grin
.
body_en:
When Denmark's national team stars go from the dressing room to the training ground, they are often still in the process of putting on clothes, and this gives the photographers an opportunity to capture both biceps and chest.
Several of the players put on a very special vest before jumping into the rest of the training clothes, and this only happens on the grass.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
During the World Cup in Qatar, Al Sailiya Sport Club serves as the national team's private training area.
The pitches are in tip-top condition, but the framework screams of something that will be taken down again when the football party in the desert state is over.
Muscles and urine
Here, the players are followed closely. Measured and weighed. Because individual data is a gigantic part of modern football. Already leading up to the final round, Kasper Hjulmand handed each of his players a huge stack of papers with information on everything from particularly strained muscles to the quality of their urine.
It is the national team's physical trainer - Spanish Ismael Camenforte López - who is responsible for that part, and in Qatar he is responsible for how the player's physical numbers look before, between, during and after the World Cup matches.
Sports bra for men
One of the tools for that is the diminutive vests that most resemble a kind of sports bra for men. That is why you see that the players come out naked because they have to wear the vest over their heads before they put on their jerseys.
It mostly only happens on the pitch when the press photographers are in place in their marked zones. And in Doha, the players don't have to worry about freezing, because the temperatures easily reach the good side of 30.
The national team in bare cash
The vests, which have been adopted by all teams from PSG to FCK, have a built-in GPS, and they can, among other things, measure how far a player has run or how many sprints the player has taken.
The national team's training bull
As you can see, Kasper Hjulmand's foot soldiers get to eat their spinach and oatmeal, but there are players who spend more time in the strength room than others.
One of them is Martin Braithwaite.
The Espanyol forward has toiled and sweated to get into what he himself calls the form of his life.
And after the match against France he also admitted that
he is more often found among the dumbbells than some of his teammates
, which Andreas Skov Olsen also gave him earlier during the final round.
The article continues below the picture...
Another is Andreas Cornelius, who has always made sure to eat his vitamins. However, he has reached a size that ideally should not get any bigger.
At least if it says Christian Eriksen. Ekstra Bladet asked the Manchester United player how many elbow bends Cornelius owed after a terrible save in the 0-0 match against Tunisia.
- Nobody. He's not supposed to get any bigger,
he said with a laugh
.

title: Ny fidus i Pusher Street
subtitle: Lejer hashboder ud til rockere og bander. Pushere i smart forretningsmanøvre holder dem ude af politiets søgelys
body:
Flere pushere i Christianias Pusher Street har fundet frem til en ny måde at lave penge på. I stedet for selv at styre boden lejer de den i stedet ud til andre kriminelle.
En forretningsmodel, der blandt andet har den sideeffekt, at den trækker endnu flere tunge kriminelle til Pusher Street.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Nok er indtjeningen mindre, end hvis pusheren selv styrer den daglige gang. Til gengæld er risikoen for at blive taget af politiet voldsomt formindsket, fortæller kilder med indsigt i det kriminelle miljø.
Dermed kommer lejeren af boden til at stå med den store risiko. Samtidig skal lejeren ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger i de fleste tilfælde selv sørge for det nødvendige mandskab til boden.
Her er den såkaldte klipper den vigtigste person. Klipperen er personen, der står for at klippe hash af hashpladen og udlevere den til køberen.
Fast indtægt
En anden vigtig person er den såkaldte christianit. For at drive en hashforretning i Pusher Street skal man have tilknytning til Christiania, og den regel kan man komme rundt om, når man har en fastboende christianit tilknyttet boden.
- Du har en fast indtægt, hvor du er tilpas langt væk og samtidig heller ikke skal bekymre dig om tab, hvis politiet kommer forbi og konfiskerer, fortæller en kilde.
Det er uvist, hvor mange af de godt 32 boder, der for tiden er opslået i Pusher Street, der nu drives efter den forretningsmodel.
I og med at lejerforholdet kan skifte, kan det være svært at afgøre, hvem, der p.t kontrollerer de udlejede hashboder.
Men det er selvfølgelig oftest folk med tilknytning til rocker- og bandemiljøet, der har magten til at styre hashsalget fra den lejede bod.
Til gengæld er det åbenlyst, at der kan opstå stridigheder i forbindelse med en sådan lejemål.
Det skete eksempelvis i november, hvor uenighed om en lejet bod udløste vold og tumult. Ved episoden var der opstået tvivl om, hvem der egentlig havde lejet boden.
Tumult
I forbindelse med uenigheden pressede navngivne HA'ere bodens ejer til konfrontere personer med Satudarah-tilknytning, hvorefter den første tumult brød ud.
Efterfølgende viste først HA-rockere sig talstærkt i hashgaden, og dagen efter forsøgte så 50 mænd med Satudarah-tiknytning at gøre det samme.
Rockerne nåede ikke helt frem til Pusher Street, da de i stedet stødte sammen med politibetjente, der trak stave og anvendte peberspray imod Satudarah-folkene.
I forbindelse med sagen har Ekstra Bladet rettet henvendelse til Københavns Politi, men her ønsker man ikke kommentere Ekstra Bladets oplysninger.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Christiania-talsmand: Pusher Street ikke vores ansvar
Det officielle Christiania ønsker at lægge afstand til aktiviteterne i Pusher Street. Det gælder på spørgsmålet omkring 'Stadens' holdning til hashpushernes nye fidus.
- Christiania har fralagt sig et hvert ansvar for, hvad der sker i den gade, slår en Christiania-talsmand, Hulda Mader, fast.
På spørgsmålet om tidligere tiders 'krav' om tilstedeværelsen af en christianit i hver bod svarer hun:
- Dem har politiet jo fjernet.
Hun har tidligere givet til kende, at det må være op til politiet at håndtere den ulovlige handel med cannabis i Pusher Street, ligesom man opfordrer politikerne til at gentænke forbudspolitikken i forhold til hash.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Reklamerede med kokain-salg på Snapchat
Mens hash og andre cannabis-produkter ifølge Christianias eget regelsæt er accepteret, så er hårde stoffer som kokain bandlyst.
Ikke desto mindre har politiet gennem de seneste år fundet kokain i området omkring Pusher Street. Ifølge Ekstra Bladets research er pulvernarkoen hidtil og hovedsageligt blevet afsat til de folk, der arbejder i hashgadens boder.
Men der skal ikke meget til, før at også det ændrer sig. For nylig blev der på Snapchat reklameret med, at man kunne købe kokain i en navngiven bod i Pusher Street.
I 'reklamen' havde man i øvrigt sat en kvinde til præsentere ærindet.
En ældre kvindelig beboer fik nys om det aparte 'reklamefremstød' og gik ned i Pusher Street for at få en forklaring, men her blev hun bedt om rende og hoppe, erfarer Ekstra Bladet.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Rå vold og drab
Miljøet omkring Pusher Street er brutalt. Årets kulmination på den vold udspandt sig 27. oktober. Omkring kl 17.45 troppede en maskeret mand op ved en hashbod, der kaldes Medusa-boden.
Her trak den mørkklædte mand en pistol og affyrede en serie målrettede skud imod den 23-årig mand, som stod og solgte hash.
Foreløbigt har politiet ikke meldt noget ud om et muligt motiv. Men boden, som den 23-årige arbejdede i, kontrolleres ifølge Ekstra Bladet af en Bandidos-rocker.
Han er en kontroversiel person i miljøet omkring Pusher Street. Kilder fortæller, hvordan han rent faktisk er forment adgang til Christiania.
Det er hans tidligere konfrontatoriske fremfærd, der i første omgang fik ham bandlyst på Christiania, erfarer Ekstra Bladet.
Han var blandt andet tidligere ejer af en hashbod, der i modsætning til de øvrige boder og til irritation for christianitterne havde døgnåbent. De 'ansatte' i omhandlende bod blev ifølge Ekstra Bladets kildet tvunget til at arbejde, selvom alle andre havde lukket for salget. En anholdelse og den tilhørende uro var dermed uundgåelig, hvis politiet lagde vejen forbi.
Han er først for nyligt blevet optaget i Bandidos. Men han har tidligere gjort sig i kredsen omkring Hells Angels' to afdelinger på Amager.
Kilder med indsigt i miljøet fortæller, at den omtalte rocker ved flere lejligheder har trodset forbuddet om ikke at vise i området.
Pusher Street: Rockere og banders magtkamp
body_en:
Several pushers in Christiania's Pusher Street have found a new way to make money. Instead of managing the stall themselves, they instead rent it out to other criminals.
A business model that, among other things, has the side effect of attracting even more serious criminals to Pusher Street.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Admittedly, the earnings are less than if the pusher manages the day-to-day work himself. On the other hand, the risk of being caught by the police is greatly reduced, say sources with insight into the criminal environment.
This means that the tenant of the stall will bear the big risk. At the same time, according to Ekstra Bladet's information, in most cases the tenant must provide the necessary staff for the stall himself.
Here, the so-called cutter is the most important person. The cutter is the person responsible for cutting the hash from the hash plate and delivering it to the buyer.
Fixed income
Another important person is the so-called Christianite. In order to run a hash shop in Pusher Street, you have to be connected to Christiania, and that rule can be circumvented when you have a permanent Christianite attached to the stall.
- You have a fixed income where you are conveniently far away and at the same time you don't have to worry about losses if the police come by and confiscate, says a source.
It is not known how many of the 32 or so stalls currently advertised in Pusher Street are now run according to that business model.
As the tenant relationship can change, it can be difficult to determine who currently controls the rented hash stalls.
But of course it is most often people connected to the rock and gang milieu who have the power to control the hashish sales from the rented booth.
On the other hand, it is obvious that disputes can arise in connection with such a lease.
This happened, for example, in November, when a disagreement over a rented stall triggered violence and commotion. During the episode, doubts had arisen as to who had actually rented the stall.
Uproar
In connection with the dispute, named HAs pressured the owner of the stall to confront persons with Satudarah affiliation, after which the first commotion broke out.
Subsequently, first HA rockers showed up in numbers in the hash street, and the next day 50 men with Satudarah hookups tried to do the same.
The rockers didn't quite make it to Pusher Street when they instead clashed with police officers who drew batons and used pepper spray on the Satudarah people.
In connection with the case, Ekstra Bladet has contacted the Copenhagen Police, but here they do not wish to comment on Ekstra Bladet's information.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Christiania spokesperson: Pusher Street not our responsibility
Official Christiania wants to distance itself from the activities in Pusher Street. This applies to the question of 'Staden's' attitude to the hash pushers' new scam.
- Christiania has abdicated any responsibility for what happens in that street, a Christiania spokesperson, Hulda Mader, asserts.
When asked about the 'requirement' of earlier times for the presence of a Christian in every stall, she replies:
- The police have removed them.
She has previously stated that it must be up to the police to deal with the illegal trade in cannabis in Pusher Street, just as politicians are encouraged to rethink the prohibition policy in relation to hashish.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Advertised with cocaine sales on Snapchat
While hashish and other cannabis products are accepted according to Christiania's own set of rules, hard drugs such as cocaine are banned.
Nevertheless, in recent years the police have found cocaine in the area around Pusher Street. According to Ekstra Bladet's research, the powdered narcotic has so far and mainly been allocated to the people who work in the hash street's stalls.
But it doesn't take much before that changes too. Recently, Snapchat advertised that you could buy cocaine from a named stall in Pusher Street.
In the 'advertisement', a woman had also been appointed to present the matter.
An elderly female resident found out about the unusual 'advertising push' and went down Pusher Street to get an explanation, but here she was asked to ditch and jump, learns Ekstra Bladet.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Raw violence and murder
The environment around Pusher Street is brutal. The year's culmination of that violence unfolded on October 27. Around 5:45 p.m., a masked man trooped up to a hash stall called the Medusa stall.
Here, the dark-clad man pulled out a gun and fired a series of targeted shots at the 23-year-old man, who was selling hashish.
So far, the police have not announced anything about a possible motive. But the stall in which the 23-year-old worked is controlled by a Bandidos rocker, according to Ekstra Bladet.
He is a controversial figure in the community around Pusher Street. Sources tell how he actually gained access to Christiania.
It is his previous confrontational behavior that initially got him banned from Christiania, Ekstra Bladet learns.
Among other things, he was formerly the owner of a hash stall which, unlike the other stalls and to the annoyance of the Christians, was open 24 hours a day. According to Ekstra Bladet's source, the 'employees' in the store in question were forced to work, even though everyone else had closed for sales. An arrest and the associated unrest were thus inevitable if the police stopped.
He has only recently been accepted into the Bandidos. But he has previously made his way around the Hells Angels' two branches in Amager.
Sources with insight into the environment say that the mentioned rocker has on several occasions defied the ban not to show in the area.
Pusher Street: Rockers and gangs power struggle

title: Så vildt fester de nye rockstjerner
subtitle: Sex, druk og ballade: 70 genstande på en aften, sex i spaen og byture, der rutinemæssigt går helt over gevind. Læs alt om de danske reality-stjerners vilde liv - og tømmermændene der følger med...
body:
I aften går det løs (og det kan næsten kun gå galt), når de største danske reality-stjerner for første gang holder fælles julefrokost. Med i bagagen har de en karriere, der har budt på action i en grad, hvor kun de færreste kan være med. Få alle historierne, billederne og videoerne eksklusivt her...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
I aften kan en skøn forsamling af Danmarks største reality-stjerner opleves på slap line, når de for første gang holder fælles julefrokost med alt, hvad dertil hører af snacks, snaps og skandaler.
Til det storstilede arrangement vil der blandt andet blive kåret 'Årets frækkeste deltager', og det hele kan følges eksklusivt her på Ekstra Bladet.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Festaber på slap line
Gennemsigtige kjoler, Pia Kjærsgaard i dans med en ung mand, et frieri og forkerte vindere af en pris. Reality Awards svigtede ikke, da de senest blev afholdt.
Se højdepunkter og hele showet
HER
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Vanvittig druk
Den tidligere vinder af 'Paradise Hotel' Lenny Pihl har erkendt, at han har et problem med alkohol. Derfor er han i dag på antabus.
Få et sjældent indblik i den ekstreme reality-drukkultur
HER
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Antabus, afvænning og narko
Realitydeltagere kan feste som få, men for flere har de mange lange fester udviklet sig til et decideret problem.
Nu tyder det imidlertid på, at udviklingen er ved at vende. Læs meget mere
HER
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Vilde kokain-fester
For Mark Bøgelund er kokain ikke noget særsyn. - Det var først, da jeg kom hjem fra 'Ex on the Beach', at jeg opdagede, hvor hjernedødt det er, siger han.
Læs mere om de mange stoffer, der florerer i reality-branchen
HER
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Her er alt det du ikke må se
Reality er blevet for pænt og poleret, mener nuværende deltagere, der her fortæller, hvor galt det står til - og hvad du i hvert fald ikke må se på tv.
Læs med
HER
body_en:
Tonight things go wild (and it can almost only go wrong) when the biggest Danish reality stars hold a joint Christmas lunch for the first time. In their baggage, they have a career that has offered action to a degree that only a few can participate in. Get all the stories, photos and videos exclusively here…
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Tonight, a wonderful gathering of Denmark's biggest reality stars can be experienced on the loose when they hold a joint Christmas lunch for the first time with all that goes with snacks, schnapps and scandals.
For the large-scale event, the 'Naughtiest Participant of the Year' will be awarded, and the whole thing can be followed exclusively here on Ekstra Bladet.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Party loses on slack line
See-through dresses, Pia Kjærsgaard dancing with a young man, a proposal and wrong winners of a prize. The Reality Awards did not fail when they were held most recently.
Watch highlights and the full show
HERE
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Crazy drunk
Former 'Paradise Hotel' winner Lenny Pihl has admitted he has a problem with alcohol. That is why he is on antabuse today.
Get a rare insight into the extreme reality drinking culture
HERE
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Antabuse, rehab and drugs
Reality contestants can party like a few, but for many, the many long parties have developed into a definite problem.
Now, however, there are indications that the trend is about to turn. Read much more
HERE
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Wild cocaine parties
For Mark Bøgelund, cocaine is not something special. - It was only when I came home from 'Ex on the Beach' that I discovered how brain dead it is, he says.
Read more about the many drugs that abound in the reality industry
HERE

Here's everything you shouldn't see
Reality has become too nice and polished, believe current participants, who tell here how wrong it is - and what you must not watch on TV in any case.
Read along
HERE

title: Han skulle skaffe Frank af vejen
subtitle: 37-årig dømt:
body:
Med råd, dåd og mod betaling rådgav en 37-årig mand om, hvordan liget af Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen skulle pakkes ind i plastik og skaffes af vejen.
Prisen for ydelsen lød på den nette sum af 28.000 kroner.
Det kom frem i går, da manden mødte op i Retten i Randers for at tilstå sin rolle i det, der ligner et mystisk mordkomplot på den 40-årige familiefar til fire.
Ifølge politiet har de i alt seks mistænkte haft forskellige roller i det planlagte drab, der efter sigende fandt sted om eftermiddagen 14. juli. De fem øvrige sigtede har siddet varetægtsfængslet i månedsvis.
Fandt gemmested
Men i går var alle på nær en af dem blevet fragtet fra arresten til retten for at høre den 37-årige tilstå.
De nægter sig fortsat skyldige i at have slået Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen ihjel.
Ti minutter før retsmødet gik i gang, sad den 37-årige troligt klar på sin plads.
De mange tilhørere blev dog afskåret fra at høre mandens forklaring, da dommeren valgte at imødekomme anklagerens anmodning om dørlukning. Det skete på trods af protest fra pressens repræsentanter.
Derfor var det kun de fremmødte drabssigtede, deres forsvarsadvokater og de mange betjente i lokalet, der fik den 37-åriges forklaring at høre.
Kort efter blev dørene åbnet igen, og den konkrete tiltale mod den 37-årige blev læst højt af specialanklager Jesper Rubow.
Under gårsdagens retsmøde kom det frem, at det var den nu dømte mand, der fandt det øde skovområde i Gassum, hvor liget af den 40-årige far blev fundet pakket ind efter flere døgns intens eftersøgning.
Den nu dømtes mor bor i den lille by nord for Randers, lød det videre.
Satte ild til bil
Foruden usømmelig omgang med lig blev den 37-årige dømt for bortskaffelse af beviser og for at have medvirket til brandstiftelse af den hvide varevogn, som blev fundet udbrændt ved Nørager.
Ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger var det den bil, som drabsofferet kørte i.
Anklagemyndigheden krævede manden idømt otte måneders fængsel, mens hans forsvarer, Henrik Stagetorn, mente, at fem måneder måtte være passende for de indrømmede lovovertrædelser.
Dommeren valgte, at den 37-årige skulle idømmes seks måneders fængsel, og eftersom manden har siddet varetægtsfængslet siden 22. juli, kunne han dermed gå fra retten som en fri mand.
Ingen kommentar
Den 37-årige skal dog betale en erstatning på 115.000 kroner for den udbrændte varevogn, de 28.000 kroner, han fik som betaling for forbrydelserne, er blevet beslaglagt, og derudover skal han betale sagens omkostninger.
Ekstra Bladet henvendte sig til den nu dømte mand, efter at han fik lov til at gå, og spurgte, om han ville knytte en kommentar til sagen. Han svarede venligt, men bestemt nej og forlod retten med sin forsvarsadvokat.
Fakta om de seks sigtede i sag om drab på Frank Nørgaard
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Frank om sigtet: Hun er bindegal
De øvrige sigtede for det planlagte drab blev ført tilbage til deres celler efter gårsdagens retsmøde. Det gjaldt også den 39-årige kvinde, som drabsofferet ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger dannede par med gennem en periode inden for det seneste år.
Det, på trods af at hun deler efternavn og i årevis har haft folkeregisteradresse med en jævnaldrende mand, der ligeledes er varetægtsfængslet for drabet. Han var den eneste sigtede i sagen, som ikke dukkede op ved retsmødet i går.
15. juli – dagen efter Franks forsvinden – ændrede den 39-årige drabssigtede kvinde sit coverbillede på Facebook, hvor hun med en stribe skanningsbilleder og en positiv graviditetstest erklærede, at hun var gravid og ventede barn i 2022.
Ifølge Ekstra Bladets oplysninger har hun hævdet, at Frank er faren. Det er dog uvist for Ekstra Bladet, hvorvidt hun har født barnet.
Ekstra Bladet har tidligere talt med et af drabsofferets nære veninder. I en beskedkorrespondance med veninden har Frank beskrevet ekskæresten som ’bindegal’.
Sendt væk med mobiler
Ud over ægteparret er et ungt kærestepar på henholdsvis 23 år og 26 år også sigtet for det grusomme drab.
Ifølge en retsbog bad den 39-årige kvinde angiveligt den 23-årige kvinde om at forlade landejendommen, hvor politiet mener, at Frank blev dræbt den skæbnesvangre eftermiddag i juli, med den 39-årige mands og 26-årige mands mobiltelefoner.
Her fik hun til opgave at lægge strandbilleder op, hvor hun har tagget ægteparret, sig selv og sin kæreste. Det kan muligvis være et forsøg på at skabe et alibi.
Fra stikirenddreng til rå voldsmand
Den femte sigtede i sagen er en nu 24-årig mand, som tidligere har indrømmet, at han skruede nummerpladerne af den hvide varevogn, som blev fundet udbrændt, og fjernede en olietønde med aske.
Ved et retsmøde gik han dog fra at være perifer til at være en af de centrale aktører i sagen.
Det gjorde han, da han efter politiets opfattelse bliver omtalt som ’Lange’ i en videooptagelse.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Lydklip afslører: Talte om drabet
Det er tidligere kommet frem i den spektakulære sag, at fire af de sigtede – ægteparret og kæresteparret – talte om drabet på Frank, dagen før han blev dræbt.
Sådan fremgår det af en timelang videofil, som politiet har fundet på den 23-årige kvindes mobiltelefon. Her taler de fire sigtede om, at det 40-årige offer skal komme til det formodede gerningssted i Nimtofte på Djursland og om mulige fremgangsmåder for at slå Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen ihjel.
Det er angiveligt også i denne video, at den 24-årige sigtede bliver omtalt.
Optagelsen har ikke nogen billedmæssig værdi og rummer ikke nogen egentlig konklusion. Men det er politiets opfattelse, at Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen blev tæsket med et jernrør og kvalt 14. juli.
Han blev herefter skaffet af vejen med hjælp fra den 37-årige mand, der i går tilstod sin rolle.
Mødte aldrig op til aftale
Det var Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensens nye kæreste, der meldte ham savnet, efter at han ikke dukkede op til deres aftale.
Kæresten modtog i stedet en række mystiske beskeder på sin mobil, som gjorde hende urolig. Hun har tidligere været til stede ved en række retsmøder i sagen.
Først flere dage senere blev den 40-årige far fundet i skovområdet.
Ved findestedet har der tidligere været lagt rørende hilsner fra hans efterladte, herunder hans fire børn.
body_en:
With advice, deed and for payment, a 37-year-old man advised how the body of Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen should be wrapped in plastic and removed from the road.
The price for the service was a net sum of DKK 28,000.
It came to light yesterday when the man appeared in court in Randers to confess his role in what looks like a mysterious murder plot on the 40-year-old father of four.
According to the police, a total of six suspects had different roles in the planned killing, which reportedly took place on the afternoon of July 14. The five other accused have been in custody for months.
Found hiding place
But yesterday all but one of them had been transported from the detention center to the court to hear the 37-year-old confess.
They continue to deny being guilty of killing Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen.
Ten minutes before the hearing started, the 37-year-old was probably ready in his seat.
However, the many audience members were prevented from hearing the man's explanation when the judge chose to grant the prosecutor's request to close the door. This happened despite protest from representatives of the press.
Therefore, it was only the present accused of murder, their defense lawyers and the many officers in the room who got to hear the 37-year-old's explanation.
Soon after, the doors were opened again, and the specific indictment against the 37-year-old was read out by special prosecutor Jesper Rubow.
During yesterday's court session, it emerged that it was the now convicted man who found the deserted forest area in Gassum, where the body of the 40-year-old father was found wrapped after several days of intense searching.
The now convicted's mother lives in the small town north of Randers, it went on.
Set fire to car
In addition to indecent handling of a corpse, the 37-year-old was sentenced for disposal of evidence and for having contributed to the arson of the white van, which was found burnt out near Nørager.
According to Ekstra Bladet's information, it was the car in which the murder victim was driving.
The prosecution demanded that the man be sentenced to eight months in prison, while his defender, Henrik Stagetorn, believed that five months would be appropriate for the admitted offences.
The judge chose that the 37-year-old should be sentenced to six months in prison, and since the man has been in custody since July 22, he could thus leave the court as a free man.
No comment
However, the 37-year-old must pay a compensation of DKK 115,000 for the burnt-out van, the DKK 28,000 he received as payment for the crimes has been seized, and in addition he must pay the costs of the case.
Ekstra Bladet approached the now-convicted man after he was allowed to leave, and asked if he wanted to comment on the case. He answered kindly but firmly no and left the court with his defense lawyer.
Facts about the six accused in the case of the murder of Frank Nørgaard
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Frank about the charge: She's crazy
The others charged with the planned killing were taken back to their cells after yesterday's court hearing. This also applied to the 39-year-old woman, with whom the murder victim, according to Ekstra Bladet's information, formed a couple over a period within the past year.
This, despite the fact that she shares a surname and for years has had a civil registry address with a man of the same age who is also in custody for the murder. He was the only accused in the case who did not appear at the court hearing yesterday.
On July 15 - the day after Frank's disappearance - the 39-year-old woman accused of murder changed her cover photo on Facebook, declaring with a series of scan images and a positive pregnancy test that she was pregnant and expecting a child in 2022.
According to Ekstra Bladet's information, she has claimed that Frank is the father. However, it is unknown to Ekstra Bladet whether she has given birth to the child.
Ekstra Bladet has previously spoken to one of the murder victim's close friends. In a message correspondence with the friend, Frank has described the ex-boyfriend as a 'binding maniac'.
Sent away with mobiles
In addition to the married couple, a young couple, aged 23 and 26 respectively, are also charged with the cruel murder.
According to a court record, the 39-year-old woman allegedly asked the 23-year-old woman to leave the country estate where police believe Frank was killed that fateful afternoon in July, with the 39-year-old man's and 26-year-old man's cellphones.
Here she was given the task of posting beach photos where she has tagged the married couple, herself and her boyfriend. It could possibly be an attempt to create an alibi.
From stilted boy to raw violent man
The fifth accused in the case is a now 24-year-old man who has previously admitted that he unscrewed the number plates of the white van, which was found burnt out, and removed an oil drum with ashes.
At a court hearing, however, he went from being peripheral to being one of the central players in the case.
He did so when, according to the police, he is referred to as 'Lange' in a video recording.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Audio clip reveals: Talked about the murder
It has previously emerged in the spectacular case that four of the accused – the married couple and the dating couple – talked about the murder of Frank the day before he was killed.
This is evident from an hour-long video file that the police have found on the 23-year-old woman's mobile phone. Here, the four accused talk about the 40-year-old victim coming to the suspected crime scene in Nimtofte on Djursland and about possible procedures to kill Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen.
It is also allegedly in this video that the 24-year-old accused is mentioned.
The recording has no visual value and does not contain any real conclusion. But the police believe that Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen was beaten with an iron pipe and strangled on 14 July.
He was then taken out of the way with the help of the 37-year-old man, who confessed his role yesterday.
Never showed up for appointment
It was Frank Dan Nørgaard Jørgensen's new girlfriend who reported him missing after he didn't show up for their appointment.
Instead, the girlfriend received a series of mysterious messages on her mobile, which made her uneasy. She has previously been present at a number of court hearings in the case.
It was not until several days later that the 40-year-old father was found in the forest area.
Touching greetings from his survivors, including his four children, have previously been placed at the place of discovery.
