title: 90 sekunder fra total destruktion
subtitle: Putin truer med atomvåben, men skal vi frygte en atomkrig?
body:
fullwidth
24. januar sidste år blev dommedagsurets visere placeret historisk tæt på midnat: 90 sekunder i total destruktion. Organisationen bag pegede på Ruslands trusler om brug af atomvåben som årsagen til fremrykningen af det symbolske ur.
fullwidth
- Hvad sker der, når dommedagsuret rammer midnat?
- Den totale atomkrig. Hvis det kommer dertil, mener mange, som har studeret det, at hverken menneskeheden og eller større dyr kan overleve det. Det ville kun være insekter og andet småkravl, der ville kunne klare sådan en situation.
default
Sådan lyder det fra lektor emeritus i videnskabs- og teknologihistorie ved Aarhus Universitet Henry Nielsen. Ekstra Bladet har talt med ham, da truslerne fra Rusland som bekendt ikke er blevet mindre eller færre. Tværtimod. Ruslands præsident, Vladimir Putin, rasler mere end nogensinde før med atomsablen.
Nyligt har Putin annonceret, at Rusland vil placere taktiske atomvåben i Belarus, og at Rusland vil producere flere atomvåben.
-
Jeg tror ikke, at det er blevet så meget alvorligere, fordi Putin har flyttet taktiske atomvåben til Belarus. Hvis Rusland ville smide taktiske atomvåben i Europa, så kan de gøre det, uanset om de står i Belarus eller et par hundrede kilometer inde i Rusland. Putin gør det for at minde os om, at han har atomvåben og kan bruge dem, så han gør det for at skræmme os, så Vesten måske bøjer sig for nogle af hans krav.
black
Sådan fungerer den: Så kraftig er atombomben
- En trussel med så voldsomme mulige konsekvenser kan for en lægmand som mig virke lidt hul. For hvem ville trykke på knappen?
- Men usikkerheden er også rigelig. Vi ved jo ikke, om han kan finde på at trykke på knappen, hvis Ukraine med bistand fra Vesten går over hans røde linje. Noget kunne tyde på, at vi ikke har gjort det endnu. Men hvor er de røde linje? Jeg tror, at han med vilje spiller på den usikkerhed.
Putin suspenderer atomaftale
Tilbage i februar suspenderede Rusland ‘Ny Start-aftalen’, der blev underskrevet af USA og Rusland i 2010. Aftalen trådte i kraft i 2011.
Aftalen blev i 2021 forlænget med yderligere fem år, umiddelbart efter at Joe Biden havde overtaget posten som amerikansk præsident.
I aftalen er der blandt andet fastsat et loft for, hvor mange atomvåben de to lande må have, og en aftale om løbende inspektioner.
- Det er på sigt mere farligt, for nu ved de vestlige eksperter ikke, hvad russerne foretager sig, og dermed er der skabt yderligere usikkerhed.
black
- Men, Henry, hvad så hvis Putin smider en atombombe i Ukraine? Hvad gør USA for eksempel så?
- Ja, det er jo det store spørgsmål, for det ved vi ikke.
Men det kunne være, at Vesten vil gengælde med konventionelle våben, for at signalere, at det russerne har gjort, er dødsensalvorligt.
fullwidth
Tilbage i 2018 blev dommedagsuret sat til to minutter i midnat -og sådan blev viserne stående i januar 2019.
Da organisationen bag uret, Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists, besluttede dette, medfulgte en besked om, at vi var på vej ind i en ny atomalder. Denne gang uden stabilitet.
default
- Det er meget rigtigt, medgiver Henry Nielsen.
- Det er på grund af den modernisering af atomarsenalerne, som finder sted rundt om i verden. I slutningen af 80’erne og starten af 90’erne gik antallet af atomvåben jo kraftigt ned. Man fik simpelthen destrueret mange atomvåben under gensidig inspektion, så der er ikke så mange atomvåben som før. Men efter årtusindskiftet har stormagterne virkelig moderniseret deres atomvåben og gjort de fremførende raketter mere og mere træfsikre, så det er en af farerne nu.
Og så er antallet af atommagter jo blevet flere. Tilbage i 1950 var der kun to atommagter, nemlig USA og Sovjetunionen.
I dag har ni lande atomvåben, og flere mener, at antallet af atomvåben vil stige voldsomt i de kommende år. Eksempelvis mener Pentagon, at Kina vil have mindst 1500 sprænghoveder i 2035.
20. september 2017 åbnede FN for underskrifter til ‘Traktaten om forbud mod atomvåben’, og denne trådte i kraft 22. januar 2021. 92 lande har indtil nu skrevet under, dog ingen nationer med atomvåben.
black
Her er nutiden atomvåben
- Det kan være, at mit sidste spørgsmål er dumt, Henry, men jeg tager chancen: Er det realistisk, at vi får elimineret atomvåben?
- Jeg tror desværre, de er kommet for at blive. Jeg kan ikke se, at de inden for en overskuelig fremtid vil blive afskaffet. Jeg synes ikke, der er noget, der tyder på en snarlig nedtrapning, men dommedagsuret er før blevet stillet tilbage, og det må vi håbe snart vil ske igen.
Faktaboks om Henry Nielsen:
body_en:
fullwidth
On January 24 last year, the hands of the doomsday clock were placed historically close to midnight: 90 seconds into total destruction. The organization behind it pointed to Russia's threats to use nuclear weapons as the reason for advancing the symbolic clock.
fullwidth
- What happens when the doomsday clock strikes midnight?
- Total nuclear war. If it comes to that, many who have studied it believe that neither humanity nor larger animals can survive it. Only insects and other small crawlers would be able to cope with such a situation.
default
That's what Henry Nielsen, associate professor emeritus in the history of science and technology at Aarhus University, says. Ekstra Bladet has spoken to him, as the threats from Russia, as is well known, have not diminished or diminished. On the contrary. The president of Russia, Vladimir Putin, is rattling the nuclear saber more than ever before.
Recently, Putin has announced that Russia will place tactical nuclear weapons in Belarus and that Russia will produce more nuclear weapons.
-
I don't think it's gotten that much worse because Putin has moved tactical nukes to Belarus. If Russia wanted to drop tactical nuclear weapons in Europe, then they can do it, whether they are standing in Belarus or a few hundred kilometers inside Russia. Putin is doing it to remind us that he has nuclear weapons and can use them, so he is doing it to scare us so that the West might bow to some of his demands.
black
How it works: That's how powerful the atomic bomb is
- A threat with such violent possible consequences can seem a little hollow to a layman like me. Because who would push the button?
- But there is also plenty of uncertainty. After all, we don't know if he can think of pushing the button if Ukraine, with assistance from the West, crosses his red line. Something could indicate that we haven't done it yet. But where are the red lines? I think he is intentionally playing on that uncertainty.
Putin suspends nuclear deal
Back in February, Russia suspended the 'New Start Agreement' signed by the US and Russia in 2010. The agreement entered into force in 2011.
The agreement was extended for another five years in 2021, immediately after Joe Biden had taken over the post as US president.
Among other things, the agreement sets a ceiling for how many nuclear weapons the two countries may have, and an agreement on ongoing inspections.
- It is more dangerous in the long term, because now the Western experts do not know what the Russians are doing, and thus further uncertainty has been created.
black
- But, Henry, what if Putin drops a nuclear bomb in Ukraine? What does the US do, for example?
- Yes, that is the big question, because we don't know.
But it could be that the West will retaliate with conventional weapons to signal that what the Russians have done is deadly serious.
fullwidth
Back in 2018, the doomsday clock was set to two minutes to midnight - and that's how the hands stood in January 2019.
When the organization behind the watch, the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists, decided this, it came with a message that we were entering a new atomic age. This time without stability.
default
- That is very true, admits Henry Nielsen.
- It is because of the modernization of the nuclear arsenals that is taking place around the world. In the late 80s and early 90s, the number of nuclear weapons fell sharply. Many nuclear weapons were simply destroyed under mutual inspection, so there are not as many nuclear weapons as before. But after the turn of the millennium, the great powers have really modernized their nuclear weapons and made the launch rockets more and more hit-proof, so that is one of the dangers now.
And then the number of nuclear powers has increased. Back in 1950, there were only two nuclear powers, namely the United States and the Soviet Union.
Today, nine countries have nuclear weapons, and several believe that the number of nuclear weapons will increase dramatically in the coming years. For example, the Pentagon believes that China will have at least 1,500 warheads by 2035.
On 20 September 2017, the UN opened for signatures to the 'Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons', and this came into force on 22 January 2021. 92 countries have so far signed, but no nations with nuclear weapons.
black
Here the present is nuclear weapons
- It may be that my last question is stupid, Henry, but I'll take the chance: Is it realistic that we will eliminate nuclear weapons?
- Unfortunately, I think they are here to stay. I don't see them being abolished in the foreseeable future. I don't think there is any indication of an imminent tapering, but the doomsday clock has been set back before, and we must hope that will happen again soon.

 'Vladimir Putin']

title: Styrtede i helvedesplante: - Jeg kan ikke klare det her
subtitle: Kvinden landede oven i den australske brændenælde, som har efterladt hende i voldsomme smerter
body:
De fleste af os kan huske den svigende følelse af at brænde os på en brændenælde som barn.
Det er dog intet i forhold til det smertehelvede, som en 42-årig kvinde har oplevet de seneste ni måneder, efter hun faldt under en cykeltur i den australske delstat Queensland sidste sommer.
Artiklen fortsætter under tweetet ...
Australia
Værste nogensinde
Selvom hun har født fire børn, herunder med tre kejsersnit, fortæller Naomi Lewis til det australske
medie ABC
, at hun aldrig har følt større smerte.
- 100 procent den værste smerte nogensinde. Det var frygteligt, uddyber hun over for mediet.
Efter faldet på mountainbike ned i den australske brændenælde med tilnavnet Gympie-Gympie reagerede hendes mand hurtigt.
Han satte kursen mod det nærmeste apotek, hvor han købte voks til at fjerne de fine hår fra bladende, som sad fast i Naomi Lewis' ben og venstre arm.
Her var ambulancen allerede på vej.
- Jeg kan huske, at jeg ventede på ambulancen og sagde til min mand: 'Jeg kan ikke klare det her'.
Advarer andre
På det tidspunkt, ambulancen nåede frem til Lewis-parret, var smerterne brutale.
- Så blev de ved med at lægge varmetæpper over mine ben. Jeg kan huske, at det var beroligende, siger Naomi Lewis.
Den 42-årige mor var efterfølgende indlagt i syv dage, hvor hun fik behandling med smertestillende medicin.
Først til jul kunne hun droppe medicinen, men her ni måneder senere er smerterne stadig markante.
Nu advarer hun andre om at nærme sig helvedesplanten:
- Gå ikke i nærheden af ​​dem. Rør dem ikke. Det er farligt, slutter Naomi Lewis.
I delstaten har man efter en række lignende hændelser sat tydelige advarselsskilte i områder, hvor den australske brændenælde gror.
body_en:
Most of us can remember the disappointing feeling of burning ourselves on a stinging nettle as a child.
However, it is nothing compared to the hell of pain that a 42-year-old woman has experienced in the past nine months after she fell during a bicycle ride in the Australian state of Queensland last summer.
The article continues below the tweet...
Australia
Worst ever
Although she has given birth to four children, including three by caesarean section, Naomi Lewis tells the Australian
media ABC
, that she has never felt greater pain.
- 100 percent the worst pain ever. It was terrible, she explains to the media.
After falling on a mountain bike into the Australian nettle nicknamed Gympie-Gympie, her husband reacted quickly.
He headed for the nearest pharmacy where he bought wax to remove the fine hairs from the ends of the leaves that were stuck to Naomi Lewis's leg and left arm.
Here the ambulance was already on its way.
- I remember waiting for the ambulance and saying to my husband: 'I can't handle this'.
Warns others
By the time the ambulance reached the Lewis couple, the pain was excruciating.
- Then they continued to put heating blankets over my legs. I remember it was calming, says Naomi Lewis.
The 42-year-old mother was subsequently hospitalized for seven days, where she was treated with painkillers.
It wasn't until Christmas that she was able to drop the medication, but nine months later the pain is still significant.
Now she warns others to approach the hell plant:
- Don't go near them. Don't touch them. It is dangerous, concludes Naomi Lewis.
In the state, after a series of similar incidents, clear warning signs have been placed in areas where the Australian nettle grows.

title: Putin fyrer topgeneral efter voldsomme dødstal
subtitle: Flere mislykkede angreb i Østukraine har ledt til fyringen
body:
En russisk topgeneral er for nylig blevet fyret efter flere mislykkede angreb.
Det skriver det britiske forsvarsministerium i sin seneste
opdatering
om krigen mellem Rusland og Ukraine.
Her oplyser de, at Putin har fyret en topgeneral, der har ledt Ruslands invasion af Ukraine, og som har spillet en central rolle i det østlige Ukraine.
Mere specifikt er der tale om den russiske generaloberst Rustam Muradov, der ledte den russiske militærgruppe Eastern Group of Forces.
Store tab
Fyringen kommer oven på flere af gruppens fejlende angreb.
Et af angrebene var på den østukrainske by Vuhledar, der ligger i Donbas-regionen.
Ifølge det britiske forsvarsministerium prøvede russiske styrker flere gange at overtage den ukrainske by, men det endte i stedet med voldsomme dødstal blandt russerne.
Artiklen fortsætter under videoen ...
Putin giver opsang til Danmark
Samtidig er der blandt flere medier blevet meldt, at Rusland har tabt og opgivet massevis af kampvogne i området.
- Flere fyringer på vej
Operationerne modtog derfor intens offentlig kritik i Rusland og blandt generalens egne tropper.
Derfor er han nu fyret.
Muradov overtog gruppen, efter at de tidligere var mislykkedes med at overtage den ukrainske hovedstad, Kiev, i starten af invasionen.
Forsvarsministeriet melder samtidig ud, at der højst sandsynligt vil blive fyret flere centrale militærledere.
Der sker på baggrund af Ruslands fejlende missioner i Donbas.
Læs mere om det seneste fra krigen i Ukraine her:
Putins bidske hunde
Britiske efterretninger: Vil erstatte den brutale Wagner-gruppe
Putin sender stikpille til Danmark
body_en:
A top Russian general has recently been fired after several failed attacks.
This is what the British Ministry of Defense writes in its latest
update
about the war between Russia and Ukraine.
Here they state that Putin has fired a top general who led Russia's invasion of Ukraine and who played a central role in eastern Ukraine.
More specifically, we are talking about the Russian Colonel-General Rustam Muradov, who led the Russian military group Eastern Group of Forces.
Great losses
The dismissal comes on top of several of the group's failed attacks.
One of the attacks was on the eastern Ukrainian town of Vuhledar, located in the Donbas region.
According to the British Ministry of Defence, Russian forces tried several times to take over the Ukrainian city, but it instead ended with a heavy death toll among the Russians.
The article continues below the video...
Putin gives notice to Denmark
At the same time, several media have reported that Russia has lost and abandoned a lot of tanks in the area.
- More layoffs on the way
The operations therefore received intense public criticism in Russia and among the general's own troops.
That is why he is now fired.
Muradov took over the group after they had previously failed to take over the Ukrainian capital, Kiev, at the start of the invasion.
At the same time, the Ministry of Defense announces that several key military leaders will most likely be fired.
It is happening against the background of Russia's failing missions in Donbas.
Read more about the latest from the war in Ukraine here:
Putin's biting dogs
British intelligence: Will replace the brutal Wagner group

title: Forsvarsadvokaten: Dette skal en sigtet aldrig gøre
subtitle: Den profilerede forsvarsadvokat Henrik Garlik deler sin unikke viden fra retssager og særligt, hvad man aldrig skal gøre som sigtet
body:
For nogle er det helt nyt. Andre har været igennem møllen før og kender proceduren.
Uanset hvad kan der opstå en del spørgsmål, hvis man bliver anholdt af politiet og sigtet i en straffesag. Det fortæller Henrik Garlik, der i sine 27 år som forsvarer har ført tusindvis af straffesager ved de danske domstole. Heriblandt store narkosager, voldssager og drabssager.
- Klienterne har altid mange praktiske spørgsmål, som omhandler deres familie, hvem dommeren og anklageren er, og hvad de skal have på i retten. Mit svar er altid, at personen skal komme i det tøj, de føler sig tilpas i. Man kan hurtigt gennemskue, om folk ikke er vant til at gå i jakkesæt, siger Henrik Garlik.
Er man sigtet i en sag, skal der som udgangspunkt beskikkes en forsvarer. Oftest kan man selv vælge, men i nogle tilfælde vil retten beskikke en offentlig forsvarer.
Dette skal man som klient lade være med
Inden for 24 timer af anholdelsen skal man i grundlovsforhør, hvor man stilles for en dommer, der skal tage stilling til, om man skal varetægtsfængsles. Her anbefaler Henrik Garlik altid sine klienter, at de ikke skal udtale sig.
- Jeg har set rigtig mange dårlige eksempler på klienter, der udtaler sig ved grundlovsforhør. Der skal de simpelthen benytte deres ret til ikke at udtale sig. Hvis sigtede senere retter bare lidt i sin forklaring, bliver de bombarderet med beskyldninger fra anklageren om, at de ikke er troværdige. Det er bedst at vente med at udtale sig, til vi har fået adgang til politiets materiale, forklarer forsvarsadvokaten.
Forskellen på sigtet og tiltalt
Når Henrik Garlik har fået udleveret politiets materiale, er hans vigtigste opgave at sætte sig ind i og fremlægge politiets materiale for den sigtede. Hvis klienten ikke er varetægtsfængslet, holder han møder med klienten, hvor det nu giver mening. Ellers besøger han den sigtede i arresten.
- Det gør jeg så ofte, som det er nødvendigt. Det er vigtigt, at der opstår en vis kemi, for i forbindelse med varetægtsfængslingen er forsvareren den eneste, den sigtede må have kontakt til og kan have tillid til. Så man må lægge øre til mange personlige ting såsom afsavn til familien, fortæller Henrik Garlik.
Uanset om møderne foregår i eller uden for arresten, spørger han klienten, om der er andet, han skal vide, og om der er nogen vidner, som kan gøre ham klogere på sagen.
Dette er strengt forbudt at gøre som forsvarer
Der er særligt én bestemt ting, som klienterne forventer, at forsvarsadvokaten klæder dem på til, men det er strengt forbudt at gøre.
- De fleste spørger, hvad de skal sige i retten. Mange misforstår det og tror, det er forsvarsadvokatens rolle at hjælpe med at afgive en forklaring. Sådan er det ikke. Det er tjenestemisbrug at gøre det, fortæller Henrik Garlik.
Det er også en misforståelse, at forsvarsadvokaten altid har i sinde at vinde sagen.
- Anklagemyndigheden rejser tiltale i de sager, hvor de mener, de kan få dømt vedkommende, så vi er ikke ude i en 50/50-ordning. Jeg har en interesse i, at min klient får en retfærdig rettergang, siger Henrik Garlik slutteligt.
Læs mere her:
Helikopterlægens vilde arbejde: Lever for akut handling
Bomberydderen: Her er det vildeste, jeg har oplevet
Med slamsugeren på arbejde: - Man skal være gjort af et særligt stof
body_en:
For some it is completely new. Others have been through the mill before and know the procedure.
Regardless, a number of questions may arise if you are arrested by the police and charged in a criminal case. This is what Henrik Garlik says, who in his 27 years as a defense lawyer has handled thousands of criminal cases in the Danish courts. Including major drug cases, violent cases and murder cases.
- The clients always have many practical questions, which concern their family, who the judge and the prosecutor are and what they should wear in court. My answer is always that the person should wear the clothes they feel comfortable in. You can quickly see if people are not used to wearing suits, says Henrik Garlik.
If you are charged in a case, a defense attorney must be appointed as a general rule. Most often you can choose yourself, but in some cases the court will appoint a public defender.
As a client, you must leave this out
Within 24 hours of the arrest, you must have a constitutional hearing, where you will be brought before a judge who will decide whether you should be detained. Here, Henrik Garlik always advises his clients not to speak out.
- I have seen many bad examples of clients who speak out at constitutional hearings. There they simply have to exercise their right not to speak out. If the accused later corrects their explanation even slightly, they are bombarded with accusations from the prosecutor that they are not credible. It is best to wait to make a statement until we have had access to the police material, explains the defense attorney.
The difference between accused and accused
When Henrik Garlik has been handed over the police material, his most important task is to familiarize himself with and present the police material to the accused. If the client is not in custody, he holds meetings with the client where it makes sense. Otherwise, he visits the accused in custody.
- I do that as often as necessary. It is important that a certain chemistry develops, because in connection with custody, the defense attorney is the only person the accused must have contact with and can trust. So you have to pay attention to many personal things, such as missing the family, says Henrik Garlik.
Regardless of whether the meetings take place in or outside the detention center, he asks the client if there is anything else he needs to know and if there are any witnesses who can enlighten him on the case.
This is strictly forbidden to do as a defender
There is one particular thing in particular that the clients expect the defense attorney to dress them for, but it is strictly forbidden to do so.
- Most people ask what they should say in court. Many misunderstand this and think that it is the role of the defense attorney to help give a statement. It is not like that. It is abuse of service to do so, says Henrik Garlik.
It is also a misunderstanding that the defense attorney always has in mind to win the case.
- The prosecution brings charges in those cases where they believe they can get the person convicted, so we are not in a 50/50 arrangement. I have an interest in my client getting a fair trial, says Henrik Garlik in conclusion.

title: Se Jokkes bilag: Prins Light
subtitle: Luksuslivet er slut. Bruger penge på Easyjet, sandkage og cola
body:
Mens kronprins Frederik lever et luksusliv i sus og dus med privatchauffører til at køre ham rundt, når han skal på arbejde, så er det en ganske anden verden, lillebror Joachim de seneste år har bevæget rundt i som udsendt - eller udstødt - af Danmark.
Et kongeligt liv på første klasse er noget, Jokke må kigge langt efter, når han som forsvarsattaché rejser rundt på sine opgaver på statens regning.
Ekstra Bladet har fået aktindsigt i prinsens forbrug, mens han har været udsendt til Paris, og det afslører en særdeles mådeholdende kongelig.
God investering
Et af de første af prinsens bilag er på 290,82 kroner for køb af et landkort over Frankrig. Nok en god investering. For prins Joachim har kørt Frankrig tyndt i sin egen bil og scoret kilometerpenge - til statens takst på under to kroner pr. kørt kilometer, forstås.
Artiklen fortsætter ...
Alene sidste år kom han godt rundt i Frankrig.
I maj 2022 gav det prinsen kørselsgodtgørelse for 824,6 kroner, da han mødtes med det franske regiment i Mourmelon. I juni udløste det 1189,16 kroner i kørselspenge, da han deltog i ceremonien for D-dag i Normandiet.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
Men i marts måned 2022 lykkedes det dog Joachim at komme tilbage på sporet, når det kommer til luksus. Ikke i luften. Nej, Joachim tog toget på første klasse fra Lorient til Paris-stationen Montparnasse sent om aftenen, og derved kunne den lidt mere end tre timer lange tur i forbindelse med et maritimt møde klares for 409 kroner.
Det er dog ikke kun tog og bil, der har sendt prins Joachim rundt i Frankrig.
To stjerner
I november sidste skulle år prinsen byde velkommen til det såkaldte Space Innovation Event Toulouse
-
et netværksmøde til at fremme samarbejde mellem Danmark og Frankrig på investering i rumforskning.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
For ulejligheden kunne prins Joachim indkvartere sig Hotel Croix Baragnon. Hotellet udmærker sig ved at have to stjerner med særdeles spartansk indrettede værelser, og prinsen kunne efterfølgende aflevere et bilag på 1176,46 kroner for to nætter.
Heller ikke turen til Toulouse blev foretaget på første klasse. Tværtimod fløj prinsen med lavprisselskabet Easyjet - pris 817 kroner. Til sammenligning var storebror Frederik i Rotterdam i juni samme år. Han fløj med forsvarets privatfly, hvilket kostede skatteborgerne 391.812 kroner for en returbillet.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
Ekstra Bladet ville selvfølgelig gerne have talt med prins Joachim om hans nye og beskedne liv. Kongehusets kommunikationsafdeling melder hus forbi og henviser til Udenrigsministeriet. Her er meldingen, at prinsen ikke har mulighed for at stille op til interview. Heller ikke en direkte henvendelse til prinsen har båret frugt.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Billig vin og sprøde cigaretter
Heller ikke når det kommer til døgnets måltider, er prins Joachim blevet mødt af en butler med sølvbakke, når sulten har meldt sig.
Tværtimod går det igen, at hans kongelige højhed primært sætter tænderne i simple måltider som skinkesandwich og madpandekager med fyld - gerne skyllet ned med danskvand eller cola.
Bilagene viser også, at prinsen har en sød tand. Brownies, sandkager, mandelkager, cookies og sprøde cigaretformede vafler er blandt de søde sager, Joachim har snacket. Hans sønderjyske fortid fornægter sig ikke.
Artiklen fortsætter ...
Prinsens morgenmad, når han er i felten som forsvarsattaché, består oftest af croissanter enten med eller uden chokolade, og noget tyder på, at han på ingen måde er for fin til at tage med til andre.
Et af bilagene er på 40 minicroissanter - 20 med og 20 uden chokolade. Pris: 275 kroner.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
Heller ikke aftensmaden indtager Joachim på Michelin-stjernede restauranter. Prinsen var i juli 2021 vært for en reception for 50 personer og bestilte mad fra et cateringfirma i Montebourg. Han trakterede forsamlingen for 8904 kroner - en kuvertpris på under 180 kroner.
Der blev under receptionen konsumeret 12 flasker hvidvin og 12 flasker rød fra den absolut billige ende af vinkortet. Hvidvinen kostede 66 kroner pr. flaske, mens den røde løb op i knap 74 kroner.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Indlogeret på slidt kaserne
I februar i år var prins Joachim hjemme i Danmark til den årlige forsvarskonference i Aalborg.
Nordens Paris, som nordjyderne ynder at kalde deres hovedstad, byder på glimrende hoteller, men dronningens yngste søn blev indlogeret under særdeles primitive forhold.
Joachim skulle i tre nætter knalde brikker på Hvorup Kaserne, der i dag er kendt som Aalborg Kaserne. Og som i øvrigt er blandt de kaserner, der er blevet beskrevet som værende 'ikke i god stand'.
De samlede udgifter til prinsens tur til Aalborg beløber sig til 1119 kroner.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Mette betaler
53-årige prins Joachim belaster ikke Forsvarets budget med udgifter til løn. Han har, siden han blev deporteret til Frankrig i 2020, fået dispensation til at få sine årpenge med til udlandet. Med en indkomst på knap fire millioner kroner om året er prins Joachim den højestlønnede forsvarsattaché, Danmark har.
Der er flertal i Folketinget til regeringens forslag om, at Joachim kan få sine 330.450 kroner om måneden med til Washington, når han i september tiltræder stillingen som forsvarsindustriattaché der.
I sammenligning får kronprinsen 1.869.573 kroner om måneden i apanage, hvoraf han skal give ti procent til Mary.
KUN FOR +KUNDER
body_en:
While Crown Prince Frederik lives a life of luxury in the hustle and bustle with private drivers to drive him around when he has to go to work, it is a completely different world that younger brother Joachim has moved around in recent years as an exile - or expelled - from Denmark.
A first-class royal life is something Jokke has to look far for when, as a defense attache, he travels around on his assignments at the state's expense.
Ekstra Bladet has obtained document access to the prince's spending while he has been posted to Paris, and this reveals a particularly moderate royal.
Good investment
One of the first of the prince's vouchers is for DKK 290.82 for the purchase of a map of France. Still a good investment. For Prince Joachim, he has driven France thinly in his own car and scored mileage money - at the state's rate of less than two kroner per hour. Kilometers driven, of course.
The article continues...
Last year alone he got around France well.
In May 2022, it gave the prince a travel allowance of 824.6 kroner when he met with the French regiment in Mourmelon. In June, it triggered DKK 1189.16 in travel money when he participated in the ceremony for D-Day in Normandy.
The article continues below the picture...
But in the month of March 2022, Joachim managed to get back on track when it comes to luxury. Not in the air. No, Joachim took the train in first class from Lorient to the Paris station Montparnasse late in the evening, and thus the slightly more than three-hour trip in connection with a maritime meeting could be completed for 409 kroner.
However, it is not only trains and cars that have sent Prince Joachim around France.
Two stars
Last November, the year the prince was to welcome the so-called Space Innovation Event Toulouse
-
a network meeting to promote cooperation between Denmark and France on investment in space research.
The article continues below the picture...
For the inconvenience, Prince Joachim could accommodate himself at the Hotel Croix Baragnon. The hotel is distinguished by having two stars with particularly spartanly furnished rooms, and the prince was subsequently able to hand over a voucher of DKK 1176.46 for two nights.
Nor was the trip to Toulouse made in first class. On the contrary, the prince flew with the low-cost company Easyjet - price DKK 817. By comparison, older brother Frederik was in Rotterdam in June of the same year. He flew with the defense's private plane, which cost taxpayers DKK 391,812 for a return ticket.
The article continues below the picture...
Ekstra Bladet would of course have liked to talk to Prince Joachim about his new and modest life. The Royal Palace's communications department reports the house by and refers to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Here is the message that the prince does not have the opportunity to appear for an interview. Nor has a direct approach to the prince borne fruit.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Cheap wine and crisp cigarettes
Not even when it comes to the meals of the day, Prince Joachim has been greeted by a butler with a silver tray when he is hungry.
On the contrary, it turns out that His Royal Highness primarily sinks his teeth into simple meals such as ham sandwiches and food pancakes with filling - preferably washed down with sparkling water or cola.
The appendices also show that the prince has a sweet tooth. Brownies, shortbread, almond cakes, cookies and crispy cigarette-shaped waffles are among the sweets Joachim has snacked on. His South Jutland past does not deny itself.
The article continues...
The prince's breakfast, when he is in the field as a defense attaché, usually consists of croissants either with or without chocolate, and something suggests that he is by no means too nice to take to others.
One of the attachments is for 40 mini croissants - 20 with and 20 without chocolate. Price: DKK 275.
The article continues below the picture...
Joachim does not eat dinner at Michelin-starred restaurants either. In July 2021, the Prince hosted a reception for 50 people and ordered food from a catering company in Montebourg. He treated the gathering for 8,904 kroner - an envelope price of less than 180 kroner.
During the reception, 12 bottles of white wine and 12 bottles of red from the absolutely cheap end of the wine list were consumed. The white wine cost 66 kroner per bottle, while the red ran up to almost DKK 74.
The article continues below the picture...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Lodged in worn-out barracks
In February this year, Prince Joachim was at home in Denmark for the annual defense conference in Aalborg.
The Paris of the North, which the people of North Jutland like to call their capital, offers excellent hotels, but the queen's youngest son was lodged in extremely primitive conditions.
Joachim had to spend three nights knocking pieces at Hvorup Barracks, which today is known as Aalborg Barracks. And which, by the way, is among the barracks that have been described as being 'not in good condition'.
The total expenses for the prince's trip to Aalborg amount to 1119 kroner.
The article continues below the picture...
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Mette pays
53-year-old Prince Joachim does not burden the Defense budget with salary expenses. Since he was deported to France in 2020, he has been granted a dispensation to take his annual allowance abroad. With an income of just under four million kroner a year, Prince Joachim is the highest paid defense attaché in Denmark.
There is a majority in the Folketing for the government's proposal that Joachim can take his 330,450 kroner a month to Washington when he takes up the position of defense industry attache there in September.
In comparison, the crown prince receives 1,869,573 kroner per month in appanage, of which he must give ten percent to Mary.
ONLY FOR + CUSTOMERS

title: Joachim indfriede Kjærs store ønske
subtitle: Christian Kjær havde et særligt ønske til sin runde fødselsdag - dronningens yngste søn sørgede for, at det gik i opfyldelse
body:
Det var et hårdt slag for Christian Kjær, da han i 2019 fik frataget sine
fine kongelige titler
.
Årsagen var den betingede dom på 30 dage, som Kjær modtog efter en sag fra 2018 om en påkørsel af en official ved et cykelløb i Nordsjælland.
Under fejringen af hans 80-års fødselsdag på Sophienlyst Slot i weekenden spurgte Ekstra Bladet Christian Kjær om til forholdet til den kongelige familie.
- Godt, lød hans korte svar, og fødselarens kone, Susan Astani, fortæller, at især forholdet til prins Joachim er særdeles godt.
Opkald fra prinsen
- Prins Joachim ringede til Christian for at ønske tillykke. Vi har det rigtigt godt med Joachim og hans familie. Han er et super-rart menneske, fortæller Susan Astani.
Det var også den 53-årige prins, der sørgede for, at Christian Kjær fik det at drikke til sin fødselsdag, som han ønskede sig.
- Christian ville gerne have prins Henriks vin. Så Joachim sørgede for, at vi fik den sendt direkte fra Caix, siger Susan Astani.
Hun fortæller, at forholdet til den kongelige familie er fint - også selvom Christian Kjær mistede sine titler.
- Han synes, at det var uretfærdigt. Men sådan er det. Vi har det godt med familien.
- Har Christian fået en personlig hilsen fra dronningen i anledning af sin runde dag?
- Det ved jeg ikke endnu. Han har fået så mange gaver og blomster, så jeg har slet ikke overblik over det endnu, siger Susan Astani.
Ikke hende
Da Ekstra Bladet talte med Christian Kjær i forbindelse med weekendens festligheder, fortalte han, at han ikke mente, at det var dronningen, der stod bag, at han skulle fratages sine titler som kammerherre og hofjægermester, samt at han mistede sit ridderkors.
- Jeg tror ikke, det var hende, sagde han og fortalte, at han ikke er sur på majestæten.
Kryptisk udmelding om dronning Margrethe: - Jeg tror ikke, det var hende
Prins Joachim var inviteret til Kjærs 80-års fødselsdagsfest, men var forhindret i at komme.
Christian Kjær - Sagen kort
body_en:
It was a hard blow for Christian Kjær, when he was deprived of his in 2019
fine royal titles
.
The reason was the conditional sentence of 30 days that Kjær received after a case from 2018 about hitting an official at a cycle race in North Zealand.
During the celebration of his 80th birthday at Sophienlyst Castle this weekend, Ekstra Bladet asked Christian Kjær about his relationship with the royal family.
- Good, was his short answer, and the birthday boy's wife, Susan Astani, says that the relationship with Prince Joachim in particular is extremely good.
Call from the prince
- Prince Joachim called Christian to congratulate him. We feel really good with Joachim and his family. He is a super-nice person, says Susan Astani.
It was also the 53-year-old prince who made sure that Christian Kjær got what he wanted to drink for his birthday.
- Christian wanted Prince Henrik's wine. So Joachim made sure that we had it sent directly from Caix, says Susan Astani.
She says that the relationship with the royal family is fine - even though Christian Kjær lost his titles.
- He thinks it was unfair. But that's how it is. We have a good time with the family.
- Has Christian received a personal greeting from the queen on the occasion of his big day?
- I do not know yet. He has received so many gifts and flowers, so I don't have an overview of it yet, says Susan Astani.
Not her
When Ekstra Bladet spoke to Christian Kjær in connection with the weekend's celebrations, he said that he did not think that it was the queen who was behind him being stripped of his titles as chamberlain and master huntsman, and that he lost his knight's cross.
- I don't think it was her, he said and said that he is not mad at the majesty.
Cryptic announcement about Queen Margrethe: - I don't think it was her
Prince Joachim was invited to Kjær's 80th birthday party, but was prevented from coming.
Christian Kjær - The case in brief

 'Prins Joachim' 'Sophienlyst Slot' 'Susan Astani']

title: Danske soldater i prostitutions- og bombekaos
subtitle: Adskillige gange er Forsvarets betalingskort blevet brugt til at købe seksuelle ydelser sidste år
body:
De danske soldater har glædeligt svinget Forsvarets betalingskort, når det kom til de mere kulørte - og i særlig grad private - udgifter.
Udgifterne spænder nemlig helt fra grænsehandel i Tyskland til prostitution af flere omgange i Schweiz.
Udover at bruge løs af statens penge til at tilfredsstille diverse lyster, er en soldat også blevet fanget i at opbevare heftige mængder af bomber og sprængstof i en lejlighed i København.
Sådan fremgår det af Forsvarsministeriets Auditørkorps - der er den militære anklagemyndighed - årsberetning.
Prostitution i Schweiz
Da en premierløjtnant sidste år var på tjenesterejse i Schweiz, fik han brugt sit tjenstligt udleverede firmahæftende betalingskort til rent privatforbrug.
Det private forbrug bestod af prostituerede.
Han vedtog en bøde på 3500 kroner for grov pligtforsømmelse, da han i fire tilfælde i løbet af sit ophold i alpelandet brugte Forsvarets betalingskort til at købe sig seksuelle ydelser til en samlet værdi af 14.632,16 kroner.
En korporal røg dog også i fælden og 'kom til' at bruge Forsvarets betalingskort, da han var på natklub. Han blev idømt en bøde på 2.500 kroner for grov pligtforsømmelse, da han bankede 6500 kroner af på natklubben. Det slog Københavns Byret fast i juni 2022.
Lidt mindre eksklusivt var det dog, da en seniorsergent måtte vedtage en bøde på 1500 kroner, da han i tre tilfælde fandt sig selv ved Fleggaard ved den dansk-tyske grænse. I alle tre tilfælde brugte han Forsvarets betalingskort til en samlet værdi af 758,84 kroner.
Kender du noget til sager om krænkelser, alkohol eller stoffer i Forsvaret? Så kan du kontakte journalisterne
her
.
Bombe i København
I den lidt mere alvorlige afdeling finder vi en sag, der blev afgjort ved Retten i Esbjerg i december.
Her blev en premierløjtnant nemlig idømt hele fire års fængsel for besiddelse af våben og eksplosivstoffer under særligt skærpende omstændigheder.
I forbindelse med en skydeøvelse i 2015 var han kommet i besiddelse af to brisantgranater, fire håndgranater med detonatorer og 500 gram formbart sprængstof - nogen han havde holdt fast på lige siden.
I første omgang opbevarede officeren nemlig bomberne på sit kontor på en kaserne, men i 2017 flyttede han hele molevitten med bil og færge til sin bopæl i København, hvor han opbevarede det på loftet i en beboelsesejendom.
Først i juni 2022 blev det opdaget, og udover at blive dømt efter straffeloven, så blev han ligeledes dømt for grov pligtforsømmelse, da han havde flere stykker skarp ammunition, en beskyttelsesvest og en kniv i strid med Forsvarets bestemmelser.
Næsten 2000 sager
Alt i alt blev der i 2020 oprettet 1859 sager i Forsvarsministeriets Auditørkorps.
808 af dem er straffesager, 521 er sager fra Hjemmeværnet, og 530 af dem er 'øvrige sager'.
Det samlede antal sager adskiller ikke meget fra tidligere år, hvor der i 2021 blev oprettet 1825 sager, i 2020 blev der oprettet 1952 sager, i 2019 blev der oprettet 1903 sager, og i 2018 kunne de nøjes med 1690 sager.
Ekstra Bladet har forsøgt at få et interview med forsvarschef Flemming Lentfer, men det har han 'takket nej' til.
I en pressemeddelelse, der blev udsendt i forbindelse med årsberetningen, sagde han dog følgende om misbrug af kreditkort:
- Misbrug af betalingskort skal minimeres og derfor have konsekvenser. For Forsvarets ansatte skal naturligvis følge de gældende regler. Det gør langt de fleste heldigvis også.
Om våbensikkerhed sagde Flemming Lentfer:
- Der er naturligvis tale om alvorlige – men heldigvis få - sager. Det siger sig selv, når der er tale om Forsvarets våben og ammunition.
- Når det er sagt, så skal soldater have adgang til våben og ammunition for at kunne øve, træne og løse deres opgaver, og Forsvaret har i dagligdagen generelt et stort fokus på sikkerheden i forbindelse med opbevaring og udlevering af våben for at mindske risikoen for misbrug og tyveri, og for at sikre kontrol med våben og ammunition, siger forsvarschefen.
body_en:
The Danish soldiers happily waved the Armed Forces payment card when it came to the more colorful - and to a particular extent private - expenses.
The costs range from cross-border trafficking in Germany to multiple rounds of prostitution in Switzerland.
In addition to using the state's money to satisfy various desires, a soldier has also been caught storing large quantities of bombs and explosives in an apartment in Copenhagen.
This appears from the Ministry of Defence's Auditor Corps - which is the military prosecution authority - annual report.
Prostitution in Switzerland
When a first lieutenant was on a business trip in Switzerland last year, he was allowed to use his official company-issued payment card for purely private use.
Private consumption consisted of prostitutes.
He accepted a fine of DKK 3,500 for serious dereliction of duty when, in four cases during his stay in the Alpine country, he used the Armed Forces payment card to buy sexual services to a total value of DKK 14,632.16.
However, a corporal also fell into the trap and 'got' to use the Armed Forces payment card when he was at a nightclub. He was sentenced to a fine of DKK 2,500 for gross dereliction of duty when he cashed DKK 6,500 at the nightclub. This was decided by Copenhagen City Council in June 2022.
It was a little less exclusive, however, when a senior sergeant had to accept a fine of 1,500 kroner when he found himself at Fleggaard on the Danish-German border in three cases. In all three cases, he used the Armed Forces payment card for a total value of DKK 758.84.
Do you know anything about cases of violations, alcohol or drugs in the Armed Forces? Then you can contact the journalists
here
.
Bomb in Copenhagen
In the slightly more serious department, we find a case that was decided at the Court in Esbjerg in December.
Here, a first lieutenant was sentenced to a full four years in prison for possession of weapons and explosives under particularly aggravating circumstances.
In connection with a shooting exercise in 2015, he had come into possession of two high-explosive grenades, four hand grenades with detonators and 500 grams of malleable explosives - something he had held on to ever since.
Initially, the officer kept the bombs in his office in a barracks, but in 2017 he moved the entire pier by car and ferry to his residence in Copenhagen, where he stored it in the attic of a residential property.
It was only discovered in June 2022, and in addition to being sentenced under the Criminal Code, he was also convicted of gross dereliction of duty, as he had several pieces of live ammunition, a protective vest and a knife in violation of the regulations of the Armed Forces.
Almost 2000 cases
All in all, in 2020, 1,859 cases were created in the Ministry of Defence's Auditor Corps.
808 of them are criminal cases, 521 are cases from the Home Guard, and 530 of them are 'other cases'.
The total number of cases does not differ much from previous years, where in 2021 1825 cases were created, in 2020 1952 cases were created, in 2019 1903 cases were created, and in 2018 they could make do with 1690 cases.
Ekstra Bladet has tried to get an interview with defense chief Flemming Lentfer, but he has 'turned it down'.
In a press release issued in connection with the annual report, however, he said the following about credit card abuse:
- Abuse of payment cards must be minimized and therefore have consequences. Employees of the Armed Forces must of course follow the applicable regulations. Fortunately, the vast majority do too.
Flemming Lentfer said about gun safety:
- These are of course serious - but fortunately few - cases. This goes without saying when it comes to the Armed Forces' weapons and ammunition.
- Having said that, soldiers must have access to weapons and ammunition in order to be able to practice, train and complete their tasks, and the Armed Forces generally have a great focus on security in connection with the storage and delivery of weapons in daily life in order to reduce the risk of abuse and theft, and to ensure control of weapons and ammunition, says the defense chief.

title: Lund Madsen: Der er altid lavvande i kassen
subtitle: Radioværten Anders Lund Madsen var bange for Katmandu, men 'absurd tiltrukket' af Nepals bjerge
body:
Når man har syv børn og et barnebarn, er der altid lavvande i kassen, og da Anders Lund Madsen ikke har haft fastansættelse nogen steder, siden han i slutningnen af 1990'erne forlod Ekstra Bladet, hopper han fra tue til tue for at hive hyre hjem til familien. Denne gang hed 'tuen' så Nepal og tv-programmet 'The Journey'.
- Det var simpelthen for åndssvagt at sige 'nej' til et tilbud om at komme til Nepal. Hvornår kommer man lige der igen? Men samtidig brød jeg mig ikke om tanken om Katmandu - en storby i et af de mest indviklede hjørner af Asien. Jeg tænkte, at det måtte være ligesom at være på Roskilde Festival konstant i flere uger. Det lyder måske mærkeligt. Men da vi så kom af sted, fandt jeg ud af, at vi var en kæmpe produktion, og at vi deltagere på den måde var skærmet.
Lund Madsen erkender, at han nok - næst efter Stig Tøfting - var den mindst spirituelle af deltagerne.
- Man er på mange måder fucked, hvis man ikke lige fanger ånden med det samme. Det begyndte da også med, at vi skulle velsignes af en munk. Det var meget 'munket', og jeg tænkte: 'o.k. - så leger vi den leg, og så går vi ud i junglen'. Men på en eller anden måde vokser det på én. Måske fordi alt forekommer tidsløst. Da jeg for år siden var over Atlanten i en båd, havde vi firetimersvagter i et fast skema. I Nepal ophørte tiden med at eksistere. Vi flød bare med og mærkede roen.
Er blevet et bedre menneske
Hvad kan man få med hjem fra sådan en tur? For Anders Lund Madsen har gevinsten været, at han er blevet et rarere menneske.
- Det er altså ikke noget, jeg siger. Det er udsagn fra familien. Jeg er blevet meget rarere, og det er da et dejligt resultat af en rejse.
Faktisk er Lund Madsen så taknemmelig for sit udkomme og sine oplevelser, at han ikke havde behøvet at få penge for turen.
- På den anden side ville jeg ikke skuffe produktionsselskabet, derfor tog jeg imod pengene alligevel. Så blev der også lidt til alle børnene, griner han hjerteligt og tilføjer:
- Lige der er jeg meget pragmatisk. I min branche går det op og ned, så penge skal der til.
Selve traveturen i Nepal var på 15 dage, og Lund Madsen var i godt selskab med Christiane Schaumburg-Müller Åxman, Josephine Højbjerg, Stig Tøfting, Søs Egelind og Dulfi Al-Jabouri.
'The Journey' er har premiere 8. maj på Viaplay.
body_en:
When you have seven children and a grandchild, the coffers are always low, and since Anders Lund Madsen has not had permanent employment anywhere since he left Ekstra Bladet at the end of the 1990s, he jumps from place to place in order to hire home to the family. This time the 'tuen' was called Nepal and the TV program 'The Journey'.
- It was simply too weak-minded to say 'no' to an offer to come to Nepal. When will you get there again? But at the same time, I didn't care for the idea of ​​Kathmandu - a big city in one of the most intricate corners of Asia. I thought it must be like being at Roskilde Festival constantly for several weeks. It might sound strange. But when we set off, I found out that we were a huge production and that we participants were thus shielded.
Lund Madsen acknowledges that he was probably - second only to Stig Tøfting - the least spiritual of the participants.
- You're screwed in many ways if you don't catch the spirit right away. It also started with us having to be blessed by a monk. It was very 'monkey' and I thought: 'o.k. - then we play that game, and then we go out into the jungle'. But somehow it grows on one. Maybe because everything seems timeless. When I was across the Atlantic in a boat years ago, we had four-hour shifts on a fixed schedule. In Nepal, time ceased to exist. We just floated along and felt the calm.
Have become a better person
What can you take home from such a trip? For Anders Lund Madsen, the gain has been that he has become a nicer person.
- So that's not what I'm saying. This is a statement from the family. I have become much nicer, and that is a wonderful result of a trip.
In fact, Lund Madsen is so grateful for his outcome and his experiences that he did not need to get money for the trip.
- On the other hand, I didn't want to disappoint the production company, so I accepted the money anyway. Then there was also some for all the children, he laughs heartily and adds:
- Right there, I am very pragmatic. In my industry there are ups and downs, so money is needed.
The actual trotting trip in Nepal lasted 15 days, and Lund Madsen was in good company with Christiane Schaumburg-Müller Åxman, Josephine Højbjerg, Stig Tøfting, Søs Egelind and Dulfi Al-Jabouri.
'The Journey' premieres on May 8 on Viaplay.
ner_clusters:
['Anders Lund Madsen' 'Asien' 'Atlanten'

 'Ekstra Bladet' 'Josephine Højbjerg' 'Katmandu' 'Nepal'
 'Roskilde Festival' 'Søs Egelind' 'Stig Tøfting' 'The Journey']

title: Luksus-konkurs undersøges: Offentlige millioner væltede ind
subtitle: Sinitone modtog 48,7 millioner kroner af de fem regioner fra stiftelsen i 2019 til konkursen i år. Nu undersøges det, om alt er foregået efter bogen
body:
Ved du noget? Så skriv til journalisterne bag historien
her
.
Nok var
aktiverne tilsynelandende opskrevet med millioner af kroner
, men det væltede også ind med reelle midler i høreapparatsfirmaet Sinitone, inden det gik konkurs med et brag omkring årsskiftet.
Det sørgede statskassen for,
mens ejerne levede i luksus med dyre biler og boliger
.
Selskabets koncept var at køre ud til ældre, give dem en høretest og sælge et høreapparat.
Og for at høreapparater ikke bliver for dyrt for kunderne, spytter staten penge i som tilskud. Dem har Sinitone fået masser af.
FAKTA Høreapparater - regler
I alt blev der fra stiftelsen i 2019 og frem til konkursen udbetalt 48,7 millioner kroner i tilskud fra de fem danske regioner.
Det viser aktindsigter, som Ekstra Bladet har fået hos de danske regioner.
Sinitone - regionerne
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Undersøges
Ifølge Per Monberg, der er direktør i det genopståede Hørebil
, som har købt aktiverne fra Sinitone og forsøger at drive virksomheden videre på reel vis, foregik alt ikke efter bogen i Sinitone.
- Den mest ekstreme afart er, at man har indgivet en ansøgning om støtte hos regionen eller kommunen i det øjeblik, der blev foretaget en høreprøve. Men en høreprøve er bare en foreløbig test, og personen behøver ikke nødvendigvis at have fået høreapparatet, men virksomheden har alligevel fået tilskuddet.
- Ofte får personerne apparatet, og så er alt i den skønneste orden. Men kæden hopper af, når kunden alligevel ikke får høreapparatet, for så skal støtten jo ikke udbetales til virksomheden. Og det er derfor, at forretningsgangen i dag er sådan, at der først bliver søgt om støtte, når apparatet er købt. Og det er sådan, at det skal være, siger han til Ekstra Bladet.
Og det bliver netop nu undersøgt, om selskabet har fået udbetalt en del af de mange millioner kroner på et falsk grundlag.
Det bekræfter Region Syddanmark i en mail til Ekstra Bladet.
'Ja, CKV (Center for Kommunikation og Velfærdsteknologi i regionen, red.) har få sager, aktuelt, hvor borgeren har returneret høreapparaterne efter en kort afprøvningsperiode, men hvor Sinitone har hævet tilskuddet alligevel,' lyder det i et mailsvar.
Det bliver videre oplyst, at der er tale om tre sager på nuværende tidspunkt, der i øjeblikket bliver undersøgt nærmere. Desuden afventer regionen en liste fra kuratorerne omkring flere borgere, der kan være kommet i klemme. Regionen forventer dog ikke at blive væltet af sager.
'De fleste borgere, der har afleveret høreapparater retur efter afprøvningsperiode, vil typisk hurtigt opsøge en anden forhandler og dermed opdage, at deres tilskud ER hævet,' lyder det videre.
FAKTA Sinitones millionkollaps
Ekstra Bladet har været i kontakt med de andre regioner.
Region Hovedstaden bekræfter over for Ekstra Bladet, at regionen har oplevet fejl i forbindelse med Sinitones tilskud. Disse fejl har de dog efterfølgende fået rettet op på, oplyser regionen i et mailsvar.
Også Region Sjælland har konstateret fejl, som de dog 'fik rettet op på ved at ændre nogle arbejdsgange,' lyder det.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Direktør tavs - bestyrelsesformand rystet
Ekstra Bladet har sendt Rasmus Bjerregaard en række spørgsmål på mail, men han har ikke reageret på henvendelserne eller besvaret på skrift.
Bestyrelsesformand Torben Linnet Albrekt afviser i en mail, at han har haft noget at gøre med tilskuddene fra regionerne. Ifølge ham var det Rasmus Bjerregaard, der som direktør håndterede ansøgning om støtte og fakturering af den slags sager.
'Jeg ved, at efter audiologerne havde været ude ved en klient, så skulle der sidst på dagen laves en dagsrapport. Disse dagsrapporter blev dagligt gennemgået af den adm. direktør og hans personlige assistent (navn udeladt, red.), hvorefter den. adm. direktør genererede i systemet, hvad der skulle ske, eks. udstedelse af en faktura. Dette kan også ses via loggen. Dog fortæller loggen ikke, om der har været et reelt salg eller ej,' skriver Torben Linnet Albrekt.
'Kunder er kommet i klemme, fordi det kun er muligt at søge tilskud én gang hvert fjerde år, og fordi I allerede har hævet tilskud på deres vegne. Hvad tænker du om det?'
'Jeg er rystet over den uansvarlighed og grådighed. Men ser man på alle de andre ting, som er blevet gjort uretmæssigt i selskabet, så kommer det ikke længere som en overraskelse. Jeg føler, at alt har handlet om grådighed.'
'Du har tidligere bekræftet, at I ikke afholdt bestyrelsesmøder. Hvad lavede du for de 3,2 millioner kroner, du fik i årligt honorar?'
'Jeg lavede fuldtids bestyrelsesarbejde og er desuden den, der byggede og udviklede virksomheden indtil 2021. Rasmus var ikke til stede de første 12+ måneder. Jeg sov på kontoret de første 18 måneder og arbejdede i døgndrift 16 timer om dagen. Herefter gik jeg i gang med at sælge virksomheden for op imod 400 mio. Dkr. Og i den periode, hvor jeg ikke var på kontoret fast, da jeg ikke havde med den daglige drift at gøre.'
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Ejerne af Sinitone levede i luksus i tiden op til konkursen. Det vanvittige forbrug kan du læse meget mere om
her
, mens du
her
kan se deres vilde lønsedler.
Alle historier - Sinitone
ALT OM EMILIE MENG-SAGEN
body_en:
Do you know anything? Then write to the journalists behind the story
here
.
Enough was
the assets apparently written up by millions of kroner
, but it also poured real funds into the hearing aid company Sinitone, before it went bankrupt with a bang around the turn of the year.
The Treasury ensured that
while the owners lived in luxury with expensive cars and homes
.
The company's concept was to drive out to the elderly, give them a hearing test and sell a hearing aid.
And so that hearing aids do not become too expensive for customers, the state spits money in as a subsidy. Sinitone has got plenty of them.
FACTS Hearing aids - rules
In total, from the foundation in 2019 until the bankruptcy, DKK 48.7 million in subsidies were paid out from the five Danish regions.
This is shown by access to documents that Ekstra Bladet has obtained from the Danish regions.
Sinitone - the regions
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Under investigation
According to Per Monberg, director of the resurrected Hørebil
, which has bought the assets from Sinitone and is trying to run the company on in a real way, everything did not go according to the book in Sinitone.
- The most extreme variant is that an application for support has been submitted to the region or municipality at the moment a hearing test was carried out. But a hearing test is just a preliminary test, and the person does not necessarily need to have received the hearing aid, but the company has received the grant anyway.
- Often the people get the device, and then everything is in perfect order. But the chain jumps off when the customer does not get the hearing aid anyway, because then the support does not have to be paid to the company. And that is why the business process today is such that support is only applied for when the device has been purchased. And that is how it should be, he says to Ekstra Bladet.
And it is currently being investigated whether the company has been paid a part of the many millions of kroner on a false basis.
This is confirmed by the Region of Southern Denmark in an email to Ekstra Bladet.
'Yes, CKV (Center for Communication and Welfare Technology in the region, ed.) has a few cases, currently, where the citizen has returned the hearing aids after a short trial period, but where Sinitone has raised the subsidy anyway,' reads an email reply.
It is further stated that there are currently three cases which are currently being investigated further. In addition, the region is waiting for a list from the curators about several citizens who may have gotten into trouble. However, the region does not expect to be overwhelmed by cases.
'Most citizens who have returned hearing aids after a trial period will typically quickly seek out another dealer and thus discover that their subsidy IS increased,' it continues.
FACTS Sinitone's million-dollar collapse
Ekstra Bladet has been in contact with the other regions.
Region Hovedstaden confirms to Ekstra Bladet that the region has experienced errors in connection with Sinitone's subsidy. However, these errors have subsequently been rectified, the region states in an email reply.
Region Zealand has also identified errors, which they 'corrected by changing some workflows,' it says.
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
Director silent - chairman shaken
Ekstra Bladet has sent Rasmus Bjerregaard a number of questions by email, but he has not responded to the inquiries or replied in writing.
Board chairman Torben Linnet Albrekt denies in an email that he had anything to do with the subsidies from the regions. According to him, it was Rasmus Bjerregaard who, as director, handled the application for support and the invoicing of such cases.
'I know that after the audiologists had been to a client, a daily report had to be made at the end of the day. These daily reports were reviewed daily by the CEO and his personal assistant (name omitted, ed.), after which the The managing director generated in the system what was to happen, e.g. issuing an invoice. This can also be seen via the log. However, the log does not tell whether there has been a real sale or not,' writes Torben Linnet Albrekt.
'Customers are in a pinch because it is only possible to apply for a subsidy once every four years and because you have already raised the subsidy on their behalf. What do you think about that?'
'I am appalled by the irresponsibility and greed. But if you look at all the other things that have been done improperly in the company, it no longer comes as a surprise. I feel like everything has been about greed.'
'You have previously confirmed that you did not hold board meetings. What did you do for the 3.2 million kroner you got as an annual fee?'
'I did full-time board work and am also the one who built and developed the company until 2021. Rasmus was not around for the first 12+ months. I slept in the office for the first 18 months and worked around the clock 16 hours a day. After that, I set about selling the company for up to DKK 400 million. DKK And during the period when I wasn't in the office permanently, since I wasn't involved with the day-to-day operations.'
--------- SPLIT ELEMENT ---------
The owners of Sinitone lived in luxury in the time leading up to the bankruptcy. You can read much more about the crazy consumption
here
, while you
here
can see their wild paychecks.

title: Nyt festfænomen møder kritik
subtitle: Et nyt 'festfænomen' har mødt kritik og bekymring. Ifølge Natteravnene smides unge ud og overlades til sig selv, hvis de bliver for berusede. Arrangørerne genkender ikke det billede
body:
Man kan næsten lugte sprutten og mærke det klistrede dansegulv, når man ser de videoer, festarrangørerne Rive Event deler på deres sociale medier fra deres '16+-fester' i Roskilde.
Her ses dansende unge mennesker i deres stiveste party-puds stimlet tæt sammen, imens de skråler med på tidens største hits.
Det lyder festligt, men arrangementerne, videoerne er fra, har ligesom arrangørerne bag fået heftig kritik den seneste tid.
Mange af videoerne deles særligt på TikTok, hvor der reklameres for de kommende '16+-fester', som også mange 15-årige kan deltage i. For så længe, man er født i 2007, er man velkommen. 'Også selvom man kun er 15 år', skriver arrangørerne.
Blandt andre
Sjællandske Nyheder
og
TV 2
har omtalt 'festfænomenet', der promoveres på sociale medier og tiltrækker stor opmærksomhed.
Overladt til sig selv
Blandt dem, der har udtrykt bekymring for arrangementerne, der foregår på Hestetorvet i Roskilde, er formand for Natteravnene i Roskilde Klaus Walmod.
- Vores dybeste bekymring er, at vi oplever berusede unge mennesker blive sat uden for døren og overladt til sig selv. Og det er uanset vejret. Jeg synes, at det er bekymrende, at man overlader unge, berusede mennesker til sig selv på den måde, siger han til Ekstra Bladet.
Formanden fortæller, at flere af hans kolleger hos Natteravnene har set berusede unge bliver overladt til sig selv, og at de er særligt opmærksomme på at passere stedet, når de går. Sidst han var ude at gå, så han én blive båret ud af en dørmand og sat på trappen ved siden af, fortæller han.
- Det, synes jeg ikke, er en ordentlig måde at gøre det på.
Dialog
I et opslag på Facebook skriver arrangørerne, at få af dem har mødt Natteravnene foran stedet, og at de gerne vil i dialog med jer om at skabe de bedst mulige rammer.
Det byder Natteravnene velkommen, fortæller Klaus Walbo.
I arrangørernes opslag skriver de også, at unge blot ville drikke sig fulde andre steder, hvis ikke de holdt deres fester.
- Nogle af dem vil sikkert drikke sig fulde andre steder, ja. Men mit bud er, at hvis de gør det hjemme hos nogen, hvor der er forældre, så vil der dels være ansvarlige voksne til stede - forhåbentlig - og dels vil de nok drikke lidt mindre, end de gør et sted som det her, siger han og tilføjer, at det ikke er ofte, de møder unge, der sidder og drikker sig fulde udenfor.
Rive Event kan ikke selv genkende Natteravnenes udlægning af sagen. Læs deres svar i faktaboksen herunder.
Det siger arrangørerne
Politiet er opmærksomme
TV 2
har talt med politiinspektør hos Midt- og Vestsjællands Politi Thomas Tarpgaard, som fortæller, at de er meget opmærksomme på 16+-festerne, som er et nyt fænomen, der særligt er opstået efter coronanedlukningerne.
Ifølge ham promoveres festerne som privatfester, hvilket gør, at loven ikke brydes.
- De, der holder festerne, har jo læst og forstået loven. Man må ikke servere alkohol for mindreårige, og det gør de ikke. De sælger colaer og frugtjuice, så tager de en entrépris, som folk gerne vil betale for at komme ind, så alle de regler, vi kender på bevillingsområdet, er ikke gældende i deres tilfælde, siger han til TV 2.
Kritik
body_en:
You can almost smell the booze and feel the sticky dance floor when you watch the videos that party organizers Rive Event share on their social media from their '16+ parties' in Roskilde.
Here, dancing young people in their stiffest party clothes are seen crowded together, while they sing along to the greatest hits of the time.
It sounds festive, but the events the videos are from, like the organizers behind them, have recently come under heavy criticism.
Many of the videos are shared especially on TikTok, where the upcoming '16+ parties' are advertised, which many 15-year-olds can also participate in. As long as you were born in 2007, you are welcome. 'Even if you are only 15 years old', the organizers write.
Among other
Zealand News
and
TV 2
has referred to the 'party phenomenon' that is promoted on social media and attracts a lot of attention.
Left to one self
Among those who have expressed concern about the events taking place at Hestetorvet in Roskilde is the chairman of the Night Owls in Roskilde, Klaus Walmod.
- Our deepest concern is that we experience drunk young people being put outside the door and left to fend for themselves. And that's regardless of the weather. I think it is worrying that young, drunk people are left to fend for themselves like that, he says to Ekstra Bladet.
The chairman says that several of his colleagues at Natteravnene have seen drunken young people being left to their own devices, and that they are particularly careful to pass the place when they go. The last time he was out for a walk, he saw someone being carried out by a doorman and put on the stairs next to him, he says.
- I don't think that is a proper way to do it.
Dialogue
In a post on Facebook, the organizers write that few of them have met the Night Owls in front of the venue, and that they would like to dialogue with you to create the best possible setting.
The Night Ravens welcome that, says Klaus Walbo.
In the organizers' notices, they also write that young people would simply get drunk elsewhere if they didn't hold their parties.
- Some of them will probably get drunk elsewhere, yes. But my guess is that if they do it at someone's home, where there are parents, there will partly be responsible adults present - hopefully - and partly they will probably drink a little less than they do in a place like this, says he adds that it is not often that they meet young people who sit and get drunk outside.
Rive Event itself cannot recognize the Night Ravens' interpretation of the case. Read their answers in the fact box below.
That's what the organizers say
The police are aware
TV 2
have spoken to police inspector at Central and West Zealand Police Thomas Tarpgaard, who says that they are very aware of the 16+ parties, which are a new phenomenon that has particularly arisen after the corona shutdowns.
According to him, the parties are promoted as private parties, which means that the law is not broken.
- Those who hold the parties have read and understood the law. You can't serve alcohol to minors, and they don't. They sell colas and fruit juices, then they charge an entrance price that people want to pay to get in, so all the rules we know about grants do not apply in their case, he tells TV 2.
Criticism

 'Sjællandske Nyheder' 'Thomas Tarpgaard' 'TikTok' 'TV 2']

title: Ven i chok: - Han har skjult en helt forfærdelig side
subtitle: Det er slet ikke til at forstå for en nær ven til den 32-årige varetægtsfængslede, at han nu også er sigtet for drabet på Emilie Meng
body:
Ordene kan knap komme over læberne på en tæt ven til den 32-årige mand, som nu også er sigtet for drabet på Emilie Meng.
- Jeg ved slet ikke, hvad jeg skal sige ... Det er forfærdeligt. Mit hoved er ikke så superklart lige nu, siger kammeraten gennem 14 år.
Han er åbenlyst i chok, da Ekstra Bladet efter aftale fanger ham på telefonen, kort efter Sydsjællands og Lolland-Falsters Politi på et pressemøde har oplyst offentligheden om, at den 32-årige varetægtsfængslede i kidnapningssagen af en 13-årig pige i Kirkerup nu også er sigtet for drabet på Emilie Meng i 2016 og en tredje
overfaldsepisode på Sorø Gymnastikefterskole 8. november sidste år.
- Det er så surrealistisk. Jeg føler lidt, at jeg har levet i en form for parallelverden. Men mine tanker gik først og fremmest til familierne, særligt Emilies, siger den nære ven.
32-årig sigtet i Emilie Meng-sagen
Føler sig manipuleret
Han har svært ved at koble de brutale sigtelser til den mand, han i årevis har været sammen med i flere forskellige sociale sammenhænge.
- Han har jo haft succes med at skjule en helt forfærdelig side af sig selv. Det har han været utrolig dygtig til ... Jeg føler mig dybt manipuleret, siger vennen.
Den 32-årige mand har delvist erkendt sigtelserne, der drejer sig om bortførelsen af den 13-årige pige i Kirkerup, men han nægter sig ifølge sin forsvarer, Karina Skou, skyldig i de nye sigtelser, der lyder på frihedsberøvelse, voldtægt og drab på Emilie Meng samt trusler med kniv, forsøg på frihedsberøvelse og forsøg på voldtægt på efterskoleeleven.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
Fortalte om afhøring
Ifølge vennen fortalte den nu 32-årige mand for flere år siden, at
han var blevet afhørt i forbindelse med drabet på Emilie Meng
, fordi han på hendes forsvindingstidspunkt ejede en sølvgrå Hyundai i30. Det er den samme bil, som politiet efterlyste i sagen.
Dengang var det dog ikke noget, som man i vennegruppen tænkte nærmere over.
- Ingen lagde mærke til det dengang. Hvis man havde mødt X (navnet på den sigtede, red.) ville det aldrig, aldrig, aldrig slå dig, at det kunne være ham. Vi jokede nærmere med, at han var blevet afhørt, fordi han altid var uheldig,
har kammeraten tidligere udtalt.
Artiklen fortsætter under billedet ...
Krisehjælp
Kilden fortæller videre, at sagen har ramt som et granatchok i vennegruppen. Flere af dem blev i sidste uge kaldt ind til afhøring hos politiet.
- Jeg ved, at de har afhørt de nære og de nærmeste bekendte, og der ved jeg, at Emilie Meng har været et tema, fortæller vennen.
Flere af dem har det 'frygteligt' med sagen og har været nødsaget til at få krisehjælp for at håndtere deres tanker og følelser om den 32-årige mand. Det fortsætter de med efter den nye udvikling i sagen.
- Vi har alle sammen søgt professionelt hjælp for at komme igennem det her, og vi beder nu om ro til at bearbejde chokket, siger vennen.
Afhort2604
body_en:
The words can barely come across the lips of a close friend of the 32-year-old man, who is now also charged with the murder of Emilie Meng.
- I don't even know what to say... It's terrible. My head is not so super clear right now, says the friend of 14 years.
He is obviously in shock when Ekstra Bladet catches him on the phone by agreement, shortly after the South Zealand and Lolland-Falster Police have informed the public at a press conference that the 32-year-old remanded in custody in the kidnapping case of a 13-year-old girl in Kirkerup is now also is charged with the murder of Emilie Meng in 2016 and a third
assault episode at Sorø Gymnastikefterskole on 8 November last year.
- It's so surreal. I kind of feel like I've been living in some kind of parallel world. But my thoughts went first and foremost to the families, especially Emilie's, says the close friend.
32-year-old charged in the Emilie Meng case
Feels manipulated
He finds it difficult to link the brutal charges to the man he has been with for years in several different social contexts.
- After all, he has succeeded in hiding an absolutely terrible side of himself. He has been incredibly good at that ... I feel deeply manipulated, says the friend.
The 32-year-old man has partially admitted the charges relating to the abduction of the 13-year-old girl in Kirkerup, but according to his defender, Karina Skou, he pleads not guilty to the new charges, which include deprivation of liberty, rape and murder Emilie Meng as well as threats with a knife, attempted deprivation of liberty and attempted rape of the after-school student.
The article continues below the picture...
Told about interrogation
According to the friend, the now 32-year-old man told several years ago that
he had been questioned in connection with the murder of Emilie Meng
, because at the time of her disappearance he owned a silver-grey Hyundai i30. It is the same car that the police wanted in the case.
At the time, however, it was not something that was thought about in the group of friends.
- No one noticed it then. If you had met X (the name of the accused, ed.) it would never, never, never strike you that it could be him. We rather joked that he had been interrogated because he was always unlucky,
the comrade has previously stated.
The article continues below the picture...
Crisis aid
The source goes on to say that the case has hit the group of friends like a shell shock. Several of them were last week called in for questioning by the police.
- I know that they have interrogated the close and closest acquaintances, and I know that Emilie Meng has been a theme, says the friend.
Several of them feel 'terrible' about the case and have been forced to get crisis help to deal with their thoughts and feelings about the 32-year-old man. They will continue to do so after the new development in the case.
- We have all sought professional help to get through this, and we are now asking for peace to process the shock, says the friend.
Abhort2604
